plot: A smooth-talking man falls for a hardened columnist while helping a shy accountant woo a beautiful heiress.

name: Ice Age
plot: The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat.

name: Perfect Blue
plot: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

name: My Neighbor Totoro
plot: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

name: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
plot: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days.

name: Alive
plot: After crash-landing in the snowswept Andes, a Uruguayan rugby team has no choice but to turn to desperate measures in order to survive.

name: 13 Going on 30
plot: Unpopular schoolgirl Jenna Rink makes an unusual wish on her birthday. Miraculously, her wish comes true and the 13-year-old Jenna wakes up the next day as a 30-year-old woman.

name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
plot: A newly-engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must seek shelter at the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-n-Furter.

name: There's Something About Mary
plot: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

name: Magnolia
plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

name: Jeepers Creepers
plot: A brother and sister driving home through isolated countryside for spring break encounter a flesh-eating creature which is in the midst of its ritualistic eating spree.

name: Annie
plot: A spunky young orphan is taken in by a rich eccentric, much to the chagrin of the cantankerous woman who runs the orphanage.

name: Raging Bull
plot: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
plot: Teenager Nancy Thompson must uncover the dark truth concealed by her parents after she and her friends become targets of the spirit of a serial killer with a bladed glove in their dreams, in which if they die, it kills them in real life.

name: Collateral
plot: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

name: Weird Science
plot: Two high-school nerds use a computer program to literally create the perfect woman, who promptly turns their lives upside-down.

name: The Piano Teacher
plot: A young man romantically pursues his masochistic piano teacher.

name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
plot: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

name: Closer
plot: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.

name: The Crow: Salvation
plot: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

name: Stalker
plot: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

name: Death Becomes Her
plot: When a fading actress learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.

name: In the Mood for Love
plot: Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

name: The Princess Diaries
plot: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her sixteenth year.

name: Together
plot: In 1975, the dynamics of a Swedish commune begin to change upon the arrival of a beaten wife and her two kids.

name: Shakespeare in Love
plot: The world's greatest ever playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

name: Super Troopers
plot: Five Vermont state troopers, avid pranksters with a knack for screwing up, try to save their jobs and out-do the local police department by solving a crime.

name: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
plot: In the 1970s, an anchorman's stint as San Diego's top-rated newsreader is challenged when an ambitious newswoman becomes his co-anchor.

name: Beauty and the Beast
plot: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

name: The Others
plot: In 1945, immediately following the end of Second World War, a woman who lives with her two photosensitive children on her darkened old family estate in the Channel Islands becomes convinced that the home is haunted.

name: Network
plot: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit, but finds that his message may be difficult to control.

name: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

name: They Live
plot: They influence our decisions without us knowing it. They numb our senses without us feeling it. They control our lives without us realizing it. They live.

name: Fallen
plot: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution, the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

name: Madagascar
plot: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.

name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
plot: After being mistaken for an actor, a New York thief is sent to Hollywood to train under a private eye for a potential movie role, but the duo are thrown together with a struggling actress into a murder mystery.

name: Resident Evil
plot: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.

name: Friday
plot: It's Friday, and Craig and Smokey must come up with $200 they owe a local bully or there won't be a Saturday.

name: The Name of the Rose
plot: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

name: Glory
plot: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

name: The Crow: Wicked Prayer
plot: On his way to becoming an immortal demon, a gang leader orchestrates the murder of an ex-con and his girlfriend.

name: Birth
plot: A young boy attempts to convince a woman that he is her dead husband reborn.

name: Dead Ringers
plot: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

name: Eraserhead
plot: Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.

name: Waiting...
plot: Young employees at ShenaniganZ restaurant collectively stave off boredom and adulthood with their antics.

name: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
plot: Robin Hood decides to fight back as an outlaw when faced with the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham.

name: Demolition Man
plot: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

name: A Walk to Remember
plot: Two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is sentenced to perform community service.

name: The Replacements
plot: During a pro football strike, the owners hire substitute players.

name: 8 Mile
plot: Follows a young rapper in the Detroit area, struggling with every aspect of his life, wants to make it big but his friends and foes make this odyssey of rap harder than it may seem.

name: Jawbreaker
plot: Three of the most popular girls at Reagan High accidentally kill the prom queen with a jawbreaker when a kidnapping goes horribly wrong.

name: Layer Cake
plot: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

name: The Untouchables
plot: During Prohibition, Treasury agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone, and assembles a small, incorruptible team to help him.

name: The Hunt for Red October
plot: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain violates orders and heads for the U.S. in a new undetectable sub. The American CIA and military must quickly determine: Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
plot: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

name: Wrong Turn
plot: Chris and a group of five friends are left stranded deep in the middle of the woods after their cars collide. As they venture deeper into the woods, they face an uncertain and bloodcurdling fate.

name: The Thin Red Line
plot: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

name: Hoosiers
plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small-town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the state championship in 1950s Indiana.

name: Cinema Paradiso
plot: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

name: Mask
plot: A teenager with a massive facial skull deformity and biker gang mother attempt to live as normal a life as possible under the circumstances.

name: Face/Off
plot: To foil a terrorist plot, FBI agent Sean Archer assumes the identity of the criminal Castor Troy who murdered his son through facial transplant surgery, but the crook wakes up prematurely and vows revenge.

name: Bound
plot: Tough ex-con Corky and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.

name: Cocoon
plot: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigor.

name: The Blair Witch Project
plot: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

name: Being John Malkovich
plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

name: Heathers
plot: At Westerburg High where cliques rule, jocks dominate and all the popular girls are named Heather, it's going to take a Veronica and mysterious new kid to give teen angst a body count.

name: The Running Man
plot: In a dystopian America, a falsely convicted policeman gets his shot at freedom when he must forcibly participate in a TV game show where convicts, runners, must battle killers for their freedom.

name: Men in Black II
plot: Agent J is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory after the re-appearance of a case from K's past.

name: Hellboy
plot: A demon raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

name: Three Men and a Baby
plot: Jack Holden and his friends, Peter and Michael, spend most of their time having flings with several women in their apartment. Their life changes when a mysterious baby appears at their doorstep.

name: My Best Friend's Wedding
plot: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

name: The Sting
plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

name: Spaceballs
plot: A star-pilot for hire and his trusty sidekick must come to the rescue of a princess and save Planet Druidia from the clutches of the evil Spaceballs.

name: As Good as It Gets
plot: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

name: Twins
plot: A physically perfect but innocent man goes in search of his long-lost twin brother, who is short, a womanizer, and small-time crook.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
plot: Five friends head out to rural Texas to visit the grave of a grandfather. On the way they stumble across what appears to be a deserted house, only to discover something sinister within. Something armed with a chainsaw.

name: Empire of the Sun
plot: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.

name: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
plot: A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

name: Saturday Night Fever
plot: Anxious about his future after high school, a 19-year-old Italian-American from Brooklyn tries to escape the harsh reality of his bleak family life by dominating the dance floor at the local disco.

name: My Girl
plot: Vada is obsessed with death. Her mother is dead, and her father runs a funeral parlor. When Vada's father hires Shelly, a makeup expert, and begins to fall in love, Vada is outraged and does everything in her power to split them up.

name: Rollerball
plot: In a corporate-controlled future, an ultra-violent sport known as Rollerball represents the world, and one of its powerful athletes is out to defy those who want him out of the game.

name: To Die For
plot: A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.

name: Last Tango in Paris
plot: A young Parisian woman meets a middle-aged American businessman who demands their clandestine relationship be based only on sex.

name: Mortal Kombat
plot: Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.

name: The Little Mermaid
plot: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

name: The Conversation
plot: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.

name: Striptease
plot: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

name: The Little Rascals
plot: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

name: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
plot: Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town.

name: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
plot: A world-class playboy and part-time secret agent from the 1960s emerges after thirty years in a cryogenic state to battle with his nemesis Dr. Evil.

name: Mona Lisa Smile
plot: A free-thinking art professor teaches conservative 1950s Wellesley girls to question their traditional social roles.

name: Naked
plot: An unemployed Mancunian vents his rage on unsuspecting strangers as he embarks on a nocturnal London odyssey.

name: The Prince of Egypt
plot: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

name: Weekend at Bernie's
plot: Two idiots try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

name: Deep Impact
plot: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepares for the worst.

name: Mission: Impossible II
plot: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

name: Die Hard with a Vengeance
plot: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

name: Rush Hour
plot: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

name: Barry Lyndon
plot: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

name: Vanilla Sky
plot: A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.

name: City Slickers
plot: On the verge of turning 40, an unhappy Manhattan yuppie is roped into joining his two friends on a cattle drive in the southwest.

name: Tarzan
plot: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

name: Licence to Kill
plot: A vengeful James Bond goes rogue to infiltrate and take down the organization of a drug lord who has murdered his friend's new wife and left him near death.

name: Halloween
plot: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

name: Underworld
plot: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

name: Little Shop of Horrors
plot: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

name: Coach Carter
plot: Controversy surrounds high school basketball coach Ken Carter after he benches his entire team for breaking their academic contract with him.

name: The Village
plot: A series of events tests the beliefs of a small isolated countryside village.

name: Cry-Baby
plot: In 1950s Baltimore, a bad boy with a heart of gold wins the love of a good girl, whose boyfriend sets out for revenge.

name: What Every Frenchwoman Wants
plot: A teenager returns home to spend his summer vacation. However, in a mansion full of women, he will have no choice but to expand his education in titillating ways.

name: 50 First Dates
plot: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.

name: The Fly
plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

name: The Beach
plot: On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise.

name: Fatal Attraction
plot: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

name: Lilo & Stitch
plot: A young and parentless girl adopts a 'dog' from the local pound, completely unaware that it's supposedly a dangerous scientific experiment that's taken refuge on Earth and is now hiding from its creator and those who see it as a menace.

name: King Arthur
plot: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

name: The Jerk
plot: A simpleminded, sheltered country boy suddenly decides to leave his family home to experience life in the big city, where his naivete is both his best friend and his worst enemy.

name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
plot: Roy Neary, an Indiana electric lineman, finds his quiet and ordinary daily life turned upside down after a close encounter with a UFO, spurring him to an obsessed cross-country quest for answers as a momentous event approaches.

name: Alice Doesn't Live Here Anymore
plot: A recently widowed woman is on the road with her precocious young son, determined to make a new life for herself as a singer.

name: The Evil Dead
plot: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.

name: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

name: Mrs. Doubtfire
plot: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

name: Ocean's Twelve
plot: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's Eleven (2001).

name: Serenity
plot: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

name: The Emperor's New Groove
plot: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

name: Hellraiser
plot: A woman discovers the newly resurrected, partially formed, body of her brother-in-law and lover. She starts killing for him to revitalize his body and escape the demonic beings that are pursuing him after he escaped their underworld.

name: Caddyshack
plot: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a flatulent new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

name: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
plot: A young man in a small Midwestern town struggles to care for his mentally-disabled younger brother and morbidly obese mother while attempting to pursue his own happiness.

name: Philadelphia
plot: When a man with HIV is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

name: Mars Attacks!
plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

name: Signs
plot: A widowed former reverend living with his children and brother on a Pennsylvania farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields, which suggests something more frightening to come.

name: Capote
plot: In 1959, Truman Capote learns of the murder of a Kansas family and decides to write a book about the case. While researching for his novel In Cold Blood, Capote forms a relationship with one of the killers, Perry Smith, who is on death row.

name: Punch-Drunk Love
plot: Socially frustrated Barry Egan calls a phone-sex line to curb his loneliness. Little does he know it will land him in deep trouble and will jeopardize his burgeoning romance with the mysterious Lena.

name: Fiddler on the Roof
plot: In pre-revolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant with traditional values contends with marrying off three of his daughters with modern romantic ideals while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

name: Masters of the Universe
plot: The heroic warrior He-Man battles against the evil lord Skeletor and his armies of darkness for control of Castle Grayskull.

name: Big Fat Liar
plot: Fourteen-year-old Jason Shepherd has a reputation for stretching the truth. So, when big-time Hollywood producer Marty Wolf steals his class paper and turns it into a smash hit movie, no one believes Jason's latest tall tale.

name: Unbreakable
plot: A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

name: Zoolander
plot: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

name: Hairspray
plot: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

name: The Italian Job
plot: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

name: The Chronicles of Riddick
plot: The wanted criminal Richard Bruno Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

name: Red Dragon
plot: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

name: Poltergeist
plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.

name: The Mask of Zorro
plot: A young thief seeking revenge for his brother's death is trained by the once-great, aging Zorro, who is pursuing his own vengeance.

name: House of 1000 Corpses
plot: Two young couples traveling across the backwoods of Texas searching for urban legends of murder end up as prisoners of a bizarre and sadistic backwater family of serial killers.

name: When Harry Met Sally...
plot: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

name: Anastasia
plot: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

name: Steel Magnolias
plot: A young beautician, newly arrived in a small Louisiana town, finds work at the local salon, where a small group of women share a close bond of friendship, and welcome her into the fold.

name: Empire Records
plot: Twenty-four hours in the lives of the young employees at Empire Records when they all grow up and become young adults thanks to each other and the manager. They all face the store joining a chain store with strict rules.

name: Pretty in Pink
plot: A poor girl must choose between the affections of dating her childhood sweetheart or a rich but sensitive playboy.

name: Smokey and the Bandit
plot: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor-trailer full of beer over state lines, in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.

name: Hostel
plot: Three backpackers head to a Slovak city that promises to meet their hedonistic expectations, with no idea of the hell that awaits them.

name: Sophie's Choice
plot: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

name: Leviathan
plot: Perched on the hull of a wrecked Soviet freighter, a team of deep-sea miners led by head oceanographer Steven Beck comes face to face with a mutant creature that's the product of a failed genetic experiment.
In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

name: The Birdcage
plot: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing moralistic parents.

name: The Transporter
plot: Frank Martin, who "transports" packages for unknown clients, is asked to move a package that soon begins moving, and complications arise.

name: The Piano
plot: In the mid-19th century a mute woman is sent to New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a farmer, but is soon lusted after by a farm worker.

name: Shark Tale
plot: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

name: Falling Down
plot: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

name: La haine
plot: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
plot: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

name: The Basketball Diaries
plot: A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.

name: Slap Shot
plot: A failing ice hockey team finds success with outrageously violent hockey goonery.

name: The Vanishing
plot: The boyfriend of an abducted woman never gives up the search as the abductor looks on.

name: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
plot: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

name: First Knight
plot: Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is due to be married to King Arthur. Meanwhile, a violent warlord tries to seize power from Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table.

name: Akira
plot: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

name: The Bone Collector
plot: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

name: Alexander
plot: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest army leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.

name: M*A*S*H
plot: The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and high jinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.

name: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
plot: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

name: Double Jeopardy
plot: A woman framed for her husband's murder suspects he is still alive; as she has already been tried for the crime, she can't be re-prosecuted if she finds and kills him.

name: The Faculty
plot: When Casey Connor, Herrington High School's newspaper photographer, witnesses the murder of a nurse and sees her alive again, he decides to investigate the bizarre happenings.

name: Me, Myself & Irene
plot: A nice-guy cop with Dissociative Identity Disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.

name: Trading Places
plot: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

name: Toy Story 2
plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

name: Manhunter
plot: Former FBI profiler Will Graham returns to service to pursue a deranged serial killer dubbed "the Tooth Fairy" by the media.

name: An American Werewolf in London
plot: Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.

name: Deathstalker
plot: A lone warrior nicknamed Deathstalker is sent by a witch on a quest to find a sword, a chalice, and an amulet, two of which are held by the wicked king and sorcerer, Munkar.

name: Young Frankenstein
plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

name: Identity
plot: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

name: Field of Dreams
plot: Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.

name: Rambo: First Blood Part II
plot: Rambo returns to the jungles of Vietnam on a mission to infiltrate an enemy base-camp and rescue the American POWs still held captive there.

name: The Aviator
plot: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

name: Blood In, Blood Out
plot: Based on the true life experiences of poet Jimmy Santiago Baca, the film focuses on step-brothers Paco and Cruz, and their bi-racial cousin Miklo.

name: Meet the Fockers
plot: All hell breaks loose when the Byrnes family meets the Focker family for the first time.

name: Blade: Trinity
plot: Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula.

name: Air Force One
plot: Communist radicals hijack Air Force One with the U.S. President and his family on board. The Vice President negotiates from Washington D.C., while the President, a veteran, fights to rescue the hostages on board.

name: Meet the Parents
plot: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

name: The Iron Giant
plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

name: Uncle Buck
plot: Laid back commitment-phobe Buck babysits his brother's rebellious teenage daughter and her cute younger brother and sister.

name: The Room
plot: In San Francisco, an amiable banker's seemingly perfect life is turned upside down when his deceitful fiancée embarks on an affair with his best friend.

name: Peter Pan
plot: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

name: Gone in 60 Seconds
plot: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

name: Killing Me Softly
plot: A young American woman living in London begins a passionate and kinky affair with a handsome stranger who may have a dark and dangerous past.

name: That Thing You Do!
plot: A local Pennsylvania band scores a one-hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from their manager.

name: Willow
plot: A young farmer is chosen to undertake a perilous journey in order to protect a special baby from an evil queen.

name: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
plot: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

name: Charlie's Angels
plot: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

name: Funny Games
plot: Two violent young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.

name: 2 Fast 2 Furious
plot: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

name: Cold Mountain
plot: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.

name: 101 Dalmatians
plot: An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat but creates an extravagant mess instead.

name: Dogville
plot: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado community in exchange for labor, but when a search visits the town she finds out that their support has a price.

name: Silverado
plot: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

name: Grumpy Old Men
plot: A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

name: Adaptation.
plot: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.

name: Green Street Hooligans
plot: A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.

name: The 'Burbs
plot: An overstressed suburbanite and his neighbors are convinced that the new family on the block is part of a murderous Satanic cult.

name: Miss Congeniality
plot: An F.B.I. Agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
plot: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

name: Liar Liar
plot: A pathological liar-lawyer finds his career turned upside down when he inexplicably cannot physically lie for 24 whole hours.

name: Bloodsport
plot: "Bloodsport" follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

name: The Mummy Returns
plot: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

name: Das Boot
plot: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

name: Commando
plot: A retired Special Forces colonel tries to save his daughter, who was abducted by his former subordinate.

name: He Knows You're Alone
plot: A young bride-to-be is being stalked upon by a serial killer in Staten Island. She gets help from a former lover, but will they manage to escape?

name: Street Fighter
plot: In the midst of a civil war in South East Asia, a general intensifies the climate of violence by kidnapping 63 UN delegates. To free the hostages, a colonel leads a group of fighters, who will have to use all their skills to be successful.

name: The Wedding Singer
plot: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

name: Rat Race
plot: A Las Vegas casino magnate determined to find a new avenue for wagering sets up a race for money.

name: The Longest Yard
plot: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

name: The Punisher
plot: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.

name: Traffic
plot: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife attempts to carry on the family business.

name: Wild at Heart
plot: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

name: Road to Perdition
plot: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

name: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
plot: A young linguist named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

name: Friday the 13th
plot: A group of teenage camp counselors attempt to re-open an abandoned summer camp with a tragic past, but they are stalked by a mysterious, relentless killer.

name: Gremlins
plot: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

name: Waking Ned Devine
plot: When a lottery winner dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim the money.

name: Inventing the Abbotts
plot: Two working class brothers court three wealthy and beautiful sisters in a small Illinois town.

name: Equilibrium
plot: In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.

name: Treasure Planet
plot: Jim Hawkins is a teenager who finds the map of a great treasure hidden by a space pirate. Together with some friends, he sets off in a large spaceship, shaped like a caravel, on his quest.

name: Chopper
plot: Chopper tells the intense story of Mark "Chopper" Read, a legendary criminal who wrote his autobiography while serving a jail sentence in prison. His book, "From the Inside", upon which the film is based, was a best-seller.

name: Miller's Crossing
plot: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

name: Awakenings
plot: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

name: Robots
plot: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.

name: Sky High
plot: Set in an era where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.

name: Enemy of the State
plot: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

name: Cabaret
plot: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

name: Ghost in the Shell
plot: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

name: Bottle Rocket
plot: Three friends plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

name: Fantastic Four
plot: A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom.

name: The Royal Tenenbaums
plot: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.

name: Big
plot: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
plot: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding loon and his family of equally psychopathic killers.

name: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
plot: At Le Hollandais gourmet restaurant, every night is filled with opulence, decadence and gluttony. But when the cook, a thief, his wife and her lover all come together, they unleash a shocking torrent of sex, food, murder and revenge.

name: Audition
plot: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.

name: Carlito's Way
plot: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

name: Earth Girls Are Easy
plot: A Southern California girl befriends three furry aliens after their spaceship lands in her swimming pool.

name: Chocolat
plot: A French woman and her young daughter open up a chocolate shop in a small remote village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.

name: Donnie Brasco
plot: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the Mafia life--at the expense of his regular one.

name: Jurassic Park III
plot: A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.

name: Red Dawn
plot: It is the dawn of World War III. In the west mountains of America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.

name: Hope Floats
plot: Birdee Calvert must choose between her morals and her heart after her husband divorces her and a charming young man, who her daughter disapproves of, comes back into her life.

name: Wayne's World
plot: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

name: Revenge of the Nerds
plot: At Adams College, a group of bullied outcasts and misfits resolve to fight back for their peace and self-respect.

name: Romancing the Stone
plot: A mousy romance novelist sets off for Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure hunting for treasure with a mercenary rogue.

name: Munich
plot: After the Black September capture and massacre of Israeli athletes at the 1972 Olympics, five men are chosen to eliminate the people responsible for that fateful day.

name: Flashdance
plot: An 18-year-old female amateur dancer who performs nightly at a dancing bar, and works as a welder during the day, dreams of joining the Pittsburgh ballet school.

name: Local Hero
plot: An American oil company has plans for a new refinery and sends someone to Scotland to buy up an entire village, but things don't go as expected.

name: Breakfast on Pluto
plot: In the 1970s, a young trans woman, Patrick "Kitten" Braden, comes of age by leaving her Irish town for London, in part to look for her mother and in part because her gender identity is beyond the town's understanding.

name: Hackers
plot: Teenage hackers discover a criminal conspiracy with plans to use a computer virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

name: Mysterious Skin
plot: Two pre-adolescent boys both experienced a strange event and later it affects their lives in different ways. One becomes a reckless, sexually adventurous prostitute, while the other retreats into a reclusive fantasy of alien abduction.

name: Freaky Friday
plot: An overworked mother and her daughter did not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.

name: Frida
plot: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

name: Brazil
plot: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

name: Lord of War
plot: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an INTERPOL Agent.

name: Dreamcatcher
plot: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

name: The Time Machine
plot: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

name: Alien vs. Predator
plot: During an archaeological expedition on Bouvetøya Island in Antarctica, a team of archaeologists and other scientists find themselves caught up in a battle between the two legends. Soon, the team realize that only one species can win.

name: Mannequin
plot: A young artist, searching for his vocation, makes a mannequin so perfect he falls in love with it. Finding the mannequin in a store window, he gets a job there and his creation comes to life.

name: Under the Tuscan Sun
plot: Frances Mayes, a 35-year-old San Francisco writer, gets a divorce that leaves her with terminal writer's block and depression. Later, she decides to buy a house in Tuscany in order to change her life.

name: Out of Africa
plot: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

name: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
plot: Video game adventurer Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

name: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
plot: The Brothers Grimm arrive at the home of a wealthy Grande Dame who speaks of the many legends surrounding the fable of the cinder girl before telling the "true" story of her ancestor.

name: Cocktail
plot: A talented New York City bartender takes a job at a bar in Jamaica and falls in love.

name: In the Name of the Father
plot: An Irish man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. Meanwhile, a British lawyer fights to clear their names and free them.

name: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
plot: Central Europe, 1968: A Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

name: Panic Room
plot: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.

name: Coyote Ugly
plot: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.

name: Spy Kids
plot: Using high tech gadgets, two kids have to save their reactivated OSS top spy parents when they're taken by an evil, high tech enemy.

name: Medicine Man
plot: In the beautiful and dangerous Amazon rainforest, dissimilar people must make their choices between business, science, and love.

name: Adventures in Babysitting
plot: A babysitter must battle her way through the big city after being stranded there with the kids she's looking after.

name: Hollow Man
plot: A brilliant scientist's discovery renders him invisible, but transforms him into an omnipotent, dangerous megalomaniac.

name: The Blob
plot: A deadly entity from space crash-lands near a small town and begins consuming everyone in its path. Panic ensues as shady government scientists try to contain the horrific creature.

name: Bye Bye Love
plot: A story about the family breakup of three divorced men. The film presented their perspective and it reveals their relationship with their children, ex-wives, girl friends, male friendships, and their identities as divorced men.

name: October Sky
plot: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

name: Thir13en Ghosts
plot: When Cyrus Kriticos, a very rich collector of unique things, dies, he leaves his house, fortune, and his prized collection of ghosts.

name: WarGames
plot: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

name: Lethal Weapon
plot: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

name: Ran
plot: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

name: Children of the Corn
plot: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believes that everyone over age 18 must be killed.

name: Tron
plot: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

name: JFK
plot: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

name: Super Mario Bros.
plot: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

name: Annie Hall
plot: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.

name: Last Action Hero
plot: With the help of a magic ticket, a young movie fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action movie character.
The epic tale of a class struggle in twentieth-century Italy as seen through the eyes of two childhood friends on opposing sides.

name: Four Weddings and a Funeral
plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

name: Transporter 2
plot: Transporter Frank Martin, surfaces in Miami, Florida and is implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful USA official.

name: Secondhand Lions
plot: Fourteen-year-old Walter Caldwell's irresponsible mother Mae sends him to live with his bachelor uncles, Hub and Garth, so that she can go on yet another husband-hunting trip.

name: The Island
plot: A man living in a futuristic sterile colony begins to question his circumscribed existence when his friend is chosen to go to the Island, the last uncontaminated place on earth.

name: The Spy Who Loved Me
plot: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent whose lover he killed.

name: The Man in the Iron Mask
plot: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

name: The Hot Chick
plot: An attractive and popular teenager, who is mean-spirited toward others, finds herself in the body of an older man, and must find a way to get back to her original body.

name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
plot: Two rock-'n-rolling teens, on the verge of failing their class, set out on a quest to make the ultimate school history report after being presented with a time machine.

name: Papillon
plot: A French convict in the 1930s befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence in the South American penal colony on Devil's Island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

name: Frailty
plot: A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."

name: The Adventures of Milo and Otis
plot: The adventures of a young cat and a dog as they find themselves accidentally separated and each swept into a hazardous trek.

name: Space Jam
plot: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

name: Bruce Almighty
plot: A whiny news reporter is given the chance to step into God's shoes.

name: In the Realm of the Senses
plot: A passionate telling of the story of Sada Abe, a woman whose affair with her master led to an obsessive and ultimately destructive sexual relationship.

name: Young Guns
plot: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

name: The Secret Garden
plot: A young, recently-orphaned girl is sent to England after living in India all of her life. Once there, she begins to explore her new, seemingly-isolated surroundings, and its secrets.

name: The Crying Game
plot: A British soldier kidnapped by the IRA soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

name: Elektra
plot: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.

name: King Kong
plot: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

name: Joy Ride
plot: Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychopathic killer.

name: In the Cut
plot: New York City writing professor, Frannie Avery, has an affair with a police detective who is investigating the murder of a beautiful young woman in her neighborhood.

name: A River Runs Through It
plot: Two sons of a stern minister - one reserved, one rebellious - grow up in rural 1920s Montana while devoted to fly fishing.

name: Beethoven
plot: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but must contend with a dog-napping veterinarian and his henchmen.

name: Billy Madison
plot: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

name: The Cat in the Hat
plot: Two bored children have their lives turned upside down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

name: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
plot: In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, science fiction, and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.

name: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
plot: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

name: Kiki's Delivery Service
plot: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

name: Ordinary People
plot: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father and the guilt-ridden younger son.

name: Tommy Boy
plot: After his auto-parts tycoon father dies, the overweight, underachieving son teams up with a snide accountant to try and save the family business.

name: Blade II
plot: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reapers, who are feeding on vampires.

name: Dog Day Afternoon
plot: Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

name: Picture of Beauty
plot: In an early 20th century village, a painter with an unusual commission finds two pretty girls to model for him. The girls slowly come of age while exploring their sexuality and finding liberation in a repressed society.

name: The Last Boy Scout
plot: A private detective's protected female witness is murdered, prompting him and the victim's boyfriend to investigate the crime that leads to a corrupt politician and a crooked football team owner.

name: 9½ Weeks
plot: A woman becomes involved with a man she barely knows. Complications develop during their sexual escapades.

name: Top Secret!
plot: An American rock and roll singer is invited to a cultural festival in East Germany in order to distract from a plot to destroy NATO submarines, but he accidentally becomes involved in a resistance plot to rescue an imprisoned scientist.

name: Scary Movie 2
plot: Four teens are tricked by Professor Oldman (Tim Curry) into visiting a haunted house for a school project.

name: The Whole Nine Yards
plot: A struggling dentist's life is turned upside down when a famous gangster moves in next door, and his wife convinces him to inform a notorious mob boss about the gangster's whereabouts.

name: Die Another Day
plot: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

name: The Devils
plot: In 17th-century France, Father Urbain Grandier's protection of the city of Loudun from the corrupt Cardinal Richelieu is undermined by a sexually repressed nun's accusation of witchcraft.

name: What a Girl Wants
plot: An American teenager learns that her father is a wealthy British politician running for office. Although she is eager to find him, she realizes it could cause a scandal and cost him the election.

name: Scream 2
plot: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sidney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

name: Querelle
plot: A handsome sailor is drawn into a vortex of sibling rivalry, murder, and explosive sexuality.

name: The Tin Drum
plot: In 1924, Oskar Matzerath is born in the Free City of Danzig. At age three, he falls down a flight of stairs and stops growing. In 1939, World War II breaks out.

name: Rushmore
plot: A teenager at Rushmore Academy falls for a much older teacher and befriends a middle-aged industrialist. Later, he finds out that his love interest and his friend are having an affair, which prompts him to begin a vendetta.

name: Swingers
plot: A wannabe actor has a hard time moving on from a break-up, but he is lucky to have supportive friends.

name: Major League
plot: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a purposely horrible team so they'll lose and she can move the team. But when the plot is uncovered, they start winning just to spite her.

name: Life of Brian
plot: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

name: The Big Hit
plot: Socially anxious hitman Melvin Smiley, an expert in his lucrative field, goes on a job and falls in love with his kidnapping victim, turning his world upside down.

name: Havoc
plot: Two affluent suburban girls clash with the Latino gang culture of East Los Angeles.

name: The Mighty Ducks
plot: A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

name: Mississippi Burning
plot: Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

name: Fire in the Sky
plot: An Arizona logger mysteriously disappears for five days in an alleged encounter with a flying saucer in 1975. His co-workers endure ridicule and contempt as they are wrongly accused of murder.

name: Bridget Jones's Diary
plot: Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.

name: Logan's Run
plot: A police officer in the future uncovers the deadly secret behind a society that worships youth.

name: The Wicker Man
plot: A puritan police sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl, who the pagan locals claim never existed.

name: Class
plot: A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, and only later does he learn more about the woman who enlivened his night.

name: The Poseidon Adventure
plot: A group of passengers must embark on a harrowing struggle for survival after a rogue wave capsizes their cruise ship at sea.

name: Cheaper by the Dozen
plot: With his wife on a book tour, Tom Baker finds his life turned upside down when he agrees to care for his twelve children while simultaneously also coaching his new football team.

name: House of Wax
plot: A group of teens are unwittingly stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.

name: The Thomas Crown Affair
plot: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

name: Monster's Ball
plot: After a family tragedy, a racist prison guard re-examines his attitudes while falling in love with the African-American wife of the last prisoner he executed.

name: The Craft
plot: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft, and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who anger them.

name: A Little Princess
plot: Sara is sent to a strict boarding school after her father enlists in WWI. When he is presumed dead, the headmistress, knowing she will not receive any more money, forces the girl to become a servant.

name: Nickelodeon
plot: Buck and lawyer Leo accidentally get into movie production in the early days (1910).

name: Jarhead
plot: A psychological study of Marine's state of mind during the Gulf War. Told through the eyes of a U.S. Marine sniper who struggles to cope with boredom, a sense of isolation, and other issues back home.

name: Vacation
plot: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

name: Gosford Park
plot: Set in the 1930s, a group of pretentious rich and famous get together for a weekend of relaxation at a hunting resort. But when a murder occurs, each one of these interesting characters becomes a suspect.

name: Pink Flamingos
plot: Notorious Baltimore criminal and underground figure Divine goes up against a sleazy married couple who make a passionate attempt to humiliate her and seize her tabloid-given title as "The Filthiest Person Alive".

name: Sling Blade
plot: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

name: Rollerball
plot: The big thing in 2005 is a violent sport which can have some pretty serious consequences... like dying.

name: We Were Soldiers
plot: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news.

name: Clear and Present Danger
plot: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

name: 9 to 5
plot: Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.

name: The Pacifier
plot: Having recovered from wounds received in a failed rescue operation, Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.

name: The Last Temptation of Christ
plot: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

name: Fortress
plot: After being kidnapped for ransom by four criminals, a schoolteacher and her students flee into a cave and build fortifications in anticipation of a decisive battle with their captors.

name: Wall Street
plot: An impatient young stockbroker is willing to do anything to get to the top, including trading on illegal inside information taken through a ruthless, greedy corporate raider who takes the youth under his wing.

name: Blast from the Past
plot: A naive man comes out into the world after spending 35 years in a nuclear fallout shelter.

name: The Mexican
plot: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

name: Serpico
plot: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

name: Go
plot: The aftermath of a drug deal as told from three different points of view.

name: Chaplin
plot: An elderly Charlie Chaplin discusses his autobiography with his editor, recounting his amazing journey from his poverty-stricken childhood to world-wide success after the ingenious invention of the Little Tramp.

name: The Little Vampire
plot: A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.

name: Open Range
plot: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

name: Live and Let Die
plot: James Bond is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organisation and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

name: High Fidelity
plot: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

name: Pitch Black
plot: A transport ship crashes and leaves its crew stranded on a desert planet inhabited by bloodthirsty creatures that come out during an eclipse.

name: The Devil's Own
plot: A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.

name: Valley Girl
plot: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

name: Back to School
plot: To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.

name: The Terminal
plot: An Eastern European tourist unexpectedly finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.

name: Ella Enchanted
plot: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new stepfamily in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.

name: Hocus Pocus
plot: A teenage boy named Max and his little sister move to Salem, where he struggles to fit in before awakening a trio of diabolical witches that were executed in the 17th century.

name: Back to the Future Part III
plot: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.

name: Desperado
plot: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.

name: Following
plot: A young writer who follows strangers for material meets a thief who takes him under his wing.

name: Witness
plot: While protecting an Amish boy - who is the sole witness to a brutal murder - and his mother, a detective is forced to seek refuge within their community when his own life is threatened.

name: Swordfish
plot: A covert counter-terrorist unit called Black Cell led by Gabriel Shear wants the money to help finance their war against international terrorism, but it's all locked away. Gabriel brings in convicted hacker Stanley Jobson to help him.

name: Hulk
plot: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

name: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
plot: Four armed men hijack a New York City subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. The city's police are faced with a conundrum: Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

name: Maid in Manhattan
plot: A Senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite, when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.

name: Love & Basketball
plot: Monica and Quincy love and play basketball together through many life challenges from childhood to adulthood.

name: Gandhi
plot: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

name: Parenthood
plot: Four Buckman siblings attempt to raise their children - each in their own different style - and deal with the joys and sorrows that the process brings.

name: What Women Want
plot: A cocky, chauvinistic advertising executive magically acquires the ability to hear what women are thinking.

name: The Living Daylights
plot: James Bond is sent to investigate a KGB policy to kill all enemy spies, and uncovers an arms deal that potentially has major global ramifications.

name: National Lampoon's Van Wilder
plot: The most popular kid on campus meets a beautiful journalist who makes him realize that maybe he's afraid to graduate.

name: The Rules of Attraction
plot: The incredibly spoiled and overprivileged students of Camden College are a backdrop for an unusual love triangle between a drug dealer, a virgin and a bisexual classmate.

name: Wyatt Earp
plot: From Wichita to Dodge City, to the O.K. Corral in Tombstone, a man becomes a myth in this thrilling journey of romance, adventure, and desperate heroic action.

name: The Insider
plot: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a 60 Minutes exposé on Big Tobacco.

name: The Firm
plot: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

name: What Dreams May Come
plot: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

name: Murder by Death
plot: Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.

name: Castle in the Sky
plot: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

name: Dick Tracy
plot: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

name: The Matrix Revolutions
plot: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

name: Wild Wild West
plot: The two best special agents in the Wild West must save President Grant from the clutches of a diabolical, wheelchair-bound, steampunk-savvy, Confederate scientist bent on revenge for losing the Civil War.

name: Little Women
plot: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

name: Splash
plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid he briefly encountered as a boy and falls in love with her without knowing her secret.

name: Rookie of the Year
plot: When an accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, he becomes a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.

name: Kung Fu Hustle
plot: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

name: Cure
plot: A frustrated detective deals with the case of several gruesome murders committed by people who have no recollection of what they've done.

name: The Accused
plot: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

name: Strange Days
plot: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

name: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
plot: Laura Palmer's harrowing final days are chronicled one year after the murder of Teresa Banks, a resident of Twin Peaks' neighboring town.

name: The Wraith
plot: In a small town in Arizona, a mysterious man/spirit descends from the sky and manifests in a sports car and targets a local violent road-racing gang of motor heads, headed by a ruthless bully who'll do anything to get what he wants.

name: The Rocketeer
plot: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high-flying masked hero.

name: Child's Play
plot: A struggling single mother unknowingly gifts her son a doll imbued with a serial killer's consciousness.

name: Dead Alive
plot: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

name: Species
plot: A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.

name: The Voyeur
plot: A troubled college professor becomes obsessed with the idea that his emotionally distant wife is having an affair with his invalid father.

name: Red Heat
plot: A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.

name: Tootsie
plot: Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

name: Fun with Dick and Jane
plot: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

name: Real Genius
plot: An uptight teenage prodigy enters a top engineering college, but feels awkward among the freewheeling students. When a professor aims to turn their laser project into a military weapon, he and his offbeat roommate plot to ruin the plan.

name: Jagged Edge
plot: A wealthy woman is murdered in her beach house. The husband is allegedly knocked out first. He inherits all. He has a female ex criminal prosecutor represent him in court.

name: Father of the Bride
plot: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

name: Pocahontas
plot: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.

name: Mean Creek
plot: When a teen is bullied, his brother and friends lure the bully into the woods to seek revenge.

name: The Ninth Gate
plot: A book broker discovers his latest find may summon Satan.

name: Body Heat
plot: During an extreme heatwave, a beautiful Florida woman and a seedy lawyer engage in an affair while plotting the murder of her rich husband.

name: Cop Land
plot: The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

name: Pet Sematary
plot: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.

name: Sorcerer
plot: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous Latin American jungle.

name: Tourist Trap
plot: A group of young friends stranded at a secluded roadside museum are stalked by a masked assailant who uses his telekinetic powers to control the attraction's mannequins.

name: Suspiria
plot: An American newcomer to a prestigious German ballet academy comes to realize that the school is a front for something sinister amid a series of grisly murders.

name: Flight of the Navigator
plot: In 1978, a boy travels eight years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

name: Rounders
plot: A young, reformed gambler must return to playing high stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks, while balancing his relationship with his girlfriend and his commitments to law school.

name: What Lies Beneath
