plot: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

name: Kramer vs. Kramer
plot: After his wife leaves him, a work-obsessed Manhattan advertising executive is forced to learn long-neglected parenting skills, but a heated custody battle over the couple's young son deepens the wounds left by the separation.

name: The Last Emperor
plot: Bernardo Bertolucci's Oscar-winning dramatisation of the life story of China's last emperor, Pu Yi.

name: A View to a Kill
plot: The recovery of a microchip from the body of a fellow British secret agent leads James Bond to a mad industrialist scheming to cause massive destruction.

name: A Room with a View
plot: Lucy Honeychurch (Helena Bonham Carter) shares a brief romance with George Emerson in Florence. Yet as she tries to move on with her life and look for marriage elsewhere, can she truly forget the events of that summer?

name: Joe Kidd
plot: An ex-bounty hunter reluctantly helps a wealthy landowner and his henchmen track down a Mexican revolutionary leader.

name: The Man in the Moon
plot: A coming of age story set in the south of the U.S. when Elvis was King.

name: The Manchurian Candidate
plot: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

name: Howard the Duck
plot: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invasion with the help of a nerdy scientist and a struggling female rock singer.

name: Career Opportunities
plot: Jim is the dorky son of a local cement contractor who lives at home and has no direction. Josie is the gorgeous daughter of a wealthy businessman who dreams of leaving town. They find they have a lot in common.

name: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
plot: Five siblings are left alone all summer when their mom leaves town and the evil babysitter bites the dust.

name: Flash Gordon
plot: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.

name: Predator 2
plot: The Predator returns to Earth, this time to stake a claim on the war-torn streets of a dystopian Los Angeles.

name: Final Destination 2
plot: Death is stalking Kimberly Corman and multiple survivors of a deadly highway accident.

name: Jacob's Ladder
plot: Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam War veteran attempts to uncover his past while suffering from a severe case of dissociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusions, and perceptions of death.

name: The Lair of the White Worm
plot: When an archaeologist uncovers a strange skull in a foreign land, the residents of a nearby town begin to disappear, leading to further inexplicable occurrences.

name: Jason X
plot: Jason Voorhees is cryogenically frozen at the beginning of the 21st century, and is discovered in the 25th century and taken to space. He gets thawed, and begins stalking and killing the crew of the spaceship that's transporting him.

name: The Frighteners
plot: After a tragic car accident that kills his wife, a man discovers he can communicate with the dead, and he uses that gift to con people. However, when a demonic spirit appears, he may be the only one who can stop it from killing the living and the dead.

name: Heavenly Creatures
plot: Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

name: Endless Love
plot: Parental disapproval of a passionate romance between two teenagers leads to arguments, circumstance, insanity and tragedy.

name: The Bodyguard
plot: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to an R&B singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.

name: King of New York
plot: A drug kingpin is released from prison and seeks to take total control of the criminal underworld in order to give back to the community.

name: Varsity Blues
plot: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

name: Color of Night
plot: A color-blind psychoanalyst is stalked by an unknown killer after taking over his murdered friend's therapy group, all of whom have a connection to a mysterious young woman that he begins having intense sexual encounters with.

name: Ronin
plot: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

name: Chungking Express
plot: Two melancholic Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal waitress at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

name: Chopping Mall
plot: A group of young shopping mall employees stay behind for a late night party in one of the stores. When the mall goes on lock-down before they can get out, the robot security system malfunctions, and goes on a killing spree.

name: The Age of Innocence
plot: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

name: Wolf Creek
plot: Three backpackers stranded in the Australian outback are plunged inside a hellish nightmare of insufferable torture by a sadistic psychopathic local.

name: Before Sunset
plot: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

name: Tomorrow Never Dies
plot: James Bond sets out to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

name: Some Kind of Wonderful
plot: When Keith goes out with Amanda, the girl of his dreams, Amanda's ex-boyfriend plans to get back at Keith. Meanwhile, Keith's best friend, tomboy Watts, realizes she has feelings for Keith.

name: Hot Shots!
plot: A parody of Top Gun (1986) in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.

name: Angel Heart
plot: A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.

name: Daredevil
plot: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

name: Paprika
plot: A young country girl comes to town and works in a brothel in order to help her fiance get the money to start his own business. "Paprika" is the name given to her by the madam.

name: Seven Years in Tibet
plot: Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian climber, breaks out of prison and travels to the holy city of Lhasa. He is employed as an instructor to the 14th Dalai Lama and soon becomes his close confidante.

name: The World Is Not Enough
plot: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot while protecting an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
plot: When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, replicating the city's residents one body at a time.

name: He Got Game
plot: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

name: The French Connection
plot: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

name: Hard Candy
plot: Hayley's a smart, charming teenage girl. Jeff's a handsome, smooth fashion photographer. An Internet chat, a coffee shop meet-up, an impromptu fashion shoot back at Jeff's place. Jeff thinks it's his lucky night. He's in for a surprise.

name: The Brown Bunny
plot: Professional motorcycle racer Bud Clay heads from New Hampshire to California to race again. Along the way he meets various needy women who provide him with the cure to his own loneliness, but only a certain woman from his past will truly satisfy him.

name: Clash of the Titans
plot: Perseus must battle Medusa and the Kraken to save the Princess Andromeda.

name: The Great Outdoors
plot: A Chicago man and his family go camping with his obnoxious brother-in-law.

name: Buffalo '66
plot: After being released from prison, Billy is set to visit his parents with his wife, whom he does not actually have. This provokes Billy to act out, as he kidnaps a girl and forces her to act as his wife for the visit.

name: Videodrome
plot: A programmer at a Toronto TV station that specializes in adult entertainment searches for the producers of a dangerous and bizarre broadcast.

name: Murder on the Orient Express
plot: In December 1935, when his transcontinental luxury train is stranded by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before, with a multitude of suspects.

name: A Cinderella Story
plot: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Samantha Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.

name: The 13th Warrior
plot: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled in a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

name: The Cannonball Run
plot: A wide variety of eccentric competitors participate in a wild and illegal cross-country road race. However, the eccentric entrants will do anything to win the road race, including low-down, dirty tricks.

name: Terms of Endearment
plot: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love and her daughter's family problems.

name: The American President
plot: A widowed U.S. President running for reelection and an environmental lobbyist fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception," and sparks fly anyway.

name: The Bourne Supremacy
plot: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

name: Cheeky
plot: While scouting out apartments in London for her Venetian boyfriend, Carla rents an apartment that overlooks the Thames. There she meet the lesbian hyper-horny real estate agent Moira.

name: A Fish Called Wanda
plot: In London, four very different people team up on a jewel heist, then try to double-cross one another for the loot, complicated by their efforts to fool a very proper barrister.

name: Drugstore Cowboy
plot: A pharmacy-robbing dope fiend and his crew pop pills and evade the law.

name: Christiane F.
plot: A teen girl in 1970s Berlin becomes addicted to heroin. Everything in her life slowly begins to distort and disappear as she befriends a small crew of junkies and falls in love with a drug-abusing male prostitute.

name: I Spit on Your Grave
plot: An aspiring writer is repeatedly assaulted, humiliated, and left for dead by four men she systematically hunts down to seek revenge.

name: Sister Act
plot: When a nightclub singer is forced to take refuge from the mob in a convent, she ends up turning the convent choir into a soulful chorus complete with a Motown repertoire, until the sudden celebrity of the choir jeopardizes her identity.

name: Austin Powers in Goldmember
plot: Upon learning that his father has been kidnapped, Austin Powers must travel to 1975 and defeat the aptly named villain Goldmember, who is working with Dr. Evil.

name: Fletch
plot: While working undercover wisecracking newspaper reporter Irwin "Fletch" Fletcher is offered a large sum by a millionaire with a terminal disease to kill him. Intrigued, Fletch decides to unearth the full story behind the offer.

name: Gummo
plot: Lonely residents of a tornado-stricken Ohio town wander the deserted landscape trying to fulfill their boring, nihilistic lives.

name: Corpse Bride
plot: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

name: Wings of Desire
plot: An angel tires of his purely ethereal life of merely overseeing the human activity of Berlin's residents, and longs for the tangible joys of physical existence when he falls in love with a mortal.

name: Billy Elliot
plot: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

name: BASEketball
plot: Two childhood friends are pro athletes of a national sport called BASEketball, a hybrid of baseball and basketball, and must deal with a greedy businessman scheming against their team.

name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
plot: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

name: Rambo III
plot: Rambo mounts a one-man mission to rescue his friend Colonel Trautman from the clutches of the formidable invading Soviet forces in Afghanistan.

name: Bitter Moon
plot: After hearing stories of her, a passenger on a cruise ship develops an irresistible infatuation with an eccentric paraplegic's wife.

name: Vision Quest
plot: A high school wrestler in Spokane, Washington has trouble focusing on his training regimen when a beautiful young drifter takes up temporary residence at his home.

name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
plot: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

name: You've Got Mail
plot: Book superstore magnate Joe Fox and independent book shop owner Kathleen Kelly fall in love in the anonymity of the Internet, both blissfully unaware that he's trying to put her out of business.

name: Cube
plot: A group of strangers awaken to find themselves placed in a giant cube. Each one of them is gifted with a special skill and they must work together to escape an endless maze of deadly traps.

name: Camp Nowhere
plot: A group of junior high kids don't want to go to summer camps chosen by their parents. They make their own adult-free camp and "hire" an ex drama teacher to help.

name: Superman III
plot: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

name: High Tension
plot: Best friends Marie and Alexia decide to spend a quiet weekend at Alexia's parents' secluded farmhouse. But on the night of their arrival, the girls' idyllic getaway turns into an endless night of horror.

name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
plot: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

name: Survival Island
plot: Three people - a rich couple and a crew member - are shipwrecked on a tropical island and their subsequent fight for survival becomes even tougher when they begin to turn on each other.

name: Altered States
plot: A psycho-physiologist experiments with drugs and a sensory-deprivation tank and has visions he believes are genetic memories.

name: Fallen Angels
plot: This Hong Kong-set crime drama follows the lives of a hitman, hoping to get out of the business, and his elusive female partner.

name: An Officer and a Gentleman
plot: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.

name: Casper
plot: An afterlife therapist and his daughter meet a friendly young ghost when they move into a crumbling mansion in order to rid the premises of wicked spirits.

name: Addams Family Values
plot: The Addams Family try to rescue their beloved Uncle Fester from his gold-digging new love, a black widow named Debbie.

name: Enemy at the Gates
plot: A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

name: Breaking Away
plot: A working-class Indiana teen obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl while searching for life goals with his friends.

name: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
plot: A fun-loving American bulldog pup, a hilarious Himalayan cat, and a wise old golden retriever embark on a long trek through the rugged wilderness of the Sierra Nevada mountains in a quest to reach home and their beloved owners.

name: Zardoz
plot: In the late 23rd century, a savage trained only to kill finds a way into the community of bored immortals that alone preserves humanity's achievements.

name: Barb Wire
plot: During the Second American Civil War in 2017, Barb Wire owns a nightclub called the Hammerhead. Things become complicated when her ex-lover Axel Hood, who is married to the fugitive Corrina Devonshire, re-enters her life.

name: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
plot: A Korean-American office worker and his Indian-American stoner friend embark on a quest to satisfy their desire for White Castle burgers.

name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

name: Chicken Run
plot: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

name: The Great Gatsby
plot: A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.

name: Hardball
plot: A gambling addict and ticket scalper living an aimless life reluctantly agrees to coach a Little League team from the Chicago projects as part of a loan agreement.

name: The Bad News Bears
plot: An aging, down-on-his-luck ex-minor leaguer coaches a team of misfits in an ultra-competitive California little league.

name: Original Sin
plot: A woman, along with her lover, plans to con a rich man by marrying him, earning his trust, and then running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she falls in love with him.

name: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
plot: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

name: Timeline
plot: A group of archaeologists get embroiled in an adventure where they must travel back in time to 14th Century France, to save their professor before the French battle the English at Castlegard. If they fail, they won't be able to return.

name: The Aristocats
plot: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

name: The Twilight Samurai
plot: As the feudal Japan era draws to a close, a widower samurai experiences difficulty balancing clan loyalties, 2 young daughters, an aged mother, and the sudden reappearance of his childhood sweetheart.

name: Crocodile Dundee
plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

name: Christine
plot: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

name: Dirty Harry
plot: When a man calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces San Francisco, tough-as-nails Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down the crazed psychopath.

name: Cabin Fever
plot: Five college graduates rent a cabin in the woods and begin to fall victim to a horrifying flesh-eating virus, which attracts the unwanted attention of the homicidal locals.

name: The Doors
plot: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

name: Jesus Christ Superstar
plot: Film version of the musical stage play, presenting the last few weeks of Christ's life told in an anachronistic manner.

name: Payback
plot: After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.

name: Nothing But Trouble
plot: A businessman and his friends are captured by a sadistic judge and his equally odd family in a bizarre mansion in the backwoods.

name: Bad Boys II
plot: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.

name: The Hours
plot: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.

name: The Pledge
plot: A retiring police detective pledges to catch the killer of a young child.

name: The Kentucky Fried Movie
plot: The daily programming of a fictional local TV channel presented as a series of highly irreverent skits.

name: K-19: The Widowmaker
plot: When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

name: Freeway
plot: A twisted take on "Little Red Riding Hood", with a teenage juvenile delinquent on the run from a social worker travelling to her grandmother's house and being hounded by a charming, but sadistic, serial killer and pedophile.

name: I Know What You Did Last Summer
plot: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

name: The Lover
plot: In 1929 French Indochina, a French teenage girl embarks on a reckless and forbidden romance with a wealthy, older Chinese man, each knowing that knowledge of their affair will bring drastic consequences to each other.

name: Solaris
plot: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

name: Night of the Comet
plot: A comet wipes out most of life on Earth, leaving two Valley Girls fighting against cannibal zombies and a sinister group of scientists.

name: Bully
plot: A pack of naïve teenagers conspire to murder a mutual friend, whose aggressive demeanour has proven too much.

name: Dawn of the Dead
plot: During an escalating zombie epidemic, two Philadelphia SWAT team members, a traffic reporter and his TV executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

name: Enter the Dragon
plot: A Shaolin martial artist travels to an island fortress to spy on an opium lord - who is also a former monk from his temple - under the guise of attending a fighting tournament.

name: Streets of Fire
plot: A mercenary is hired to rescue his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.

name: The Remains of the Day
plot: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.

name: Rocky IV
plot: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

name: The Last Picture Show
plot: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

name: The Good Girl
plot: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.

name: Small Soldiers
plot: When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.

name: The Ice Pirates
plot: In a distant future scarce of water, space pirates get caught after stealing ice from a spaceship. They are sold to a princess looking for her dad. He might have found a planet abundant with water.

name: Little Darlings
plot: Two fifteen year-old girls from different sides of the tracks compete to see who will be the first to lose their virginity while at a summer camp.

name: Can't Buy Me Love
plot: An outcast secretly pays the most popular girl in school one thousand dollars to pretend to be his girlfriend for a month.

name: Antares
plot: Three stories revolve around the love lives of an adulterous woman, a checkout girl and a single mother.

name: Romance
plot: Frustrated by the lack of intimacy in her relationship, a young schoolteacher goes through a series of intimidating and often violent sexual partners.

name: Much Ado About Nothing
plot: Young lovers, and soon to wed, Hero and Claudio conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles, Benedick and Beatrice, to wed as well.

name: Something's Gotta Give
plot: A swinger on the cusp of being a senior citizen with a taste for young women falls in love with an accomplished woman closer to his age.

name: But I'm a Cheerleader
plot: A naive teenager is sent to rehab camp when her straitlaced parents and friends suspect her of being a lesbian.

name: Drop Dead Gorgeous
plot: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

name: Scary Movie 3
plot: Cindy must investigate mysterious crop circles and video tapes, and help the President in preventing an alien invasion.

name: Mean Streets
plot: In New York City's Little Italy, a devoutly Catholic mobster must reconcile his desire for power, his feelings for his epileptic lover, and his devotion to his troublesome friend.

name: Cursed
plot: A werewolf loose in Los Angeles changes the lives of three young adults who, after being mauled by the beast, learn they must kill it in order to avoid becoming werewolves themselves.

name: Scanners
plot: A scientist trains a man with an advanced telepathic ability called "scanning" to stop a dangerous Scanner with extraordinary psychic powers from waging war against non scanners.

name: S.W.A.T.
plot: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

name: Dangerous Liaisons
plot: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

name: House of Sand and Fog
plot: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her house's new owners.

name: Troop Beverly Hills
plot: A soon to be divorced Beverly Hills socialite is determined to prove to her husband and herself that she can finish what she starts out to do, by becoming a den mother to a troop of Beverly Hills Girl Scouts.

name: The Right Stuff
plot: The U.S. space program's development from the breaking of the sound barrier to selection of the Mercury 7 astronauts, from a group of test pilots with a more seat-of-the-pants approach than the program's more cautious engineers preferred.

name: The Brothers Grimm
plot: Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

name: Return to the Blue Lagoon
plot: In this sequel to The Blue Lagoon (1980), two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become suntanned teenagers in love.

name: Tango & Cash
plot: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a pair of mismatched LAPD officers must put their differences aside to get even with the brutal crime baron who sent them to rot in a maximum-security prison.

name: Patriot Games
plot: When CIA analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

name: Heavy Metal
plot: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

name: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
plot: Four best girlfriends hatch a plan to stay connected with one another as their lives start off in different directions: they pass around a pair of secondhand jeans that fits each of their bodies perfectly.

name: The Quick and the Dead
plot: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

name: Lords of Dogtown
plot: The film follows the surf and skateboarding trends that originated in Venice, California during the 1970s.

name: Ghost Ship
plot: A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.

name: Stealing Beauty
plot: After her mother commits suicide, a young woman travels to Italy in search of love, truth and a deeper connection with herself.

name: Tank Girl
plot: A girl is among the few survivors of a dystopian Earth. Riding a war tank, she fights against the tyranny of a mega-corporation that dominates the remaining potable water supply of the planet.

name: Reign of Fire
plot: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.

name: For Your Eyes Only
plot: Secret service agent James Bond is assigned to find a missing British vessel equipped with a weapons encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

name: High Plains Drifter
plot: A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

name: Newsies
plot: A musical based on the New York City newsboy strike of 1899. When young newspaper sellers are exploited beyond reason by their bosses they set out to enact change and are met by the ruthlessness of big business.

name: Never Say Never Again
plot: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

name: Summer School
plot: Freddy the gym teacher has to teach remedial English in summer (high) school, if he wants tenure. As he can only teach gym and his students want fun, emphasis is on "field trips" - until he's fired unless all his students pass the test.

name: Grease 2
plot: A British student at a 1960s American high school must prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

name: Private School
plot: Chris from a girls' boarding school loves Jim from a nearby boys' boarding school. Jordan also wants Jim and plays dirty. Jim and two friends visit the girls' school posing as girls.

name: RoboCop 2
plot: RoboCop returns to protect the citizens of old Detroit but faces a deadly challenge when a rogue OCP member secretly creates a new, evil RoboCop 2.

name: Pleasantville
plot: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves transported to a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that colorless, complacent world.

name: Stripes
plot: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

name: The Karate Kid Part II
plot: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

name: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
plot: A Chicago advertising man must struggle to travel home from New York for Thanksgiving, with a lovable oaf of a shower-curtain-ring salesman as his only companion.

name: American Pie 2
plot: Jim and his friends are now in college, and they decide to meet up at the beach house for some fun.

name: The Devil's Rejects
plot: The murderous, backwoods Firefly family take to the road to escape the vengeful Sheriff Wydell, who is not afraid of being as ruthless as his target.

name: Heartbreakers
plot: A mother and daughter con team seduce and scam wealthy men.

name: Great Expectations
plot: Modernization of Charles Dickens' classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York City pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.

name: No Way Out
plot: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

name: Short Circuit
plot: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

name: Solaris
plot: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

name: Bedazzled
plot: Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted seven wishes by the Devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul.

name: The Last Starfighter
plot: High schooler Alex Rogan conquers the Starfighter video game, only to find out it was just a test, and is transported to another planet. He has been recruited to join a team of the best starfighters to defend their world from the attack.

name: Soylent Green
plot: A nightmarish futuristic fantasy about the controlling power of big corporations and an innocent cop who stumbles on the truth.

name: Death on the Nile
plot: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can Poirot identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

name: Critters
plot: A group of small but vicious alien creatures called Crites escape from an alien prison transport vessel and land near a small farm town on earth, pursued by two shape-shifting bounty hunters.

name: About a Boy
plot: Will, who attends single parent meetings to woo women, meets Marcus, a troubled 12-year-old boy. As they become friends, Will learns to be responsible while he helps Marcus with his studies.

name: The Mission
plot: Eighteenth-century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.

name: Cool Runnings
plot: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

name: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
plot: Alice wakes up in the Raccoon City hospital after the area has been overrun by zombies, and must now make it out of the city before a nuclear bomb is dropped.

name: Sahara
plot: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

name: Battle Royale
plot: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill one another under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

name: Michael Collins
plot: Neil Jordan's historical biopic of Irish revolutionary Michael Collins, the man who led a guerrilla war against the UK, helped negotiate the creation of the Irish Free State, and led the National Army during the Irish Civil War.

name: Without Warning
plot: Sandy and Greg are teenagers who go camping, despite warnings not to, with their friends. They soon encounter aliens, who are using the area as a hunting ground.

name: Maverick
plot: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

name: Death Wish
plot: A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks. In self-defense, the vengeful man kills muggers on the mean streets after dark.

name: The Client
plot: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

name: 48 Hrs.
plot: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him in order to track down a killer.

name: The Cider House Rules
plot: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

name: Return to Oz
plot: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is somehow called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

name: Army of Darkness
plot: When Ash Williams is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., he must retrieve the Necronomicon and battle an army of the dead in order to return home.

name: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
plot: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, Oceanographer Steve Zissou (Bill Murray) rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

name: Bull Durham
plot: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

name: The NeverEnding Story III
plot: A young boy must restore order when a group of bullies steal the magical book that acts as a portal between Earth and the imaginary world of Fantasia.

name: A Night at the Roxbury
plot: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.

name: Body Double
plot: A young actor's obsession with spying on a beautiful woman who lives nearby leads to a baffling series of events with drastic consequences.

name: Lifeforce
plot: A race of space vampires arrives in London and infects the populace, beginning an apocalyptic descent into chaos.

name: A Bridge Too Far
plot: Operation Market Garden, September 1944: The Allies attempt to capture several strategically important bridges in the Netherlands in the hope of breaking the German lines.

name: Spawn
plot: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

name: Mallrats
plot: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

name: Lock Up
plot: With only six months left of his sentence, inmate Frank Leone is transferred from a minimum security prison to a maximum security prison by a vindictive warden.

name: Airplane II: The Sequel
plot: A faulty computer causes a passenger space shuttle to head straight for the Sun. Can Ted Striker save the day and get the shuttle back on track - again?

name: Fright Night
plot: "Fright Night" sees a teenager believing that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire. He turns to an actor in a television hosted horror movie show for help to deal with the undead.

name: Ed Wood
plot: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams despite his lack of talent.

name: The King of Comedy
plot: A passionate yet unsuccessful comedian stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.

name: Mr. Holland's Opus
plot: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

name: Cinderella Man
plot: The true story of James J. Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer, who returned to the spotlight to win the heavyweight championship of the world.

name: Damage
plot: A Member of Parliament falls passionately in love with his son's girlfriend despite the obvious dangers.

name: Teen Wolf
plot: An ordinary high school student discovers that his family has an unusual pedigree.

name: Zathura: A Space Adventure
plot: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.

name: Encino Man
plot: When they find a frozen caveman in their back yard, two high school outcasts thaw him and introduce him to modern life while he in turn gets them to actually enjoy life.

name: DragonHeart
plot: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying Knight must cooperate to stop an evil King, who was given partial immortality.

name: Catwoman
plot: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

name: Eye See You
plot: A lead detective being stalked by a serial killer is asked to check into a clinic treating law enforcement officials who can't face their jobs.

name: Kingpin
plot: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

name: Die Hard 2
plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

name: Time Bandits
plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

name: The Land Before Time
plot: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

name: Drop Dead Fred
plot: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.

name: Boys Don't Cry
plot: A young man named Brandon Teena navigates love, life, and being transgender in rural Nebraska.

name: Imagine Me & You
plot: A newlywed bride becomes infatuated with another woman who questions her sexual orientation, promoting a stir among the bride's family and friends.

name: Friday Night Lights
plot: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.

name: Frankenstein
plot: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

name: Garfield: The Movie
plot: Jon Arbuckle buys a second pet, a dog named Odie. However, Odie is then abducted and it is up to Jon's cat, Garfield, to find and rescue the canine.

name: Somewhere in Time
plot: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

name: Days of Thunder
plot: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

name: Elf
plot: Raised as an oversized elf, Buddy travels from the North Pole to New York City to meet his biological father, Walter Hobbs, who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.

name: The Last House on the Left
plot: Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychopathic convicts.

name: Grumpier Old Men
plot: John and Max resolve to save their beloved bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant, just as its new female owner catches Max's attention.

name: Of Mice and Men
plot: A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.

name: Robin Hood
plot: The story of the legendary British outlaw portrayed with the characters as anthropomorphic animals.

name: Four Brothers
plot: When their adoptive mother is gunned down in a store robbery, four brothers decide to investigate the murder and find the killers themselves, but not all is what it seems.

name: The Postman
plot: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

name: Babe
plot: Gentle farmer Arthur Hoggett wins a piglet Babe at a county fair. Narrowly escaping his fate as Christmas dinner, Babe bonds with motherly border collie Fly and discovers that he too can herd sheep. But will the other animals accept him?

name: Match Point
plot: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
plot: Flighty teenage girl Buffy Summers learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.

name: Dressed to Kill
plot: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

name: Lord of the Flies
plot: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.

name: Scream 3
plot: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.

name: Three Amigos!
plot: Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

name: Coma
plot: When a young female doctor notices an unnatural amount of comas occurring in her hospital she uncovers a horrible conspiracy.

name: Flatliners
plot: Five medical students experiment with "near death" experiences, until the dark consequences of past tragedies begin to jeopardize their lives.

name: Doom
plot: Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines.

name: Red Sonja
plot: The fearless warrior Red Sonja sets out to avenge her family's murder and rid her kingdom from the tyrannical rule of evil Queen Gedren.

name: The Island of Dr. Moreau
plot: After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.

name: Wolf
plot: Publisher Will Randall becomes a demon wolf and has to fight to keep his job.

name: The Brady Bunch Movie
plot: The original 1970s TV family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.

name: Joe Dirt
plot: After being abandoned by his parents at the Grand Canyon, Joe Dirt tells the story of his journey to find his parents.

name: Ali G Indahouse
plot: Ali G unwittingly becomes a pawn in the Chancellor's plot to overthrow the Prime Minister of Great Britain. However, Ali is embraced by the nation as a voice of the youth, making the PM and his government more popular than ever.

name: Ray
plot: The story of the life and career of the legendary rhythm and blues musician Ray Charles, from his humble beginnings in the South, where he went blind at age seven, to his meteoric rise to stardom during the 1950s and 1960s.

name: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
plot: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.

name: Nanny McPhee
plot: A governess uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.

name: La Bamba
plot: Biographical story of the rise from nowhere of early rock and roll singer Ritchie Valens who died at age 17 in a plane crash with Buddy Holly and The Big Bopper.

name: Hotel Rwanda
plot: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

name: Over the Top
plot: Tough trucker Lincoln Hawk is determined to win back his son and triumph at the world arm wrestling championships.

name: Monamour
plot: A neglected homemaker has an affair behind her boring husband's back, triggering a passionate transformation. Now, a dash of infidelity awakens his dormant enthusiasm for her. But is his newfound interest a case of too little, too late?

name: Cruising
plot: A police officer goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.

name: Escape from L.A.
plot: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

name: Walking Tall
plot: A former U.S. soldier returns to his hometown to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which prompts him to clean house.

name: My Own Private Idaho
plot: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

name: George of the Jungle
plot: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

name: Miracle
plot: The true story of Herb Brooks, the player-turned-coach who led the 1980 U.S. Olympic hockey team to victory over the seemingly invincible Soviet squad.

name: Under Siege
plot: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.

name: Patch Adams
plot: The true story of a heroic man, Hunter "Patch" Adams, determined to become a medical doctor because he enjoys helping people. He ventured where no doctor had ventured before, using humour and pathos.

name: Selena
plot: The true story of Selena, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart-topping albums on the Latin music charts.

name: xXx
plot: The US government recruits extreme sports athlete Xander Cage to infiltrate a Russian criminal ring, which is plotting the destruction of the world.

name: Practical Magic
plot: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.

name: Ghost World
plot: Two eccentric best friends graduate high school and respond to a man's romance-seeking newspaper ad as a gag, only to find their lives becoming increasingly complicated.

name: Clerks
plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

name: The Vampire Lovers
plot: Seductive vampire Carmilla Karnstein and her family target the beautiful and the rich in a remote area of late eighteenth-century Gemany.

name: eXistenZ
plot: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

name: U.S. Marshals
plot: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

name: Best in Show
plot: A behind-the-scenes look into the highly competitive and cut-throat world of dog shows through the eyes of a group of ruthless dog owners.

name: Menace II Society
plot: A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.

name: The Message
plot: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

name: Firestarter
plot: A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telepathic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.

name: Southern Comfort
plot: During a routine exercise, a team of National Guardsmen are threatened by angry and violent locals.

name: The Scorpion King
plot: A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.

name: Evolution
plot: A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.

name: Stepmom
plot: A terminally ill woman must deal with her ex-husband's new lover, who will be their children's stepmother.

name: Being There
plot: After the death of his employer forces him out of the only home he's ever known, a simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful tycoon and an insider in Washington politics.

name: Bachelor Party
plot: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

name: All the President's Men
plot: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.

name: Freddy vs. Jason
plot: Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenagers of Elm Street. Only this time, they're out to get each other, too.

name: Emma
plot: While matchmaking for friends and neighbours, a young 19th Century Englishwoman nearly misses her own chance at love.

name: Behind Enemy Lines
plot: A disillusioned pilot shot down over war-torn Bosnia goes on the run from the local military and an assassin, as his commanding officer risks all to save him.

name: A Goofy Movie
plot: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

name: Dancer in the Dark
plot: An Eastern European US immigrant with a love for musicals has to cope with the gradual loss of her vision.

name: Anatomy of Hell
plot: A woman employs a gay man to spend four nights at her house to watch her when she's "unwatchable".

name: Saw II
plot: A detective and his team must rescue 8 people trapped in a factory by the twisted serial killer known as Jigsaw.

name: It Could Happen to You
plot: A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.

name: Primer
plot: Four friends/fledgling entrepreneurs, knowing that there's something bigger and more innovative than the different error-checking devices they've built, wrestle over their new invention.

name: Spy Kids 3: Game Over
plot: Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker. It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.

name: House on Haunted Hill
plot: An amusement park mogul offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

name: Picnic at Hanging Rock
plot: During a rural summer picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence frustrates and haunts the people left behind.

name: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
plot: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

name: Blow Out
plot: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

name: Sweet November
plot: A workaholic executive, and an unconventional woman agree to a personal relationship for a short period. In this short period she changes his life.

name: Into the Blue
plot: Four divers cross paths with drug smugglers in the Bahamas.

name: Bubble Boy
plot: Bubble Boy's been in a bubble all his life due to no immune system. A cute blonde girl befriends BB. Her boyfriend proposes and BB decides to travel across USA to Niagara Falls to stop the wedding.

name: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
plot: Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Mr. Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy.

name: The Player
plot: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected, but which one?

name: Vampires
plot: Recovering from an ambush that killed his entire team, a vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to walk in sunlight.

name: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
plot: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

name: Four Rooms
plot: Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.

name: The Outlaw Josey Wales
plot: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

name: The New World
plot: The story of the English exploration of Virginia, and of the changing world and loves of Pocahontas.

name: Can't Hardly Wait
plot: A complete graduating class, consisting of beautiful girls, geeks and promising footballers, assemble at a rich classmate's residence for a party. Interesting developments follow at the get-together.

name: Angela's Ashes
plot: An Irish Catholic family returns to 1930s Limerick after a child's death in America. The unemployed I.R.A. veteran father struggles with poverty, prejudice and alcoholism as the family endures harsh slum conditions.

name: Withnail & I
plot: In 1969, two substance-abusing, unemployed actors retreat to the countryside for a holiday that proves disastrous.

name: Chasing Amy
plot: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

name: Amores Perros
plot: An amateur dog fighter, a supermodel, and a derelict assassin, all separately struggling to find love, find their lives transformed by a devastating car wreck in Mexico City.

name: Baise-moi
plot: Two young women, marginalised by society, go on a destructive tour of sex and violence. Breaking norms and killing men - and shattering the complacency of polite cinema audiences.

name: Escape from Alcatraz
plot: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possibly successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

name: Iron Eagle
plot: A young pilot plans a rescue mission when his father, an Air Force Colonel, is shot down over enemy territory and captured.

name: Dude, Where's My Car?
plot: Two potheads wake up after a night of partying and cannot remember where they parked their car.

name: Mr. Deeds
plot: A sweet-natured, small-town guy inherits a controlling stake in a media conglomerate and begins to do business his way.

name: Krull
plot: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet, Krull.

name: License to Drive
plot: A teen decides to go for a night on the town with his friends despite flunking his driver's test.

name: U-571
plot: A German submarine is boarded by disguised American submariners trying to capture their Enigma cipher machine.

name: Presumed Innocent
plot: As a lawyer investigates the murder of a colleague, he finds himself more connected to the crime than anyone else.

name: The First Wives Club
plot: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

name: Brotherhood of the Wolf
plot: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

name: Conan the Destroyer
plot: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

name: Yours, Mine & Ours
plot: A widowed Coast Guard Admiral and a widowed handbag designer fall in love and marry, much to the dismay of his 8 and her 10 children.

name: Mindhunters
plot: A group of FBI trainees are taken to a remote island for simulation training. However, once there, they realize that they are being hunted by a serial killer, who might be someone amidst them.

name: The Cable Guy
plot: A designer makes a grievious mistake when he rejects the friendship of a borderline cable guy.

name: The Long Goodbye
plot: Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam, but in doing so gets implicated in his wife's murder.

name: Brother Bear
plot: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

name: Gothika
plot: A psychiatrist awakens as a patient in a mental institution, with no memory of the murder she's accused of committing. As she tries to regain her memory, a vengeful spirit manipulates her.

name: Spy Game
plot: Retiring CIA agent Nathan Muir recalls his training of Tom Bishop while working against agency politics to free him from his Chinese captors.

name: The Messenger: The Story of Joan of Arc
plot: A young girl receives a vision that drives her to rid France of its oppressors.

name: Evil Under the Sun
plot: Trying to find how a millionaire wound up with a phony diamond brings Hercule Poirot to an exclusive island resort frequented by the rich and famous. When a murder is committed, everyone has an alibi.

name: Perfect
plot: A female aerobics instructor meets a male reporter doing a story on health clubs, but it isn't love at first sight.

name: Tears of the Sun
plot: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

name: While You Were Sleeping
plot: A hopelessly romantic Chicago Transit Authority ticket booth operator is mistaken for the fiancée of a comatose patient.

name: Candyman
plot: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

name: My Left Foot
plot: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

name: Team America: World Police
plot: Popular Broadway actor Gary Johnston is recruited by the elite counter-terrorism organization Team America: World Police. As the world begins to crumble around him, he must battle with terrorists, celebrities and falling in love.

name: Meatballs
plot: Wacky hijinks of counselors and campers at a less-than-average summer camp.

name: Dinosaur
plot: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sanctuary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

name: From Beyond
plot: A group of scientists have developed the Resonator, a machine which allows whoever is within range to see beyond normal perceptible reality. But when the experiment succeeds, they are immediately attacked by terrible life forms.
A Hollywood composer goes through a mid-life crisis and becomes infatuated with a sexy, newly married woman.

name: 28 Days
plot: A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.

name: Crimson Tide
plot: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.

name: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
plot: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

name: Spun
plot: A drug dealer introduces one of his customers, a 'speed freak', to the man who runs the meth lab. A crazy three-day adventure ensues.

name: Stuart Little
plot: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

name: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
plot: The magical inhabitants of a rainforest fight to save their home, which is threatened by logging and a polluting force of destruction called Hexxus.

name: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
plot: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral James T. Kirk resumes command of the overhauled USS Enterprise in order to intercept it.

name: Vertical Limit
plot: A climber must rescue his sister on the peak of K2, the second highest mountain in the world .

name: Deep Blue Sea
plot: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

name: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
plot: After her sex offender husband gets caught in the act and kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against one of her husband's victims and the woman's family.

name: Say Anything
plot: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

name: The Handmaid's Tale
plot: Under a dystopian religious tyranny, most women cannot conceive children. Those young women who can live in a form of sexual slavery to provide children for influential families.

name: All That Jazz
plot: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid career of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.

name: Diamonds Are Forever
plot: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

name: 2010: The Year We Make Contact
plot: A joint USA-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn exactly what happened to the "Discovery" and its H.A.L. 9000 computer.

name: The Dukes of Hazzard
plot: Cousins Bo, Luke, and Daisy Duke, and their uncle Jesse, egg on the authorities of Hazzard County, Boss Hogg and Sheriff Coltrane.

name: Six Days Seven Nights
plot: Robin Monroe, a New York magazine editor, and the gruff pilot Quinn Harris must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island.

name: Against All Odds
plot: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.

name: Born on the Fourth of July
plot: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country for which he fought.

name: The Nutty Professor
plot: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

name: Cobra
plot: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far-reaching plans.

name: The World's Fastest Indian
plot: The story of New Zealander Burt Munro, who spent years rebuilding a 1920 Indian motorcycle, which helped him set the land speed world record at Utah's Bonneville Salt Flats in 1967.

name: Along Came a Spider
plot: When a senator's daughter under Secret Service protection is kidnapped from a private school, detective Alex Cross investigates the case even though he's recovering from the loss of his partner.

name: Vamp
plot: Two fraternity pledges travel to a sleazy bar in search of a stripper for their college friends, unaware it is occupied by vampires.

name: Election
plot: A high school teacher meets his match in an over-achieving student politician.

name: Breaking the Waves
plot: Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.

name: Sleeping with the Enemy
plot: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

name: The Man with the Golden Gun
plot: James Bond is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin, while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.

name: One Hour Photo
plot: A mentally unstable photo developer targets an upper middle-class family after his obsession with them becomes more sick and disturbing than any of them could imagine.

name: Virtuosity
plot: When a virtual reality simulation created using the personalities of multiple serial killers manages to escape into the real world, an ex-cop is tasked with stopping its reign of terror.

name: The Big Chill
plot: A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

name: G.I. Jane
plot: Lt. Jordan, a US Navy topographic analyst, joins the US Navy Special Warfare Group and struggles to prove her worth in a unit dominated by men. But a cynical woman Texan senator has sold her out.

name: Gettysburg
plot: In 1863, the Northern and Southern forces fight at Gettysburg in the decisive battle of the American Civil War.

name: In the Mouth of Madness
plot: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

name: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
plot: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is based on real-life stoners Jay and Silent Bob, so when they get no profit from a big-screen adaptation, they set out to wreck the movie.

name: The Beastmaster
plot: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

name: Chariots of Fire
plot: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew and the other a devout Christian, are driven to win in the 1924 Olympics as they wrestle with issues of pride and conscience.

name: Lost in Space
plot: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

name: The Sweetest Thing
plot: Christina Walters spent years avoiding men, then suddenly met her perfect match while hanging with her best friends, Courtney and Jane. When she finds out that he has left town, she and Courtney set out on a trip.

name: Anger Management
plot: Dave Buznik is a businessman who is wrongly sentenced to an anger management program, where he meets an aggressive instructor.

name: Chicken Little
plot: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

name: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
plot: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.

name: To Live and Die in L.A.
plot: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.

name: Dog Soldiers
plot: A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scottish wilderness.

name: Faces of Death
plot: A collection of death scenes, ranging from TV material to homemade super 8 movies.

name: Elizabeth
plot: The early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

name: Heaven's Gate
plot: During the Johnson County War in 1890 Wyoming, a sheriff born into wealth does his best to protect immigrant farmers from rich cattle interests.

name: Raising Helen
plot: After her sister and brother-in-law die in a car accident, a young woman becomes the guardian of their three children.

name: Near Dark
plot: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.

name: Happiness
plot: The lives of several individuals intertwine as they go about their lives in their own unique ways, engaging in acts which society as a whole might find disturbing in a desperate search for human connection.

name: Never Been Kissed
plot: A newspaper reporter enrolls in high school as part of research for a story.

name: Deathstalker II: Duel of the Titans
plot: In this parody of the sword and sorcery films, a princess is deposed by an evil sorcerer. She enlists the aid of Deathstalker to battle the forces of evil, including a clone of the princess, and win back her kingdom.

name: Heavyweights
plot: Plump kids are lured into joining a posh fat camp with the promise of quick weight loss and good times, only to find that it is a woodland hellhole run by a psycho ex-fitness instructor.

name: Out of Time
plot: A Florida police chief must solve a vicious double homicide before he himself falls under suspicion.

name: Beverly Hills Cop III
plot: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who killed his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

name: Three Days of the Condor
plot: A bookish CIA researcher in Manhattan finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

name: Westworld
plot: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

name: Frequency
plot: An accidental cross-time radio link connects father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.

name: Zapped!
plot: A high school science nerd gains telekinetic powers after a laboratory accident and uses them for revenge upon bullies.

name: Pi
plot: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

name: The Black Hole
plot: A research vessel finds a missing ship, commanded by a mysterious scientist, on the edge of a black hole.

name: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
plot: When Stan Marsh and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

name: 3 Ninjas
plot: Each year, three brothers visit their grandfather for the summer. He is highly skilled in ninjutsu, and for years he has trained the boys in his techniques.

name: Evil Dead II
plot: Ash Williams, the lone survivor of an earlier onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits, holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

name: Star Trek: First Contact
plot: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

name: Serendipity
plot: A couple search for each other years after the night they first met, fell in love, and separated, convinced that one day they'd end up together.

name: Get Shorty
plot: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

name: Don't Look Now
plot: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

name: Rob Roy
plot: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

name: Lake Placid
plot: Four people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

name: Lethal Weapon 2
plot: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

name: The NeverEnding Story II: The Next Chapter
plot: A young boy with a distant father enters a world of make-believe and magic through a portal within an antique book.

name: Cool World
plot: When Jack Deebs was behind bars he found escape by creating Cool World, a cartoon series featuring a vixen named Holli Would. The flesh proves weaker than ink, however, as Holli takes human form in Las Vegas.

name: The Constant Gardener
plot: A widower's transcontinental quest to find answers about his wife's death leads him to explosive secrets.

name: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
plot: A parody of several U.S. films about being in the 'Hood', for instance Boyz n the Hood (1991), South Central (1992), Menace II Society (1993), Higher Learning (1995) and Juice (1992).

name: Midnight Express
plot: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

name: Moonraker
plot: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

name: River's Edge
plot: A high school slacker commits a shocking act and proceeds to let his friends in on the secret. However, the friends' reaction is almost as ambiguous and perplexing as the crime itself.

name: Harry and the Hendersons
plot: The Henderson family adopt a friendly Sasquatch but have a hard time trying to keep the legend of 'Bigfoot' a secret.

name: Powder
plot: An off-the-charts genius who is home schooled and shunned after his last relative dies shows the unconscious residents of his town about connection awareness and the generosity of the spirit.

name: The Perfect Storm
plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

name: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension
plot: Adventurer, brain surgeon, rock musician Buckaroo Banzai and his crime-fighting team, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil alien invaders from the eighth dimension who are planning to conquer Earth.

name: Superman II
plot: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

name: Dead Man Walking
plot: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

name: The Parallax View
plot: An ambitious reporter gets in way-over-his-head trouble while investigating a senator's assassination which leads to a vast conspiracy involving a multinational corporation behind every event in the world's headlines.

name: Jack
plot: Because of an unusual disorder that has aged him four times faster than a typical human being, a boy looks like a 40-year-old man as he starts fifth grade at public school after being homeschooled.

name: Just Friends
plot: While visiting his hometown during Christmas, a man comes face-to-face with his old high-school crush and best friend--a woman whose rejection of him turned him into a ferocious womanizer.

name: Memphis Belle
plot: In 1943, the crew of a B-17 based in the UK prepares for its 25th and final bombing mission over Germany before returning home to the USA.

name: Beach Babes from Beyond
plot: Three intergalactic beauties beam down off the California coast and have close encounters with three local beach boys.

name: The Color of Money
plot: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

name: The Towering Inferno
plot: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.

name: Sex and Lucía
plot: Various lives converge on an isolated island, all connected by an author whose novel has become inextricably entwined with his own life.

name: The Legend of Zorro
plot: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.

name: Kundun
plot: From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.

name: Cujo
plot: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

name: Home Alone 3
plot: Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.

name: Mystic Pizza
