name: The Postman Always Rings Twice
plot: The sensuous wife of a roadside diner proprietor and a rootless drifter begin a sordid, steamy affair and conspire to murder her Greek husband.

name: Quigley Down Under
plot: Sharpshooter Matt Quigley is hired from Wyoming by an Australian rancher paying a very high price. But when Quigley arrives Down Under, all is not as it seems.

name: Intermission
plot: A variety of losers in Dublin have harrowingly farcical intersecting stories of love, greed and violence.

name: The Santa Clause
plot: When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

name: Junior
plot: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

name: Pusher
plot: A drug pusher grows increasingly desperate after a botched deal leaves him with a large debt to a ruthless drug lord.

name: The Lord of the Rings
plot: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

name: Double Impact
plot: Twin brothers are separated when their parents are murdered but 25 years later they re-unite in order to avenge their parents' death.

name: Arachnophobia
plot: A new species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to a small California town in a coffin and starts to breed, leaving a trail of deaths that puzzle and terrify the young doctor newly arrived in town with his family.

name: Lilya 4-Ever
plot: Sixteen-year-old Lilja and her only friend, the young boy Volodja, live in Russia, fantasizing about a better life. One day, Lilja falls in love with Andrej, who is going to Sweden, and invites Lilja to come along and start a new life.

name: Friday After Next
plot: Working as security guards, Craig and Day-Day run into the thief who stole their Christmas presents.

name: The Naked Gun 2½: The Smell of Fear
plot: Lieutenant Frank Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.

name: A Perfect World
plot: A kidnapped boy strikes up a friendship with his captor, an escaped convict on the run from the law, while the search for him continues.

name: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man
plot: Two lone riders hold up a bank's armoured car to save their friend's bar from imminent foreclosure. Soon, the mission goes awry when they discover the vehicle's unexpected cargo.

name: The Phantom
plot: The Phantom, descendent of a line of African superheroes, travels to New York City to thwart a wealthy criminal genius from obtaining three magic skulls which would give him the secret to ultimate power.

name: The Arrival
plot: Zane, an astronomer, discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will do anything to stop Zane from learning it.

name: The Karate Kid Part III
plot: Ostracised villain John Kreese attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the help of a Vietnam War comrade, the wealthy owner of a toxic waste disposal business.

name: Conspiracy Theory
plot: A taxi driver with a penchant for conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of these theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

name: The Recruit
plot: A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.

name: The Last Castle
plot: A court-martialed General rallies together twelve hundred inmates to rise against a corrupt and sadistic warden.

name: Velvet Goldmine
plot: In 1984, British journalist Arthur Stuart investigates the career of 1970s glam superstar Brian Slade, who was heavily influenced in his early years by hard-living and rebellious American singer Curt Wild.

name: Up in Smoke
plot: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

name: Butcher, Baker, Nightmare Maker
plot: An orphaned teenager finds himself being dominated by his aunt who's hell-bent on keeping him with her...at all costs.

name: Quadrophenia
plot: Jimmy Cooper loathes his dead-end job and his working-class parents. He seeks solace with his mod clique, scooter riding, and drugs, only to be disappointed.

name: Santa Sangre
plot: A former circus artist escapes from a mental hospital to rejoin his armless mother - the leader of a strange religious cult - and is forced to enact brutal murders in her name as he becomes "her arms".

name: 25th Hour
plot: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.

name: Flubber
plot: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

name: Singles
plot: A group of twenty-something friends search for love and success in grunge-era Seattle.

name: The Watcher in the Woods
plot: When a family moves to a country home, the young girls experience strange happenings that have a link to an occult event years past.

name: Delicatessen
plot: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

name: Flesh+Blood
plot: In medieval Europe, a young girl from a noble family is obsessed with her captors - commoners.

name: Harold and Maude
plot: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

name: Two Weeks Notice
plot: A lawyer decides that she's used too much like a nanny by her boss, so she walks out on him.

name: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
plot: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

name: Grind
plot: Four skaters follow their idol on his summer tour in an attempt to get noticed, get sponsored, and become stars themselves.

name: Used Cars
plot: When the owner of a struggling used car lot is killed, it's up to the lot's hot-shot salesman to save the property from falling into the hands of the owner's ruthless brother and used-car rival.

name: Catch-22
plot: A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.

name: Heartbreak Ridge
plot: Hard-nosed, hard-living Marine Gunnery Sergeant Tom Highway clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.

name: Speed 2: Cruise Control
plot: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

name: Dungeons & Dragons
plot: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.

name: The Specialist
plot: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

name: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams
plot: The Cortez siblings set out for a mysterious island, where they encounter a genetic scientist and a set of rival spy kids.

name: What's Love Got to Do with It
plot: The story of singer Tina Turner's rise to stardom and how she gained the courage to break free from her abusive husband, Ike Turner.

name: Oscar
plot: A gangster attempts to keep the promise he made to his dying father: that he would give up his life of crime and "go straight".

name: Hair
plot: Claude Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of youngsters led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted. He soon falls in love with Sheila Franklin, a rich girl but still a rebel inside.

name: Jeremiah Johnson
plot: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

name: Kung Pow: Enter the Fist
plot: A rough-around-the-edges martial arts master seeks revenge for his parents' death.

name: The Thirteenth Floor
plot: A computer scientist running a virtual reality simulation of 1937 becomes the primary suspect when his colleague and mentor is murdered.

name: Soldier
plot: A soldier trained from birth is deemed obsolete and dumped on a waste planet where he is reluctantly taken in by a community of defenseless, stranded wayfarers.

name: The Ice Storm
plot: In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle-class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.

name: Muriel's Wedding
plot: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

name: Nashville
plot: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention.

name: Tie Me Up! Tie Me Down!
plot: An unbalanced but alluring former mental patient takes a porn star prisoner in the hopes of convincing her to marry him.

name: A Tale of Two Sisters
plot: After being institutionalized in a mental hospital, Su-mi reunites with her sister, Su-yeon, and they return to live at their country home. But strange events plague the house, leading to surprising revelations and a shocking conclusion.

name: Mermaids
plot: An unconventional single mother relocates with her two daughters to a small Massachusetts town in 1963, where a number of events and relationships both challenge and strengthen their familial bonds.

name: I Stand Alone
plot: A horse butcher's life and mind begin to break down as he lashes out against various factions of society while attempting to reconnect with his estranged daughter.

name: Arabian Nights
plot: In ancient Arabia, a beautiful slave girl chooses a youth to be her new master, then she is kidnapped and they must search for each other. Stories are told within stories: love, travel and the whims of destiny.

name: Ryan's Daughter
plot: Set in the wake of the 1916 Easter Rising, a married woman in a small Irish village has an affair with a troubled British officer.

name: Syriana
plot: A politically charged epic about the state of the oil industry in the hands of those personally involved in and affected by it.

name: Lady Vengeance
plot: After being wrongfully imprisoned for thirteen years and having her child taken away from her, a woman seeks revenge through increasingly brutal means.

name: The Black Cauldron
plot: A young boy and a group of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

name: Shadow of the Vampire
plot: The filming of Nosferatu (1922) is hampered by the fact that its star Max Schreck is taking the role of a vampire far more seriously than seems humanly possible.

name: The Good Son
plot: A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle and becomes friends with his cousin, a boy of the same age who shows increasing signs of violent and psychopathic behavior.

name: Derailed
plot: When two married business executives having an affair are blackmailed by a violent criminal, the two must turn the tables on him to save their families.

name: Three O'Clock High
plot: A nerd gets himself in hot water with the new bully, a quiet bad boy who challenges him to fight on the grounds of their high school after the day's end.

name: Blue Crush
plot: As a hard-core surfer girl prepares for a big competition, she finds herself falling for a football player.

name: The Garbage Pail Kids Movie
plot: Dodger must confront the struggles of life as he is visited by the Garbage Pail Kids and intimidated by some older bullies.

name: Spy Hard
plot: Dick Steele, Agent WD-40 is assigned by his Director, to stop the evil General Rancor from destroying the world. WD-40 believed Rancor was dead and he teams up with the hot KGB Agent Veronique Ukrinsky to find Rancor and save the world.

name: Bird on a Wire
plot: An old flame discovers her ex-boyfriend from the past is a relocated FBI informant out to stop the bad guys.

name: Big Night
plot: New Jersey, 1950s. Two brothers run an Italian restaurant. Business is not going well as a rival Italian restaurant is out-competing them. In a final effort to save the restaurant, the brothers plan to put on an evening of incredible food.

name: Klute
plot: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

name: Johnny Dangerously
plot: Set in the 1930s, an honest, good-hearted man is forced to turn to a life of crime to finance his neurotic mother's sky-rocketing medical bills.

name: The Pagemaster
plot: A cowardly boy, who buries himself in accident statistics, enters a library to escape a storm, only to be transformed into an animated illustration by the Pagemaster. He has to work through obstacles from classic books to return to real-life.

name: Phantom of the Paradise
plot: A disfigured composer sells his soul for the woman he loves so that she will perform his music. However, an evil record tycoon betrays him and steals his music to open his rock palace, The Paradise.

name: Flowers in the Attic
plot: Children are hidden away under an attic by their conspiring mother and grandmother.

name: Underground
plot: Two underground black marketeers, Marko and Blacky, sell weapons to the Communist resistance in wartime Belgrade, living the good life along the way.

name: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
plot: The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken control of a New York City media mogul's high-tech skyscraper.

name: The Mirror Has Two Faces
plot: A shy, middle-aged professor enters into a romantic but non-physical relationship with an unlucky-in-love colleague.

name: Bugsy Malone
plot: The classic gangster story of Bugsy Malone told with an all-child cast.

name: House
plot: A troubled writer moves into a haunted house after inheriting it from his aunt.

name: The Final Conflict
plot: The now adult Antichrist plots to eliminate his future divine opponent while a cabal of monks plot to stop him.

name: The Getaway
plot: A recently-released ex-con and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.

name: Dirty Dancing: Havana Nights
plot: High school senior Katey moves to Havana in November 1958, when her dad gets a promotion at Ford. She meets a local waiter, who introduces her to sensual Cuban music/dance. They enter a big dance contest for the prize when he gets fired.

name: The Magician
plot: A Melbourne hitman who is simultaneously ruthless and caring and volatile. 'Filmed' by his media student for a university assignment, Ray is under contract to kill a low life of the Melbourne underworld when a more tempting offer is made.

name: Supervixens
plot: Clint Ramsey must quit his job at Martin Bormann's gas station and flee after his wife is killed by psychopathic cop Harry Sledge, who tries to pin the murder on him.

name: School Ties
plot: In 1959, a star quarterback from a working-class family is given an opportunity to attend an elite New England preparatory school, but he is conflicted about whether or not to tell his Evangelical classmates that he is Jewish.

name: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde
plot: Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.

name: The Hudsucker Proxy
plot: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

name: Troll
plot: A wicked troll king in search of a mystical ring that will transform him to human form invades a San Francisco apartment complex where a powerful witch lives.

name: Quiz Show
plot: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.

name: Until the End of the World
plot: In 1999, Claire Tourneur's life is forever changed after she survives a car crash. She rescues Sam and travels the world with him. Writer Eugene Fitzpatrick follows and writes their story as a method of recording dreams is being developed.

name: The Cutting Edge
plot: A temperamental figure skater and an arrogant former hockey player attempt to win the Olympic Gold Medal as a figure skating pairs team.

name: Poison Ivy
plot: A seductive teen befriends an introverted high school student and schemes her way into the lives of her wealthy family.

name: Wild Rovers
plot: Tired of cow-punching for a living, two Montana cowboys rob a bank and flee but their employer's sons chase after them.

name: When a Man Loves a Woman
plot: The seemingly perfect relationship between a man and his wife is tested as a result of her alcoholism.

name: Sphere
plot: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

name: Congo
plot: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

name: Kate & Leopold
plot: An English Duke from 1876 is inadvertently dragged to modern day New York where he falls for a plucky advertising executive.

name: Analyze This
plot: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number-one patient is an insecure mob boss.

name: The Big Blue
plot: The rivalry between Enzo and Jacques, two childhood friends and now world-renowned free divers, becomes a beautiful and perilous journey into oneself and the unknown.

name: Hamburger Hill
plot: A very realistic interpretation of one of the bloodiest battles of the Vietnam War.

name: Five Easy Pieces
plot: A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.

name: Pete's Dragon
plot: An orphan boy and his magical dragon come to town with his abusive adoptive parents in pursuit.

name: Sid and Nancy
plot: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

name: May
plot: A socially awkward veterinary assistant with a lazy eye and obsession with perfection descends into depravity after developing a crush on a boy with perfect hands.

name: Courage Under Fire
plot: A U.S. Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

name: Hoop Dreams
plot: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

name: And Justice for All
plot: A lawyer is forced to defend a judge, while defending other clients, and trying to find punishment for the guilty and provide justice for the innocent.

name: The Hitcher
plot: A young man who escapes the clutches of a murderous hitchhiker is subsequently stalked by the hitcher and framed for his crimes.

name: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
plot: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

name: American Me
plot: A Mexican-American Mafia kingpin is released from prison, falls in love for the first time, and grows introspective about his gangster lifestyle.

name: Chances Are
plot: A reincarnated man unknowingly falls in love with his own daughter from his previous life. Once he realizes this, he tries to end their relationship before angels erase his memory.

name: Teen Witch
plot: High school misfit Louise, at a loss for romance, discovers magical abilities, but the teenage witch finds that she cannot conjure herself true love, so what?

name: Running Scared
plot: Two street-wise Chicago cops have to shake off some rust after returning from a Key West vacation to pursue a drug dealer who nearly killed them in the past.

name: Sirens
plot: When a painting is termed blasphemous, a young minister and his wife visit the artist... and the three sexually playful models living with him.

name: The General's Daughter
plot: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

name: Silent Running
plot: In a future where all flora is extinct on Earth, an astronaut is given orders to destroy the last of Earth's botany, kept in a greenhouse aboard a spacecraft.

name: The Exorcist III
plot: A police lieutenant uncovers more than he bargained for as his investigation of a series of murders, which have all the hallmarks of the deceased Gemini serial killer, leads him to question the patients of a psychiatric ward.

name: Lady Chatterley's Lover
plot: After a injury leaves her husband paralysed, Lady Chatterly is torn between her love for her husband and her physical desires. With her husband's consent, she seeks out other means of fulfilling her needs.

name: The Crush
plot: A journalist becomes the unwanted center of attention for a 14-year-old girl, who proceeds to sabotage his life after he refuses her sexual advances.

name: Spanglish
plot: A woman and her daughter emigrate from Mexico for a better life in America, where they start working for a family whose patriarch is a newly celebrated chef with an insecure wife.

name: The Net
plot: When Angela Bennett, a computer programmer, stumbles upon government secrets, she finds herself on the run from an unknown enemy hell-bent on destroying her completely.

name: American Gigolo
plot: A Los Angeles escort is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

name: Always
plot: The spirit of a recently deceased expert pilot mentors a newer pilot while watching him fall in love with the girlfriend that he left behind.

name: Open Water
plot: Based on the true story of two scuba divers accidentally stranded in shark infested waters after their tour boat has left.

name: Executive Decision
plot: When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.

name: Looney Tunes: Back in Action
plot: The Looney Tunes search for a man's missing father and the mythical Blue Monkey diamond.

name: Out for Justice
plot: With his partner executed in broad daylight by a psychotic mafia enforcer, a veteran Brooklyn officer vows revenge. But is the unstoppable detective prepared to face the truth and pay the price of blood?

name: Just Like Heaven
plot: A lonely landscape architect falls for the spirit of the beautiful woman who used to live in his new apartment.

name: Peggy Sue Got Married
plot: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

name: Hoodwinked!
plot: Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Woodsman and Granny all tell the police the events that led up to their encounter.

name: Ninja Scroll
plot: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a kunoichi and a spy in battling a demonic clan of killers - led by a ghost from his past - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

name: Scrooged
plot: A selfish, cynical television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

name: Boiler Room
plot: A college dropout, attempting to live up to his father's high standards, gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm which puts him on the fast track to success. But the job might not be as legitimate as it first appeared to be.

name: Shaft
plot: New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.

name: Halloween II
plot: While Dr. Loomis hunts for Michael Myers, a traumatized Laurie is rushed to Haddonfield Memorial Hospital, and The Shape is not far behind her.

name: Voyage of the Damned
plot: The tragic 1939 voyage of SS St. Louis carrying hundreds of German Jewish refugees from Nazi Germany that seemingly no nation is willing to save from certain doom.

name: Intimacy
plot: A failed London musician meets once a week with a woman for a series of intense sexual encounters to get away from the realities of life. But when he begins inquiring about her, it puts their relationship at risk.

name: Dead Man's Shoes
plot: A disaffected soldier returns to his hometown to get even with the thugs who brutalized his mentally-challenged brother years ago.

name: The Conformist
plot: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.

name: Revenge
plot: A retired US Navy pilot comes to Mexico, where he falls in love with the wife of a powerful businessman. The consequences will be cruel and unforeseen.

name: Return to Me
plot: A man who falls in love with the woman who received his wife's heart must decide which woman it is who holds his heart.

name: The New Guy
plot: A high school senior branded uncool in the ninth grade gets himself expelled so he changes his image to cool kid at the town's other high school.

name: The Master of Disguise
plot: An Italian waiter fights off a criminal mastermind with his inherited powers of disguise.

name: The City of Lost Children
plot: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

name: Tender Cousins
plot: With Adolf Hitler threatening Europe, against the backdrop of the deceptively peaceful summer of 1939, 14-year-old Julien experiences the intoxicating effects of first love, smitten with his beautiful 16-year-old cousin Julia.

name: Hard Boiled
plot: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

name: Private Parts
plot: The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.

name: Cemetery Man
plot: A cemetery man must kill the dead a second time when they become zombies.

name: Half Baked
plot: The story of three not so bright men who come up with a series of crazy schemes to get a friend out of jail.

name: Jaws 3-D
plot: A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.

name: The Stepford Wives
plot: The secret to a Stepford wife lies behind the doors of the Men's Association.

name: SLC Punk!
plot: In the early 1980s Stevo, and Heroin Bob are the only two dedicated punks in conservative Salt Lake City.

name: Casanova
plot: The fabled romantic Giacomo Casanova, after failing to win the affection of the Venetian woman Francesca Bruni, strives to discover the real meaning of love.

name: Scorned
plot: A vengeful widow is out to seduce the relatives of the man she blames for her husband's death.

name: Starsky & Hutch
plot: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".

name: Aguirre, the Wrath of God
plot: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

name: Beautiful Girls
plot: A piano player at a crossroads in his life returns home to his friends and their own problems with life and love.

name: Taps
plot: Military cadets take extreme measures to ensure the future of their academy when its existence is threatened by local condo developers.

name: Chaos
plot: Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.

name: The Final Countdown
plot: A modern aircraft carrier is thrown back in time to 1941 near Hawaii, just hours before the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.

name: Bad Taste
plot: The population of a small town disappears and is replaced by aliens that chase human flesh for their intergalactic fast-food chain.

name: An Unfinished Life
plot: Desperate to provide care for her daughter, down-on-her-luck Jean moves in with her father in-law from whom she is estranged. Through time, they learn to forgive each other and heal old wounds.

name: Spies Like Us
plot: Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.

name: Tin Cup
plot: A washed-up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the U.S. Open in order to win the heart of his successful rival's girlfriend.

name: The Substitute
plot: Shale's Mercenary team is retired after a (not so) covert mission in Cuba. He becomes a substitute teacher at his teacher fiancee's Miami high school to get those behind kneecapping her. His team helps him.

name: The War Zone
plot: An alienated teenager, saddened that he has moved away from London, must find a way to deal with a dark family secret.

name: Man Behind the Sun
plot: Japanese troops round up Chinese and Russian prisoners of war and take them to unit 731, where they're horribly tortured and experimented on to test new biological weapons.

name: Ghoulies
plot: A young man and his girlfriend move into an old mansion home, where he becomes possessed by a desire to control ancient demons.

name: Basket Case
plot: A young man carrying a big basket that contains his extremely deformed, formerly conjoined twin brother seeks vengeance on the doctors who separated them against their will.

name: Only You
plot: As a teen, Faith was told that her destiny is a man named Damon Bradley. Years later - Faith is about to marry another man - a Damon Bradley calls to wish them all the best. Faith blows off the wedding and follows Damon to Italy.

name: It Takes Two
plot: Alyssa and Amanda are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers, that accidentally meet one day.

name: Enough
plot: After running away fails, a terrified woman empowers herself in order to battle her abusive husband.

name: Broken Flowers
plot: As the extremely withdrawn Don Johnston is dumped by his latest woman, he receives an anonymous letter from a former lover informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. A freelance sleuth neighbor moves Don to embark on a cross-country search for his old flames in search of answers.

name: The Cave
plot: Blood-thirsty creatures await a pack of divers who become trapped in an underwater cave network.

name: Friday the 13th: Part 3
plot: Jason Voorhees stalks a group of friends who have just arrived to spend the weekend at a cabin near Crystal Lake.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy's Revenge
plot: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by deceased child murderer Freddy Krueger, who is out to possess him in order to continue his reign of terror in the real world.

name: Taking Lives
plot: An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.

name: The Gambler
plot: Axel Freed is a literature professor. He has the gambling vice. When he has lost all of his money, he borrows from his girlfriend, then his mother, and finally some bad guys that chase him. Despite all of this, he cannot stop gambling.

name: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
plot: A group of martial-arts warriors has only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

name: The Rookie
plot: A Texas baseball coach makes the major league after agreeing to try out if his high school team made the playoffs.

name: Supernova
plot: A deep space rescue and recovery spaceship with a crew of 6 receives a distress call from a mining operation 3432 light years away. A rescue operation via dimension jump is made. Bad idea.

name: Once Were Warriors
plot: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

name: Volcano
plot: A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles and a city official and a seismologist try to stop its inevitable flow through the city.

name: Nosferatu the Vampyre
plot: Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.

name: Immoral Tales
plot: An erotic collection of short stories, an anthology comprised of tantalizing tales about sexual desire and its diverse manifestations.

name: Charley Varrick
plot: A man, his wife and their friend stage a bloody bank robbery without realizing they are stealing from the Mob.

name: My Bodyguard
plot: When a boy comes to a new school and gets harassed by a bully, he acquires the services of the school's most feared kid as a bodyguard.

name: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider - The Cradle of Life
plot: Adventurer Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box, before an evil scientist finds it, and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to assist her.

name: Fresh Horses
plot: A college student from Cincinnati breaks off his engagement to his wealthy fiancée after falling in love with a girl from Kentucky. She claims to be 20, but he learns she is actually only 16 and already married.

name: Runaway Jury
plot: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

name: A Woman Under the Influence
plot: Although wife and mother Mabel is loved by her husband Nick, her mental illness places a strain on the marriage.

name: Be Cool
plot: Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.

name: Bride of Chucky
plot: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

name: The Philadelphia Experiment
plot: A United States Navy destroyer escort participates in a Navy "invisibility" experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors forty years into the future.

name: One Crazy Summer
plot: An aspiring teenage cartoonist and his friends come to the aid of a singer trying to save her family property from developers.

name: In the Bedroom
plot: A New England couple's college-aged son dates an older woman who has two small children and an unwelcome ex-husband.

name: Body of Evidence
plot: A lawyer defends a woman accused of killing her older lover by having sex with him.

name: THX 1138
plot: In the 25th century, a time when people have designations instead of names, a man, THX 1138, and a woman, LUH 3417, rebel against their rigidly controlled society.

name: Fools Rush In
plot: After a one-night stand with Alex, Isabel realizes that she is pregnant and they decide to get married. However, along with the marriage comes compromise of one's own cultural traditions.

name: Airport
plot: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

name: Beyond the Valley of the Dolls
plot: Three girls come to Hollywood to make it big, but find only sex, drugs, and sleaze.

name: Arthur
plot: Alcoholic billionaire playboy Arthur Bach must marry a woman he does not love, or he will be cut off from his $750,000,000 fortune. But when Arthur falls in love with a poor waitress, he must decide if he wants to choose love or money.

name: Marked for Death
plot: A retired DEA agent is out to hunt down and take out a Jamaican drug posse that has targeted he and his family for murder.

name: Dagon
plot: A boating accident runs a young man and woman ashore in a decrepit Spanish fishing town which they discover is in the grips of an ancient sea god and its monstrous half human offspring.

name: Tuck Everlasting
plot: A young woman meets and falls in love with a young man who is part of a family of immortals.

name: Three Colors: Red
plot: A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

name: The Gate
plot: Kids left home alone accidentally unleash a horde of malevolent demons from a mysterious hole in their suburban backyard.

name: Soul Plane
plot: Things get raucously funny aboard the maiden flight of a black-owned airline, thanks to some last-minute passenger additions.

name: Windtalkers
plot: Two U.S. Marines in World War II are assigned to protect Navajo Marines, who use their native language as an unbreakable radio cypher.

name: Milk Money
plot: A group of young boys befriend a prostitute named V.

name: Blank Check
plot: After a bike accident, a young boy inadvertently gains possession of a check for $1 million and proceeds to spend it, unaware that the gangsters it belongs to are in pursuit.

name: Ma mère
plot: When his father dies, a young man is introduced by his attractive, amoral mother to a world of hedonism and depravity.

name: Assault on Precinct 13
plot: A Highway Patrol Officer, two criminals and a station secretary defend a defunct Los Angeles precinct office against a siege by a bloodthirsty street gang.

name: Finding Forrester
plot: Forrester, the author of a famous book, decides to help Jamal, a 16-year-old student, discover his writing prowess by mentoring him and enrolling him into a prestigious private school.

name: Speak
plot: After a blurred trauma over the summer, Melinda enters high school a selective mute. Struggling with school, friends, and family, she tells the dark tale of her experiences, and why she has chosen not to speak.

name: In & Out
plot: A midwestern teacher questions his sexuality after a former student makes a comment about him at the Academy Awards.

name: La Belle Noiseuse
plot: The former famous painter Frenhofer revisits an abandoned project using the girlfriend of a young visiting artist. Questions about truth, life, and artistic limits are explored.

name: Hannah and Her Sisters
plot: Between two Thanksgivings two years apart, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

name: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
plot: Kirsty is brought to an institution after the horrible events of Hellraiser (1987), where the occult-obsessive head doctor resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites and their demonic underworld.

name: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
plot: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from a life of crime to pursue his passion of rap music.

name: Married to the Mob
plot: A mobster's wife hates her lifestyle, but gets a chance to change it when her husband is killed - if the Long Island mob and the FBI let her.

name: Inspector Gadget
plot: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

name: Hart's War
plot: A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.

name: The Peacemaker
plot: A US Army colonel and a civilian woman supervising him must track down stolen Russian nuclear weapons before they're used by terrorists.

name: The Sword and the Sorcerer
plot: A mercenary with a three-bladed sword rediscovers his royal heritage's dangerous future when he is recruited to help a princess foil the designs of a brutal tyrant and a powerful sorcerer in conquering a land.

name: Yentl
plot: A Jewish girl disguises herself as a boy to enter religious training.

name: Elvira: Mistress of the Dark
plot: "Elvira: Mistress of the Dark" is a 1988 comedy, horror movie - upon arriving in a small town where Elvira has inherited a rundown mansion, the famous horror host must battle an evil uncle, and townspeople who want her burned at the stake.

name: Big Momma's House
plot: In order to protect a beautiful woman and her son from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as a large grandmother.

name: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid
plot: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

name: A Boy and His Dog
plot: A young man and his telepathic dog wander a post-apocalyptic wasteland.

name: Maelstrom
plot: After plunging her car into a river, a woman encounters a man who helps her come to terms with her life.

name: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan
plot: Jason Voorhees is accidentally awakened from his watery grave and ends up stalking a ship full of graduating high-school students headed to Manhattan, New York.

name: Night of the Demons
plot: Ten teenagers party at an abandoned funeral parlor on Halloween night. When an evil force awakens, demonic spirits keep them from leaving and turn their gathering into a living Hell.

name: Hellraiser III: Hell on Earth
plot: An investigative reporter must send the newly unbound Pinhead and his legions back to Hell.

name: A Civil Action
plot: A tenacious lawyer takes on a case involving two companies responsible for causing several children to be diagnosed with leukemia due to the town's water supply being contaminated, at the risk of bankrupting his firm and career.

name: Nell
plot: In a remote woodland cabin, a small-town doctor discovers Nell - a beautiful young hermit-woman with many secrets.

name: Sabrina
plot: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

name: The Money Pit
plot: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

name: The Entity
plot: A woman is tormented by an invisible being.

name: Ong-Bak: The Thai Warrior
plot: When the head of a statue sacred to a village is stolen, a young martial artist goes to the big city and finds himself taking on the underworld to retrieve it.

name: Secrets & Lies
plot: Following the death of her adoptive parents, a successful young black optometrist establishes contact with her biological mother -- a lonely white factory worker living in poverty in East London.

name: Heaven Can Wait
plot: A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.

name: Benny & Joon
plot: A mentally ill young woman finds her love in an eccentric man who models himself after Buster Keaton.

name: The Jungle Book
plot: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

name: Dead Presidents
plot: A Vietnam vet adjusts to life after the war while trying to support his family, but the chance of a better life may involve crime and bloodshed.

name: Monster-in-Law
plot: The love life of Charlotte is reduced to an endless string of disastrous blind dates, until she meets the perfect man, Kevin. Unfortunately, his merciless mother will do anything to destroy their relationship.

name: Osmosis Jones
plot: A policeman white blood cell, with the help of a cold pill, must stop a deadly virus from destroying the human they live in, Frank.

name: Taxi
plot: To work off his tarnished driving record, a hip taxi driver must chauffeur a loser police inspector on the trail of German bank robbers.

name: Under Siege 2: Dark Territory
plot: Casey Ryback hops on a Colorado to LA train to start a vacation with his niece. Early into the trip, terrorists board the train and use it as a mobile HQ to hijack a top secret destructive US satellite.

name: Son of the Mask
plot: Tim Avery, an aspiring cartoonist, finds himself in a predicament when his dog stumbles upon the mask of Loki. Then after conceiving an infant son "born of the mask", he discovers just how looney child raising can be.

name: Basquiat
plot: The brief life of Jean Michel Basquiat, a world renowned New York street artist struggling with fame, drugs and his identity.

name: The Legend of 1900
plot: A baby boy discovered on an ocean liner in 1900 grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.

name: The Prince of Tides
plot: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

name: Stop Making Sense
plot: Considered by critics as the greatest concert film of all time, the live performance was shot over the course of three nights at Hollywood's Pantages Theater in December of 1983 and features Talking Heads' most memorable songs.

name: The Wizard
plot: A boy and his brother run away from home and hitch cross-country, with help from a girl they meet, to compete in the ultimate video-game championship.

name: The Animal
plot: After receiving organ transplants from various animal donors, a man finds himself taking on the traits of those animals.

name: The Kiss
plot: After the death of her mother, a teenage girl is faced with bizarre supernatural occurrences when her mother's estranged sister arrives and begins to infiltrate her and her father's lives.

name: Exit to Eden
plot: Elliot heads for the sexual fantasy island, Eden. He takes some photos of diamond smugglers. They and undercover cops want the photos and follow him to Eden.

name: The World According to Garp
plot: A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.

name: Silver Bullet
plot: In a small town, brutal killings start to plague the close knit community. Marty Coslaw, a paraplegic boy, is convinced the murders are the doings of a werewolf.

name: Wicker Park
plot: A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a café is his long-lost love. His belief leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold in order to trail her.

name: A Handful of Dust
plot: The wife's affair and a death in the family hasten the demise of an upper-class English marriage.

name: A Walk in the Clouds
plot: Paul Sutton, a young married soldier, befriends a pregnant lady who is petrified her father will disown her, and agrees to pose as her boyfriend. As time passes, they start growing fond of each other.

name: French Kiss
plot: A woman flying to France to confront her straying fiance gets into trouble when the charming crook seated next to her uses her for smuggling.

name: Radio
plot: The story of a high school coach and the developmentally challenged man who he took under his wing.

name: The American Friend
plot: Tom Ripley, who deals in forged art, suggests a picture framer he knows would make a good hit man.

name: Point of No Return
plot: A government fakes the death of a criminal to turn this young woman into a killer on its service.

name: Open Your Eyes
plot: A very handsome man finds the love of his life, but he suffers an accident and needs to have his face rebuilt by surgery after it is severely disfigured.

name: Cutthroat Island
plot: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

name: The Beverly Hillbillies
plot: Nice guy redneck Jed Clampett strikes it rich when he finds black oil. He and his kin move to posh Beverly Hills.

name: The Majestic
plot: In 1951, a blacklisted Hollywood writer gets into a car accident, loses his memory and settles down in a small town where he is mistaken for a long-lost son.

name: The Natural
plot: A middle-aged unknown comes seemingly out of nowhere to become a legendary baseball player with almost supernatural talent.

name: Frankie and Johnny
plot: Johnny has just been released from prison, and gets a job in a café beside waitress Frankie. Frankie is a bit of a loner, but Johnny is determined their romance will blossom.

name: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
plot: A couple's seemingly solid marriage begins to crumble when the wife discovers that her husband intends to divorce her.

name: 1492: Conquest of Paradise
plot: Christopher Columbus' discovery of the Americas and the effect this has on the indigenous people.

name: Nostalghia
plot: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy researching the life of an 18th-century composer, and instead meet a ruminative madman who tells the poet how the world may be saved.

name: Dreamscape
plot: A man who can enter and manipulate people's dreams is recruited by a government agency to help cure the President of the United States of his nightmares about nuclear war but stumbles upon an assassination plot.

name: Fat Girl
plot: Two sisters confront their sexual attitudes and experiences while on a family holiday.

name: Star Trek: Insurrection
plot: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

name: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
plot: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who had left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.

name: Eaten Alive!
plot: A young woman teams up with a mercenary to find her missing sister in the jungles of New Guinea where they find that a deranged leader of a religious cult has located his commune in an area inhabited by cannibals.

name: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
plot: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time, as the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

name: Phantasm
plot: A teenage boy and his friends face off against a mysterious grave robber, known only as the Tall Man, who employs a lethal arsenal of unearthly weapons.

name: The Getaway
plot: An ex-con and his devoted wife must flee from danger when a heist doesn't go as planned.

name: Good Night, and Good Luck.
plot: Broadcast journalist Edward R. Murrow looks to bring down Senator Joseph McCarthy.

name: Necessary Roughness
plot: Due to NCAA sanctions, the Texas State University Fightin' Armadillos must form a football team from their actual student body, with no scholarships to help, to play their football schedule.

name: Legal Eagles
plot: A New York district attorney works and flirts with his adversary and her kooky artist client, who is on trial for a murder she didn't commit.

name: Three Men and a Little Lady
plot: Three ex-dads quickly discover how empty life is without their little lady, and go to outrageous lengths in their efforts to win their daughter back in this critically acclaimed and equally charming sequel.

name: Beaches
plot: A privileged rich debutante and a cynical struggling entertainer share a turbulent, but strong childhood friendship over the years.

name: Shanghai Noon
plot: A Chinese man travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped Princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

name: The Last Unicorn
plot: A beautiful unicorn sets out to learn if she truly is the last of her kind in this sparkling animated musical.

name: The Brood
plot: A man tries to uncover an unconventional psychologist's therapy techniques on his institutionalized wife, amidst a series of brutal murders.

name: Forever Young
plot: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

name: Lost and Delirious
plot: After starting at an upmarket boarding school, a teenage girl forms close friendships with her two older roommates. However, when she discovers that her new friends are lovers she finds herself caught in a complicated situation.

name: The Hole
plot: Four teenagers at a British private school secretly uncover and explore the depths of a sealed underground hole created decades ago as a possible bomb shelter.

name: Nowhere
plot: Follows a day in the lives of a group of Los Angeles high school students and the strange lives they lead.

name: Doc Hollywood
plot: A young doctor on his way across the country to a job interview crashes his car in a small town and is sentenced to work for several days at the town hospital.

name: Lethal Weapon 4
plot: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with deadly Chinese triads that are trying to free their former leaders out of prison and onto American soil.

name: *batteries not included
plot: Aliens help a feisty old New York couple in their battle against the ruthless land developer who's out to evict them.

name: Driven
plot: A young hot shot driver is in the middle of a championship season and is coming apart at the seams. A former CART champion is called in to give him guidance.

name: The Shootist
plot: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

name: Surf Ninjas
plot: Two boys learn from a mysterious warrior that they are the heirs to the throne of Patusan and set out to overthrow the current monarchy.

name: Wag the Dog
plot: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

name: Set It Off
plot: Desperation drives four inner-city women to bank robbery in Los Angeles, then they start mistrusting each other.

name: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
plot: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.

name: Blown Away
plot: An Irish bomber escapes from prison and targets a member of the Boston bomb squad.

name: Colors
plot: An experienced cop and his rookie partner patrol the streets of East Los Angeles while trying to keep the gang violence under control.

name: Caché
plot: A married couple is terrorized by a series of surveillance videotapes left on their front porch.

name: Ali
plot: A biography of sports legend Muhammad Ali, focusing on his triumphs and controversies between 1964 and 1974.

name: The Deep
plot: In Bermuda, two amateur treasure-hunting divers have a run-in with local criminals when they inadvertently discover the secret cargo of a World War II shipwreck.

name: Collateral Damage
plot: After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.

name: Black Sheep
plot: A gubernatorial candidate hires a wormy special assistant whose only job is to make sure the candidate's well-meaning but incompetent brother doesn't ruin the election.

name: Pieces
plot: The co-eds of a Boston college campus are targeted by a mysterious killer who is creating a human jigsaw puzzle from their body parts.

name: Runaway
plot: In the near future, a police officer specializes in malfunctioning robots. When a robot turns out to have been programmed to kill, he begins to uncover a homicidal plot to create killer robots... and his son becomes a target.

name: The Haunted Mansion
plot: A realtor and his wife and children are summoned to a mansion, which they soon discover is haunted, and while they attempt to escape, he learns an important lesson about the family he has neglected.

name: My Summer of Love
plot: In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.

name: Capricorn One
plot: When the first manned flight to Mars is deemed unsafe and scrubbed on the launch pad, anxious authorities must scramble to save face and retain their funding - and so an unthinkable plot to fake the mission is hatched.

name: Godspell
plot: An adaption of the musical, in a modern-day song-and-dance recreation of the Gospel of St. Matthew.

name: Juice
plot: Four inner-city teenagers get caught up in the pursuit of power and happiness, which they refer to as "the juice".

name: Head-On
plot: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.

name: Good Bye Lenin!
plot: In 1990, to protect his fragile mother from a fatal shock after a long coma, a young man must keep her from learning that her beloved nation of East Germany as she knew it has disappeared.

name: America's Sweethearts
plot: A movie publicist deals with the messy public split of his movie's co-stars while keeping reporters at bay while a reclusive director holds the film's print hostage.

name: Rosencrantz & Guildenstern Are Dead
plot: Two minor characters from the play 'Hamlet' stumble around unaware of their scripted lives and unable to deviate from them.

name: The Joy Luck Club
plot: The life histories of four East Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

name: The Way of the Dragon
plot: A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them.

name: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
plot: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.

name: Broken Arrow
plot: Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.

name: The Man from Snowy River
plot: In 1880s Australia, after young Jim Craig's father dies, he takes a job at the Harrison cattle ranch, where he is forced to become a man.

name: SpaceCamp
plot: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

name: Bad Boys
plot: Chicago crime kid Mick O'Brien is sent to reform school after accidentally killing a rival's kid brother.

name: The Hurricane
plot: The story of Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

name: Class of 1984
plot: A new teacher at a troubled inner-city high school soon ends up clashing with a delinquent punk posse who run the institute with an iron fist.

name: Summer Rental
plot: An overworked air-traffic controller takes his family on a beach vacation but is soon beset by series of mishaps.

name: Because of Winn-Dixie
plot: A mischievous dog befriends a lonely young girl in a new town and helps her make new friends.

name: My Tutor
plot: A rich father hires a tutor for his son. The son is a horny teenager and the tutor is a gorgeous blonde. Complications ensue.
Several women enter a science fiction author's life over the course of a few years, after the author has lost the woman he considers his one true love.

name: The One
plot: A rogue Multiverse agent goes on a manhunt for alternate versions of himself, getting stronger with each kill. Only the last version of himself, an LASD cop, can stop his crusade before he becomes "The One".

name: Pootie Tang
plot: "The Man" is baffled by a chill hero's invincible weapon: gibberish.
The famous 1970s New York City nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

name: The Duellists
plot: France, 1801. Due to a minor perceived slight, mild-mannered Lieutenant d'Hubert is forced into a duel with hot-headed irrational Lieutenant Feraud. The disagreement ultimately results in scores of duels spanning several years.

name: The Quiet
plot: Following the unexpected death of her father, a deaf teenager moves in with her godparents, where she discovers the cruel behaviour of their daughter may be indicative of a dark secret within the family.

name: Galaxy of Terror
plot: A ragtag spaceship crew sent on a rescue mission encounter a formidable enemy, their worst fears projected by their own imaginations.

name: Zombie
plot: Strangers searching for a young woman's missing father arrive at a tropical island where a doctor desperately seeks the cause and cure of a recent epidemic of the undead.

name: The Tenant
plot: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.

name: Fanny and Alexander
plot: Two young Swedish children in the 1900s experience the many comedies and tragedies of their lively and affectionate theatrical family, the Ekdahls.

name: Roxanne
plot: The large-nosed C.D. Bales is in love with the beautiful Roxanne; she falls for his personality but another man's looks.

name: Harlem Nights
plot: During the 1930s, a New York City illegal gambling house owner and his associates must deal with strong competition, gangsters, and corrupt cops in order to stay in business.

name: Coonskin
plot: Rabbit, a country-born trickster, takes over the organized crime racket in Harlem, facing opposition from the institutionalized racism of the Mafia and corrupt police.

name: The Double Life of Véronique
plot: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

name: Captain Ron
plot: A Chicagoan inherits an old yacht. He, his wife, daughter and son fly to a Caribbean island and hire a dubious Captain Ron to sail them on an adventure to Miami.

name: Life as a House
plot: When a man is diagnosed with terminal cancer, he takes custody of his misanthropic teenage son, for whom quality time means getting high, engaging in small-time prostitution, and avoiding his father.

name: High Spirits
plot: When a hotelier attempts to fill the chronic vacancies at his castle by launching an advertising campaign that falsely portrays the property as haunted, two actual ghosts show up and end up falling for two guests.

name: Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives
plot: Tommy Jarvis exhumes Jason Voorhees to cremate his corpse, but inadvertently brings him back to life instead. The newly revived killer seeks revenge, and Tommy may be the only one who can stop him.

name: Jungle 2 Jungle
plot: A man learns he has a thirteen-year-old son who was raised in the jungle and brings the boy to New York City, turning his life upside down in the process.

name: Down Periscope
plot: Lt. Cmdr. Tom Dodge is assigned as Captain to the USS Stingray, an old diesel driven submarine that has seen better days.

name: Dark Star
plot: In the far reaches of space, a small crew, 20 years into their solitary mission, find things beginning to go hilariously wrong.

name: The Jacket
plot: A Gulf war veteran is wrongly sent to a mental institution for insane criminals, where he becomes the object of a doctor's experiments, and his life is completely affected by them.

name: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
plot: Kids all over America want Silver Shamrock masks for Halloween. Doctor Daniel Challis seeks to uncover a plot by Silver Shamrock owner Conal Cochran.

name: The Fantastic Four
plot: When dosed with cosmic rays, four intrepid explorers are given incredible powers.

name: Deep Red
plot: A jazz pianist and a wisecracking journalist are pulled into a complex web of mystery after the former witnesses the brutal murder of a psychic.

name: Children of Heaven
plot: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

name: The Final Cut
plot: Set in a world with memory recording implants, Alan Hakman is a cutter, someone with the power of final edit over people's recorded histories. His latest assignment is one that puts him in danger.

name: Space Cowboys
plot: When retired engineer Frank Corvin is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

name: Tenebrae
plot: An American novelist visiting Rome to promote his latest book is stalked and harassed by an obsessed fan who is committing a string of murders that appear to be tributes to his work.

name: Grizzly Man
plot: A devastating and heart-rending take on grizzly bear activists Timothy Treadwell and Amie Huguenard, who were killed in October of 2003 while living among grizzly bears in Alaska.

name: Femme Fatale
plot: A woman tries to straighten out her life, even as her past as a con-woman comes back to haunt her.

name: Snake Eyes
plot: A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.

name: Ransom
plot: Multi-millionaire Tom Mullen's son is kidnapped, but after initially agreeing to pay the ransom Mullen then decides to use the ransom money as a bounty.

name: Bolero
plot: Set in the 1920s, a young woman sets out to lose her virginity. Her mission leads her to a Moroccan sheikh and a Spanish bullfighter.

name: Whale Rider
plot: A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.

name: Summer of Sam
plot: Spike Lee's take on the "Son of Sam" murders in New York City during the summer of 1977 centering on the residents of an Italian-American Northeast Bronx neighborhood who live in fear and distrust of one another.

name: Screwballs
plot: Frolicking youth comedy about zany high school students set in the 1960s.

name: Opening Night
plot: A renowned actress teeters on the edge of a breakdown as she counts down the days toward a big Broadway opening.

name: Tampopo
plot: A truck driver stops at a small family-run noodle shop and decides to help its fledgling business. The story is intertwined with various vignettes about the relationship of love and food.

name: Honey
plot: Honey is a sexy, tough music video choreographer who shakes up her life after her mentor gives her an ultimatum: sleep with him or be blacklisted within their industry.

name: Highlander II: The Quickening
plot: In the future, Highlander Connor MacLeod must prevent the destruction of Earth under an anti-ozone shield.

name: National Lampoon's European Vacation
plot: The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.

name: The Woman in Red
plot: On his way to work, Teddy spots Charlotte, an incredibly beautiful Woman in Red. He really wants to meet her, but what would his wife say?

name: Happy Together
plot: A couple take a trip to Argentina but both men find their lives drifting apart in opposite directions.

name: American Splendor
plot: An original mix of fiction and reality illuminates the life of comic book hero everyman Harvey Pekar.

name: Black Christmas
plot: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

name: Mischief
plot: Guided by James Dean, the eternal symbol of youthful rebellion, a gawky high school student obsessed with the hottest girl in class takes a crash course in teenage coolness from his motorcycle-rebel neighbor.

name: A Mighty Wind
plot: Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.

name: UHF
plot: An unemployed visionary becomes the manager of a local television station. The station becomes a success, with all sorts of hilarious sight gags and wacky humor.

name: D3: The Mighty Ducks
plot: The unruly team of hockey misfits grows up a bit and receives scholarships to a prestigious prep school, where they take on the snotty varsity team.

name: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
plot: A scientific expedition sets out for Borneo to seek a flower called the Blood Orchid, which could grant longer life. Meanwhile, they run afoul of snakes and each other.

name: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
plot: Janey is new in town and soon meets Lynne, who shares her passion for dancing in general and "Dance TV" in particular.

name: Mulholland Falls
plot: In 1950's Los Angeles, a special crime squad of the LAPD investigates the murder of a young woman.

name: Rio Lobo
plot: After the Civil War, Cord McNally searches for the two traitors whose treachery caused the defeat of McNally's unit and the loss of a close friend.

name: Outland
plot: A federal marshal stationed at a mining colony on the Jupiter moon of Io uncovers a drug-smuggling conspiracy. He gets no help from the workers or authorities when he finds himself marked for murder.

name: Lethal Weapon 3
plot: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue a former LAPD officer who uses his knowledge of police procedure and policies to steal and sell confiscated guns and ammunition to local street gangs.

name: The Dead Pool
plot: Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder various San Francisco celebrities, with himself being one of the targets.

name: Ski School
plot: Rival groups in a skiing school do battle on and off the piste. One gang are rich and serious, the other group are party animals.

name: Teaching Mrs. Tingle
plot: The story of a girl who is willing to do anything to become Valedictorian, even if it means murdering the teacher that stands in her way.

name: Malice
plot: A tale about a happily married couple who would like to have children. Tracy teaches art, Andy's a college dean. Things are never the same after she is taken to hospital and operated upon by Jed, a "know all" doctor.

name: Humanoids from the Deep
plot: Humanoid sea creatures start killing a fishing town's residents, and raping their women. It's up to the townsfolk and a visiting biologist to fight back and fend them off.

name: The Prophecy
plot: At the scene of a bizarre murder, L.A. homicide detective Thomas Dagget discovers a lethal heavenly prophecy now being fulfilled on earth. In his fight to stop the forces of evil, he finds an unlikely ally in an elementary school teacher.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
plot: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may be able to defeat him for good.

name: Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Next Generation
plot: A group of teenagers get into a car crash in the Texas woods on prom night, and then wander into an old farmhouse that is home to Leatherface (Robert Jacks) and his insane family of cannibalistic psychopaths.

name: Trees Lounge
plot: Tommy is an unemployed mechanic who spends most of his time in a bar (Trees Lounge) in a small blue collar town. He seems to always be thinking, "If only X then I could stop drinking".

name: Roar
plot: A naturalist living with big cats in East Africa expects a visit by his family of four from Chicago. A mix-up leaves him searching for his family, who have been left in the clutches of wild lions.

name: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment
plot: When a new gang moves into town it's up to the screwball police team to stop them.

name: Hardware
plot: The head of a cyborg reactivates, rebuilds itself, and goes on a violent rampage in a space marine's girlfriend's apartment.

name: 3-Iron
plot: A transient young man breaks into empty homes to partake of the vacationing residents' lives for a few days.

name: Harriet the Spy
plot: Harriet M. Welsch is a spy. But when her friends find her secret notebook, the tables are turned on her. Can she win them back and still keep on going with the spy business?

name: The Perils of Gwendoline in the Land of the Yik Yak
plot: Gwendoline, a runaway nun, arrives in Hong Kong on a mission to find her father, who was last seen in the legendary Land of the Yik Yak searching for a rare butterfly. She's guided on her perilous journey by the selfish mercenary Willard.

name: Beau-père
plot: After her mother dies, fourteen-year-old Marion falls in love with her stepfather, Remy.

name: Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead
plot: Five different criminals face imminent death after botching a job quite badly.

name: 24 Hour Party People
plot: In 1976, Tony Wilson sets up Factory Records and brings Manchester's music to the world.

name: Victor/Victoria
plot: A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

name: Convoy
plot: Truckers form a mile-long "convoy" in support of a trucker's vendetta with an abusive sheriff - Based on the country song of the same title by C.W. McCall.

name: Police Academy 4: Citizens on Patrol
plot: The misfit Police Academy (1984) graduates now are assigned to train a group of civilian volunteers to fight crime once again plaguing the streets.

name: D.A.R.Y.L.
plot: A seemingly normal young boy is found abandoned on a mountain road and adopted by a family who are increasingly amazed by his abilities before discovering the secret behind his real identity.

name: Wing Commander
plot: Blair, a fighter pilot, joins an interstellar war to fight the evil Kilrathi who are trying to destroy the universe.

name: Trapped
plot: The Jennings' fight for their daughters life after she is kidnapped by an experienced gang of thieves.

name: Waterloo
plot: Facing the decline of everything he has worked to obtain, conqueror Napoleon Bonaparte and his army confront the British at the Battle of Waterloo.

name: Freaky Friday
plot: A mother and daughter find their personalities switched and have to live each other's lives on one strange Friday.

name: The Great Mouse Detective
plot: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

name: The Quest
plot: A group of gentlemen of fortune visits a legendary "Lost City", located in Tibet. They plan to steal a priceless statue "Golden Dragon" during the martial arts tournament.

name: Communion
plot: On December 26th Whitley Strieber has a strange nightmare. In the following days, plagued by painful headaches, his behavior becomes increasingly erratic. Later, under hypnosis, he realizes that his dream was not a dream at all.

name: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
plot: A legendary dhampir competes with a motley family of bounty hunters to return a young woman, who has been seemingly abducted by a vampire, to her family.

name: Tigerland
plot: A group of recruits go through Advanced Infantry Training at Fort Polk, Louisiana's infamous Tigerland, last stop before Vietnam for tens of thousands of young men in 1971.

name: The Three Musketeers
plot: A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.

name: The War of the Roses
plot: A married couple tries everything to drive each other out of the house in a vicious divorce battle.

name: Chain Reaction
plot: Two researchers in a green alternative energy project are put on the run when they are framed for murder and treason.

name: Fortress
plot: In a future, private underground prison/Fortress, the inmates are computer controlled with CCTV, dream readers and devices that can cause pain or death. John and his illegally pregnant wife are inside but want to escape before birth.

name: Talk to Her
plot: Two men share an odd friendship while they care for two women who are both in deep comas.

name: Gigli
plot: Larry Gigli is assigned by a crime boss to kidnap the brother of a prominent district attorney. A beautiful woman known only as Ricki is sent to stay with him to make sure he doesn't mess up the job.

name: At Close Range
plot: Reunited with his career criminal father, tough teen Brad thinks he's found his ticket to an exciting life of crime, only to find out he's wrong.

name: Welcome to the Dollhouse
plot: An awkward seventh-grader struggles to cope with inattentive parents, snobbish class-mates, a smart older brother, an attractive younger sister and her own insecurities in suburban New Jersey.

name: The Canterbury Tales
plot: Pasolini's artistic, sometimes violent, always vividly cinematic retelling of some of Chaucer's most erotic tales.

name: Around the World in 80 Days
plot: To win a bet, an eccentric British inventor embarks, with his Chinese valet and an aspiring French artist, on a trip full of adventures and dangers around the world in exactly 80 days.

name: Chasing Liberty
plot: Anna wants to be like other girls her age (18): date a guy etc. but she's the US president's daughter and always guarded. In Prague he breaks his promise of only 2 agents following her to a concert and she runs away with Ben to see Europe.

name: Kazaam
plot: A troubled kid inadvertently releases a genie, who must grant him any three wishes he requests.

name: Wrongfully Accused
plot: Ryan Harrison is framed for murder and must prove himself innocent by finding a mysterious one-eyed, one-armed, one-legged man after escaping from a bus accident on the way to jail.

name: Carnal Knowledge
plot: Chronicling the lifelong sexual development of two men who meet and become friends in college.

name: Next of Kin
plot: Truman, a Chicago cop, sets out to find the killer of his brother. Meanwhile, another of his brothers, Briar (a hillbilly) decides to find the killer himself.

name: The Long Riders
plot: The origins, exploits and the ultimate fate of the Jesse James gang is told in a sympathetic portrayal of the bank robbers made up of brothers who begin their legendary bank raids because of revenge.

name: The Thief Who Came to Dinner
plot: A computer programmer decides to become a thief. And when he starts making waves an insurance investigator hounds him. He also meets a woman who becomes his accomplice.

name: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane
plot: A thirteen-year-old girl, who lives with her absentee father, befriends a disabled teenage amateur magician and invites him, gradually, into her tenuous struggle against a predatory local neighbor.

name: U Turn
plot: A man heading to Vegas to pay off his gambling debt before the Russian mafia kills him is forced to stop in an Arizona town where everything that can go wrong does go wrong.

name: The Monster Squad
plot: A group of young monster fanatics attempts to save their hometown from Count Dracula and his monsters.

name: The Babysitter
plot: A teenage babysitter is the focus of two boys and a man's separate obsessions.

name: Crossroads
plot: A wannabe blues-guitar virtuoso finds an old blues player and hopes he can teach him a long-lost song by legendary musician Robert Johnson.

name: The Paper
plot: New York City tabloid editor Henry's faced with tough decisions while he faces several serious life challenges, and a tempting job offer.

name: Evita
plot: The hit musical based on the life of Eva Perón (Evita Duarte), a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan Domingo Perón, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

name: Judgment Night
plot: Four young friends, while taking a shortcut en route to a local boxing match, witness a brutal murder which leaves them running for their lives.

name: Land of the Dead
plot: The living dead have taken over the world, and the last humans live in a walled city to protect themselves as they come to grips with the situation.

name: In Her Shoes
plot: Strait-laced Rose breaks off relations with her party girl sister, Maggie, over an indiscretion involving Rose's boyfriend. The chilly atmosphere is broken with the arrival of Ella, the grandmother neither sister knew existed.

name: The Ladykillers
plot: An eccentric, if not charming Southern professor and his crew pose as a classical ensemble in order to rob a casino, all under the nose of his unsuspecting but sharp old landlady.

name: Hustle & Flow
plot: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful hip-hop emcee.

name: Waking Life
plot: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

name: Queen Margot
plot: Young Queen Margot finds herself trapped in an arranged marriage amidst a religious war between Catholics and Protestants. She hopes to escape with a new lover, but finds herself imprisoned by her powerful and ruthless family.

name: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
