plot: Sinbad and the vizier of Marabia, followed by evil magician Koura, seek the three golden tablets that can gain them access to the ancient temple of the Oracle of All Knowledge.

name: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
plot: In this live-action prequel to The Flintstones (1994), the Flintstones and the Rubbles go on a trip to Rock Vegas, where Wilma Slaghoople is pursued by playboy Chip Rockefeller.

name: Wonder Boys
plot: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.

name: Pola X
plot: A young writer becomes intrigued with a mysterious dark-haired woman who claims to be his long-lost sister, starting an unusual relationship with her and prompting a downward spiral involving his domineering mother and lovely fiancée.

name: Saved!
plot: When a girl attending a Christian high school becomes pregnant, all of her former friends turn on her and she is ostracized and demonized.

name: Race with the Devil
plot: Two couples vacationing together in an R.V. from Texas to Colorado are terrorized after they witness a murder during a Satanic ritual.

name: Fist of Fury
plot: A young man seeks vengence for the death of his teacher.

name: Harsh Times
plot: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

name: White Squall
plot: Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.

name: Party Girl
plot: A 20-something, irresponsible party girl is bailed out of jail by her librarian godmother. To repay the loan, she starts working at the library and gradually turns her life around.

name: Holy Smoke
plot: Ruth's been brainwashed by a guru in Delhi, India. Her parents in Sydney hire a specialist in reversing this. Ruth is tricked to return to Australia and is isolated in an outback cabin with the specialist. It gets messy.

name: Darkness Falls
plot: A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.

name: Disco Pigs
plot: Pig and Runt - born on the same day, in the same hospital, moments apart. Twins, all but by blood.

name: Balto
plot: An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

name: A Man Apart
plot: A man known as Diablo emerges to head a drug cartel after the previous leader is imprisoned.

name: Red Rock West
plot: Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter is mistaken for a hitman, but when the real hitman arrives, complications ensue.

name: The Yards
plot: Ex-con Leo tries to go straight, but his plans are derailed after reuniting with his old crew and a well-connected railway contractor.

name: Mac and Me
plot: An alien trying to escape from NASA is befriended by a wheelchair-bound boy.

name: Reds
plot: A radical American journalist becomes involved with the Communist revolution in Russia, and hopes to bring its spirit and idealism to the United States.

name: Cellular
plot: A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. The catch? The woman claims to have been kidnapped, and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.

name: The Prince and Me
plot: At college Paige meets Eddie, a student from Denmark, whom she first dislikes but later accepts, likes, and loves; he proves to be Crown Prince Edvard. Paige follows him to Copenhagen, and he follows her back to school with a plan.

name: Eight Legged Freaks
plot: Venomous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions.

name: Malibu Express
plot: A womanizing private detective is assigned the task of investigating who is behind the hi-tech computer technology leaks to the Russians.

name: Intolerable Cruelty
plot: Miles, a high-profile divorce lawyer, wins a case for his rich but adulterous client Rex Rexroth. But Rex's ex-wife, Marylin, who is no saint and is a gold-digger, plots to take revenge on Miles.

name: Blue Streak
plot: A former convict poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago.

name: Maladolescenza
plot: A teen boy grows from playing and fighting with his German-shepherd dog to playing kid--then adult--games with two equally young girls in a dream-like forest which eventually turns eerie and somber.

name: The Shadow
plot: In 1930s New York City, The Shadow (Alec Baldwin) battles his nemesis, Shiwan Khan (John Lone), who is building an atomic bomb.

name: Wicked City
plot: While protecting a signatory to a peace treaty between their peoples, a male human and a female demon discover that their mutual attraction may be the key to unifying their worlds.

name: L.E.T.H.A.L. Ladies: Return to Savage Beach
plot: A stolen computer floppy disc filled with information about the location of a mythical treasure in Savage Island will lure both villains and L.E.T.H.A.L. Agents into a dangerous treasure hunt.

name: The Ghost and the Darkness
plot: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

name: Casualties of War
plot: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager.

name: Shallow Grave
plot: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

name: Henry & June
plot: Anaïs Nin meets American writer Henry Miller in Paris in 1931. She keeps a diary of her sexual awakening, which includes Henry and his wife June.

name: Gallipoli
plot: Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.

name: Clockwatchers
plot: The relationship between four female temps all working for the same credit company is threatened with the arrival of a new hire, who lands a permanent position one of the women was vying for.

name: Belladonna of Sadness
plot: After being raped by an evil feudal lord and subsequently getting banished from her village, a peasant girl makes a pact with the Devil to gain magical powers and take her revenge.

name: Jaws: The Revenge
plot: Chief Brody's widow believes that her family is deliberately being targeted by another shark in search of revenge.

name: Police Story
plot: A virtuous Hong Kong Police Officer must clear his good name when the drug lord he is after frames him for the murder of a dirty cop.

name: Snow Dogs
plot: When a Miami dentist inherits a team of sled dogs, he's got to learn the trade or lose his pack to a crusty mountain man.

name: Walking Tall
plot: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser, who almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

name: The People vs. Larry Flynt
plot: The story of controversial pornography publisher Larry Flynt, and how he became a defender of free speech.

name: North Country
plot: A fictionalized account of the first major successful sexual harassment case in the United States, Jenson vs. Eveleth Mines, where a woman who endured a range of abuse while working as a miner filed and won the landmark 1984 lawsuit.

name: Caveman
plot: A caveman seeks revenge on a much larger competitor for the hand of a beautiful cavewoman.

name: Son in Law
plot: Having gotten a taste of college life, a drastically changed farm girl returns home for Thanksgiving break with her best friend, a flamboyant party animal who is clearly a fish out of water in a small farm town.

name: New Jack City
plot: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

name: Hidalgo
plot: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.

name: The Omega Man
plot: Dr Robert Neville has developed an experimental vaccine which makes him the only immune survivor of a biological catastrophe. A gang of homicidal mutants blame science for their condition and attempt to kill him.

name: Bean
plot: The bumbling Mr. Bean travels to America when he is given the responsibility of bringing a highly valuable painting to a Los Angeles museum.

name: Ilsa: She Wolf of the SS
plot: Ilsa is an evil Nazi warden at a death camp that conducts "medical experiments." Ilsa's goal is to prove women can withstand more pain and suffering than men, and therefore should be allowed to fight on the front lines.

name: Demons
plot: A group of random people are invited to a screening of a mysterious movie, only to find themselves trapped in the theater with ravenous demons.

name: Get Over It
plot: A high school senior's girlfriend breaks up with him. His friends try to make him think of something else. His friend's sister Kelly helps him with the school musical. Spending time with Kelly has an effect.

name: Over the Edge
plot: A group of bored teenagers rebel against authority in the community of New Granada after the death of one of their own.

name: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
plot: With the help of an irreverent young sidekick, a bank robber gets his old gang back together to organize a daring new heist.

name: Purple Rain
plot: A young musician, tormented by an abusive situation at home, must contend with a rival singer, a burgeoning romance, and his own dissatisfied band, as his star begins to rise.

name: The Grifters
plot: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend, both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

name: First Desires
plot: Three teenage girls decide to visit a romantic island and find love. They get shipwrecked and end up on different sides of the island. Each girl begins her own romantic adventure either with a man, a boy or even another girl.

name: Dream a Little Dream
plot: An accident puts the consciousness of an elderly dream researcher into the body of a bratty teenager. The problem? The kid prefers dreamworld limbo to real life.

name: My Dinner with Andre
plot: Two old friends meet for dinner; as one tells anecdotes detailing his experiences, the other notices their differing worldviews.

name: Night on Earth
plot: An anthology of 5 different cab drivers in 5 American and European cities and their remarkable fares on the same eventful night.

name: Barbed Wire Dolls
plot: Women's prison tale, with Lina Romay as Maria who is jailed after killing her father, played by director Jess Franco, who tries to rape her. Lesbian wardens, torture, nudity, sex, insanity and conspiracy round out the formula.

name: Kagemusha: The Shadow Warrior
plot: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

name: Night of the Living Dead
plot: When the unburied dead return to life and seek human victims, seven refugees shelter in a house in the Pennsylvanian countryside.

name: Fantastic Planet
plot: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

name: Waiting to Exhale
plot: Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with men.

name: Barbarian Queen
plot: A sword-wielding warrior, Amethea, and a few companions embark on a life-or-death mission to liberate her people from the clutches of a brutal monarch who destroyed her village and enslaved her people.

name: With Honors
plot: Convinced his thesis will have him graduate with honors from Harvard University, a stuffy student finds himself at the mercy of a homeless man's demands when he holds the papers hostage.

name: The Lighthorsemen
plot: In 1917 when the British forces are bogged down in front of the Turkish and German lines in Palestine they rely on the Australian light horse regiment to break the deadlock.

name: Something Wicked This Way Comes
plot: In a small American town, a diabolical circus and its demonic proprietor prey on the townsfolk.

name: The Front Page
plot: A ruthless editor tries to get his top reporter to cover one more crime story before retirement.

name: Flesh Gordon
plot: Emperor Wang is leader of the planet Porno and sends his mighty "Sex Ray" towards Earth, turning everyone into sex-mad fiends. Only one man can save the Earth, football player Flesh Gordon

name: The Horse Whisperer
plot: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

name: 3 Women
plot: Two roommates/physical therapists, one a vain woman and the other an awkward teenager, share an increasingly bizarre relationship.

name: Ishtar
plot: Two terrible lounge singers get booked to play a gig in a Moroccan hotel but somehow become pawns in an international power play between the C.I.A., the Emir of Ishtar, and the rebels trying to overthrow his regime.

name: Julia
plot: At the behest of an old and dear friend, playwright Lillian Hellman undertakes a dangerous mission to smuggle funds into Nazi Germany.

name: The Mechanic
plot: An aging hitman befriends a young man who wants to be a professional killer. Eventually it becomes clear that someone has betrayed them.

name: Sympathy for Mr. Vengeance
plot: A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' friend's daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant.

name: Hide and Seek
plot: As a widower tries to piece together his life in the wake of his wife's suicide, his daughter finds solace, at first, in her imaginary friend.

name: Crimes of Passion
plot: A mysterious woman, fashion designer by day and prostitute by night, is hounded by two men: a married father of two children and a sexually repressed preacher.

name: A Very Long Engagement
plot: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

name: The Decameron
plot: An adaptation of nine stories from Boccaccio's "Decameron".

name: Psycho
plot: A young female embezzler arrives at the Bates Motel, which has terrible secrets of its own.

name: Torque
plot: A biker returns from Thailand to set things straight with his girlfriend. One gang leader wants him for delivery of 2 motorbikes filled with crystal meth and another gang leader wants him for murdering his brother.

name: Wagons East
plot: In the 1860s Wild West, a ragged bunch of misfit settlers decides they cannot stand living in their current situation and they hire a grizzled cowboy to take them on a journey back East to their hometowns.

name: 100 Girls
plot: Matt spends the night with a girl in an elevator during power outage in a girls' college dorm. He never sees her. Waking up in the morning, panties are all that's left of her. How does he find her in a building with 100 girls?

name: The Goodbye Girl
plot: After being dumped by her live-in boyfriend, an unemployed dancer and her 10-year-old daughter are reluctantly forced to live with a struggling off-Broadway actor.

name: The Ultimate Gift
plot: A deceased billionaire leaves his spoiled adult grandson a series of odd tasks to perform in order to receive "the ultimate gift," with the resentful grandson having no idea what that might be.

name: Bad Santa
plot: A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid.

name: Quest for Camelot
plot: An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit, and a goofy two-headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.

name: Barfly
plot: Based on the life of successful poet Charles Bukowski and his exploits in Hollywood during the 60s, 70s, and 80s.

name: Rita, Sue and Bob Too
plot: Realistic story of working-class Yorkshire life, alternately serious and light-hearted, as two schoolgirls have a sexual fling with a married man.

name: Thunderbirds
plot: When The Hood finds and invades International Rescue's secret base and traps most of the Tracy family, only young Alan Tracy and his friends can save the day.

name: Stigmata
plot: When a young woman becomes afflicted by stigmata, a priest is sent to investigate her case, which may have severe ramifications for his faith and for the Catholic Church itself.

name: You Can Count on Me
plot: A single mother's life is thrown into turmoil after her struggling, rarely seen younger brother returns to town.

name: Raw Deal
plot: A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them.

name: Fright Night Part 2
plot: "Fright Night Part 2" is a sequel to "link=tt0089175]". Charley Brewster and the horror host Peter Vincent must face more vampires, out for revenge.

name: Friday the 13th: The New Blood
plot: Jason Voorhees is accidentally freed from his watery prison by a telekinetic teenager. Now, only she can stop him.

name: Cronos
plot: A mysterious device designed to provide its owner with eternal life resurfaces after four hundred years, leaving a trail of destruction in its path.

name: Split Second
plot: In a flooded future London, Detective Harley Stone hunts a serial killer who murdered his partner, and has haunted him ever since. He soon discovers what he is hunting might not be human.

name: The Program
plot: Several players from different backgrounds try to cope with the pressures of playing football at a major university. Each deals with the pressure differently, some turn to drinking, others to drugs, and some to studying.

name: Fat Man and Little Boy
plot: This film reenacts the Manhattan Project, the secret WWII project, and the first atomic bombs designed, built, and tested in Los Alamos.

name: Cannonball Run II
plot: The original characters from The Cannonball Run (1981) race across the country once more in various cars and trucks.

name: Jason Goes to Hell
plot: Serial killer Jason Voorhees' supernatural origins are revealed.

name: Glitter
plot: A young singer dates a disc jockey who helps her get into the music business, but their relationship become complicated as she ascends to super stardom.

name: The Baby-Sitters Club
plot: Seven junior-high-school girls organize a daycare camp for children while at the same time experiencing classic adolescent growing pains.

name: Shivers
plot: The residents of a suburban high-rise apartment building are being infected by a strain of parasites that turn them into mindless, sex-crazed fiends out to infect others by the slightest sexual contact.

name: Eye for an Eye
plot: When the courts fail to keep behind bars the man who raped and murdered her daughter, a woman seeks her own form of justice.

name: Far from Heaven
plot: In 1950s Connecticut, a flustered housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.

name: The Night Porter
plot: A concentration camp survivor rekindles her sadomasochistic relationship with her lover, a former SS officer - now working as a night porter at a Vienna hotel - but his former Nazi associates begin stalking them.

name: Blankman
plot: A simpleton inventor becomes a superhero with a bulletproof costume and a low budget.

name: Stir Crazy
plot: Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends are sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell can keep them locked in a cage.

name: The Cotton Club
plot: Meet the jazz musicians, dancers, owner, and guests (like gangster Dutch Schultz) of The Cotton Club in 1928-1930s Harlem.

name: The Eagle Has Landed
plot: A German plot to kidnap Sir Winston Churchill unfolds at the height of World War II.

name: Center Stage
plot: A group of teenagers from various backgrounds enroll at the American Ballet Academy in New York to make it as ballet dancers and each one deals with the problems and stress of training and getting ahead in the world of dance.

name: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
plot: A town's Sheriff and regular patron of a historical whorehouse fights to keep it running when a television reporter targets it as the Devil's playhouse.

name: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
plot: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

name: The Devil's Backbone
plot: After Carlos - a 12-year-old whose father has died in the Spanish Civil War - arrives at an ominous boys' orphanage, he discovers the school is haunted and has many dark secrets which he must uncover.

name: Rock & Rule
plot: A malevolent rock star kidnaps a singer to force her to participate in the summoning of a demon, and her band must help her stop him.

name: The Car
plot: A small desert town is terrorized by a powerful, seemingly possessed car, and the local sheriff may be the only one who can stop it.

name: Airborne
plot: California born and raised surfer, Mitchell Goosen has to spend six months in Ohio while learning the hard way- love is where the heart is.

name: Lone Wolf McQuade
plot: After helping the local police with some horse thieves, a Texas Ranger aims at a drug lord with arms trade as well. They're interested in the same woman and they're both into martial arts.

name: Defending Your Life
plot: In an afterlife way-station resembling a major city, the lives of the recently deceased are examined in a court-like setting.

name: Just Married
plot: A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage.

name: Steel Dawn
plot: In a post-apocalyptic world, a warrior wandering through the desert comes upon a group of settlers who are being menaced by the leader of a murderous gang who's after the water they control.

name: Hardbodies
plot: Three middle aged guys rent a beach house to hopefully score with young, single women. Not having what it takes, the men hire a sexy young surfer, Scotty, to teach them some game and help them meet girls.

name: Out Cold
plot: A snowboarder's plans for his own snowboard park go awry when an ex-girlfriend returns to town.

name: The Lost Empire
plot: Seeking revenge, officer Angel Wolfe, her Native American friend Whitestar, and outlaw Heather infiltrate a fortified island where an undead wizard and his evil cult force captured women to take part in gladiatorial tournaments.

name: Kicking & Screaming
plot: Family man Phil Weston, a lifelong victim of his father's competitive nature, takes on the coaching duties of a kids' soccer team, and soon realizes that he's also taking on his father's dysfunctional way of relating.

name: Belly
plot: Two young friends involved in organized crime and drug dealing find that their priorities differ.

name: Get Carter
plot: When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.

name: The Secret of My Success
plot: A talented young man can't get an executive position without rising through the ranks, so he comes up with a shortcut, which also benefits his love life.

name: The Magdalene Sisters
plot: Three young Irish women struggle to maintain their spirits while they endure dehumanizing abuse as inmates of a Magdalene Sisters Asylum.

name: Wonderland
plot: In the police investigation of a brutal crime scene, one man was at the center of it all: legendary porn star John Holmes.

name: Messiah of Evil
plot: A young woman goes searching for her missing artist father. Her journey takes her to a strange Californian seaside town governed by a mysterious undead cult.

name: The Eiger Sanction
plot: Classical art professor and collector Dr. Jonathan Hemlock, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.

name: Jungle Fever
plot: Friends and family of a married Black architect react in different ways to his affair with an Italian secretary.

name: My Girl 2
plot: Vada Sultenfuss must go to LA to stay with her Uncle Phil to do some research on her mother's life, but finds much more.

name: Jade
plot: A bright assistant D.A. investigates a gruesome hatchet murder and hides a clue he found at the crime scene. Under professional threats and an attempt on his life, he goes on heartbroken because evidence point to the woman he still loves.

name: The Family Stone
plot: An uptight, liberal businesswoman accompanies her boyfriend to his eccentric and outgoing family's annual Christmas celebration and finds that she's a fish out of water in their free-spirited way of life.

name: Alice, Sweet Alice
plot: In 1961, a divorced Catholic couple's life is turned upside-down when one of their two adolescent daughters is suspected of her younger sister's brutal murder during her First Holy Communion and a series of subsequent stabbings.

name: Scum
plot: An uncompromising story of life in a British juvenile offender institution in the '70s.

name: Madam Kitty
plot: Kitty runs a brothel in Nazi Germany where the soldiers come to "relax". Recording devices have been installed in each room by a power-hungry army official, who plans to use the information to blackmail Hitler and gain power himself.

name: The Stuff
plot: A delicious, mysterious goo that oozes from the earth is marketed as the newest dessert sensation, but the tasty treat rots more than teeth when zombie-like snackers who only want to consume more of the strange substance at any cost begin infesting the world.

name: Thinner
plot: An obese attorney is cursed by a gypsy to rapidly and uncontrollably lose weight.

name: The Beyond
plot: A young woman inherits an old hotel in Louisiana where, following a series of supernatural "accidents", she learns that the building was built over one of the entrances to Hell.

name: The Heart Is Deceitful Above All Things
plot: Seven-year-old Jeremiah is pulled from his foster home and thrown into a troubled life on the road with his teenage mother, Sarah.

name: High Crimes
plot: A successful lawyer's husband is arrested for murdering nine villagers in El Salvador in 1988 as a US soldier under a different name. She decides to defend him in military court and find out the truth about what happened.

name: Live Nude Girls
plot: Four women get together for a bachelorette party.

name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
plot: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

name: Stealth
plot: Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war.

name: The Sect
plot: A lonely kindergarten teacher discovers a secret well in the basement of her house, and soon finds herself being followed by a murderous Satanic cult.

name: The Proposition
plot: A lawman apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother, or else they'll execute his younger brother.

name: Man on Fire
plot: A former CIA agent, John Creasy, is hired as a bodyguard for a girl in Italy, who becomes the daughter he never had. When she is abducted, Creasy's fiery rage is unleashed, and despite being badly wounded, embarks on a bloody revenge spree.

name: Embrace of the Vampire
plot: An 18-year-old college freshman is seduced by a handsome vampire lover who introduces her to a dark world of carnal desires.

name: Prom Night
plot: At a high-school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.

name: Mission to Mars
plot: When the first manned mission to Mars meets with a catastrophic and mysterious disaster after reporting an unidentified structure, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the tragedy and bring back any survivors.

name: Force 10 from Navarone
plot: During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.

name: Beau Travail
plot: An ex-Foreign Legion officer recalls his once-glorious life of leading troops in Djibouti.

name: Like Mike
plot: A 13-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials "MJ" inside them.

name: Going Overboard
plot: A struggling young comedian takes a menial job on a cruise ship hoping for his big chance to make it in the world of cruise-ship comedy.

name: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
plot: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually committed by a new vigilante assassin.

name: The Hunted
plot: An FBI deep-woods tracker attempts to capture a trained assassin who has made a sport of hunting humans.

name: Coffy
plot: A sexy Black nurse takes vigilante justice against inner-city drug dealers after her sister becomes their latest victim.

name: Secret Things
plot: Nathalie teaches Sandrine that sexual transgression can cause violent pleasure and give those who use it a powerful weapon to climb the social hierarchy. They decide to get a job in a bank, a place where victims abound.

name: The Stepford Wives
plot: Joanna Eberhart has come to the quaint little town of Stepford, Connecticut with her family, but soon discovers there lies a sinister truth in the all too perfect behavior of the female residents.

name: Dangerous Beauty
plot: A Venetian courtesan becomes a hero to her city, but later becomes the target of an inquisition by the Church for witchcraft.

name: Basic
plot: A D.E.A. Agent investigates the disappearance of a legendary Army Ranger Drill Sergeant and several of his cadets during a training exercise gone severely awry.

name: The Sugarland Express
plot: A woman attempts to reunite her family by helping her husband escape prison and together kidnapping their son. But things don't go as planned when they are forced to take a police hostage on the road.

name: The Stepfather
plot: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

name: Vampire's Kiss
plot: After an encounter with a neck-biter, a publishing executive thinks that he's turning into a vampire.

name: Gleaming the Cube
plot: A young avid skateboarder uncovers a government conspiracy while investigating his adoptive brother's mysterious death.

name: Everyone Says I Love You
plot: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a troubled marriage while her stepsister gets engaged.

name: Mandingo
plot: An 1840s slaveowner trains one of his slaves to be a bare-knuckle fighter.

name: The French Lieutenant's Woman
plot: Anna and Mike portray two characters in a film set in 19th century England who fall in love despite the fact that Mike's character is engaged.

name: Magnum Force
plot: Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan pursues a conspiracy of vigilante cops, who are not above going beyond the law to kill San Francisco's undesirables.

name: Maniac
plot: A psychopathic man goes on a killing and mutilation spree in New York City.

name: Romeo Must Die
plot: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

name: Drunken Master
plot: Wong Fei-Hung is a mischievous yet righteous young man, but after a series of incidents his frustrated father has him disciplined by a master of drunken martial arts.

name: Above the Law
plot: A former Special Operations Vietnam vet works as a Chicago cop, and uncovers C.I.A. wrongdoing.

name: The Wanderers
plot: The Wanderers is a teenage, Italian gang in Bronx, NYC, 1963. They have their confrontations with other gangs. Drugs and weapons are uncool. Adult life awaits them.

name: The Last Detail
plot: Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.

name: Farewell My Concubine
plot: Two boys meet at an opera training school in Peking in 1924. Their resulting friendship will span nearly 70 years and endure some of the most troublesome times in China's history.

name: Hard Eight
plot: Professional gambler Sydney teaches John the tricks of the trade. John does well until he falls for cocktail waitress Clementine.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
plot: When journalist April O'Neil discovers an ancient scepter with magical powers, the Turtles must cow-a-bunga their way back to 17th century Japan to rescue her from the evil clutches of Lord Norinaga.

name: Babette's Feast
plot: During the late 19th century, a strict religious community in a Danish village takes in a French refugee from the Franco-Prussian War as a servant to the late pastor's daughters.

name: A Chorus Line
plot: Hopefuls try out before a demanding director for a part in a new musical.

name: After the Sunset
plot: The story of what happens after a master thief achieves his last big score, when the F.B.I. Agent who promised he'd capture him, is about to do just that.

name: Time After Time
plot: H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.

name: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
plot: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

name: Spice World
plot: World-famous pop group the Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double-decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

name: Witchery
plot: A photographer and others are stranded at a Massachusetts island hotel haunted by a woman in black.

name: Brewster's Millions
plot: A minor-league baseball player must spend $30 million in 30 days in order to inherit $300 million. However, he's not allowed to own any assets, destroy the money, gift it, give it to charity, or tell anyone about the deal.

name: Dracula: Dead and Loving It
plot: Mel Brooks' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.

name: Once Bitten
plot: A vampire Countess needs to drink the blood of a virgin in order to keep her eternal beauty. It seems that all is hopeless, until she bumps into Mark Kendall.

name: Reversal of Fortune
plot: Wealthy Sunny von Bülow lies brain-dead, husband Claus guilty of attempted murder; but he says he's innocent and hires Alan Dershowitz for his appeal.

name: All the Right Moves
plot: An ambitious young football star is trapped in a dying mill town--unless his gridiron skills can win him a way out.

name: Calendar Girls
plot: A Women's Institute chapter's fundraising effort for a local hospital by posing nude for a calendar becomes a media sensation.

name: Alligator
plot: A pet baby alligator is flushed down a toilet and survives in the city sewers. Twelve years later, it grows to an enormous size thanks to a diet of discarded laboratory dogs injected with growth hormones. Now, humans have entered the menu.

name: The Object of My Affection
plot: A pregnant New York City social worker begins to develop romantic feelings for her gay best friend, and decides she'd rather raise her child with him, much to the dismay of her overbearing boyfriend.

name: Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes
plot: A missing heir of respected Scottish family, raised in African jungles by animals, finally returns to his estate only to realize that difference between the two worlds is really significant.

name: Smoke Signals
plot: Arnold rescued Thomas from a fire when he was a child. Thomas thinks of Arnold as a hero, while Arnold's son Victor resents his father's alcoholism, violence and abandonment of his family.

name: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
plot: An eight-year-old boy genius and his friends must rescue their parents after the adults are abducted by aliens.

name: All About My Mother
plot: A comedy-drama about a bereaved mother, and overwrought actress, her jealous lover, and a pregnant nun.

name: Something Wild
plot: A free-spirited woman "kidnaps" a yuppie for a weekend of adventure. But the fun quickly takes a dangerous turn when her ex-convict husband shows up.

name: Creepshow 2
plot: Three macabre tales from the latest issue of a boy's favorite comic book, dealing with a vengeful wooden Native American, a monstrous blob in a lake, and an undying hitchhiker.

name: Frenzy
plot: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

name: House of Flying Daggers
plot: A romantic police captain breaks a beautiful member of a rebel group out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.

name: Pat Garrett & Billy the Kid
plot: Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

name: Gods and Generals
plot: The rise and fall of confederate general Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson, as he meets with military success against the Union from 1861 to 1863, when he is accidentally killed by his own soldiers.

name: The Idiots
plot: The group of people gather at the house in Copenhagen suburb to break all the limitations and to bring out the "inner idiot" in themselves.

name: Waiting for Guffman
plot: An aspiring director and the marginally talented amateur cast of a hokey small-town Missouri musical production go overboard when they learn that someone from Broadway will be in attendance.

name: Night of the Creeps
plot: Alien brain parasites, entering humans through the mouth, turn their host into a killing zombie. Some teenagers start to fight against them.

name: My Sassy Girl
plot: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

name: Jingle All the Way
plot: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

name: Shine
plot: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

name: Feast
plot: Patrons locked inside a bar are forced to fight monsters.

name: Twilight
plot: A retired detective accepts a simple task, unaware that it will tear open old, forgotten, but deadly wounds.

name: Making the Grade
plot: A spoiled rich young man hires a young hustler, who lives in a broken car and owes money to a dicey loan shark, to take his place in his elite prep school and graduate for him.

name: My Name Is Nobody
plot: A young, easy-going gunman worships and competes with a famed gunfighter, insisting that he must face down a gang of 150 outlaws before he can retire.

name: Shattered Glass
plot: The story of a young journalist who fell from grace when it was discovered he fabricated over half of his articles from the publication The New Republic magazine.

name: Les Misérables
plot: Valjean, a former criminal, has atoned for his past and now finds himself in the midst of the French Revolution, avoiding a law-obsessed policeman hell-bent on capturing him.

name: Bad Girls
plot: Four prostitutes join together to travel the Old West.

name: Battle Beyond the Stars
plot: A farm boy recruits a band of outlaws to save the planet Akir from forces that threaten to wipe them out from the face of the universe. A battle stretching beyond the stars begins here.

name: The Sure Thing
plot: Walter Gibson is a university freshman going through a dry spell. His old buddy arranges a "sure thing" for him in California. Gibson and his classmate Allison then take a long road trip out to Cali, and both foil each other's plans.

name: American Movie
plot: Documentary about an aspiring filmmaker's attempts to finance his dream project by finally completing the low-budget horror film he abandoned years before.

name: Vegas Vacation
plot: In the fourth outing for the vacation franchise, the Griswolds have to survive Vegas fever when they go to Las Vegas for a fun family vacation.

name: The Big Green
plot: A teacher on exchange from England is placed in an underachieving Texas school, where she coaches the students in soccer, improving their self-esteem and leading to unexpected success.

name: Before Night Falls
plot: The life of Cuban poet and novelist, Reinaldo Arenas.

name: What the Peeper Saw
plot: A wealthy author's second wife begins to suspect that her 12-year-old stepson may have murdered his mother, who mysteriously died in a bathtub accident.

name: Yi Yi
plot: Each member of a middle-class Taipei family seeks to reconcile past and present relationships within their daily lives.

name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
plot: Set back in the 80s when Harry met Lloyd in high school where they cross paths with a mean principal and a bunch of other outcasts much like themselves.

name: The Sea Inside
plot: The factual story of Spaniard Ramon Sampedro, who fought a 28-year campaign in favor of euthanasia and his own right to die.

name: Rumor Has It...
plot: Sarah Huttinger is a woman who learns that her family was the inspiration for the book and film "The Graduate" -- and that she just might be the offspring of the well-documented event.

name: Phenomenon
plot: An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.

name: Scandal
plot: Based on the Profumo Scandal of 1963, an affair between an exotic dancer and the Minister of War shakes up the British government.

name: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within
plot: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.

name: Rabid
plot: A young woman develops a taste for human blood after experimental plastic surgery, and her victims turn into blood-thirsty zombies, leading into a city-wide epidemic.

name: Stalingrad
plot: The story follows a group of German soldiers, from their Italian R&R in the summer of 1942 to the frozen steppes of Soviet Russia and ending with the battle for Stalingrad.

name: Red Planet
plot: Astronauts, and their robotic dog AMEE (Autonomous Mapping Evaluation and Evasion), search for solutions to save a dying Earth by searching on Mars, only to have the mission go terribly awry.

name: Hot Dog... The Movie
plot: Harkin Banks heads to skiing championships in California. A teen runaway tags along as he parties and competes with friends and foes.

name: Fair Game
plot: Max Kirkpatrick is a cop who protects Kate McQuean, a civil law attorney, from a renegade KGB team out to terminate her.

name: An American Werewolf in Paris
plot: An American man unwittingly gets involved with French werewolves who have developed a serum allowing them to transform at will.

name: PCU
plot: A high school senior visits college for the weekend, and stays at the wildest house on campus.

name: The Medallion
plot: A Hong Kong detective suffers a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion and is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers.

name: The Alamo
plot: Based on the 1836 standoff between a group of Texan and Tejano men, led by Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie, and Mexican dictator Santa Anna's forces at the Alamo in San Antonio Texas.

name: Skipped Parts
plot: An ungrounded young mother and her thoughtful teenage son are banished to a remote provincial town by her domineering father.

name: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed & Fabulous
plot: Gracie Hart abandons the life of a field agent to become the public face of the FBI. Yet, when Cheryl Frasier and Stan Fields are kidnapped, she is determined to rescue them, along with her reluctant partner.

name: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
plot: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

name: Big Jake
plot: In 1909, when John Fain's gang kidnaps Jacob McCandles' grandson and holds him for ransom, Big Jake sets out to rescue the boy.

name: Evil Toons
plot: Burt has a cleaning company and hires four women to clean an isolated house. They find an old book, a dagger and a soul shred and when one of them, Megan, reads an incantation, she unleashes an evil beast in our world.

name: About Last Night
plot: A man and woman meet and try to have a romantic affair, despite their personal problems and the interference of their disapproving friends.

name: Double Team
plot: An international spy teams up with an arms dealer to escape from a penal colony and rescue his family from a terrorist.

name: Two Mules for Sister Sara
plot: When a former Civil War soldier saves a nun from a gang of bandits, they team up to help the Mexicans in their war against the French.

name: Suburbia
plot: When household tensions and a sense of worthlessness overcome Evan, he finds escape when he clings with the orphans of a throw-away society.

name: She-Devil
plot: A surprisingly resourceful housewife vows revenge on her husband when he begins an affair with a wealthy romance novelist.

name: Wayne's World 2
plot: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

name: Places in the Heart
plot: In central Texas in the 1930s, a widow with two small children tries to save her small 40-acre farm with the help of a blind boarder and an itinerant black handyman.

name: Firefox
plot: A pilot is sent into the Soviet Union on a mission to steal a prototype jet fighter that can be partially controlled by a neuralink.

name: Young Sherlock Holmes
plot: When assorted people start having inexplicable delusions that lead to their deaths, a teenage Sherlock Holmes decides to investigate.

name: Muppet Treasure Island
plot: The Muppets set sail in search of treasure, with Jim Hawkins and Long John Silver.

name: Nightwatch
plot: A law student starts working as a night watchman at The Department of Forensic Medicine in Copenhagen. His mad friend gets him on a game of dare that escalates. As a serial-killer's victims start piling up at work, he becomes a suspect.

name: Norma Rae
plot: A young single mother and textile worker agrees to help unionize her mill despite the problems and dangers involved.

name: Thrashin'
plot: Two skateboarding gangs battle each other for supremacy, and a member of one gang falls in love with the sister of his rival.

name: Kinsey
plot: A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior.

name: The Swan Princess
plot: A power-hungry sorcerer curses a princess to live as a swan by day in this tale of everlasting love.

name: New Rose Hotel
plot: Two businessmen are hired to steal secrets from a rival, and decide to use a beautiful call girl to do so.

name: Unleashed
plot: A man enslaved by the mob since childhood and raised into behaving like a human attack dog escapes his captors and attempts to start a new life.

name: Foul Play
plot: A San Francisco librarian picks up a hitchhiker whose car has broken down, which leads to her being stalked and hunted by shady individuals. A cop she briefly met during a function eventually comes to her rescue.

name: Escape to Witch Mountain
plot: Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?

name: Wizards
plot: On a post-apocalyptic Earth, a wizard and his faire folk comrades fight an evil wizard who's using technology in his bid for conquest.

name: Los ritos sexuales del diablo
plot: A young woman travels to England after the abrupt death of her brother. Staying with her sister-in-law, she finds her companion soon drawn into a satanic cult based in the house, whose rites seem to centre on large-scale sexual congress.

name: Beethoven's 2nd
plot: Beethoven, the St. Bernard dog, becomes a father, but his girlfriend Missy is dognapped, and his puppies are in danger of the same fate.

name: Absolute Power
plot: Career thief Luther Whitney (Clint Eastwood) witnesses a horrific crime involving U.S. President Alan Richmond (Gene Hackman).

name: Laura
plot: Sculptor Paul is reunited with a former great love after a long time, but is much more impressed by his 15-year-old daughter, Laura, who looks like her mother when Paul was in love with her.

name: Titus
plot: Titus returns victorious from war, only to plant the seeds of future turmoil for himself and his family.

name: Guess Who
plot: A young woman, Theresa, brings her boyfriend, Simon, home to meet her parents and surprise them with the news of their engagement. Another surprise: Simon is white.

name: The Company of Wolves
plot: A teenage girl in a country manor falls asleep while reading a magazine, and has a disturbing dream involving wolves prowling the woods below her bedroom window.

name: Dorm Daze
plot: Set during a crazy afternoon in the lives of a dozen college students at a co-ed dorm that starts with the arrival of two very different women with the same name of Dominique.

name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
plot: In this collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh, a honey-loving teddy bear, embarks on some eccentric adventures.

name: Dutch
plot: To get to know his girlfriend's son, a working-class good guy volunteers to pick him up from his prep school, only to learn that he isn't the nicest young man.

name: The Hidden
plot: A cop and an FBI agent race for answers after law abiding people suddenly become violent criminals.

name: The Lords of Flatbush
plot: Two members of a social club in 1950s Brooklyn have more interest in romance than in rumbles.

name: Grey Gardens
plot: Meet a mother and daughter, high-society dropouts, reclusive cousins of Jackie O., managing to thrive together amid the decay and disorder of their East Hampton, NY, mansion, making for an eerily ramshackle echo of the American Camelot.

name: Last Man Standing
plot: A drifting gunslinger-for-hire finds himself in the middle of an ongoing war between the Irish and Italian mafia in a Prohibition era ghost town.

name: Men at Work
plot: Two garbage men uncover a conspiracy involving illegal toxic waste dumping and decide to bring the whole operation down.

name: Mean Machine
plot: A football star jailed for assault leads a group of inmates in a match against prison guards.

name: Sea of Love
plot: A detective investigating a series of murders becomes involved with a woman who may be the culprit.

name: Toys
plot: When Lieutenant General Leland Zevo (Sir Michael Gambon) inherits a toymaking company and begins making war toys, his employees band together to stop him before he ruins the name of Zevo Toys forever.

name: Apt Pupil
plot: A boy blackmails his neighbor after suspecting him to be a Nazi war criminal.

name: Black Moon Rising
plot: A thief, Quint, is hired by the Justice Department to steal incriminating tapes from a corrupt corporation. The tapes vanish when Quint hides them in the back of a hydrodynamic powered racing car that is stolen by a hot car ring.

name: Shogun Assassin
plot: When the wife of the Shogun's Decapitator is murdered and he is ordered to commit suicide by the paranoid Shogun, he and his four-year-old son escape and become assassins for hire, embarking on a journey of blood and violent death.

name: Johnny Got His Gun
plot: During World War I, a patriotic young American is rendered blind, deaf, limbless, and mute by a horrific artillery shell attack. Trapped in what's left of his body, he desperately looks for a way to end his life.

name: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
plot: After escaping from an insane asylum, the bonkers Charles Dreyfus sends 26 assassins on the trail of the forever bumbling Inspector Clouseau.

name: Multiplicity
plot: A man who never has enough time for the things he wants to do is offered the opportunity to have himself duplicated.

name: The Missing
plot: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

name: The Weather Man
plot: A Chicago weather man, separated from his wife and children, debates whether professional and personal success are mutually exclusive.

name: Phase IV
plot: Suddenly, desert ants form a group intelligence and wage war on the humans. It's up to a couple of scientists and a girl to stop them

name: Nobody's Fool
plot: A stubborn man past his prime reflects on his life of strict independence and seeks more from himself.

name: Blue Chips
plot: A college basketball coach is forced to break the rules in order to get the players he needs to stay competitive.

name: Down by Law
plot: Two men are framed and sent to jail, where they meet a murderer who helps them escape and leave the state.

name: Stone Cold
plot: A tough Alabama cop is blackmailed by the FBI into going undercover in a violent Mississippi biker gang.

name: Children of a Lesser God
plot: A new speech teacher at a school for the deaf falls in love with the janitor, a deaf woman speechless by choice.

name: Summer Catch
plot: A rich girl whose family summers on Cape Cod has a romance with a local poor boy who hopes to become a major league baseball player.

name: Emmanuelle
plot: The wife of a French diplomat in Bangkok embarks on a voyage of self-discovery.

name: Elizabethtown
plot: During a hometown memorial for his Kentucky-born father, a young man begins an unexpected romance with a too-good-to-be-true stewardess.

name: Short Circuit 2
plot: Robot Johnny Five comes to the city and gets manipulated by criminals who want him for their own purposes.

name: Loaded Weapon 1
plot: In this Lethal Weapon (1987) spoof, two mismatched LA cops investigate a case involving cocaine-laced girl scout cookies.

name: The Pillow Book
plot: A woman with a body-writing fetish seeks to find a combined lover and calligrapher.

name: Who Am I?
plot: A Secret Agent loses his memory after falling from a crashing helicopter. He is then chased by several other agency operatives, but he has no idea why.

name: Tetsuo: The Iron Man
plot: A businessman accidentally kills The Metal Fetishist, who gets his revenge by slowly turning the man into a grotesque hybrid of flesh and rusty metal.

name: Aria
plot: 10 short films by 10 different directors, set to arias by different composers.

name: Strange Brew
plot: Canada's most famous hosers, Bob and Doug McKenzie, get jobs at the Elsinore Brewery, only to learn that something is rotten with the state of it.

name: Radio Flyer
plot: A father recounts a dark period of his childhood when he and his little brother lived in the suburbs.

name: Caged Fury
plot: Discontent leads to a daring escape plan in a women's prison where the inmates are all lingerie clad models and the lesbian warden demands unusual favours for early parole.

name: Airport '77
plot: Art thieves hijack a 747, hit fog and crash into the ocean, trapping them and the passengers under one hundred feet of water.

name: Snow Day
plot: When a school in upstate New York is snowed in, a group of students hi-jack a plow to keep the school closed.

name: The Fabulous Baker Boys
plot: The lives of two struggling musicians, who happen to be brothers, inevitably change when they team up with a beautiful, up-and-coming singer.

name: Kiss of the Spider Woman
plot: A gay man and a political prisoner are together in a prison. The gay man narrates the stories of two fake movies and his own life.

name: BloodRayne
plot: In the eighteenth century, a vampire escapes from the freak show, in which she once participated, and teams up with a group of vampire slayers to kill the man who raped her mother.

name: Bowfinger
plot: When a desperate movie producer fails to get a major star for his bargain-basement film, he decides to shoot the film secretly around him.

name: London
plot: At a drug laden party in a New York loft, a young man tries to win back his ex-girlfriend.

name: The Chorus
plot: Pierre, a successful orchestra conductor, returns home when his mother dies. He stumbles upon an old diary and recollects the childhood school memories and his music teacher Clement Mathieu.

name: Fly Away Home
plot: A father and daughter decide to attempt to lead a flock of orphaned Canada Geese south by air.

name: Kinky Boots
plot: A drag queen comes to the rescue of a man who, after inheriting his father's shoe factory, needs to diversify his product if he wants to keep the business afloat.

name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
plot: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

name: The Meaning of Life
plot: The comedy team takes a look at life in all of its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

name: Tomcats
plot: At the wedding of a friend, the remaining bachelors bet on staying single. Seven years later, one of the two remaining loses $51,000 in Vegas. He must get the other guy married to cash in and pay his debt or die. A cute woman helps him.

name: Dragon Ball: The Magic Begins
plot: An evil alien searches the Earth for seven "Dragon Pearls" which can grant him ultimate power. A gang of misfit adventurers band together to stop him.

name: Dirty Work
plot: A loser finds success in the revenge-for-hire business.

name: Stuck on You
plot: Conjoined twins from Martha's Vineyard move to Los Angeles so that one of them can pursue an acting career.

name: Another 9½ Weeks
plot: John heads to Paris hoping to meet his ex from 9½ Weeks (1986), but instead ends up with her former friend, Lea.

name: Hostage
plot: When a family is held hostage, former hostage negotiator Jeff Talley arrives at the scene. Talley's own family is kidnapped and Talley must decide which is more important: saving a family he doesn't even know or saving his own family.

name: The Beast
plot: In order to inherit a fortune a young woman agrees to marry a young man. She soon discovers that his family harbours a dark past involving a monstrous beast.

name: Seed of Chucky
plot: Chucky and Tiffany are resurrected by their innocent gender-confused child, Glen/Glenda, and hit Hollywood, where a movie depicting the killer dolls' murder spree is underway.

name: Earthquake
plot: Various interconnected people struggle to survive when an earthquake of unimaginable magnitude hits Los Angeles, California.

name: Duck, You Sucker!
plot: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

name: El Mariachi
plot: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

name: Club Dread
plot: When a serial killer interrupts the fun at the swanky Coconut Pete's Coconut Beach Resort--a hedonistic island paradise for swingers--it's up to the club's staff to stop the violence...or at least hide it.

name: Are We There Yet?
plot: To impress a foxy divorcee, ladies' man Nick offers to take her kids on an extended road trip, unaware of the torture he's in for.

name: Arlington Road
plot: A man begins to suspect his neighbors are not what they appear to be and their secrets could be deadly.

name: Miracle Mile
plot: A young man hears a chance phone call telling him that a nuclear war has started and missiles will hit his city in 70 minutes.

name: The Scarlet Letter
plot: An affair between a young woman and a pastor has disastrous consequences.

name: Day of the Warrior
plot: The Agency's computer database is compromised by a powerful criminal named "The Warrior". Now, with the list of all the undercover agents' identities in hand, he is going after them, one by one.

name: Godzilla: Final Wars
plot: Godzilla's fiftieth Anniversary project, in which Godzilla travels around the world to fight his old foes and his allies plus a new, mysterious monster named Monster X.

name: Henry V
plot: In the midst of the Hundred Years War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France in 1415.

name: Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story
plot: A fictionalized account of the life of the martial arts superstar.

name: A Brighter Summer Day
plot: Based on a true story, primarily on a conflict between two youth gangs, a 14-year-old boy's girlfriend conflicts with the head of one gang for an unclear reason, until finally the conflict comes to a violent climax.

name: Begotten
plot: Presented in a surreal, gory and entirely visual manner, Begotten tells of the death of religion, the abuse of nature by Man and a nihilistic outlook on what life ultimately is.

name: Double Dragon
plot: Two brothers have half of a powerful ancient Chinese talisman. An evil gang leader has the other half, and determines to get the brothers' half and have a complete medallion so he can gain absolute power.

name: The Brave Little Toaster
plot: A group of dated appliances embark on a journey to the city to find their master after being abandoned in a cabin in the woods.

name: Luna
plot: While touring in Italy, a recently-widowed American opera singer has an incestuous relationship with her 15-year-old son to help him overcome his heroin addiction.

name: Poetic Justice
plot: Grieving hairdresser Justice goes on a road trip from South Central L.A. to Oakland on a mail truck alongside her friend and an obnoxious postal worker.

name: A Dirty Shame
plot: An uptight, middle-aged, repressed woman turns into a sex addict after getting hit on the head, and she then falls into an underground subculture of sex addicts in suburban Baltimore.

name: Beneath the Valley of the Ultra-Vixens
plot: Believe it or not, even Smalltown USA still has people who are unfulfilled and unrelieved in the midst of plenty. Levonna and Lamar could have the perfect relationship, were it not for Lamar's obsession with rear entry.

name: Another Country
plot: Based on the life of the young Guy Burgess, who would become better known as one of the Cambridge Spies.

name: Daylight
plot: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

name: Bad Influence
plot: A soft and hesitant young man is in danger when he tries to break toxic relationships with a mysterious stranger claiming to be his friend.

name: The Next Karate Kid
plot: Mr. Miyagi is back and he takes a new pupil under his wing: a troubled adolescent girl.

name: New Nightmare
plot: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

name: The Silent Partner
plot: A timid bank teller anticipates a bank robbery and steals the money himself before the crook arrives. When the sadistic crook realizes he's been fooled, he tracks down the teller and engages him in a cat-and-mouse chase for the cash.

name: The Glass House
plot: An orphaned teenager is taken in by a Malibu couple but discovers they aren't the caring friends they seemed to be.

name: The Motorcycle Diaries
plot: Ernesto Guevara de la Serna, popularly known as Che, along with his friend Alberto Granado, decides to take a road trip across South America. His experiences on the journey transform him.

name: Pump Up the Volume
plot: Mark runs a pirate radio station and causes an uproar when he speaks his mind and enthralls fellow teens.

name: Rock-A-Doodle
plot: In order to defeat the wicked Grand Duke of Owls, a young boy, transformed into a cat, teams up with a group of barnyard animals to find the rooster who can raise the sun.

name: Serial Mom
plot: She's the perfect all-American parent: a great cook and homemaker, a devoted recycler, and a woman who'll literally kill to keep her children happy.

name: Where the Truth Lies
plot: Karen O'Connor, a young journalist known for her celebrity profiles, is consumed with discovering the truth behind a long-buried incident that affected the lives and careers of showbiz team Vince Collins and Lanny Morris.

name: The Rage: Carrie 2
plot: A horrible massacre strikes up after an outcast teenage girl is taunted by a group of high school jocks, all of them unaware of her cutthroat telekinetic powers.

name: Bulletproof
plot: Two criminals, Keats and Moses, end their friendship, when Keats turns out to be an undercover cop. Many years later, the two are forced to work together when Keats is assigned to protect Moses as a witness.

name: Child's Play 3
plot: Chucky returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy who defeated him, and now a teenager living in a military academy.

name: Turner & Hooch
plot: A detective must adopt a rambunctious dog in order to help him find a killer.

name: Invasion of the Bee Girls
plot: A powerful cosmic force is turning Earth women into queen bees who kill men by wearing them out sexually.

name: Higher Learning
plot: People from all different walks of life, encounter racial tension, rape, responsibility, and the meaning of an education on a university campus.

name: One Fine Day
plot: The lives of two strangers and their young children unexpectedly intersect on one hectic, stressful day in New York City.

name: Swing Kids
plot: A group of teens adores forbidden music in Nazi Germany just before the outbreak of World War II.

name: Summer of '42
plot: During his summer vacation on Nantucket Island in 1942, a youth eagerly awaiting his first sexual encounter finds himself developing an innocent love for a young woman awaiting news on her soldier husband's fate in WWII.

name: Slave of the Cannibal God
plot: A woman and her brother fly to New Guinea to look for a lost expedition, led by her husband, which has vanished in the jungle.

name: Koyaanisqatsi
plot: A collection of expertly photographed phenomena with no conventional plot. The footage focuses on the relationship between nature, humanity, and technology.

name: The Return of the Pink Panther
plot: Inspector Jacques Clouseau is put on the case when the Pink Panther diamond is stolen, with the Phantom's trademark glove the only clue.

name: Frantic
plot: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

name: The Madness of King George
plot: When King George III goes mad, his Lieutenants try to adjust the rules to run the country without his participation.

name: Happy Birthday to Me
plot: At the snobby Crawford Academy, Virginia's group of friends start to go missing years after horrible events that happened to her as a child around her birthday.

name: Malicious
plot: A widower and two of his sons become infatuated with their beautiful housekeeper, and all three set out to seduce her using their own unique methods.

name: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
plot: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

name: Game of Death
plot: A martial arts movie star must fake his death to find the people who are trying to kill him.

name: Dead Birds
plot: A group of Confederate soldiers hole up in an abandoned plantation after robbing a bank and find themselves at the mercy of supernatural forces.

name: Best of the Best
plot: A team from the United States is going to compete against Korea in a Tae Kwon Do tournament. The team consists of fighters from all over the country - can they overcome their rivalry and work together to win?

name: Warriors of Virtue
plot: A young boy is whisked away to the mythical land of Tao where he becomes the center of a conflict between an evil lord and a group of animal warriors.

name: The Tuxedo
plot: A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

name: The Sacrifice
plot: At the dawn of World War III, a man searches for a way to restore peace to the world and finds he must give something in return.

name: Dark Water
plot: A mother and daughter, still wounded from a bitter custody dispute, hole up in a run-down apartment building, where they are targeted by the ghost of a former resident.

name: Kinetta
plot: At a Greek hotel in the off-season, a chamber maid, a man obsessed with BMWs, and a photo-store clerk attempt to film and photograph various badly reenacted struggles between a man and a woman.

name: What?
plot: During her Italian vacation, a young and beautiful American tourist finds herself as a guest in a coastal villa inhabited by some odd people.

name: Oliver Twist
plot: An adaptation of the classic Dickens tale, where an orphan meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

name: The House of the Spirits
plot: A rancher, his clairvoyant wife, and their family face turbulent years in South America in this adaptation of Isabel Allende's best-seller.

name: Song for a Raggy Boy
plot: The true story of a single teacher's courage to stand up against an untouchable prefect's sadistic disciplinary regime and other abuse in a Catholic Reformatory and Industrial School in 1939 Ireland.

name: Creep
plot: Trapped in a London subway station, a woman who's being pursued by a potential attacker heads into the unknown labyrinth of tunnels beneath the city's streets.

name: Angel
plot: Molly, a high schooler, secretly earns her living as Angel, a street prostitute whose only family and friends are the ones she works with on the streets. She has to survive against a serial killer who is targeting people of her profession.

name: The Great Train Robbery
plot: England, 1850s. A master criminal aims to rob a train of a large sum of gold. Security is incredibly tight and the task seems an impossible one. However, he has a plan and just the right people to carry it out.

name: Taste of Cherry
plot: An Iranian man drives his car in search of someone who will quietly bury him under a cherry tree after he commits suicide.

name: The Kid
plot: An unhappy, disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when he is mysteriously confronted by an eight-year-old version of himself.

name: Paid in Full
plot: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience.

name: Sugar & Spice
plot: A popular high-school cheerleader becomes pregnant by the star quarterback and turns to crime to support her desired lifestyle.

name: Child's Play 2
plot: While Andy's mother is admitted to a psychiatric hospital, the young boy is placed in foster care, and Chucky, determined to claim Andy's soul, is not far behind.

name: Virus
plot: After outrunning a typhoon at sea, a strong-willed tugboat navigator and her crew discover a high-tech alien life form that's taken control of a Russian research vessel and aims to destroy on a massive scale.

name: The Jewel of the Nile
plot: When Joan Wilder is abducted while on a trip along the Nile, her boyfriend, Jack Colton, and pal Ralph rush to rescue her and retrieve a fabled jewel.

name: Dead End
plot: Christmas Eve. On his way to his in-laws with his family, Frank Harrington decides to try a shortcut, for the first time in 20 years. It turns out to be the biggest mistake of his life.

name: The Guyver
plot: A young man discovers a mechanical device that merges with his own body, turning him into a cyborg superhero. When strange creatures start appearing, trying to take the device back, he begins to uncover a secret plot to genetically engineer terrifying monsters.

name: Romeo Is Bleeding
plot: A womanizing, crooked cop on the payroll of the mafia is confronted with the reality of his double life after he is asked to kill a beautiful and ruthless Russian gangster.

name: Murder in the First
plot: An eager and idealistic young attorney defends an Alcatraz prisoner accused of murdering a fellow inmate. The extenuating circumstances: his client had just spent over three years in solitary confinement.

name: Three Colors: White
plot: After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

name: The Cowboys
plot: Rancher Wil Andersen is forced to hire inexperienced boys as cowhands in order to get his herd to market on time but the rough drive is full of dangers and a gang of cattle rustlers is trailing them.

name: Monkeybone
plot: In a coma, a cartoonist finds himself trapped within his own underground creation and must find a way to get back, while racing against his popular but treacherous character, Monkeybone.

name: Village of the Damned
plot: A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.

name: Sniper
plot: A veteran US Marine sniper is partnered with a rookie sniper as his spotter to take out a politician and a rebel leader in the jungles of Panama.

name: Poolhall Junkies
plot: A talented pool hustler who has stayed out of the game for years must return to his old ways when his little brother gets involved with his enemy--the very man who held him back from greatness.

name: All About Lily Chou-Chou
plot: The problematic lives of teenager students for whom the singer Lily Chou-Chou's dreamy music is the only way to escape an alienating, violent and insensitive society.

name: Edison
plot: Upon discovering a den of corrupt policemen, a fresh-faced journalist makes shaky allies in a jaded reporter and investigator for a powerful district attorney.

name: The Keep
plot: Nazis are forced to turn to a Jewish historian for help in battling the ancient demon they have inadvertently freed from its prison.

name: Strictly Ballroom
plot: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.

name: The Watcher
plot: David Allen Griffin is a cool killer- time and time again, he chooses a female victim, studies her for weeks till he knows her routine to the smallest detail, makes meticulous preparations using his forensic knowledge to gain entry when she's quite alone, subdues her and administers a long, torturous death. Joel Campbell got so frustrated by his failure to capture Griffin in Los Angeles, that he quit the FBI, moved to Chicago, and remains in psychiatric therapy, unable to function normally. Then he realizes, when opening his mail very late, that a new murder victim is Griffin's, and the killer sent him pictures of her. Campbell reports this to the police, but is unwilling to join them in the search, suggesting Griffin is too slick and clever; yet he won't get out of it that easily.

name: 102 Dalmatians
plot: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

name: Birdy
plot: After two friends return home from the Vietnam War one becomes mentally unstable and obsesses with becoming a bird.

name: Wake in Fright
plot: After a bad gambling bet, a schoolteacher is marooned in a town full of crazy, drunk, violent men who threaten to make him just as crazy, drunk, and violent.

name: House of the Dead
plot: A group of college students travels to a mysterious island to attend a rave, which is soon taken over by bloodthirsty zombies.

name: Mighty Joe Young
plot: A legendary fifteen-foot tall mountain gorilla named Joe is taken to an animal sanctuary in California by zoologist Gregg O'Hara (Bill Paxton) and Jill Young (Charlize Theron), with whom he grew up. Poacher Strasser (Rade Serbedzija) returns from the past to seek vengeance on Joe.

name: The Clan of the Cave Bear
plot: A young Cro-Magnon woman is raised by Neanderthals.

name: Wanda
plot: Wanda, a lonely housewife, drifts through mining country until she meets a petty thief who takes her in.

name: Strip Nude for Your Killer
plot: When a model dies during an abortion, a series of murders begins, starting with her doctor. The killer wears a suit and a black motorcycle helmet. Will anyone discover the killer's identity before the entire agency dies?

name: The Enforcer
plot: Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan reluctantly teams up with rookie Inspector Kate Moore to foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans.

name: Man of the House
plot: A Texas Ranger must protect a group of cheerleaders who have witnessed a murder.

name: It's Alive
plot: The Davises are expecting a baby, which turns out to be a monster with a nasty habit of killing people whenever it is scared. And it is easily scared.

name: Sleuth
plot: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

name: Evil
plot: A teenage boy expelled from school for fighting arrives at a boarding school where the systematic bullying of younger students is encouraged as a means to maintain discipline, and decides to fight back.

name: Butterfly
plot: In 1937 Nevada, silver mine caretaker Jess Tyler is reunited with his teenage daughter Kady who will do anything to persuade Jess to let her have claim to the mine.

name: Domino
plot: A recounting of Domino Harvey's life story. The daughter of actor Laurence Harvey turned away from her career as a Ford model to become a bounty hunter.

name: Exit Wounds
plot: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

name: Safe
plot: An affluent and unexceptional homemaker in the suburbs develops multiple chemical sensitivity.

name: Heart and Souls
plot: An unhappy businessman finds a new sense of purpose after he's tasked with helping a quartet of ghosts fulfill their last wishes before moving on to the afterlife.

name: Loser
plot: A college student, branded a loser by his roommates and booted from the dorm, falls in love with a coed who has eyes for their condescending professor.

name: Boomerang
plot: A successful executive and womanizer finds his lifestyle choices have turned back on him when his new female boss turns out to be an even bigger deviant than he is.

name: Tora! Tora! Tora!
plot: The story of the 1941 Japanese air raid on Pearl Harbor, and the series of preceding American blunders that aggravated its effectiveness.

name: The Big Feast
plot: A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.

name: Passenger 57
plot: An airline security expert must take action when he finds himself trapped on a passenger jet when terrorists seize control of it.

name: Dreams
plot: A collection of tales based upon eight of director Akira Kurosawa's recurring dreams.

name: Dick
plot: After wandering off during a White House tour, two high school girls inadvertently become Richard Nixon's top secret advisers at the height of the Watergate scandal.

name: Just a Gigolo
plot: After World War I, a war hero returns to Berlin to find that there's no place for him--he has no skills other than what he learned in the army, and can only find menial, low-paying jobs. He decides to become a gigolo to lonely rich women.

name: Sssssss
plot: A college student becomes lab assistant to a scientist who is working on a serum that can transform humans into snakes.

name: The MatchMaker
