plot: A lonely princess and a poor cobbler fall in love while trying to retrieve three magical orbs that were stolen by a bumbling thief, all while outwitting a powerful sorcerer as adventure and comedic pop culture references abound.

name: Someone Like You
plot: After being jilted by her boyfriend, a talk show talent scout writes a column on the relationship habits of men which gains her national fame.

name: American Ninja
plot: American soldier, obviously very skilled in martial arts, single-handedly takes on mercenaries in the Philippines.

name: The Players Club
plot: A woman must contend with rival strippers and her boss in an attempt to make a legitimate living.

name: Coffee and Cigarettes
plot: A series of vignettes that all have coffee and cigarettes in common.

name: Bowling for Columbine
plot: Filmmaker Michael Moore explores the roots of America's predilection for gun violence.

name: Goodbye, Children
plot: A French boarding school run by priests seems to be a haven from World War II until a new student arrives. Occupying the next bed in the dormitory to the top student in his class, the two young boys begin to form a bond.

name: Chairman of the Board
plot: A surfer becomes the head of a major company.

name: American Gothic
plot: A group of travellers make emergency landing on an island in the Pacific Northwest after their seaplane malfunctioned, and stumble across an isolated and psychopathic family.

name: In America
plot: A family of Irish immigrants adjust to life on the mean streets of Hell's Kitchen while also grieving the death of a child.

name: The Stunt Man
plot: A fugitive stumbles onto a movie set just when they need a new stunt man, takes the job as a way to hide out and falls for the leading lady while facing off with his manipulative director.

name: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters
plot: A fictionalized account in four chapters of the life of celebrated Japanese writer Yukio Mishima.

name: Jack Frost
plot: A father who can't keep his promises is killed in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman who has the final chance to put things right with his son before he is gone forever.

name: Arizona Dream
plot: A young New Yorker goes to Arizona where he finds freedom to both love and dream.

name: Dragnet
plot: The equally strait-laced and "by-the-book" nephew of Joe Friday must work with his more laid-back partner to solve a mystery.

name: Left Behind: The Movie
plot: The Biblical prophecy of Armegeddon begins when the Rapture instantly takes all believers in Christ from the Earth. A reporter left behind learns that the Anti-Christ will soon take power.

name: Gods and Monsters
plot: The last days of Frankenstein (1931) director James Whale are explored.

name: Fletch Lives
plot: After receiving an inheritance in Louisiana, Los Angeles reporter Irvin Fletcher heads to the Belle Isle plantation where he gets himself into hilarious trouble.

name: Blue Thunder
plot: The cop test pilot for an experimental police helicopter learns the sinister implications of the new vehicle.

name: A Lot Like Love
plot: Unacquainted Emily and Oliver join the mile-high club together on the way from LAX to NYC--end of story. Except that they keep meeting constantly over the next seven years..

name: Warrior Queen
plot: In ancient Pompeii, slaves are bought and sold for household chores and sex. A mysterious queen moves among the elite, while secretly helping the slaves to escape.

name: Just Cause
plot: A Harvard professor is lured back into the courtroom after twenty-five years to take the case of a young black man condemned to death for the horrific murder of a child.

name: The Cheap Detective
plot: San Francisco, 1940, detectives, dames, documents, Nazis, and a treasure.

name: Nicholas Nickleby
plot: A young, compassionate man struggles to save his family and friends from the abusive exploitation of his cold-heartedly grasping uncle.

name: Sorceress
plot: Sword and sorcery story of the cosmic struggle between white magic and black magic.

name: Sidekicks
plot: A bullied teen who fantasizes about being Chuck Norris' sidekick trains in martial arts to fulfill his dreams.

name: Bagdad Cafe
plot: A lonely German woman ends up in the most desolate motel on Earth and decides to make it brighter.

name: Suspect Zero
plot: A mysterious serial killer is preying on other serial killers and one FBI agent suspects there may be more to the vigilante than the obvious characteristics.

name: Forbidden Zone
plot: The bizarre and musical tale of a girl who travels to another dimension through the gateway found in her family's basement.

name: The House by the Cemetery
plot: A New England home is terrorized by a series of murders, unbeknownst to the guests that a gruesome secret is hiding in the basement.

name: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
plot: Stella is a highly successful, forty-something San Francisco stock broker who is persuaded by her colorful New York girlfriend Delilah to take a well deserved, first-class vacation to Jamaica.

name: Catchfire
plot: A witness to a mob assassination flees for her life, running from town to town and switching identities along the way, but she cannot seem to elude Milo, the chief hit man sent after her.

name: A Bay of Blood
plot: The murder of a wealthy countess triggers a chain reaction of brutal killings in the surrounding bay area, as several unscrupulous characters try to seize her large estate.

name: Bad Guy
plot: An unfeeling gangster seeks to ruin the life of a young girl who rejected him. He forces her into prostitution and spies on her regularly, then he soon begins to fall for her.

name: Confessions from a Holiday Camp
plot: Timothy Lea finds work in a holiday camp, and is soon up to his usual sexy shenanigans when he organizes a beauty pageant.

name: Igby Goes Down
plot: A young man's peculiar upbringing renders him unable to competently cope with the struggle of growing up.

name: The Man with Two Brains
plot: A brain surgeon marries a femme fatale whose life he saved, causing his life to turn upside down. Things go even more awry when he falls in love with a telepathic brain.

name: White Palace
plot: Lust turns to love for a 40-ish working-class woman and a 20-ish yuppie adman with little in common.

name: Losin' It
plot: Set in 1965, four rowdy teenage guys travel to Tijuana, Mexico for a night of partying when they are joined by a heartbroken housewife who is in town seeking a quick divorce.

name: Save the Green Planet!
plot: Byeong-gu believes that the world is on the verge of an alien invasion, and sets out to save the world.

name: Big Trouble
plot: The lives of several Miami denizens, from ad agents to gunrunners to street thugs to law enforcement to school-children, intersect with humorous and dangerous results.

name: Lorenzo's Oil
plot: Lorenzo Odone, a Virginia 5-year-old, develops a degenerative nerve disease so rare that nobody is working on a cure, so his parents decide to immerse themselves in research and tackle the problem themselves.

name: Anita
plot: Anita, a young woman with a troubled childhood and a hunger for love, finds a soul mate in Erik, a kindly college student.

name: Rock 'n' Roll High School
plot: Ramones fanatic and delinquent Riff Randell battles it out with the strict new principal of Vince Lombardi High School, Miss Togar, with help from the Ramones.

name: Ice Castles
plot: An inexperienced yet naturally gifted ice skater makes a spectacular debut in the skating world before encountering an event that could possibly derail her hopes and dreams.

name: Drowning Mona
plot: When a woman drives a car into the river to her death, everyone in town becomes a suspect.

name: Sweet Movie
plot: After winning the "most virgin" contest, Miss Canada is married to a rich milk tycoon. But she quickly flees the marriage to experience the world around her, full of sweetness and anarchy.

name: Wild America
plot: Three brothers who are obsessed with animals are given permission from their parents to travel around America with a camera documenting wildlife.

name: Wilde
plot: The turmoil in poet/playwright Oscar Wilde's life after he discovers his homosexuality.

name: The Fury
plot: A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from a shadowy secret government agency.

name: Delta of Venus
plot: A struggling American writer (England) and a fellow American expatriate (Mandylor) begin a sordid affair among the chaos and discord of 1940 Paris, France on the brink of World War II.

name: Pure Country
plot: Dusty gets tired of all the smoke and light effects, wonders what happened to doing it the way that made him famous and happy. Takes a walk to find what seems to be missing and finds himself and his music again!

name: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
plot: Scientist Sherman Klump's inventions, his upcoming marriage to his pretty colleague Denise Gaines, and his reputation, are threatened by his evil clone Buddy Love.

name: The Devil's Honey
plot: A young woman abducts and subjects a doctor whom she holds responsible for the death of her boyfriend to acts of sexual torture.

name: All the Pretty Horses
plot: Two Texas cowboys head to Mexico in search of work, but soon find themselves in trouble with the law after one of them falls in love with a wealthy rancher's daughter.

name: That Obscure Object of Desire
plot: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen-year-old former chambermaid Conchita.

name: The Big Easy
plot: A corrupt lieutenant in the homicide division is threatened by the righteous DA while trying to solve a string of mysterious murders.

name: M. Butterfly
plot: In 1960s China, French diplomat Rene Gallimard falls in love with an opera singer, Song Liling - but Song is not at all who Gallimard thinks.

name: The Villain
plot: Facing hanging, a bank robber makes a deal with the corrupt banker to avoid execution in exchange for a dirty assignment.

name: Ready to Wear
plot: A chronicle of the interconnected lives of a group of people in the lead up to Paris Fashion Week.

name: L.A. Story
plot: With the help of a talking freeway billboard, a wacky weatherman tries to win the heart of an English newspaper reporter, who is struggling to make sense of the strange world of early 1990s Los Angeles.

name: Johnny Handsome
plot: After being double crossed and thrown in jail, a deformed gangster gets a new face and rehabilitation, but his desire for revenge looms.

name: The Crimson Rivers
plot: A murder detective must follow the footsteps of a brutal killer within the secrets of a classist college.

name: The Sister of Ursula
plot: Still mourning the passing of their father, two Austrian sisters, Dagmar and Ursula, arrive at a luxurious Italian seaside hotel. At the same time, a mysterious killer starts murdering promiscuous women in the area.

name: The Mighty Quinn
plot: When police officer Xavier Quinn's childhood friend, Maubee, becomes associated with murder and a briefcase full of ten thousand dollar bills, The Mighty Quinn must clear his name. Or try to catch him, which could be even trickier.

name: Slums of Beverly Hills
plot: In 1976, a lower-middle-class teenager struggles to cope living with her neurotic family of nomads on the outskirts of Beverly Hills.

name: Two for the Money
plot: After suffering a career-ending knee injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.

name: Manon of the Spring
plot: A beautiful but shy shepherdess plots vengeance on the men whose greedy conspiracy to acquire her father's land caused his death years earlier.

name: The Road to Wellville
plot: A story about the ins and outs of one unusual health facility in the early twentieth century, run by the eccentric Dr. John Harvey Kellogg.

name: Bulletproof Monk
plot: Based on the very underground comic book of the same name, a Tibetan monk becomes a mentor to a young street punk and tries teaching him how to protect the scroll of ultimate power from a secret Nazi organization bent on world domination.

name: Millennium Actress
plot: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

name: Death and the Maiden
plot: A political activist is convinced that her guest is a man who once tortured her for the government.

name: Year of the Dragon
plot: A police detective cracks down on organized crime in Chinatown after the murders of Triad and Mafia leaders.

name: A Love Song for Bobby Long
plot: A headstrong young woman returns to New Orleans after the death of her estranged mother.

name: The Purple Rose of Cairo
plot: In 1935 New Jersey, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

name: The Way of the Gun
plot: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother carrying a baby for a powerful, shady man.

name: Mystery, Alaska
plot: The residents of a small town get over-excited when their hockey team gets chosen to host a televised event.

name: Airport 1975
plot: A 747 in flight collides with a small plane, and is rendered pilotless. Somehow the control tower must get a pilot aboard so the jet can land.

name: Roll Bounce
plot: In the summer of 1978, a teenager and his group of friends face new challenges when their neighborhood roller-skating rink closes, forcing them to visit a different rink.

name: Fireworks
plot: Nishi leaves the police in the face of harrowing personal and professional difficulties. Spiraling into depression, he makes questionable decisions.

name: Daughters of Darkness
plot: While passing through a vacation resort, a newlywed couple encounters a mysterious, strikingly beautiful countess and her aide.

name: Baraka
plot: A collection of expertly photographed scenes of human life and religion.

name: Tales from the Crypt: Demon Knight
plot: High-level demons collect low-level demons as warriors in attempt to obtain a key containing the blood of Christ. The key is guarded by immortal warriors called Demon Knights.

name: Goal! The Dream Begins
plot: The extremely talented Santiago Muñez is spotted by a Newcastle United scout and given a chance at professional football.

name: Raise Your Voice
plot: Terri Fletcher is a small town girl with the voice of a big-time singer. When personal tragedy interrupts her steady life, Terri defies her father's wishes and secretly heads off to spend a summer at a Los Angeles performing arts academy.

name: A Real Young Girl
plot: Reluctantly, a sulky adolescent returns to her parents' house for yet another boring summer vacation, dabbling in desire and the art of desirability, eventually mixing reality with vision, caged fantasies with the fierce female sexuality.

name: Heist
plot: A career jewel thief finds himself at tense odds with his longtime partner, a crime boss who sends his nephew to keep watch.

name: The Whole Ten Yards
plot: Jimmy the Tulip's quiet new life is shaken up by his old pal Oz, whose wife has been kidnapped by a Hungarian mob. The Tulip and his wife Jill spring into action.

name: White Fang
plot: Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.

name: Sonatine
plot: Several yakuza from Tokyo are sent to Okinawa to help end a gang war. The war then escalates and the Tokyo drifters decide to lay low at the beach.

name: Devil in the Flesh
plot: A sizzling, erotic thriller about a triangle between a teenage boy, an older woman an her fiance, an imprisoned terrorist, set in a world of intrigue, betrayal and erotic pleasure, from which may be no escape.

name: Kicking and Screaming
plot: A bunch of guys hang around their college for months after graduation, continuing a life much like the one before graduation.

name: Benny's Video
plot: A 14-year-old video enthusiast obsessed with violent films decides to make one of his own and show it to his parents, with tragic results.

name: The Hotel New Hampshire
plot: A family weathers all sorts of disasters and keeps going in spite of everything, in a film noted for its wonderful assortment of oddball characters.

name: Police Academy: Mission to Moscow
plot: The Russian government hires the veterans of the Police Academy (1984) to help deal with the Mafia.

name: Dark Water
plot: A mother and her 6-year-old daughter move into a creepy apartment whose every surface is permeated by water.

name: Leatherface: Texas Chainsaw Massacre III
plot: A California couple and a survivalist encounter Leatherface and his family.

name: Love Jones
plot: Darius Lovehall is a young black poet in Chicago who starts dating Nina Mosley, a beautiful and talented photographer. While trying to figure out if they've got a "love thing" or are just "kicking it," they hang out with their friend, talking about love and sex. Then Nina tests the strength of Darius' feelings and sets a chain of romantic complications into motion.

name: Colossus: The Forbin Project
plot: Thinking this will prevent war, the US government gives an impenetrable supercomputer total control over launching nuclear missiles. But what the computer does with the power is unimaginable to its creators.

name: Stay Hungry
plot: So-called 'special agent' infiltrates into the gym, which is targeted by a dirty business fraud.

name: One False Move
plot: A small town police chief awaits the arrival of a gang of killers.

name: Guna
plot: A neurodivergent individual escapes the family he despises and the asylum he is kept in by creating fantasies.

name: Melvin and Howard
plot: The story of hard-luck Melvin E. Dummar, who claimed to have received a will naming him an heir to the fortune of Howard Hughes.

name: Benji
plot: A stray dog saves two kidnapped children.

name: Close My Eyes
plot: An estranged brother and sister begin an intense sexual relationship, behind the curtain of their otherwise normal working-class lives.

name: Inseminoid
plot: A crew of interplanetary archaeologists is threatened when an alien creature impregnates one of their members, causing her to turn homicidal and murder them one by one.

name: My Blue Heaven
plot: An all too uptight FBI agent must protect a larger than life mobster with a heart of gold, currently under witness protection in the suburbs.

name: Soapdish
plot: An ambitious television soap actress connives with her producer to scuttle the career of the show's long-time star, but nothing works as they plan.

name: Simon Birch
plot: A young boy with stunted growth is convinced that God has a great purpose for him.

name: Stay Tuned
plot: A husband and wife are sucked into a hellish television set and must survive the gauntlet of twisted versions of shows in which they find themselves.

name: Cannibal Girls
plot: A young couple spend the night in an old farmhouse owned by a reverend, only to find out that it is also lived in by beautiful women who hunger after human flesh.

name: Shattered
plot: After a horrific car wreck leaves him an amnesiac, a man slowly begins to unravel his shocking past.

name: Stranger Than Paradise
plot: A New Yorker's life is thrown into a tailspin when his younger cousin surprise-visits him, starting a strange, unpredictable adventure.

name: Easy Money
plot: To inherit his mother-in-law's colossal fortune, a hard-living gambling addict must change his unhealthy ways before they get the best of him.

name: Geminis
plot: A domineering mother with a seemingly perfect family in Argentina, is unaware of a taboo relationship happening between her youngest twin children.

name: The Fly II
plot: The almost-human son of "Brundlefly" searches for a cure to his mutated genes while being monitored by a nefarious corporation that wishes to continue his father's experiments.

name: Rebound
plot: An acclaimed college basketball coach is demoted to a junior varsity team after a public meltdown.

name: The Best of Times
plot: A small-town loser determines to have one more shot at the big time by winning a football game.

name: Ripley's Game
plot: A dying family man in need of money is persuaded to assassinate a European crime boss.

name: American Outlaws
plot: 5 Southern friends return home when the war ends 1865. But Yankee soldiers and Pinkerton are busy helping a railroad baron grab land from farmers along the planned railroad west. The 5 friends fight back.

name: Freaked
plot: A vain actor, his best friend, and an activist end up at a mutant freak farm run by a weirdo scientist.

name: Book of Shadows: Blair Witch 2
plot: A group of tourists arrives in Burkittsville, Maryland after seeing The Blair Witch Project (1999) to explore the mythology and phenomenon, only to come face to face with their own neuroses and possibly the witch herself.

name: The Skulls
plot: A senior at an ivy league college, who depends on scholarships and working on the side, gets accepted into the secret society The Skulls. He hopes it betters chances at Harvard but The Skulls is not what he thought and comes at a price.

name: Personal Best
plot: The intertwined lives and loves of three highly ranked athletes striving for the national team; Chris bounces between the beds of male coach Terry and her female friend, competitor, and role model Tory.

name: The Last Wave
plot: A Sydney lawyer defends five Aboriginal Persons in a ritualized taboo murder and in the process learns disturbing things about himself and premonitions.

name: The Chase
plot: Escaped convict Jack Hammond takes a woman hostage and sets off for the Mexican border with the police hot on his tail.

name: Hercules in New York
plot: Hercules is sent to Earth where he finds true love and starts a promising career in the bodybuilder business.

name: Bullets Over Broadway
plot: In New York in 1928, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest drama in order to get it produced.

name: Uncommon Valor
plot: Ten years after his son went M.I.A. in Vietnam, U.S. Marine retired Colonel Jason Rhodes assembles a private rescue team to find Americans held in P.O.W. camps in Laos.

name: The Apartment
plot: A recently engaged man sees a former lover and becomes obsessed with meeting her again.

name: The Fog
plot: A thick mist full of vengeful spirits haunts a prosperous island town off the coast of Oregon, as its inhabitants try to learn their town's dark secret in order to stop it.

name: Serving Sara
plot: A process server tries to serve an elusive female target.

name: Breakin' 2: Electric Boogaloo
plot: A developer tries to bulldoze a community recreation center. The local breakdancers try to stop it.

name: Zabriskie Point
plot: At a time of chronic civil unrest in late 1960s America, a young idealist and an anthropology student cross paths at Zabriskie Point in Death Valley, California. They start an unrestrained relationship by making love on the dusty terrain.

name: Bandits
plot: Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.

name: The Killer
plot: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded.

name: Last Cannibal World
plot: An oil prospector is captured and imprisoned by a violent and primitive cannibal tribe in the Philippines' rain forest. He manages to escape with a female hostage, and begins searching for his missing companion and their airplane.

name: Reform School Girls
plot: A new group of girls arrives at Pridemore Juvenile Facility, where the brutal warden plays favoritism with a few, and treats the rest like animals. But one girl is not taking this horrible treatment lying down.

name: The Man Who Knew Too Little
plot: Wallace Ritchie is mistaken for a spy and must stop a plot to assassinate international leaders at a banquet.

name: Jude
plot: In late 1800s England, Jude plans to go to the city and attend university but marries early and becomes a stonemason. When his wife leaves, he moves to the city, where he befriends his liberal cousin Sue.

name: Paulie
plot: A talking parrot named Paulie recounts his travels to look for his original owner to a Russian janitor who helps him to the end of his journey.

name: Midnight Madness
plot: Leon picks college students to participate in his all night scavenger hunt. Five teams receive clues to solve leading them to the next clue site hidden in the city.

name: High Anxiety
plot: A psychiatrist with intense acrophobia (fear of heights) goes to work for a mental institution run by doctors who appear to be crazier than their patients, and have secrets that they are willing to commit murder to keep.

name: Hooper
plot: Aging Hollywood stuntman Sonny Hooper wants to prove that he's still got what it takes to be a great professional in this risky, under-recognized line of work.

name: To Kill a King
plot: A recounting of the relationship between General Fairfax and Oliver Cromwell, as they try to cope with the consequences of deposing King Charles I.

name: Ladybugs
plot: To climb the corporate ladder to success, a guy agrees to coach the company's all-girls soccer team with the help of his secret weapon: his fiancee's son.

name: The Big Boss
plot: A young man sworn to an oath of non-violence works with his cousins in an ice factory where they mysteriously begin to disappear.

name: Red Scorpion
plot: A Spetsnaz commando is sent on a covert mission by his Soviet superiors to infiltrate a rebel army and assassinate its leader.

name: The Red Circle
plot: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

name: Ernest Goes to Camp
plot: Ernest, a lovable loser who works as a summer camp handyman and dreams of becoming a guidance councilor, must find a way to inspire a group of juvenile delinquents as well as stop a shady strip mining company from closing the camp.

name: A Better Tomorrow
plot: A reforming ex-gangster tries to reconcile with his estranged policeman brother, but the ties to his former gang are difficult to break.

name: Tank
plot: Sergeant Major Zack arrives at a new army base with his wife, son and Sherman tank. One night at a bar he "stops" a pimp/deputy from beating a girl. The corrupt sheriff uses Zack's son for revenge and Zack uses his tank.

name: Heavy Metal 2000
plot: After surviving an invasion on her peaceful homeworld, a beautiful avenger must stop a powerful psychopath from gaining immortality and rescue her kidnapped sister.

name: Lady Snowblood
plot: A strikingly beautiful young woman is trained from birth to be a deadly instrument of revenge against the swindlers who destroyed her family.

name: Barefoot Gen
plot: A powerful statement against war, Barefoot Gen is a disturbing story about the effect of the atomic bomb on a boy's life and the lives of the Japanese people.

name: Water Drops on Burning Rocks
plot: In 1970s Germany, a 50-year-old businessman falls in love with a 20-year-old man.

name: Get Carter
plot: A Las Vegas mob enforcer travels back to his hometown to investigate his brother's mysterious death.

name: McQ
plot: Seattle cop is caught up in a corrupt police force that he is trying to make right. McQ is a cop with a mission.

name: Bride & Prejudice
plot: A modern adaptation of Jane Austen's classic novel, Pride and Prejudice, that features the lives of four unmarried daughters in an Indian family.

name: Hard Times
plot: The saga of a drifter who turns to illicit bare-knuckle boxing in Depression-era New Orleans.

name: A Bittersweet Life
plot: Things go wrong for a high ranking mobster when he doesn't proceed by his boss's orders.

name: The Hunter
plot: Bounty hunter Ralph "Papa" Thorson is receiving death threats from a criminal he helped put away. This while his girlfriend is about to give birth, an event he isn't looking forward to.

name: Dead & Buried
plot: Sheriff Dan Gillis investigates eerie deaths in a sleepy coastal town.

name: Female Trouble
plot: A spoiled schoolgirl runs away from home, gets pregnant while hitch-hiking, and ends up as a fashion model for a pair of beauticians who like to photograph women committing crimes.

name: Sweet Dreams
plot: The story of Patsy Cline, the velvet-voiced country music singer who died in a tragic plane crash at the height of her fame.

name: The Protector
plot: A young fighter named Kham must go to Australia to retrieve his stolen elephant. With the help of a Thai-born Australian detective, Kham must take on all comers, including a gang led by an evil woman and her two deadly bodyguards.

name: Crumb
plot: An intimate portrait of controversial cartoonist Robert Crumb and his traumatized family.

name: Bite the Bullet
plot: A pair of ex-Rough Riders, a former prostitute, a gunfighter, an aging cowboy and an English gentleman enter a 700-mile horse race through the Southwest desert in 1908.

name: My Father the Hero
plot: A teenage girl on vacation in the Bahamas with her divorced father tries to impress a potential boyfriend by saying that her father is actually her lover.

name: Renaissance Man
plot: A failed businessman is hired by the army to teach a group of underachieving recruits in order to help them pass basic training.

name: Andre
plot: The true story of how a seal named Andre befriended a little girl named Toni and her family in 1962.

name: August 32nd on Earth
plot: After surviving a car wreck virtually unscathed, a young model compels her best friend to impregnate her at the salt flats in Utah.

name: The Apple Dumpling Gang
plot: Three orphan children strike gold in 1878 California.

name: Savage Streets
plot: A teenage vigilante seeks revenge on a group of violent thugs who raped her handicapped sister and killed her best friend.

name: Head of State
plot: When a presidential candidate dies unexpectedly in the middle of the campaign, Washington, D.C. alderman Mays Gilliam is unexpectedly picked as his replacement.

name: On Deadly Ground
plot: A blowout firefighter takes on an environmentally destructive oil corporation by causing many deaths and explosions in Alaska.

name: Beloved
plot: A slave is visited by the spirit of a mysterious young woman.

name: S1m0ne
plot: A producer's film is endangered when his star walks off, so he decides to digitally create an actress to substitute for the star, becoming an overnight sensation that everyone thinks is a real person.

name: Sudden Death
plot: A former fireman takes on a group of terrorists holding the Vice President and others hostage during the seventh game of the NHL Stanley Cup finals.

name: District B13
plot: In the ghettos of Paris in 2010, an undercover cop and an ex-thug try to infiltrate a gang in order to defuse a neutron bomb.

name: Black Widow
plot: A federal investigator tracks down a gold-digging woman who moves from husband to husband to kill them and collect the inheritance.

name: Screwballs II
plot: In the original tradition of "Screwballs," four horny teens try to get a shot at the sexy new French teacher.

name: Up the Creek
plot: Bob McGraw is in his 12th year of college, goofing his way through life, until he has to win a river rafting race with three college buddies.

name: Ned Kelly
plot: An innocent man becomes one of the most wanted criminals the world has ever known.

name: Shadowlands
plot: C.S. Lewis, a world-renowned Christian theologian, writer and professor, leads a passionless life until he meets spirited poet Joy Gresham from the U.S.

name: A Midnight Clear
plot: The Ardennes Forest, December 1944. A squad of six US infantrymen is sent to occupy a house to use as an observation post as the German Army is expected to advance through that area. However, the Germans seem oddly friendly.
A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.

name: Tokyo Decadence
plot: A submissive hooker goes about her trade, suffering abuse at the hands of Japanese salarymen and Yakuza types. She's unhappy about her work, and is apparently trying to find some sort of appeasement for the fact that her lover has married.

name: Smooth Talk
plot: A free-spirited 15-year-old girl flirts with a dangerous stranger in the Northern California suburbs and must prepare herself for the frightening and traumatic consequences.

name: Demon Seed
plot: A scientist creates Proteus--an organic super computer with artificial intelligence which becomes obsessed with human beings, and in particular the creator's wife.

name: Mannequin: On the Move
plot: A young department store intern falls in love with a female store mannequin who is really a peasant girl fallen under a thousand year spell. She comes to life whenever he removes the cursed necklace from her.

name: Hell Comes to Frogtown
plot: After a worldwide nuclear war, where 68% of the male population was wiped out and virile men becoming a rarity, Sam Hell, a scavenger and a highly virile man, is assigned to help rescue a group of fertile women kidnapped by humanoid frogs.

name: The Falcon and the Snowman
plot: The true story of a disillusioned military contractor employee and his drug pusher childhood friend who became walk-in spies for the Soviet Union.

name: Adam's Apples
plot: A neo-Nazi sentenced to community service at a church clashes with the blindly devoted minister.

name: Porky's II: The Next Day
plot: The naughty high schoolers of Angel Beach High now seek revenge on a group of KKK religious fanatics and corrupt politicians who want to shut down their Shakespeare production after they cast a Seminole transfer student in the lead.

name: Monkey Trouble
plot: A young girl's life turns hairy when her new pet monkey turns out to be a trained pickpocket on the run from a scheming gypsy.

name: Death Line
plot: When a government official disappears in the London tunnels, after several reports of missing people in the same location, Scotland Yard start to take the matter seriously, along with a couple who stumble into a victim by accident.

name: The Manhattan Project
plot: A high school prodigy builds an atomic bomb with stolen plutonium to win the 45th National Science Fair and expose a nuclear weapons lab posing as a nuclear medical research facility in Ithaca, NY.

name: Pet Sematary II
plot: A teenage boy and his father move to his recently-deceased mother's hometown, where they encounter the ancient Native American cemetery with the power to raise the dead.

name: The Hollywood Knights
plot: Led by their comedic leader, Turk, the Hollywood Knights car club raise hell throughout Beverly Hills on Halloween Night, 1965.

name: Highlander: Endgame
plot: Immortals Connor and Duncan MacLeod must join forces against Kell, an evil immortal who has become too strong for anyone to face alone.

name: Wimbledon
plot: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.

name: The Business
plot: Frankie is sent from London to Spain to make a delivery to Charlie, who likes the kid and shows him the ropes including the use of guns and drugs. Frankie likes the sun, pools and the cute, bikini clad girls and stays in Spain.

name: Black
plot: The cathartic tale of a young woman who can't see, hear, or speak, and the teacher who brings a ray of light into her dark world.

name: Funny Farm
plot: A couple swap city life for the country, but their picturesque new hometown turns out to be just a little bit different to what they were expecting.

name: The Tigger Movie
plot: Tigger goes looking through the hundred-acre-wood to find his family.

name: Slacker
plot: A day in the life of Austin, Texas as the camera roams from place to place and provides a brief look at the overeducated, the social misfits, the outcasts and the oddballs.

name: School Daze
plot: A not so popular young man wants to pledge to a popular fraternity at his historically black college.

name: When the Wind Blows
plot: A naive elderly British rural couple survive the initial onslaught of a nuclear war.

name: Hoodlum
plot: Black gangsters in 1930 Harlem fights Dutch Schultz who is trying to horn in on their numbers racket.

name: The Forgotten
plot: After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work.

name: True Crime
plot: Can an over-the-hill journalist uncover the evidence that can prove a death row inmate's innocence just hours before his execution?

name: Juwanna Mann
plot: A star basketball player decides to dress up as a woman and join the women's professional basketball league when his on-court antics get him suspended.

name: Mona Lisa
plot: A man recently released from prison manages to get a job driving a call girl from customer to customer.

name: Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot
plot: A tough police sergeant's overbearing mother comes to visit him and begins to meddle in his life and career.

name: Phoenix the Warrior
plot: In a post-apocalyptic world, women warriors battle each other from junkyards to gravel pits as they determine the fate of the entire world.

name: The Comfort of Strangers
plot: A couple retreat to Venice to work on their relationship, but an encounter with a stranger leads them into a world of intrigue - where their darkest desires are in reach.

name: She's Having a Baby
plot: Young newlyweds find out just how unprepared they are for their future together.

name: April Fool's Day
plot: Nine college students staying at a friend's remote island mansion begin to fall victim to an unseen murderer over the April Fool's Day weekend, but nothing is as it seems.

name: Hero
plot: A not-so-nice man rescues passengers from a crashed airliner, only to see someone else take credit.

name: Employee of the Month
plot: It just isn't David's day. First he gets fired at the bank, then his fiancee breaks up and throws him out of the house. The bank gets robbed and he gets shot. Twists follow.

name: Trog
plot: A sympathetic anthropologist uses drugs and surgery to try to communicate with a primitive troglodyte who is found living in a local cave.

name: Diva
plot: Two tapes, two Parisian mob killers, one corrupt policeman, an opera fan, a teenage thief, and the coolest philosopher ever filmed all twist their way through an intricate and stylish French-language thriller.

name: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
plot: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.

name: Day for Night
plot: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

name: Phantoms
plot: In the peaceful town of Snowfield, Colorado something evil has wiped out the community. And now, its up to a group of people to stop it, or at least get out of Snowfield alive.

name: Armour of God 2: Operation Condor
plot: Jackie is hired to help the UN find Nazi gold hidden in Sahara. He's accompanied from Spain by 2 (later 3) cute women. As there are others wanting the gold, lots of kung fu fighting and comedy follows.

name: Vanity Fair
plot: Growing up poor in London, Becky Sharp defies her poverty-stricken background and ascends the social ladder alongside her best friend, Amelia Sedley.

name: The Isle
plot: Working at a fishing resort in an idyllic location, but surrounded by various facets of human unpleasantness, a young mute woman falls in love with a man on the run from the law for committing murder.

name: Witchboard
plot: When his girlfriend becomes dangerously obsessed with a ghost she contacted using a Ouija board, Jim reluctantly joins forces with her ex-his own estranged childhood best friend-to identify and exorcise the evil spirit.

name: Porky's Revenge
plot: As graduation nears for the class of 1955 at Angel Beach High, the gang once again faces off against their old enemy, Porky, who wants them to throw the school's championship basketball game because he's betting on the opposing team.

name: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
plot: Our intrepid adolescent heroes wake up to find their beloved television stolen, and embark on an epic journey across America to recover it, and, who knows, maybe even score.

name: Spider
plot: A mentally disturbed man takes residence in a halfway house. His mind gradually slips back into the realm created by his illness, where he replays a key part of his childhood.

name: The Quiet American
plot: An old British reporter vies with a young U.S. doctor for the affections of a beautiful Vietnamese woman.

name: Spacehunter: Adventures in the Forbidden Zone
plot: On a distant planet inhabited by mutants, two bounty-hunters race to rescue three Earth female captives from the clutches of an evil mutant warlord.

name: Fandango
plot: Five college buddies from the University of Texas circa 1971 embark on a final road trip odyssey across the Mexican border before facing up to uncertain futures, in Vietnam and otherwise.

name: Matinee
plot: The teenage son of a navy sailor newly stationed in Key West gets some excitement with his friends when a small-time film producer comes to town to premiere a kitschy horror film during the Cuban Missile Crisis.

name: Bad Boy Bubby
plot: Bubby has spent thirty years trapped in the same small room, tricked by his mother. One day, he manages to escape and, deranged and naive in equal measures, his adventure into a modern and nihilistic life begins.

name: Love Me If You Dare
plot: As adults, best friends Julien and Sophie continue the odd game they started as children -- a fearless competition to outdo one another with daring and outrageous stunts. While they often act out to relieve one another's pain, their game might be a way to avoid the fact that they are truly meant for one another.

name: Not Without My Daughter
plot: An American woman trapped in Islamic Iran by her brutal husband must find a way for her and her daughter to escape.

name: Deep Cover
plot: A uniformed police officer is recruited by the DEA to infiltrate a drug smuggling ring looking to expand its operation.

name: The Ages of Lulu
plot: The story of a young woman's descent into the kinky and dangerous sexual underground in Madrid.

name: The Interpreter
plot: Political intrigue and deception unfold inside the United Nations, where a U.S. Secret Service agent is assigned to investigate an interpreter who overhears an assassination plot.

name: If Looks Could Kill
plot: Michael has to take summer class in French, a class trip to France, to graduate high school. He is, however, mistaken for an agent and people try to kill him. There are 007 style cars, cuties, crooks etc.

name: Jane Eyre
plot: Jane Eyre is an orphan cast out as a young girl by her aunt, Mrs. Reed, and sent to be raised in a harsh charity school for girls. There she learns to become a teacher and eventually seeks employment outside of the school. Her advertisement is answered by the housekeeper of Thornfield Hall, Mrs. Fairfax.

name: Dreamchild
plot: Ian Holm is children's author Lewis Carroll in this poignant fantasy-drama set in 1930s New York and populated by the fabulous special effects creatures of Muppet master Jim Henson.

name: Narc
plot: When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman, an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.

name: Sleepaway Camp II: Unhappy Campers
plot: Angela, supposedly reformed and living under an assumed surname, is working at a summer camp. However, when the campers start misbehaving, she soon reverts to her old ways.

name: Swing Shift
plot: A woman finds romance when she takes a job at an aircraft plant to help make ends meet after her husband goes off to war.

name: Desperate Hours
plot: An escaped con, on the run from the law, moves into a married couple's house and takes over their lives.

name: The Freshman
plot: An N.Y.C. film school student accepts a job with a local mobster who resembles a famous cinema godfather and who takes the young man under his wing, after demanding total loyalty.

name: Cyrano de Bergerac
plot: Famed swordsman and poet Cyrano de Bergerac is in love with his cousin Roxane. He has never expressed his love for her as he his large nose undermines his self-confidence. Then he finds a way to express his love to her, indirectly.

name: Appointment with Death
plot: When a former prison wardress who dominates the lives of her three adult stepchildren and her daughter is found dead at an archaeological dig near the Dead Sea, there are a great many suspects.

name: Seven Beauties
plot: The defense of honor, a strong value in Neapolitan society, and its effects on the life of everyman Pasquale Frafuso.

name: The Postman
plot: A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

name: The Wings of the Dove
plot: An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.

name: The Limey
plot: An extremely volatile and dangerous Englishman goes to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his daughter's death.

name: The Boys Next Door
plot: Roy and Bo leave their small California town the weekend after graduation for a short road trip to Los Angeles. Soon, they find themselves lashing out and leaving a trail of bodies behind them. The violence escalates throughout.

name: Bringing Down the House
plot: When a lonely guy meets a woman on the internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to get him to prove her innocence, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life.

name: Desert Hearts
plot: While waiting for her divorce papers, a repressed professor of literature is unexpectedly seduced by a carefree, spirited young lesbian.

name: Prince of the City
plot: A New York City narcotics detective reluctantly agrees to cooperate with a special commission investigating police corruption, and soon realises he's in over his head, and nobody can be trusted.

name: Revenge of the Nerds II: Nerds in Paradise
plot: The rising college nerds set out to a convention in Florida, but are not welcomed by the Alpha Beta representatives.

name: Below
plot: Strange happenings occur on a WW II submarine.

name: Proof
plot: The daughter of a brilliant but mentally disturbed mathematician, recently deceased, tries to come to grips with her possible inheritance: his insanity. Complicating matters are one of her father's ex-students, who wants to search through his papers, and her estranged sister, who shows up to help settle his affairs.

name: Bewitched
plot: Thinking he can overshadow an unknown actress in the part, an egocentric actor unknowingly gets a witch cast in an upcoming television remake of the classic sitcom Bewitched (1964).

name: Gloria
plot: When a young boy's family is killed by the mob, their tough neighbor Gloria becomes his reluctant guardian. In possession of a book that the gangsters want, the pair go on the run in New York.

name: Star 80
plot: A successful young model finds trouble when her obsessive manager-turned-husband becomes dangerously jealous.

name: Eve's Bayou
plot: What did little Eve see--and how will it haunt her? Husband, father and womanizer Louis Batiste is the head of an affluent family, but it's the women who rule this gothic world of secrets, lies and mystic forces.

name: Nil by Mouth
plot: A rough, short-tempered patriarch of a working-class family sees his life and the relationships around him slowly unravel.

name: Final Analysis
plot: A psychiatrist becomes romantically involved with the sister of one of his patients, but the influence of her controlling gangster husband threatens to destroy them both.

name: The Day of the Beast
plot: Bent on committing as many sins as possible to avert the birth of the beast, a Catholic priest teams up with a Black Metal aficionado and an Italian connoisseur of the occult. Now, he must become an unrelenting sinner. Is there still hope?

name: Mark of the Devil
plot: In 1700s Austria, a witch-hunter's apprentice has doubts about the righteousness of witch-hunting when he witnesses the brutality, the injustice, the falsehood, the torture and the arbitrary killing that go with the job.

name: Russian Ark
plot: A 19th century French aristocrat, notorious for his scathing memoirs about life in Russia, travels through the Russian State Hermitage Museum and encounters historical figures from the last 200+ years.

name: Orca
plot: A hunter squares off against a killer whale seeking vengeance for the death of its mate.

name: Opera
plot: A young opera singer is stalked by a deranged fan bent on killing the people associated with her to claim her for himself.

name: I Love You to Death
plot: Joey Boca (Kevin Kline) owns a pizza parlor, and is married to Rosalie (Tracey Ullman). He's also a serial womanizer. Rosalie goes to extremes when she finds he has been cheating.

name: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
plot: A small-town band hits it big, but it must battle a nefarious plot in the music industry.

name: Gator
plot: Agents force a former con man to help them nab a corrupt politician.

name: Eyes of Fire
plot: A preacher is accused of adultery, and he and his followers are chased out of town. They become stranded in an isolated forest, which is haunted by the spirits of French colonists controlled by evil.

name: King Kong Lives
plot: Kong falls from the twin towers and he appears to be alive. However, his heart is failing, so it's replaced with an artificial one. All is well until he senses that there's a female Kong somewhere out there and escapes wreaking havoc.

name: Sorority Boys
plot: Strapped for cash, three fraternity playboys make one last attempt to live the high life - cheaply - by masquerading as girls. But their chauvinistic ways come back to haunt them as they get a crash course in the opposite sex.

name: Tender Mercies
plot: A broken-down, middle-aged country singer gets a new wife, reaches out to his long-lost daughter, and tries to put his troubled life back together.

name: Supercop
plot: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

name: Night of the Scarecrow
plot: A group of drunk teenagers accidently set free the spirit of a warlock, which possesses a scarecrow. The scarecrow goes on a bloody rampage killing the descendents of the men who had killed the warlock a century before. A newcomer and the daughter of the mayor try to stop it before it is too late and the warlock can reincarnate...

name: Mirrormask
plot: In a fantasy world of opposing kingdoms, a fifteen-year-old girl must find the fabled MirrorMask in order to save the kingdom and get home.

name: The Gauntlet
plot: A hard but mediocre cop is assigned to escort a prostitute into custody from Las Vegas to Phoenix, so that she can testify in a mob trial. But a lot of people are literally betting that they won't make it into town alive.

name: Thursday
plot: A former L.A. drug dealer has moved to Houston to make a new life for himself as a married architect. Everything falls apart when he is suddenly visited by one of his former cohorts who comes carrying heroin.

name: No Holds Barred
plot: A TV-network boss pits a wrestler called Zeus against a wrestler called Rip in a wrestling match.

name: Gandahar
plot: An evil force begins to destroy the idyllic paradise of Gandahar, where the citizens are in perfect harmony with nature.

name: Solarbabies
plot: In a post-apocalyptic future ruled by the military, a group of renegade teenage orphans find a legendary orb, Bohdai, that can supposedly bring the rain back to dried up Earth.

name: Dahmer
plot: Biopic about notorious American serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer, taking place in both the past and the present.

name: The Missouri Breaks
plot: Tom Logan is a horse thief. Rancher David Braxton has horses, and a daughter, worth stealing. But Braxton has just hired Lee Clayton, an infamous "regulator", to hunt down the horse thieves; one at a time.

name: Flight of the Intruder
plot: During the air war over Vietnam, a U.S. Navy A-6 Intruder bomber pilot schemes with a hardened veteran to make an unauthorized air strike on Hanoi.

name: The Fan
plot: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.

name: Godzilla vs. Destoroyah
plot: The aftermath of the Oxygen Destroyer brings forth Destoroyah, a beast intent on killing Godzilla, who is on the verge of a nuclear meltdown.

name: Asterix and Obelix vs. Caesar
plot: Inhabitants of the last unconquered village in Gaul (ancient France) use a magical potion to hold their independence from Roman invaders.

name: Central Station
plot: The emotive journey of a former schoolteacher who writes letters for illiterate people, and a young boy whose mother has just died, as they search for the father he never knew.

name: Nightmare Sisters
plot: Three geeky college girls who can't get a date, organize a seance and become sex starved vamps.

name: Primary Colors
plot: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for President of the United States of America.

name: Repossessed
plot: Parody of The Exorcist (1973), with Linda Blair once again possessed by Satan, and Leslie Nielsen as the exorcist.

name: Vampire in Brooklyn
plot: A Caribbean vampire seduces a Brooklyn police officer who has no idea that she is half-vampire.

name: Breezy
plot: A young girl runs away from home and meets a grouchy older man who reluctantly takes her in. Eventually they develop a romantic and affectionate relationship.

name: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
plot: A boy is raised by a Buddhist monk in an isolated floating temple where the years pass like the seasons.

name: Raise the Red Lantern
plot: China in the 1920s. After her father's death, Songlian is forced to marry the wealthy Master Chen. With three wives already, each living in a separate house, there is fierce competition for his attention and the privileges that are gained.

name: The Minus Man
plot: Aimless Vann Siegert takes a bizarre turn in life and becomes a serial killer, tracking down the miserable, the self-destructive and those who otherwise seem willing to die.

name: Sundown: The Vampire in Retreat
plot: Reclusive vampires lounge in a lonely American town. They wear sun cream to protect themselves. A descendant of Van Helsing arrives with hilarious consequences.

name: The Care Bears Movie
plot: The Care Bears team up with a troubled brother and sister who just moved to a new town to help a neglected young magician's apprentice whose evil spell book causes sinister things to happen.

name: The Cure
plot: Erik, a loner, finds a friend in Dexter, an eleven-year-old boy with AIDS. They vow to find a cure for AIDS together and save Dexter's life in an eventful summer.

name: Still Breathing
plot: When artist and street performer Fletcher (Brendan Fraser) thinks con-artist Roz (Joanna Going) is the woman he has seen in a vision, he has no idea she sees him as her next victim.

name: The House on Sorority Row
plot: After a seemingly innocent prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one in their sorority house while throwing a party to celebrate their graduation.

name: Erik the Viking
plot: Erik the Viking and his men travel across the sea to find Valhalla to ask the gods to end the Age of Ragnarok.

name: Highlander: The Final Dimension
plot: Deceived that he had won the Prize, Connor MacLeod awakens from a peaceful life when an entombed immortal magician comes seeking the Highlander.

name: Gregory's Girl
plot: Gregory is a normal teen who is infatuated with a classmate. He must work to win her affection.

name: Madeline
plot: Horrified at the prospect of her beloved school being sold, a young French girl uses her wit and craftiness to attempt to save it, making an unlikely new friend in the process.

name: Enigma
plot: A young genius frantically races against time to crack an enemy code and solve the mystery surrounding the woman he loves.

name: Shaft
plot: A crime lord hires black private eye, John Shaft, to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.

name: Of Love and Shadows
plot: Chile 1973 is ruled by the dictator Pinochet. The wealthy don't see the violence, terror, executions etc. including Irene. She's engaged to an officer in the fascist military. She meets Francisco who opens her eyes to truth and love.

name: Man of the House
plot: A young boy refuses to accept his mother's new boyfriend, a lawyer, despite the man's attempts to win his respect. Meanwhile, disgruntled relative of a criminal he prosecuted seek revenge.

name: Murphy's Romance
plot: Emma moves to a ranch with her son after a divorce and befriends the older Murphy, but things turn complicated when her ex shows up.

name: Europa Europa
plot: A boy in Nazi Germany, trying to conceal that he is Jewish, joins the Hitler Youth.

name: The Best of Youth
plot: An Italian epic that follows the lives of two brothers from the 1960s to the 2000s.

name: Blind Fury
plot: A blind Vietnam vet, trained as a swordfighter, comes to America and helps to rescue the son of a fellow soldier.

name: Green Card
plot: A man wanting to stay in the US enters into a marriage of convenience, but it turns into more than that.

name: The Razor's Edge
plot: He had everything and wanted nothing. He learned that he had nothing and wanted everything. He saved the world and then it shattered. The path to enlightenment is as sharp and narrow as a razor's edge.

name: Mikey
plot: A seemingly sweet and innocent little boy causes murder and mayhem in his new neighborhood and falls for the teenage girl next door.

name: Exorcist: The Beginning
plot: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

name: House of Games
plot: A psychiatrist comes to the aid of a compulsive gambler and is led by a smooth-talking grifter into the shadowy but compelling world of stings, scams, and con men.

name: Living in Oblivion
plot: This ultimate tribute to all independent filmmakers takes place during one day on the set of a non-budget movie.

name: Backbeat
plot: A dramatization of the Hamburg, Germany phase of The Beatles' early history.

name: The Dallas Connection
plot: Scientists in charge of a sophisticated, state-of-the-art, military satellite are being assassinated. It's up to a team of federal agents to protect the last surviving scientist able to activate the satellite.

name: Cradle 2 the Grave
plot: A jewel thief's daughter is kidnapped after he steals a collection of prized black diamonds, which aren't at all what they seem.

name: Surviving the Game
plot: A homeless man is hired as a survival guide for a group of wealthy businessmen on a hunting trip in the mountains, unaware that they are killers who hunt humans for sport, and that he is their new prey.

name: The Return
plot: In the Russian wilderness, two brothers face a range of new, conflicting emotions when their father - a man they know only through a single photograph - resurfaces.

name: She
plot: In a post-apocalyptic world, She aids two brothers' quest to rescue their kidnapped sister. Along the way, they battle weird creatures before standing against the odds to defeat the evil Norks.

name: Absence of Malice
plot: When a prosecutor leaks to a Miami reporter that a liquor wholesaler is suspected in the murder of a union head, the man's life begins to unravel.

name: The Friends of Eddie Coyle
plot: After his last crime has him looking at a long prison sentence for repeat offenses, a low level Boston gangster decides to snitch on his friends to avoid jail time.

name: Eternity and a Day
plot: Famous writer Alexander is very ill and has little time left to live. He meets a little boy on the street, who is an illegal immigrant from Albania, and goes on a journey with him to take the boy home.

name: Dot the I
plot: Young lovers in London are wrapped up in a love triangle that may not be exactly what it seems.

name: Willard
plot: A young man with an unusual connection to rats uses them at his own sociopathic will.

name: Blood Work
plot: Still recovering from a heart transplant, retired F.B.I. profiler Terry McCaleb returns to service when his own blood analysis offers clues to the identity of a serial killer.

name: The Mirror Crack'd
plot: Miss Jane Marple comes to solve the mystery when a local woman is poisoned and a visiting movie star seems to have been the intended victim.

name: Amityville II: The Possession
plot: A dysfunctional family moves into a new house, which proves to be satanic, resulting in the demonic possession of their teenage son.

name: Dunston Checks In
plot: A young boy befriends a larcenous orangutan in a luxury hotel.

name: Autumn Sonata
plot: A devoted wife is visited by her mother, a successful concert pianist who had little time for her when she was young.

name: Soldier Blue
plot: After a cavalry patrol is ambushed by the Cheyenne, the two survivors, a soldier and a woman, must reach the safety of the nearest fort.

name: The Principal
plot: A teacher is assigned to be the principal of a violent, crime-ridden high school.

name: Nemesis
plot: Alex, a burned out LA cyborg cop, is forced by commissioner Farnsworth to find his former cyborg partner and lover Jared who's about to deliver sensitive data to cyborg terrorists who wish to wage war against humans. Is he being played?

name: Ghost Story
plot: Two generations of men find themselves haunted by the presence of a spectral woman. When the son of one of the elderly men returns to his hometown after his brother's mysterious death, they attempt to unravel her story.

name: Slaughter High
plot: Eight people are invited to their alma mater for their 10-year reunion, where a fellow former student, disfigured from a prank gone wrong, is out to seek revenge.

name: New York Minute
plot: Two sisters who just can't get along have to travel to New York City together and find themselves on numerous misadventures in order to accomplish their goals.

name: The Osterman Weekend
plot: During the Cold War, a controversial television journalist is asked by the C.I.A. to persuade certain acquaintances, who are Soviet Agents of the Omega network, to defect.

name: ...All the Marbles
plot: Small timer female wrestling team "The California Dolls" and their manager must face the hardship of their sport and life to suceed.

name: Street Trash
plot: A liquor store owner sells alcoholic beverages to homeless people, unaware of what the bottles actually contain: toxic brew.

name: The Portrait of a Lady
plot: An American girl inherits a fortune and falls into a misguided relationship with a gentleman confidence artist whose true nature, including a barbed and covetous disposition, turns her life into a nightmare.

name: A Murder of Crows
plot: A disbarred lawyer takes credit for a late friend's book, which becomes a smash hit but the tables turn on him sooner than he suspected.

name: Save Me
plot: An accountant beleaguered by personal and professional problems gets involved with a femme fatale and her mysterious psychiatrist.

name: I Spy
plot: A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.

name: The Wild Life
plot: A high-school wrestler parties with his buddy at a swinging-singles apartment complex.

name: The Incubus
plot: A small town's doctor takes matters into his own hands after a series of gruesome and bizarre rape crimes perplex the clueless authorities.

name: Feardotcom
plot: A New York City detective investigates mysterious deaths occurring 48 hours after users log onto a site named feardotcom.

name: Still Crazy
plot: Fame, fortune and fornication drove the British rock band in the '70s until a divine end. 20 years later, Strange Fruit reunites and goes on a tour with ups and downs on the continent.

name: Class of 1999
plot: Three ex-military robots are reprogrammed as teachers and secretly placed in a school where most students are part of organized gangs. They begin to respond violently to unruly students, and their military training starts to take over.

name: Clifford
plot: A bratty 10-year-old boy is obsessed with visiting a dinosaur-themed amusement park. His uptight uncle takes the wily tyke in for a week, and barely lives to regret it.

name: The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant
plot: A troubled fashion designer starts a relationship with a much younger woman.

name: George and the Dragon
plot: A knight returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon and becomes a legend.

name: Saving Face
plot: A gay Chinese-American and her traditionalist mother are reluctant to go public with secret loves that clash against cultural expectations.

name: Night Falls on Manhattan
plot: A newly elected District Attorney finds himself in the middle of a police corruption investigation that may involve his father and his partner.

name: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
plot: Deuce is tricked again into man-whoring by T.J., only in Amsterdam while other man-whores are being murdered in his midst.

name: Richard III
plot: The classic Shakespearean play about the murderously scheming 15th-century king is reimagined in an alternative setting of 1930s England as clouds of fascism gather.

name: Farewell, My Lovely
plot: Los Angeles private eye Philip Marlowe is hired by paroled convict Moose Malloy to find his girlfriend Velma, former seedy nightclub dancer.

name: The Jungle Book 2
plot: Mowgli, missing the jungle and his old friends, runs away from the man village unaware of the danger he's in by going back to the wild.

name: Dreamer
plot: Cale Crane catalyzes the rescue and rehabilitation of Sonador, a race horse with a broken leg.

name: Dancing at Lughnasa
plot: Five unmarried sisters make the most of their simple existence in rural Ireland in the 1930s.

name: Dragonfly
plot: A grieving doctor is being contacted by his deceased wife through his patients' near death experiences.

name: The Serpent and the Rainbow
plot: An anthropologist goes to Haiti after hearing rumors about a drug used by black magic practitioners to turn people into zombies.

name: The Man Without a Face
plot: Chuck wants to leave home but can't make the grade for boarding school. Then he finds out the disfigured recluse living nearby is an ex-teacher.

name: Mio in the Land of Faraway
plot: A lonely boy who is transferred from his dull life with his adoptive parents to the land where his real father is the King. In that country, he sets out on a quest, together with his new friend, to destroy the evil Knight Kato.

name: Delirium
plot: A former hooker runs a successful men's magazine. An obsessed admirer systematically slaughters her models (occasionally increasing the magazine's output) and supplies the mistress with pictures of their disfigured corpses taken in front of her semi-nude posters visible in the background. Will she be the psycho's next victim?

name: The Burglars
plot: In 1970s Athens a group of professional burglars plans an emerald heist from the home of a gem collector, but corrupt Greek police inspector Abel Zacharia is on their trail.

name: Hearts in Atlantis
plot: Widowed Liz Garfield and her son Bobby change when mysterious stranger Ted Brautigan enters their lives.

name: Felicity
plot: Teenager Felicity studies at a remote Roman Catholic Church boarding school and seeks indulgence in popular erotic novels Story of O, Emmanuelle and in a lesbian love affair with her friend Jenny.

name: Flesh for Frankenstein
plot: Baron Frankenstein creates two "zombies" - one male, one female - planning to mate them in order to create a master race.

name: Edtv
plot: A video store clerk agrees to have his life filmed by a camera crew for a television show.

name: Dead Heat
plot: A cop is killed investigating a strange case of resurrected corpses. His partner and a pathologist resurrect him, but he only has a limited time before he starts to decompose, and he uses it to chase down the diabolical man who killed him.

name: Scarecrow
plot: An ex-con drifter with a penchant for brawling is amused by a homeless ex-sailor, so they partner up as they head east together.

name: Jean de Florette
plot: A greedy landowner and his backward nephew conspire to block the only water source for an adjoining property in order to bankrupt the owner and force him to sell.

name: Pumping Iron
plot: Arnold Schwarzenegger and Lou Ferrigno face off in a no-holds-barred competition for the title of Mr. Olympia in this critically-acclaimed film that made Schwarzenegger a household name.

name: For Love or Money
plot: Doug, a concierge at a luxury Manhattan hotel, saves all his tips toward his plan for a hotel. A potential investor seduces the girl Doug loves with false promises of leaving his wife. Doug's dilemma: hotel project or girl?

name: Crimes and Misdemeanors
plot: An ophthalmologist's mistress threatens to reveal their affair to his wife while a married documentary filmmaker is infatuated with another woman.

name: The Frisco Kid
plot: A Polish rabbi wanders through the Old West on his way to lead a synagogue in San Francisco. On the way, he is nearly burned at the stake by Native Americans and almost killed by outlaws.

name: The Spanish Prisoner
plot: An employee who develops a lucrative secret process for his corporation is tempted to betray the company when higher ups attempt to take the process from him. Dastardly intrigue ensues.

name: Grandview, U.S.A.
plot: With only a week left before graduation, a young dreamer itches to renounce an uninspiring scholarship, stand up to his despotic father and pursue a career in oceanography. But, has anyone ever spread his wings away from Grandview, U.S.A.?

name: Ladder 49
plot: A firefighter, injured and trapped in a burning building, has flashbacks of his life as he drifts in and out of consciousness. Meanwhile, fellow firefighters led by the Chief attempt to rescue him.

name: Bloody Sunday
plot: A dramatization of the Irish civil rights protest march and subsequent massacre by British troops on January 30, 1972.

name: The Mutilator
plot: A college student, who accidentally killed his mother as a child, decides to take his friends to his father's fishing cabin during fall break, not knowing that his crazed father is stalking the place.

name: Road Games
plot: A laid-back American truck driver in south Australia suspects that the driver of a green van is killing young women along his route, and plays a game of cat-and-mouse to catch him.

name: Light Sleeper
plot: A drug dealer reconsiders his profession when his boss plans to go straight and an old flame reappears.

name: The Sheltering Sky
plot: An American couple travel abroad to revitalize their relationship. But as the trip drags on, their attempt at recovering what they once had seems futile.

name: Sour Grapes
plot: Evan and Ritchie see their friendship go sour after one wins a slots jackpot with two quarters bummed from the other.

name: The Giant Spider Invasion
plot: Giant spiders from another dimension invade Wisconsin.

name: Nightwatch
plot: A law student, who takes a job as a night watchman at a morgue, begins to discover clues that implicate him as the suspect of a series of murders.

name: Cube²: Hypercube
plot: Eight strangers awaken with no memory, in a puzzling cube-shaped room where the laws of physics do not always apply.

name: Love Don't Cost a Thing
plot: A high school loser pays a cheerleader to pose as his girlfriend so he can be considered cool.

name: Trouble Every Day
plot: Two American newlyweds in Paris experience a love so strong, it almost devours them.

name: You Got Served
plot: In order to achieve their dream of opening a recording studio, two friends (Omarion, Houston) must first win their city's dance contest -- a fierce competition that pits them against a group of tough street dancers.

name: Tart
plot: A portrait of the increasingly desperate attempts of a teenage Manhattan girl to find love and kinship, in a world that never reciprocates.

name: Deadly Friend
plot: After his friend is killed by her abusive father, the new kid in town attempts to save her by implanting a robotic microchip into her brain.

name: My Life as a Dog
plot: In the late '50s, young Ingemar learns a lot about life and himself when he is sent away from his sick mother to live with his aunt and uncle in a town full of eccentrics.

name: Racing Stripes
plot: An abandoned zebra grows up believing he is a racehorse, and, with the help of his barnyard friends and a teenage girl, sets out to achieve his dream of racing with thoroughbreds.

name: Crazy/Beautiful
plot: At Pacific Palisades High, a poor Latino falls hard for a troubled girl from an affluent neighborhood.

name: A Month in the Country
plot: Two soldiers (Colin Firth, Kenneth Branagh) recover from World War I while spending a summer in a Yorkshire village.

name: Mahler
plot: Composer Gustav Mahler's (Robert Powell) life, told in a series of flashbacks as he and his wife (Georgina Hale) discuss their failing marriage during a train journey.

name: Suburban Commando
plot: An interstellar hero from a distant world visits Earth, and tries to fit in with a mundane, yet kind, suburban family.

name: Alien Nation
plot: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

name: Godzilla 2000: Millennium
plot: An independent group of researchers actively track Godzilla as a giant meteor is discovered. The mysterious rock begins to levitate as its true intentions for the world and Godzilla are revealed.

name: Guarding Tess
plot: A former U.S. First Lady wants a particular Secret Service agent to head her bodyguard detail, even though he can't stand her.

name: The Case of the Bloody Iris
plot: Having recently escaped the clutches of a hippie sex cult, a beautiful model is pursued by a serial killer whose previous victims include former occupants of her new apartment.

name: Heaven Help Us
plot: A new transfer student to St. Basil's Boys' Prep School tries to fit in while romantically pursuing a troubled young girl.

name: Cold Creek Manor
plot: A family relocates from the city to a dilapidated house in the country that was once a grand estate. As they begin renovations, they discover their new home harbors a secret and may not be completely free of its former inhabitant.

name: Saints and Soldiers
plot: Four American soldiers and one Brit fighting in Europe during World War II struggle to return to Allied territory after being separated from U.S. forces during the historic Malmedy Massacre.

name: Cloak & Dagger
plot: A young boy and his imaginary friend end up on the run while in possession of a top-secret spy gadget.

name: Random Hearts
plot: Police Sergeant Dutch Van Den Broek (Harrison Ford) and U.S. Representative Kay Chandler (Dame Kristin Scott Thomas) lose their spouses in a plane crash, and they soon discover that their spouses were having an affair with each other.

name: 964 Pinocchio
plot: Pinocchio 964, lobotomised cyborg sex slave, is thrown out onto the street by his owners because of his inability to maintain an erection. He is befriended by a criminally insane, memory-wiped, homeless girl. Meanwhile, the corporate entity who manufactured and sold him plots to kill him because of his malfunction.

name: The Boy Friend
plot: When the leading lady of a low-budget musical revue sprains her ankle, the assistant stage manager is forced to understudy and perform in her place, becoming a star and finding love in the process.

name: Alone in the Dark
plot: A few dangerous and delusional mental patients break out of a mental asylum during a power blackout, and lay siege to their new doctor's house, who, they believe, killed their previous doctor.

name: Switchblade Sisters
plot: The leader of an inner-city girl gang is challenged when a new girl moves into the neighborhood.

name: Party Monster
plot: Based on the true story of Michael Alig, a Club Kid party organizer whose life was sent spiraling down when he bragged on television about killing his drug dealer and roommate.

name: Joe's Apartment
plot: A nice guy has just moved to New York and discovers that he must share his run-down apartment with a couple thousand singing, dancing cockroaches.

name: Intruder
plot: The overnight stock crew of a local supermarket find themselves being stalked and slashed by a mysterious maniac.

name: Nightmare
plot: A mental patient embarks on a murder spree upon escaping from an institution.

name: Envy
plot: A man becomes increasingly jealous of his friend's newfound success.

name: Bulworth
plot: A suicidally disillusioned liberal politician puts a contract out on himself and takes the opportunity to be bluntly honest with his voters by affecting the rhythms and speech of hip-hop music and culture.

name: She's Out of Control
plot: When an average-looking teenage girl gets a makeover, it's enough to make her father become overprotective of her.

name: Not of This Earth
plot: An alien arrives on Earth looking to take human blood in an attempt to preserve his dying planet.

name: The Anderson Tapes
plot: After ten years in prison to protect a mafia family, Duke Anderson is released and he cashes in a debt of honor with the mob to bankroll a caper.

name: Angels and Insects
plot: In the 1800s a naturalist marries into a family of British country gentry.

name: Sorority Babes in the Slimeball Bowl-O-Rama
plot: As part of a sorority ritual, pledges and their male companions steal a trophy from a bowling alley; unbeknownst to them, it contains a devilish imp who makes their lives a living Hell.

name: Year of the Jellyfish
plot: Chris, a sexy teenager who appears mostly bare-breasted on the French Riviera, has a crush on Romain, her mother's lover. In reaction to her inability to attract his attention, she experiments with other risque affairs.

name: Hell Night
plot: Four college pledges are forced to spend the night in a deserted old mansion, where they are stalked by the monstrous survivor of a family massacre years earlier.

name: Dream Lover
plot: A successful businessman tries to uncover what is wrong with his wife.

name: Innocent Blood
plot: Marie is a vampire with a thirst for bad guys. When she fails to properly dispose of one of her victims, a violent mob boss, she bites off more than she can chew and faces a new, immortal danger.

name: Continental Divide
plot: A hard-nosed Chicago journalist has an unlikely love affair with an eagle researcher.

name: The Dark Backward
plot: Garbage man Marty tries his hand at standup comedy and fails miserably until he adds the third arm to his act that mysteriously grew out of his back.

name: Pusher II
plot: Tonny is released from prison - again. This time he has his mind set on changing his broken down life, but that is easier said than done.
