name: Brother
plot: An ex-soldier with a personal honor code enters the family crime business in St. Petersburg, Russia.

name: Fire with Fire
plot: A young woman from a Catholic school and a young man from a nearby prison camp fall in love and must run away together to escape the law, the church and their parents.

name: Born in East L.A.
plot: When an L.A. born American citizen is mistaken for a Mexican illegal alien and deported to Mexico, he has to do everything he can to get across the border.

name: The Heartbreak Kid
plot: A newlywed man on his honeymoon has second thoughts about his marriage and falls for a different woman.

name: Nine Queens
plot: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").

name: The Lovers on the Bridge
plot: Alex, who's homeless and addicted to alcohol, and Michèle, who's losing her sight, form a relationship while sleeping rough on Paris's Pont-Neuf bridge.

name: Krippendorf's Tribe
plot: An anthropologist creates a fictitious lost New Guinea tribe using his family members to cover-up for his misuse of grant monies.

name: Down with Love
plot: In 1962 New York City, love blossoms between a playboy journalist and a feminist advice author.

name: The Prowler
plot: An unknown killer, clad in World War II U.S. Army fatigues, stalks a small California town, bent on reliving a 35 year-old double murder by focusing on a group of college kids holding an annual graduation dance.

name: The Journey of Natty Gann
plot: In the 1930s, a tomboy runs away from her guardian to join her single father who is 2,000 miles away, where he has found work.

name: King of the Gypsies
plot: In the criminal and violent world of modern-day Gypsies based in New York City, their 'king' Zharko Stepanowicz passes his leadership to his unwilling grandson, leaving the skipped father resentful.

name: Shoot to Kill
plot: An F.B.I. Agent teams up with a tracker to pursue a murderer after he vanishes into the mountains and infiltrates a hiking group.

name: All of Me
plot: A dying millionaire has her soul transferred into a younger, willing woman. However, something goes wrong, and she finds herself in her lawyer's body - together with the lawyer.

name: Bordello of Blood
plot: The Crypt Keeper returns to tell the story of a funeral parlor that moonlights as a vampire bordello.

name: The Heavenly Kid
plot: In order to earn his wings and get into heaven, a hip guardian angel is handed the task of watching over a lonely high school boy who needs guidance on how to fit in.

name: Wheels on Meals
plot: Two Chinese friends, who operate a food truck in Barcelona, Spain, use their martial arts expertise to help their private investigator friend protect the pickpocket Sylvia, who's been targeted by a ruthless gang.

name: A Cry in the Wild
plot: Adapted from Gary Paulsen's novel "Hatchet", a boy crash-lands in Canada's bear country and survives with a hatchet his divorced mother gave him.

name: The Day of the Locust
plot: An art director in the 1930s falls in love and attempts to make a young woman an actress despite Hollywood who wants nothing to do with her because of her problems with an estranged man and her alcoholic father.

name: The New Kids
plot: A brother and sister arrive in a small town to help their relatives run an amusement park, and they find the town is terrorized by a local street gang.

name: The Blood on Satan's Claw
plot: In early 18th century England, the children of a village slowly convert into a coven of devil worshipers.

name: The United States of Leland
plot: A young man's experience in a juvenile detention center that touches on the tumultuous changes that befall his family and the community in which he lives.

name: The Adventures of Huck Finn
plot: In Missouri, during the 1840s, young Huck Finn fearful of his drunkard father and yearning for adventure, leaves his foster family and joins with runaway slave Jim in a voyage down the Mississippi River toward slavery free states.

name: Gothic
plot: The Shelleys visit Lord Byron and compete to write a horror story.

name: The Door in the Floor
plot: A writer's young assistant becomes both pawn and catalyst in his boss's disintegrating household.

name: The Island of Dr. Moreau
plot: A shipwrecked survivor discovers a remote island owned by a crazed scientist who is carrying out sinister experiments on the island's inhabitants.

name: The End of the Affair
plot: A desperate man tries to find out why his beloved left him years ago.

name: The Adventures of Rocky & Bullwinkle
plot: When enemies Boris, Natasha, and Fearless Leader escape into the real world with a nefarious scheme, Rocky and Bullwinkle do the same, and team up with a young F.B.I. Agent to stop the trio.

name: Stuart Little 2
plot: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

name: Bad Company
plot: When an Ivy League-educated C.I.A. Agent is killed during an operation, the secret agency recruits his twin brother (Chris Rock).

name: Big Bad Mama
plot: Circumstances force a tough single mother and her two daughters into a life of crime and they quickly become outlaws on the run, picking up partners along the way, and traveling to different states, pursued by the law.

name: Armed and Dangerous
plot: A fired cop and useless lawyer sign up as security guards and find they've joined a corrupt union.

name: Battlestar Galactica
plot: After the destruction of the Twelve Colonies of Mankind, the last major fighter carrier leads a makeshift fugitive fleet on a desperate search for the legendary planet Earth.

name: The Man Without a Past
plot: M arrives in Helsinki only to be viciously attacked by thugs and pronounced dead by medics. He revives but with no memory of his past or his identity. He rebuilds his life from scratch, but the past inevitably catches up with him.

name: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham...
plot: After marrying a poor woman, rich Rahul is disowned by his father and moves to London to build a new life. Years later, his now-grown younger brother Rohan embarks on a mission to bring Rahul back home and reunite the family.

name: Jumpin' Jack Flash
plot: An American computer wiz who works at a New York bank is suddenly thrust into the world of international espionage after she inadvertently receives a coded message from a British spy.

name: Big Business
plot: Two couples of sisters from New York and from the countryside discover that they are connected in an incredible way.

name: Singapore Sling
plot: A man searching for his long-lost lover is kidnapped by her killers, an insane, mother-daughter duo, and they force him to commit various sexual atrocities with them.

name: She's Gotta Have It
plot: Story of a woman and her three lovers.

name: Turkish Delight
plot: An aimless young artist learns to face his responsibilities when a former lover develops a terminal illness.

name: Joint Security Area
plot: After a shooting incident at the North-South Korean border DMZ leaves two North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss and Swedish team investigates what actually happened.

name: Junebug
plot: A dealer in "outsider" art travels from Chicago to North Carolina to meet her new in-laws, challenging the equilibrium of this middle class Southern home.

name: The Cooler
plot: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.

name: 2001 Maniacs
plot: Eight college students travelling to Florida for Spring Break stumble into a remote town in Georgia, where they are set upon by the residents.

name: Poltergeist III
plot: Carol Anne is staying with her aunt in a high-rise building, where the supernatural forces haunting her make their return.

name: Brainscan
plot: A teenager is part of an interactive video game where he kills innocent victims. Later, the murders become real.

name: Tales from the Darkside: The Movie
plot: To stall a witch plotting to eat him, a boy reads her horror tales dealing with a collegian's resurrection of a mummy, a murderous cat, and an artist's pact with a gargoyle.

name: They All Laughed
plot: A madcap private-eye caper about a team of detectives who are following, and are being followed by, a group of beautiful women.

name: Sleeper
plot: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

name: Friend of the Family
plot: A mysterious, but kind-hearted, drifter tries to help a wealthy, but dysfunctional, Malibu family with their personal and romantic problems between them.

name: Allan Quatermain and the Lost City of Gold
plot: Allan Quatermain once again teams up with Jesse Huston where the discovery of a mysterious old gold piece sends Quatermain looking for his long-lost brother, missing in the wilds of Africa after seeking a lost white race.

name: The Thin Blue Line
plot: A film that successfully argued that a man was wrongly convicted for murder by a corrupt justice system in Dallas County, Texas.

name: The Package
plot: Experienced Green Beret sergeant Johnny Gallagher is escorting a prisoner, Airborne Ranger Thomas Boyette, back to the US, but Boyette escapes and Gallagher must risk life and limb to catch him.

name: Miracle Beach
plot: A down-on-his luck beach bum asks a cute female genie to help him seduce the woman of his dreams only to realize that he might be looking in the wrong place.

name: Beowulf
plot: In a besieged land, Beowulf must battle against the hideous creature Grendel and his vengeance seeking mother.

name: Little Voice
plot: A shy reclusive lady is convinced by an invisible entity to sing. Subsequently, she finds herself noticed by a sleazy talent agent and her talent being showcased on-stage. She also meets a kind but nervous man who becomes her best friend.

name: Hearts of Darkness: A Filmmaker's Apocalypse
plot: Documentary that chronicles how Francis Ford Coppola's Apocalypse Now (1979) was plagued by extraordinary script, shooting, budget, and casting problems--nearly destroying the life and career of the celebrated director.

name: Antitrust
plot: A computer programmer's dream job at a hot Portland-based firm turns nightmarish when he discovers his boss has a secret and ruthless means of dispatching anti-trust problems.

name: Salvador
plot: A burnt-out photojournalist becomes involved in a Central American revolution.

name: Night Watch
plot: A fantasy-horror set in present-day Moscow where the respective forces that control daytime and nighttime do battle.

name: A Kid in King Arthur's Court
plot: A Little League player is sent back into medieval times where he is given the task of saving Camelot.

name: Paradise Lost: The Child Murders at Robin Hood Hills
plot: A horrific triple child murder leads to an indictment and trial of three nonconformist boys based on questionable evidence.

name: All About the Benjamins
plot: Bounty hunter Bucum chases bail-jumper Reggie, who runs right into the scene of a diamond heist and murder and gets shot at as well. Later they become partners in their pursuit of the $20M in diamonds and lottery ticket. Their women join.

name: The Boy Who Could Fly
plot: An autistic boy who dreams of flying touches everyone he meets, including a new family who has moved in after their father dies.

name: Shocker
plot: After being sent to the electric chair, a serial killer uses electricity to come back from the dead and carry out his vengeance on the football player who turned him in to the police.

name: Sweet Sixteen
plot: Teenager Melissa moves into a small town filled with racial prejudice and bullying, and each time she meets up with one of the boys in town, they end up murdered - but who is the killer?

name: A Special Day
plot: Two neighbors, a persecuted journalist and a resigned housewife, meet during Hitler's visit to Italy in May 1938.

name: The Cowboy Way
plot: Two childhood friends who are rodeo cowboys travel from New Mexico to New York City searching for a friend who disappeared while looking for his daughter, who's just been smuggled into the US from Cuba.

name: The Underground Comedy Movie
plot: A series of comedic short films guaranteed to offend.

name: Knockaround Guys
plot: The wannabe sons of mobsters go to a remote town in the Midwest, and get themselves into more trouble than anyone could anticipate.

name: The Last Tycoon
plot: F. Scott Fitzgerald's novel is brought to life in this story of a movie producer slowly working himself to death.

name: Soul Food
plot: One person can keep a family together and, when that one person is gone, a family can be torn apart.

name: Black Dog
plot: A weapons loaded truck is shadowed by FBI and ATF. It explodes and kills the driver. Jack, just out of prison, is pressured into driving another truck from Atlanta to NJ. Things get rough when hijacking attempts are made.

name: Dinosaur Island
plot: Five downed pilots must contend with hungry prehistoric beasts and lusty cave women on a lush island paradise.

name: Neighbors
plot: A quiet man's peaceful suburban lifestyle is threatened by the new, obnoxious couple that moves in next door.

name: The Wind and the Lion
plot: A Berber chieftain triggers an international incident, drawing the involvement of Theodore Roosevelt, when he kidnaps an American widow and her children in 1900s Morocco.

name: K-9
plot: To stop an elusive criminal, a maverick detective enlists the aid of a police dog who's an unusually intelligent smart alec.

name: Performance
plot: A violent East London gangster undergoes a transformation of identity while hiding from his former colleagues in the home of a jaded Bohemian rock star and his two girlfriends.

name: Husbands
plot: After the death of a common friend, three married men leave their lives together, seeking pleasure and freedom and ultimately leaving for London.

name: Valiant
plot: At the height of World War II, a tiny wood pigeon enlists in the elite Royal Homing Pigeon Service to serve Britain, as the fearsome General Von Talon (Tim Curry) and his deadly squadron of falcons patrol the English Channel. Is he a war-hero in the making?

name: Paris Is Burning
plot: A chronicle of New York's drag scene in the 1980s, focusing on balls, voguing and the ambitions and dreams of those who gave the era its warmth and vitality.

name: Crazy in Alabama
plot: An abused wife heads to California to become a movie star while her nephew back in Alabama has to deal with a racially-motivated murder involving a corrupt sheriff.

name: Children of the Corn II: The Final Sacrifice
plot: A journalist and his son travel to Nebraska to investigate the mysterious town of Gatlin where, unbeknownst to them, a murderous cult of children are still waiting in the corn fields.

name: Metropolis
plot: Kenichi and his uncle Shunsaku Ban must find the mystery behind robot girl Tima.

name: Slackers
plot: When geeky Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the examination system, he blackmails them to win over the college's most popular girl.

name: The Champ
plot: Billy Flynn is an ex-champion boxer who was KO'd by booze and gambling. When the wealthy, estranged mother of his young son begins trying to lure the boy away from him, Flynn must return to the ring to provide for his child.

name: The Rose
plot: The tragic life of a self-destructive female rock star who struggles to deal with the constant pressures of her career and the demands of her ruthless business manager.

name: Fruits of Passion
plot: A girl loves an older man. He demands that she goes in a brothel, as evidence that she loves him.

name: The Cassandra Crossing
plot: Passengers on a European train have been exposed to a deadly disease. Nobody will let them off the train. So what happens next?

name: Evelyn
plot: Desmond's wife leaves him and their 3 kids after Christmas 1953. As he's unemployed in Dublin, the authorities place the kids in orphanages; when he finds a job, he tries to get his kids back.

name: My Family/Mi familia
plot: A man makes his way from Mexico to Los Angeles in the 1920s and gets married and raises a big family there. The movie follows the children until they get married and start their families in the 1960s.

name: Death Game
plot: Two crazy women seduce and then torment a businessman in his plush San Francisco home.

name: Ratcatcher
plot: A naïve young lad navigates the dirty squalid streets of 1973 Glasgow and the poor youth around him.

name: The Two Jakes
plot: The sequel to Chinatown (1974) finds J.J. "Jake" Gittes investigating adultery and murder, and the money that comes from oil.

name: My Favorite Year
plot: An aging, dissolute matinee idol is slated to appear on a live TV variety show in 1954, and a young comedy writer is tasked with the thankless job of keeping him ready and sober for the broadcast.

name: Breathless
plot: When Jesse Lujack steals a car in Las Vegas and drives down to LA, his criminal ways only escalate - but when will it end?

name: Double Down
plot: The controversial story of a lone genius who closes down the Las Vegas Strip... The goverment can't stop him. As he reunites with his dead girlfriend each night.

name: Kaun?
plot: While alone in the house, a woman hears news of serial killer on the loose. And then a stranger rings the doorbell...

name: The Five Heartbeats
plot: The story of the rise and fall of an African American vocal group.

name: Blind Date
plot: A workaholic needs a date for a dinner with new important clientele, but who his brother sets him up with could lead to disaster.

name: The Perfect Score
plot: Six high school seniors decide to break into the Princeton Testing Center so they can steal the answers to their upcoming SAT tests and all get perfect scores.

name: The Inglorious Bastards
plot: In 1944 France, a group of escaped American military prisoners en route to Switzerland volunteers to steal a German V2 rocket warhead for the Allies.

name: Lenny
plot: The story of acerbic 1960s comic Lenny Bruce, whose groundbreaking, no-holds-barred style and social commentary was often deemed by the Establishment as too obscene for the public.

name: Lockdown
plot: Avery (Jones) returns to college as a competitive swimmer after getting his life back on track. But his life takes another unexpected turn when he and his two friends (Bonds, Casseus) are wrongly accused of murder and end up in prison.

name: The Rugrats Movie
plot: The babies gets lost in the forest after Tommy Pickles gets a new baby brother.

name: The Railway Children
plot: After the enforced absence of their father, three children move with their mother to Yorkshire, where during their adventures they attempt to discover the reason for his disappearance.

name: Dirty Love
plot: A jilted photographer goes on a mission to get back at her philandering model boyfriend and along the way discovers that not all love is created equal.

name: Autumn in New York
plot: Romantic drama about an aging playboy who falls for a sweet, but terminally ill, young woman.

name: HouseSitter
plot: Con artist Gwen moves into Newton's empty home without his knowledge and begins setting up house, posing as his new wife.

name: No Man's Land
plot: A rookie cop goes undercover and infiltrates a car thief ring.

name: Joe
plot: Two men--wealthy conservative Bill and far-right factory worker Joe--form a dangerous bond after Bill confesses to Joe about murdering his daughter's drug-dealer boyfriend.

name: On a Clear Day You Can See Forever
plot: A troubled young woman who visits a psychotherapist to help her quit smoking undergoes hypnosis and finds herself reliving a tragic Victorian romance from a past life.

name: Ali: Fear Eats the Soul
plot: A lonely widow meets a much younger Moroccan worker in a bar during a rainstorm. They fall in love, to their own surprise and to the outright shock of their families, colleagues, and drinking buddies.

name: Black Angel
plot: Trapped in an unhappy marriage, the wife of a high ranking Fascist official starts a dangerous, self-destructive relationship with a duplicitous S.S. Officer.

name: The Big Red One
plot: A hardened sergeant and the four core members of his infantry unit try to survive World War II as they move from battle to battle throughout Europe.

name: War of the Buttons
plot: The children of Ballydowse and Carrickdowse engage in battles in which they cut off the buttons, shoelaces, and underwear of their captured opponents, in order to get the boys in trouble with their parents. They go to battle in mass groups of dozens, throwing stones and cutting off their opponents' buttons, etc.; sometimes they go to battle completely naked and exposed. In one such scene, about 30 boys return from a battle to celebrate victory at a barn-house only to find some girls waiting for them, and they get very embarrassed at losing their privacy.

name: Lord of Illusions
plot: A private detective gets more than he bargains for when he encounters Philip Swan, a performer whose amazing illusions captivate the world, but they are not really what everyone thinks.

name: Iris
plot: True story of the lifelong romance between novelist Iris Murdoch and her husband John Bayley, from their student days through her battle with Alzheimer's disease.

name: Galaxina
plot: In the 31st century, sexy blonde android Galaxina helms the crew of a space cruiser on a mission to find the Blue Star, a mystical gem that holds unlimited power.

name: Catch That Kid
plot: A girl and her two friends raid a bank, looking for the money needed for financing the cure of her dying father.

name: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London
plot: With all-new gadgets, high-flying action, exciting chases and a wisecracking new handler, Derek (Anthony Anderson), Cody has to retrieve the device before the world's leaders fall under the evil control of a diabolical villain.

name: Rambling Rose
plot: A young woman who exudes sexuality battles temptation.

name: Naked Weapon
plot: Madame M, kidnaps forty pre-teen girls to train them as the most deadly assassins. CIA operative follows the case for 6 years with no leads, but when a series of assassinations begin to occur, he suspects that Madame M is back in business.

name: The Message
plot: The story of prophet "Muhammad" and the delivery of the message of God "Allah."

name: X-Ray
plot: While receiving a routine check-up, a woman finds herself stranded on the hospital's eighth floor, while someone dressed as a doctor is intent on her never leaving, even if it means killing any staff member who comes into contact with her.

name: Night of the Blood Monster
plot: Sir Christopher Lee plays the Lord Chief Justice of seventeenth century England who condemns women as witches to further his political and sexual needs.

name: Corrina, Corrina
plot: In 1959, a widower hires a kindly housekeeper/nanny to care for his seven-year-old daughter.

name: The Singing Detective
plot: From his hospital bed, a writer suffering from a skin disease hallucinates musical numbers and paranoid plots.

name: A New Leaf
plot: Henry Graham lives the life of a playboy. When his lawyer tells him one day that his lifestyle has consumed all his funds, he needs an idea to avoid climbing down the social ladder. So he intends to marry a rich woman and - murder her.

name: Sometimes a Great Notion
plot: A family of fiercely independent Oregon loggers struggle to keep the family business alive amidst changing times.

name: Shining Through
plot: An American woman of Irish and Jewish-German parentage goes undercover in Nazi Germany.

name: Goin' South
plot: Due to the lack of men after the Civil War, a small western town allows a bachelorette with ulterior motives to save a horse thief from the gallows by marrying him. They must deal with his old gang, the Sheriff, the bank, and each other.

name: White Sands
plot: A small southwestern town Sheriff finds a body in the desert with a suitcase and five hundred thousand dollars. He impersonates the man and stumbles into an F.B.I. investigation.

name: Love and Bullets
plot: Arizona cop is sent to Switzerland to bring in the girlfriend of a dangerous mobster so she can testify against him. The mobster sends someone too - assassins.

name: The Santa Clause 2
plot: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for eight years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

name: The Last Days of Disco
plot: Story of two female Manhattan book editors fresh out of college, both finding love and themselves while frequenting the local disco.

name: In Hell
plot: A man must survive a prison where hardened criminals battle to the death for the wardens' entertainment.

name: Transamerica
plot: A transgender woman takes an unexpected journey when she learns that she had a son, now a teenage runaway hustling on the streets of New York.

name: Brain Damage
plot: One morning, a young man wakes to find that a small, disgusting creature has attached itself to the base of his brain stem. The creature gives him a euphoric state of happiness but demands human victims in return.

name: The Loveless
plot: Trouble ensues when a motorcycle gang stops in a small southern town while heading to the races at Daytona.

name: Laurel Canyon
plot: When an uptight young man and his fiancée move into his libertine mother's house, the resulting clash of life attitudes shakes everyone up.

name: Looker
plot: Three of four models, who had plastic surgery done by Larry after a computed list, are dead. Neither the cops nor Larry believe they're suicides. Larry investigates and stays with the fourth model. Who's behind the lists and murders?

name: The Sleeping Dictionary
plot: A young Englishman is sent to Malaysian Borneo in the 1930s to stay with a tribe as UK's colonial representative. A local woman (J.Alba) helps him understand local tradition and language. He falls in love with her etc. despite the taboo.

name: Critters 2: The Main Course
plot: Eggs of the small but voracious alien creatures called Crites are left behind on earth and, after hatching, set their appetites on the small farm town of Grover's Bend.

name: The Spanish Apartment
plot: A strait-laced French student moves into an apartment in Barcelona with a cast of six other characters from all over Europe. Together, they speak the international language of love and friendship.

name: Barely Legal
plot: Three high school guys attempt to make a porno movie.

name: Lifeguard
plot: Rick, still in his 30's, works full-time as a lifeguard on the beaches of Los Angeles. When he meets his divorced high school girlfriend and her five-year-old son after fifteen years, he considers switching to a more "serious" job.

name: Where the Boys Are
plot: Four college coeds, travel to Fort Lauderdale for their Easter week of Spring Break, and become involved in a series of adventures and misadventures.

name: Massacre in Dinosaur Valley
plot: A small plane carrying fossil hunters crashes in the Amazon jungle, and the survivors must battle their way through cannibals, wild animals, and slave traders.

name: Prozac Nation
plot: A young woman struggles with depression during her first year at Harvard.

name: Monkey Shines
plot: A quadriplegic man has a trained monkey help him with his paralysis, until the little monkey begins to develop feelings, and rage, against its new master.

name: Extreme Prejudice
plot: A Texas Ranger and a ruthless narcotics kingpin - they were childhood friends, now they are adversaries...

name: Othello
plot: The Moorish General Othello is manipulated into thinking that his new wife Desdemona has been carrying on an affair with his Lieutenant Michael Cassio, when in reality, it is all part of the scheme of a bitter Ensign named Iago.

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Death & Rebirth
plot: A recap of the first 24 episodes of Neon Genesis Evangelion, followed by a 30-minute continuation of the plot that would later form the first third of The End of Evangelion.

name: The Life and Times of Judge Roy Bean
plot: In Vinegaroon, Texas, former outlaw Roy Bean appoints himself the judge for the region and dispenses his brand of justice as he sees fit.

name: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
plot: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.

name: The Power of One
plot: An English boy, living in Africa during World War II, through his boxing prowess, becomes a symbol of hope, in a time of war.

name: Invasion U.S.A.
plot: A one-man army comes to the rescue when the United States are invaded by communists.

name: The Replacement Killers
plot: A troubled hitman seeks aid from a forger to help him get papers to China. However, the drug lord has hired replacements to finish the job, and kill the hitman.

name: Fire Down Below
plot: A federal agent uncovers lucrative toxic waste dumps in Appalachia and must deal with the locals who want to keep their 'gold mine' secret.

name: An Unmarried Woman
plot: A wealthy woman from Manhattan's Upper East Side struggles to deal with her new identity and her sexuality after her husband of 16 years leaves her for a younger woman.

name: Invaders from Mars
plot: A boy tries to stop aliens who have taken over his town and are attempting to brainwash its inhabitants.

name: Bijitâ Q
plot: A troubled and perverted family find their lives intruded by a mysterious stranger who seems to help find a balance in their disturbing natures.

name: Space Truckers
plot: A space trucker and his cute fiancee are on their way from a space station to Earth with an unknown cargo. When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo.

name: BMX Bandits
plot: A trio of teen BMX enthusiasts become entangled with a group of bank robbers after discovering their cache of walkie-talkies.

name: Terror Train
plot: Three years after a prank went terribly awry, the six college students responsible are targeted by a masked killer at a New Year's Eve party aboard a moving train.

name: The Paper Chase
plot: A first-year law student at Harvard Law School struggles with balancing his coursework and a woman, unaware that she has a connection that affects their relationship.

name: The Accidental Tourist
plot: An emotionally distant writer of travel guides must carry on with his life after his son is killed and his marriage crumbles.

name: Every Time We Say Goodbye
plot: A Protestant World War II pilot and a Jewish girl fall in love in Jerusalem, even though their diverse backgrounds threaten to pull them apart.

name: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
plot: When adventurous pets Chance, Shadow, and Sassy are accidentally separated from their vacationing humans, they're left to fend for themselves on the mean streets of San Francisco, searching for the "golden bridge" that will take them home.

name: Once Upon a Forest
plot: A young mouse, mole and hedgehog risk their lives to find a cure for their badger friend, who's been poisoned by men.

name: Cool as Ice
plot: A rapper gets stuck in a small town and falls for a local girl whose family is in witness protection.

name: The Red Violin
plot: A red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

name: The Trench
plot: June 1916. The British Army is planning a big offensive in the Somme region in France. We follow a platoon of British soldiers as they sit in a forward trench, anxiously awaiting the order to go over the top.

name: The Tailor of Panama
plot: A tailor living in Panama reluctantly becomes a spy for a British Agent.

name: Sleepaway Camp III: Teenage Wasteland
plot: After murdering a young girl, Angela Baker assumes her identity and travels to Camp New Horizons, built on the grounds of the camp she terrorized the year before, and starts killing again.

name: The Great Raid
plot: Taking place towards the end of WWII, 500 American Soldiers have been entrapped in a camp for 3 years. Beginning to give up hope they will ever be rescued, a group of Rangers goes on a dangerous mission to try and save them.

name: Laser Mission
plot: Action superstar Brandon Lee portrays rebellious government agent Michael Gold who is sent on a desperate mission to a Soviet-controlled African nation in order to uncover a top-secret laser weapons operation and destroy it.

name: Mystery Train
plot: Three stories are connected by a Memphis hotel and the spirit of Elvis Presley.

name: Ride with the Devil
plot: During the American Civil War, two friends join the Bushwhackers, a militant group loyal to the Confederacy.

name: The Shout
plot: A traveller by the name of Crossley forces himself upon a musician and his wife in a lonely part of Devon, and uses the aboriginal magic he has learned to displace his host.

name: Soldier of Orange
plot: During World War II, Dutch students join the resistance movement against the German occupation of the Netherlands.

name: Beyond the Law
plot: An undercover cop joins a murderous, arms-dealing biker gang to try to put them behind bars.

name: Dangerous Game
plot: A New York City film director working on his latest movie in Los Angeles begins to reflect the actions in his movie and real life, especially when he begins an affair with the lead actress.

name: Atlantic City
plot: In a corrupt city, a small-time gangster and the estranged wife of a pot dealer find themselves thrown together in an escapade of love, money, drugs and danger.

name: Heart Like a Wheel
plot: Shirley Muldowney is determined to be a top-fuel drag racer, although no woman has ever raced them before. Despite the high risks of this kind of racing and the burden it places on her family life, she perseveres in her dream.

name: Confessions of a Window Cleaner
plot: An optimistic and inept window cleaner fully 'satisfies' his customers, bed hopping from one unsatisfied housewife to another, until he meets a successful female police officer, who will have none of his sexual advances.

name: The Pick-up Artist
plot: A womanizer meets his match when he falls for a woman in debt to the mafia.

name: A Love Story
plot: Two teenagers fall in love over the summer, in spite of cynical and disapproving adults who dismiss their relationship as being nothing but young love.

name: City Hunter
plot: A self-indulgent private investigator winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists, and scarce food.

name: Hoffa
plot: The story of the notorious American labor union figure Jimmy Hoffa, who organizes a bitter strike, makes deals with members of the organized crime syndicate and mysteriously disappears in 1975.

name: Foxes
plot: A group of four teenage girls come of age in the asphalt desert of Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley arranged with a blazing soundtrack and endless drinking, drugs and sex.

name: Sunday Bloody Sunday
plot: The emotional intricacies of a polyamorous relationship between young artist Bob and his two lovers: a lonely male doctor and a frustrated female office worker.

name: My Favorite Martian
plot: A Martian lands on Earth and makes friends with a reporter.

name: Sahara
plot: Intent on winning a competition in place of her distinguished late father, beautiful young heiress Dale takes on the guise of a man and competes in his spot, embarking on a car race that crosses the unforgiving Sahara desert.

name: Bloody Birthday
plot: Three children are born at the height of an eclipse of the sun. Ten years later, they begin to murder the people around them - even their family members.

name: Hollywood Homicide
plot: Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.

name: The Key
plot: 1940s Venice. After twenty years of marriage, a retired art critic and his younger wife feel their passion is waning. To help her shed her inhibitions and rekindle their relationship, the professor records his sexual fantasies in a diary.

name: Boys and Girls
plot: A friendship is put to the ultimate test when two best friends wind up in bed together.

name: The Salton Sea
plot: After a tragic incident, a man drifts into a world populated by thugs and speed junkies.

name: If Only
plot: It takes a tragedy to teach the young businessman Ian to put love ahead of work and open up to his musician girlfriend Samantha.

name: Death Wish 4: The Crackdown
plot: Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey takes on the members of a vicious Los Angeles drug cartel to stop the flow of drugs after his girlfriend's daughter dies from an overdose.

name: Vagabond
plot: A young woman's body is found frozen in a ditch. Through flashbacks and interviews, we see the events that led to her inevitable death.

name: Dolls
plot: A dysfunctional family of three stop by a mansion during a storm -- father, stepmother, and child. The child discovers that the elderly owners are magical toy makers and have a haunted collection of dolls.

name: Highway to Hell
plot: An eloping bride is taken into Hell, and her fiancé must pursue.

name: The Best Man
plot: Just before his best friend's wedding, the life of a Chicago writer becomes crazy when his best friend guesses that his new book's story is based on his bride's fervent past.

name: The Four Feathers
plot: A young British officer resigns his commission just before his regiment is sent to battle and soon receives four white feathers from his friends and fiancee as symbols of what they view as his cowardice.

name: Boat Trip
plot: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

name: A Soldier's Story
plot: An African-American officer investigates a murder in a racially charged situation in World War II.

name: Critters 3
plot: The tiny fur ball aliens that will eat anything or anyone set their sights on a Los Angeles apartment tower.

name: Project X
plot: An Air Force pilot joins a top secret military experiment involving chimps, but begins to suspect there might be something more to the mysterious "Project X".

name: Behind Convent Walls
plot: On the surface the women at the convent are your average nuns. However, what they get up to in their spare time is far from what you'd expect from nuns.

name: Beat Street
plot: An aspiring DJ from the South Bronx and his best friend, a promoter, try to get into show business by exposing people to hip-hop music and the local culture.

name: Up!
plot: It begins with the murder of one Adolf Schwartz--who bears a striking resemblance to another famous Adolf--via a ravenous piranha fish in his bathtub.

name: Proof of Life
plot: Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America.

name: Woodstock
plot: Oscar-winning musical chronicle that brilliantly captures the three-day rock concert and celebration of peace and love that became a capstone for the Sixties.

name: The Mother and the Whore
plot: The chauvinist Alexandre balances relationships with several women in the post-1968 intellectual scene of Paris.

name: One Night Stand
plot: Max/W.Snipes has a one night stand with Karen/N.Kinski in NYC. He returns to his wife, 2 kids and career in LA but is affected. A year later, Max and Karen meet again by chance, but this time they're with their spouses.

name: New York Stories
plot: A middle-aged artist obsessed with his pretty young assistant, a precocious 12-year-old living in a hotel, and a neurotic lawyer with a possessive mother make up three Gotham tales.

name: She's the One
plot: The love lives of two brothers, Mickey and Francis, interconnect as Francis cheats on his wife with Mickey's ex-girlfriend, while Mickey impulsively marries a stranger.

name: Saturday the 14th
plot: A family inherits an old mansion which houses the dangerous 'Book of Evil' that has all the monsters of the world trapped inside it.

name: The Rift
plot: Siren II, a submarine under the command of Capt. Phillips, ventures into the deep on a mission to recover the missing Siren I. Their quest is hindered when the submarine becomes entangled in a patch of toxic seaweed.

name: The Contender
plot: Senator Laine Hanson is a contender for U.S. Vice President, but information and disinformation about her past surfaces that threatens to derail her confirmation.

name: Evil Dead Trap
plot: A late night TV presenter receives a snuff tape, in which a woman is brutally killed. She decides to take a crew out to a location indicated in the tape, but only death and despair await them.

name: Robot Jox
plot: In the distant future, mankind has forsaken global wars for battles of single combat. The world has been divided into two opposing super powers, with each side represented by trained champions.

name: Gloria
plot: After serving three years in prison covering for her gangster boyfriend, Kevin, Gloria returns to New York City for the money she was promised. Inside Kevin's base of operations, she finds 7-year-old Nicky, whose family has been killed.

name: Boogeyman
plot: A young man tries to deal with the childhood terror that has never stopped haunting him.

name: Where Is the Friend's House?
plot: Eight-year-old Ahmed has mistakenly taken his friend Mohammad's notebook. He wants to return it, or else his friend will be expelled from school. The boy determinedly sets out to find Mohammad's home in the neighbouring village.

name: The Scent of Green Papaya
plot: A Vietnamese servant girl, Mui, observes lives within two different Saigon families: the first, a woman textile seller with three boys and a frequently absent husband; the second, a handsome young pianist with his fiancée.

name: Six Pack
plot: A race car driver is driving to a race in a motor home with his race car on a trailer. His car gets stripped of parts. He ends up with 6 orphan kids on his way to the race.

name: The War
plot: A Vietnam veteran helps his kids battle over a tree house while recovering from his traumatic war experience.

name: Honeymoon in Vegas
plot: Jack loses $65,000 in poker in Las Vegas, where he's marrying Betsy. The wedding will have to wait as the poker winner wants the weekend with Betsy to cancel the debt. She accepts. Whom will she marry?

name: Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood
plot: After years of mother-daughter tension, Siddalee receives a scrapbook detailing the wild adventures of the "Ya-Yas", her mother's girlhood friends.

name: Dark Blue
plot: A robbery homicide investigation triggers a series of events that will cause a corrupt LAPD officer to question his tactics.

name: Masquerade
plot: A recently orphaned heiress meets a young racing yacht captain in the Long Island Hamptons. He shows interest in her, but love may not be the reason.

name: Suicide Club
plot: A detective is trying to find the cause of a string of suicides.

name: State and Main
plot: A movie crew invades a small town whose residents are all too ready to give up their values for showbiz glitz.

name: To Live
plot: After Fugui and Jiazhen lose their personal fortunes, they raise a family and survive difficult cultural changes during 1940s to 1970s China.

name: Class of Nuke 'Em High
plot: The pupils at a high school next to a nuclear power plant start acting and looking strange after buying contaminated drugs from a plant worker.

name: The Fourth Protocol
plot: John Preston is a British Agent with the task of preventing the Russians detonating a nuclear explosion next to an American base in the UK. The Russians are hoping this will shatter the "special relationship" between the two countries.

name: Lipstick
plot: A top fashion model seeks justice after she is brutally raped by her teenage sister's music teacher.

name: Battle in Heaven
plot: Marcos lusts after his boss's promiscuous daughter, but after botching an extortion scheme, he becomes wracked with guilt.

name: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes!
plot: A group of scientists band together to save the world from mutated killer tomatoes.

name: Family Plot
plot: A phony psychic/con artist and her taxi driver/actor boyfriend encounter a pair of serial kidnappers while trailing a missing heir in California.

name: Casual Sex?
plot: With high hopes on their quest to track down the perfect man, two young women take a vacation at a plush health resort. Unfortunately, the men they encounter seem to wilt at the thought of anything more than casual sex.

name: Tempest
plot: John Cassavetes gives a compelling performance as a man confronting a mid-life crisis with extraordinary results for everyone around him.

name: The Heroic Trio
plot: While one tough woman with an invisible robe has stolen 18 babies for her powerful master, two other tough women and the cops try to stop her.

name: Mi vida loca
plot: Mousie and Sad Girl are childhood best friends in a contemporary Los Angeles poor Hispanic neighborhood. But when Sad Girl becomes pregnant by Mousie's boyfriend, a drug dealer named Ernesto, the two become bitter enemies. While their dispute escalates towards violence, the violence of the world around them soon also impacts their lives.

name: The Arena
plot: When the Romans force a group of sex slaves to become gladiatrices, two such fighters - a Nubian dancer and a Gaulish priestess - form an alliance to lead the others in rebellion.

name: Slugs
plot: Killer slugs on the rampage in a rural community.

name: Dead Men Don't Wear Plaid
plot: Film noir parody with a detective uncovering a sinister plot. Characters from classic noir films appear as scenes from various movies interjected into the story.

name: O Fantasma
plot: Young and handsome Sergio works the night shift as a trash collector in Lisbon, Portugal. He can't force himself to connect with his pretty female co-worker Fatima, who displays an avid interest in him, so instead Sergio roams the city with the trash company's pet dog. Eventually Sergio becomes fascinated with a sleek motorcycle, and then also its owner, João - a young man totally indifferent to Sergio. The frustrated trash collector's surfacing sexual desires unleash his darkest impulses, sending him down a dangerous path of violence, depravity and degradation.

name: Mrs. Brown
plot: When Queen Victoria's husband Prince Albert dies, she finds solace in her trusted servant, Mr. John Brown, but their relationship also brings scandal and turmoil.

name: Who's Harry Crumb?
plot: Harry Crumb is a bumbling and inept private investigator who is hired to solve the kidnapping of a young heiress which he's not expected to solve because his employer is the mastermind behind the kidnapping.

name: Eat Drink Man Woman
plot: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

name: The Hourglass Sanatorium
plot: Józef visits his dying father at a remote mental institution, where time itself doesn't seem to exist, and the line between dreams and memories becomes indistinguishable.

name: The Crazies
plot: The military attempts to contain a manmade combat virus that causes death and permanent insanity in those infected, as it overtakes a small Pennsylvania town.

name: Ninja III: The Domination
plot: An evil ninja attempts to avenge his death from beyond the grave, by possessing an innocent woman's body.

name: The Rookie
plot: A veteran detective is assigned a rookie partner after his previous partner is killed by a car theft gang. He is determined to apprehend those responsible for his friend's death but his new partner isn't really up to the task.

name: Black Beauty
plot: The fates of horses, and the people who own and command them, are revealed as Black Beauty narrates the circle of his life.

name: Sommersby
plot: A farmer returns home from the Civil War, but his wife begins to suspect that the man is an impostor.

name: Millennium
plot: An NTSB investigator seeking the cause of an airline disaster meets a warrior woman from 1000 years in the future.

name: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex * But Were Afraid to Ask
plot: Seven stories are trying to answer the question: what is sex? Or maybe they are not trying.

name: Canadian Bacon
plot: The U.S. President, low in the opinion polls, gets talked into raising his popularity by trying to start a cold war against Canada.

name: No Blade of Grass
plot: An environmental catastrophe destroys civilization. Led by father John and mother Ann, the Custance clan sets out on a quest for safety in a savage world that may just end up turning them into the very thing they are fleeing.

name: Shock Treatment
plot: Janet and Brad become contestants on a game show and wind up as captives.

name: Bad Timing: A Sensual Obsession
plot: A psychiatrist, living in Vienna, enters a torrid relationship with a married woman. When she ends up in the hospital from an overdose, an inspector becomes set on discovering the demise of their affair.

name: Nine Months
plot: When he finds out his longtime girlfriend is pregnant, a commitment-phobe realizes he might have to change his lifestyle for better or much, much worse.

name: Godzilla vs. Megalon
plot: An inventor creates a humanoid robot named Jet Jaguar that is seized by the undersea nation of Seatopia. Using Jet Jaguar as a guide, the Seatopians send Megalon as vengeance for the nuclear tests that have devastated their society.

name: Weekend at Bernie's II
plot: Larry and Richard use a voodoo-revived corpse to track down hidden money to clear their names.

name: 8 Women
plot: A man is murdered in an isolated chalet, and the eight female residents are all suspects; their secrets are revealed as they try to determine who is guilty.

name: Lady Jane
plot: The story of Lady Jane Grey, who was Queen of England for only nine days.

name: Smokey and the Bandit II
plot: The Bandit goes on another cross-country run, transporting an elephant from Florida to Texas. And, once again, Sheriff Buford T. Justice is on his tail.

name: Look Who's Talking Now
plot: The dogs can talk at a family of 4, where mom loses her job the same day dad gets a job as pilot for a cute, single boss.

name: Half Past Dead
plot: A man goes undercover in a hi-tech prison to find information to help prosecute those who killed his wife. While there he stumbles onto a plot involving a death-row inmate and his $200 million stash of gold.

name: Welcome to Collinwood
plot: Cosimo gets a plan for a huge job from his cellmate. He asks his woman to find a patsy for his bungled car theft, offering $15,000. Suddenly, 7 are involved.

name: House Arrest
plot: Desperate to keep their various parents from getting divorced, a group of teenagers kidnaps them and holds them prisoner in a basement to force them to reconcile.

name: Crocodile Dundee in Los Angeles
plot: Australian Outback adventurer Mick "Crocodile" Dundee travels to Los Angeles with his young son while his longtime companion suspects foul play at a movie studio.

name: Mafia!
plot: Takeoff on the Godfather with the son of a mafia king taking over for his dying father

name: Beowulf & Grendel
plot: In Denmark, during the 6th century, Danish king Hrothgar and his warriors kill a troll whose son, Grendel, vows revenge.

name: Iron Will
plot: A brave young man is thrust into adulthood as he and his courageous team of sled dogs embark on a grueling and treacherous cross-country marathon.

name: The Dentist
plot: An extremely successful dentist goes off the deep end after he catches his wife cheating on him.

name: Cube Zero
plot: A young programmer whose job is to watch over the reality-warping Cube defies orders to rescue an innocent mother trapped in one of its rooms.

name: Flickering Lights
plot: A gang of 4 Danish criminals are ordered by Færingen to steal a bag from a safe. When they see DKK4,000,000 in the bag, they keep it for themselves and head for Spain. They end up in a ruin of an old restaurant on Jutland and renovate it.

name: The Astronaut's Wife
plot: After an explosion in space and subsequent two-minute radio-out period, two astronauts return home to their wives. Slightly it's revealed that they're not the same as they were.

name: Diabolique
plot: The wife and mistress of the sadistic dean of an exclusive prep school conspire to murder him.

name: Prophecy
plot: A government health inspector is dispatched to assess the damage a logging company is causing to a patch of forest claimed by Native Americans, and comes face to face with true terror wreaking havoc in the woods.

name: Mad Love
plot: The wild and sexy story of two passionate young people who take to the road for the incredible adventure of their lives.

name: Stealing Home
plot: Ex-baseball player Billy comes home to receive his childhood darling's ashes.

name: Knightriders
plot: A medieval reenactment troupe struggles to maintain its family-like dynamic amid pressure from local authorities, interest from talent agents, and their "King's" delusions of grandeur.

name: Keeping Mum
plot: A pastor preoccupied with writing the perfect sermon fails to realize that his wife is having an affair, and his children are up to no good.

name: Going Places
plot: Two thugs harass assault, steal, murder, Marie-Ange, a jaded, passive hairdresser, joins them as lover, cook, and mother confessor, on her own search for seemingly unattainable sexual pleasure.

name: Picture Perfect
plot: A young advertising executive's life becomes increasingly complicated when, in order to impress her boss, she pretends to be engaged to a man she has just met.

name: The Abominable Dr. Phibes
plot: Doctor, scientist, organist, and biblical scholar Anton Phibes seeks revenge on the nine doctors he considers responsible for the death of his wife.

name: The Meteor Man
plot: A high school teacher from a troubled inner city Washington D.C. neighborhood becomes a super-powered hero and takes on the gang that has been terrorizing his streets.

name: 3 Ninjas Kick Back
plot: Young martial artists face their grandfather's foes when they accompany him to Japan to deliver a priceless dagger.

name: The Seventh Continent
plot: A European family who plan on escaping to Australia seem caught up in their daily routine, only troubled by minor incidents. However, behind their apparent calm and repetitive existence, they are actually planning something sinister.

name: Fit to Kill
plot: In this follow up to Hard Hunted (1992), international arms dealer Kane seeks a Russian imperial diamond which was stolen by a Nazi officer from a Leningrad museum during WWII.

name: Radio Days
plot: A nostalgic look at radio's golden age focusing on one ordinary family and the various performers in the medium.

name: 52 Pick-Up
plot: A secret fling between a man and his mistress leads to blackmail and murder.

name: Indochine
plot: Eliane adopts Camille, whose Vietnamese parents were friends. In 1930, a French navy officer is interested in Eliane (owns 60km2 plantation) and later in Camille. There's an uprising in Vietnam against French colonial power.

name: To the Devil a Daughter
plot: An American occult novelist battles to save the soul of a young girl from a group of Satanists, led by an excommunicated priest, who plan on using her as the representative of the Devil on Earth.

name: Martin
plot: A young man, who believes himself to be a vampire, goes to live with his elderly and hostile cousin in a Pennsylvania small town where he tries to redeem his blood-craving urges.

name: One Piece: The Movie
plot: There once was a pirate known as the Great Gold Pirate Woonan, who obtained almost 1/3 of the world's gold. Over the course of a few years, the pirate's existence faded, and a legend grew that he disappeared with his gold to a remote island, an island pirates continue to search for. Aboard the Going Merry, Luffy and his crew, starved and reckless, are robbed of their treasure. In an attempt to get it back, they wreck the getaway ship, guided by a young boy named Tabio, who's a captured part of El Drago's pirate crew. El Drago's love for gold has driven him to look for Woonan's island, and thanks to Woonan's treasure map, he finds it. During this time, Luffy's crew have been split up, and despite their own circumstances, they must find a way to stop El Drago from obtaining Woonan's gold.

name: American Flyers
plot: Marcus takes his kid brother, David, with him for a physical test and a brain scan, suspecting cerebral aneurysm like their dad died of. They head off on bikes for the big Rockies bike race with Marcus' Sarah driving the van.

name: Death Wish: The Face of Death
plot: Paul Kersey is back at working vigilante justice when his fiancée, Olivia, has her business threatened by mobsters.

name: The Green Butchers
plot: Two Danish friends are tired of their employer and open their own butcher shop. An electrician accidentally dies in the freezer and he's sold as marinated chicken and business picks up. What happens when they run out of "chicken"?

name: The Big Sleep
plot: Grizzled American private detective in England investigates a complicated case of blackmail turned murder involving a rich but honest elderly general, his two loose socialite daughters, a pornographer and a gangster.

name: Fear City
plot: Strippers in Manhattan are being stalked and maimed by a psycho-killer. A conflicted ex-boxer-turned-talent-manager and his business partner and friend, who represent some of the girls, set out to find him before he strikes again.

name: Creature
plot: After a member of a geological research team who was sent to Saturn's largest moon: Titan crashes their spacecraft into a space station, another team is sent to Titan to investigate, not knowing the terror that awaits them.

name: Lust for a Vampire
plot: In 1830, forty years to the day since the last manifestation of their dreaded vampirism, the Karnstein heirs use the blood of an innocent to bring forth the evil that is the beautiful Mircalla - or as she was in 1710, Carmilla.

name: Asylum
plot: A woman becomes very curious about one of her psychiatrist husband's inmates, a man who was found guilty of the murder and disfigurement of his former wife.

name: Gone in 60 Seconds
plot: When a South American drug lord pays Pace to steal 48 cars for him, all but one is in the bag - thereby, the police precipitate in a desperate car chase against Pace and his Eleanor across Southern California.

name: Made
plot: Two aspiring boxers, life-long friends, get involved in a money-laundering scheme through a low-level organized crime group.

name: Vice Squad
plot: A single mother prostitute, who goes by the name Princess, finds herself forced to work undercover for the police in order to apprehend a homicidal, misogynistic pimp named Ramrod, who will do anything not to get arrested.

name: Torso
plot: A string of appalling lust murders shocks the University of Perugia as a sadistic serial killer strangles to death beautiful college girls with a red and black scarf.

name: Tales from the Crypt
plot: Five strangers get lost in a crypt and, after meeting the mysterious Crypt Keeper, receive visions of how they will die.

name: Tightrope
plot: New Orleans single dad and cop Wes Block goes after a serial rapist-killer, but when he gets too close the hunter suddenly becomes the hunted.

name: Bamboozled
plot: A frustrated African-American TV writer proposes a blackface minstrel show in protest, but to his chagrin, it becomes a hit.

name: White Man's Burden
plot: In an alternative America where African-Americans and White Americans have reversed cultural roles, a white factory worker kidnaps a black factory owner for dismissing him over perceived disdain.

name: Me and You and Everyone We Know
plot: A lonely shoe salesman and an eccentric performance artist struggle to connect in this unique take on contemporary life.

name: Tideland
plot: Because of the actions of her irresponsible parents, a young girl is left alone on a decrepit country estate and survives inside her fantastic imagination.

name: Death Hunt
plot: In 1931 Canada, Yukon trapper Johnson has a feud with a dog owner who later retaliates by publicly accusing Johnson of murder and thus triggering a police manhunt in the wilderness.

name: The Million Dollar Hotel
plot: Tragi-comic, romantic whodunnit set in a run down hotel which plays host to mentally ill people too poor to afford medical insurance.

name: The Phantom of the Opera
plot: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a horribly disfigured composer, who has plans for those who oppose him or the young singer.

name: Gymkata
plot: An American gymnast travels to a foreign country to compete in a deadly game not won by anyone other than a native in more than 900 years.

name: The Bride
plot: After years of research, the doctor finally succeeds in creating the perfect woman, who gets the name "Eva".

name: The Innocent
plot: A British telecommunication expert comes to 1950s Berlin to help the Americans spy on the USSR. He meets a cute, mysterious local woman.

name: Must Love Dogs
plot: A thirty-something preschool teacher looks to the personals for a change of pace and a relationship, with hilarious results.

name: The Toolbox Murders
plot: A ski-masked maniac kills apartment complex tenants with the contents of a toolbox.

name: The Swinging Cheerleaders
plot: A college journalist infiltrates the campus' cheerleading squad to write an piece on female exploitation, but instead makes unlikely friendships and uncovers a conspiracy involving the football team's coach.

name: My Father and My Son
plot: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

name: Popcorn
plot: A master of disguise deranged killer begins killing off the college students who are organizing a horror-movie marathon in an abandoned theater.

name: Revenge of the Ninja
plot: After ninjas killed his family, Cho and his son Kane come to America to start a new life. He opens a doll shop but is unwittingly importing heroin in the dolls. When his friend betrays him, Cho must prepare for the ultimate battle.

name: Educating Rita
plot: An alcoholic professor has been hired by a working-class girl for higher education.

name: Mrs. Henderson Presents
plot: Laura Henderson (Dame Judi Dench) buys an old London theater and opens it up as the Windmill, a performance hall which goes down in history for, amongst other things, its all-nude revues.

name: The Last of Sheila
plot: A year after Sheila is killed by a hit-and-run driver, her wealthy husband invites a group of friends to spend a week on his yacht playing a scavenger hunt mystery game. The game turns out to be all too real and all too deadly.

name: Last Days
plot: A Seattle musician's life and career are reminiscent of those of Kurt Cobain.

name: The Quiet Earth
plot: A scientist awakens to find himself alone in the world. In a desperate attempt to search for others, he finds only two who have their own agenda.

name: Fellini's Casanova
plot: Giacomo Casanova uses his sexuality to find his place in life amid eccentric and strange characters.

name: Dracula A.D. 1972
plot: In 1972 London - a century after his final battle with Professor Van Helsing - Count Dracula is resurrected by occultist Johnny Alucard, and goes after his archenemy's descendants.

name: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
plot: The story of a hooded, berserk killer who terrorized the border town of Texarkana, Arkansas in 1946--leaving no fewer than five murder victims in his wake. He was never caught. Based on one of America's most baffling murder cases.

name: For Keeps?
plot: After she gets pregnant, a teenage girl must decide whether she should keep the baby or not.

name: Out of the Blue
plot: A young girl whose father is an ex-convict and whose mother is a junkie finds it difficult to conform and tries to find comfort in a quirky combination of Elvis and the punk scene.

name: Cherry Falls
plot: In the small town of Cherry Falls, a psychotic murderer is killing off the virgins of the local high school.

name: Everything Is Illuminated
plot: A young Jewish American man, with the help of an eccentric local, endeavors to find the woman who saved his grandfather during World War II in a Ukrainian village that was ultimately razed by the Nazis.

name: The Visitors
plot: A medieval knight and his servant ask a familiar wizard to move them back in time to prevent father-in-law's accidentally killing. Instead, they fly away to the 20th century.

name: Pecker
plot: A talented young photographer, who enjoys snapping photos of his satirical, perverted Baltimore neighborhood and his wacky family, gets dragged into a world of pretentious artists from New York City and finds newfound fame.

name: Murmur of the Heart
plot: As France is nearing the end of the first Indochina War, an open-minded teenage boy finds himself torn between a rebellious urge to discover love, and the ever-present, almost dominating affection of his beloved mother.

name: Brain Donors
plot: Three manic idiots; a lawyer, cab driver and a handyman team up to run a ballet company to fulfill the will of a millionaire. Stooge-like antics result as the trio try to outwit the rich widow.

name: The Whole Wide World
plot: In 1933 Texas, a schoolteacher and aspiring writer meets a pulp fiction writer, and a relationship soon develops between the two, but it is doomed by his slavishly devotion to his ailing mother and insistence on his freedom.

name: Alice in the Cities
plot: A German journalist is saddled with a nine-year-old girl after encountering her mother at a New York airport.

name: Fat City
plot: Two men, working as professional boxers, come to blows when their careers each begin to take different directions.

name: Look Who's Talking Too
plot: This time, a new baby is on the way, and it's a girl. Wrapped together with the standard conflict between mother and father, Mikey engages in a bit of sibling rivalry with his new sister.

name: Truly Madly Deeply
plot: A woman dealing with inconsolable grief over the death of her partner gets another chance when he returns to earth as a ghost.

name: The Little Prince
plot: A pilot, stranded in the desert, meets a little boy who is a prince on a planet.

name: Mr. Nice Guy
plot: A Chinese chef accidentally gets involved with a news reporter who filmed a drug bust that went awry, and is now being chased by gangs who are trying to get the video tape.

name: Cecil B. Demented
plot: An insane independent film director and his renegade group of teenage filmmakers kidnap an A-list Hollywood actress and force her to star in their underground film.

name: Caravaggio
plot: A retelling of the life of the celebrated 17th-century painter through his brilliant, nearly blasphemous paintings and his flirtations with the underworld.

name: Flipper
plot: A teenage boy sent to spend the summer with his eccentric uncle on the Florida coast befriends a remarkable dolphin and takes on local bad guys who are polluting the water.

name: The Beach Girls
plot: Two young women convince their reluctant friend to open up her rich uncle's beach house for the summer to party, and invite all their friends.

name: The White Countess
plot: In 1930s Shanghai, a blind American diplomat develops a curious relationship with a young Russian refugee who works odd--and sometimes illicit--jobs to support members of her dead husband's aristocratic family.

name: Fahrenheit 9/11
plot: Michael Moore's view on what happened to the United States after September 11 and how the Bush Administration allegedly used the tragic event to push forward its agenda for unjust wars in Afghanistan and Iraq.

name: The Indian Runner
plot: A Vietnam vet comes home to his small town and finds himself in conflict with rules that his brother has vowed to uphold.

name: The Shipping News
plot: An emotionally beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.

name: Little Manhattan
plot: A 10-year-old boy and an 11-year-old girl find love in New York City.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Broly - The Legendary Super Saiyan
plot: Goku, Vegeta, and the rest of the Dragon Team search for the fabled Legendary Super Saiyan, a destructive, all-powerful warrior.

name: Angus
plot: A miserable fat teenager secretly has a crush on the class beauty, ends up becoming the surprising participant to dance with her at a high school dance, meaning he's got to get his act together with the help of his best friend.

name: The Pirate Movie
plot: A 1980s take-off of The Pirates of Penzance which centers on a noble pirate who leaves his profession and falls in love with a fiery young maiden.

name: Wuthering Heights
plot: A man becomes obsessed with vengeance when his soul mate marries another man.

name: The Gumball Rally
plot: An eclectic group of people takes part in a secret, and illegal, cross country road race.

name: Last Exit to Brooklyn
plot: Set in Brooklyn during the 1950s against a backdrop of union corruption and violence. A prostitute falls in love with one of her customers. Also a disturbed man discovers that he is homosexual.

name: The Rapture
plot: A telephone operator living an empty, amoral life finds God and loses him again.

name: Universal Soldier: The Return
plot: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

name: Two If by Sea
plot: A couple steals a Matisse painting on contract, and manage to evade the police. The sale takes place four days later on an island, but things don't go as planned.

name: Heartburn
plot: She's a magazine writer who gives up her career for love and family. He's a playboy newspaper columnist who can't quite give up his old tricks. And if that combination doesn't give a relationship Heartburn, nothing will.

name: Trick or Treat
plot: A bullied teenage boy is devastated after the death of his heavy metal idol, Sammi Curr. But as Halloween night approaches, he discovers that he may be the only one who can stop Sammi from making a Satanic comeback from beyond the grave.

name: The Pornographer
plot: Jacques Laurent made pornographic films in the 1970s and '80s, but had put that aside for 20 years. His artistic ideas, born of the '60s counter-culture, had elevated the entire genre.

name: In Dreams
plot: A suburban housewife learns that she has a dreamworld connection to a serial murderer, and must stop him from killing again.

name: Empire of the Ants
plot: Con artist Marilyn Fryser tries to sell bogus real estate deals in an area overrun by giant ants.

name: House on the Edge of the Park
plot: Two low-life punks invite themselves to a party at a posh villa and after being taunted by their snobbish hosts, hold everyone hostage and subject them to various forms of torture and mayhem.

name: Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow
plot: Naruto and his team are hired to protect a young actress from three rogue warriors in the Land of the Snow.

name: Blacula
plot: An 18th-century African prince, turned into a vampire by Dracula, finds himself in modern-day Los Angeles.

name: Senseless
plot: A student gets his senses enhanced by an experimental drug. But abuse is not an option.

name: Flawless
plot: An ultraconservative security guard suffers a debilitating stroke and is assigned to a rehabilitative program that includes singing lessons with the drag queen next door.

name: The Apple
plot: In 1994, a young couple enters the world of the music industry, and subsequently the world of drugs.

name: Oliver's Story
plot: In this sequel to Love Story (1970), grieving Oliver is being pressured by his in-laws to move on and take part in the family business. He meets a pretty heiress and they start dating, but memories of Jennie come rushing back.

name: Cooley High
plot: In 1964 on Chicago's Near-North Side, the lives of four carefree high school seniors and best friends, including an aspiring playwright and an all-city basketball champion, takes a tragic turn.

name: Nick of Time
plot: An unimpressive, everyday man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.

name: Dead Space
plot: A deadly virus attacks the crew of a Saturn space station.

name: Renegade
plot: In 1870, after a brutal run-in with an outlaw in a brothel, Mike Blueberry becomes marshal in Arizona where he keeps the peace between whites and Apaches, but an influx of gold-hunters threatens to lead to violence.

name: Megaforce
plot: Story about a rapid deployment defense unit that is called into action whenever freedom is threatened.

name: The Country Bears
plot: Beary Barrington goes on an adventure to save Country Bear Hall by getting the Country Bears back together for a reunion concert.

name: Hush
plot: Newlyweds move to the family thoroughbred horse ranch, where the husband's obsessive mother resolves to get rid of her new daughter-in-law.

name: Inferno
plot: A man (JCVD) drives out in the desert where some men steal his motorcycle and leave him for dead. He survives and no longer thinks of suicide as he now has a purpose in life: revenge and getting his bike back.

name: Falling in Love
plot: Although they live married lives, two strangers keep running into each other, starting a friendship that could blossom into so much more.

name: Ernest Scared Stupid
plot: Ernest accidentally unleashes an ugly troll that plots to transform children into wooden dolls in the town of Briarville, Missouri.

name: Twister
plot: Delusional and spoiled Maureen and her eccentric brother Howdy decide to track down and meet their estranged mother, all while the drama of dysfunctional relationships, disastrous weather conditions and a dark family secret ensue.

name: The Muppet Christmas Carol
plot: The Muppets present their own touching rendition of Charles Dickens' classic tale.

name: The Banger Sisters
plot: Lavinia and Suzette, former rock groupies and best friends, reconnect after twenty years; one is still as wild as ever, while the other has adopted a more conservative lifestyle.

name: TerrorVision
plot: "TerrorVision" is a 1986 horror / science fiction movie; telling the tale of when a family's new satellite television system starts receiving signals from another planet, and soon it becomes the passageway to an alien world.

name: Cats Don't Dance
plot: Danny, an ambitious singing and dancing cat, goes to Hollywood and overcomes several obstacles to fulfill his dream of becoming a movie star.

name: Happy End
plot: When a wife becomes the breadwinner of her family after her husband loses his job, adultery becomes part of her life.

name: The Children
plot: A nuclear-plant leak turns a bus-load of children into murderous atomic zombies with black fingernails.

name: Narrow Margin
plot: A Los Angeles Deputy District Attorney is sent to protect a woman who accidentally witnessed a Mafia murder.

name: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers
plot: One year after the events of Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988), the Shape returns to Haddonfield once again in an attempt to kill his now-mute niece.

name: The Swarm
plot: A huge swarm of deadly African bees spreads terror over American cities by killing thousands of people.

name: Night of the Demons 2
plot: High school students throw a Halloween party in a mansion haunted by a young demon.

name: Down in the Valley
plot: Set in the present-day San Fernando Valley, the project revolves around a delusional man who believes he's a cowboy and the relationship that he starts with a rebellious young woman.

name: Tom Sawyer
plot: Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn investigate a suspicious graveyard murder and more in this musical version of Mark Twain's novel.

name: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla
plot: An Okinawan prophecy appears to foretell Earth's destruction at the hands of Godzilla, only for the true Godzilla to reveal his doppelganger as a mechanical alien weapon.

name: Rawhead Rex
plot: An ancient creature called Rawhead is awakened from its slumber near an Irish village and goes on a rampage killing anyone in sight.

name: Firstborn
plot: A teenager must protect his family when his mother's sinister new boyfriend begins exerting his authority in their home.

name: Real Women Have Curves
plot: In East Los Angeles, an 18-year-old struggles between her ambitions of going to college and the desires of her domineering mother for her to get married, have children, and oversee the small, rundown family-owned textile factory.

name: Biloxi Blues
plot: A group of young recruits go through boot camp during the Second World War in Biloxi, Mississippi. From the play by Neil Simon.

name: Heavy
plot: The life of an overweight, unhappy cook is changed after a kind, beautiful college drop-out comes to work as a waitress at his and his mother's road-side restaurant.

name: Prison Heat
plot: Four American babes on vacation in the Middle East run into trouble when they are imprisoned by corrupt army officials.

name: Hanky Panky
plot: Completely innocent man, Michael Jordon, is drawn into a web of government secrets when a girl carrying a mysterious package gets into a taxi with him. When she's later murdered, Michael becomes the chief suspect and goes on the run.

name: Silent Rage
plot: A sheriff tries to stop the killing spree of a silent maniacal murderer who, as the result of secret genetic experimentation by an unethical scientist, has the ability to self-heal.

name: Scars of Dracula
plot: A young man is murdered while spending the night at Count Dracula's castle, prompting his brother to come to the small town where all the traces end to look for him.

name: Confessions of a Driving Instructor
plot: The sexual misadventures of Timothy Lea and his brother-in-law Sidney Noggett when they set up a driving school business.

name: The Bedroom Window
plot: A young executive starts an affair with his boss's wife which then escalates into a nightmare after he lies to the police in order to protect her.

name: White Noise
plot: An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.

name: Hideaway
plot: Hatch gets a special resuscitative medicine after "dying" in a car accident. His wife and daughter only get minor injuries. He gets strange nightmares such as killing a teen girl. Is it just dreams?

name: Don't Torture a Duckling
plot: When a southern Italian town is rocked by a string of child murders, the police and two urban outcasts search for the culprit amid scapegoating within the superstitious community.

name: The Final Terror
plot: A group of rangers go camping on unfamiliar forest grounds. All's well until the group members start getting killed by a cunning killer in the woods.

name: The Wash
plot: Life at the car wash is a place in Los Angeles, California where anything can and does happen to two friends Sean & Dee Loc (Dr. Dre and Snoop Dogg) trying to earn money to pay their rent.

name: Mr. Magoo
plot: The myopic millionaire defeats jewel smugglers in his usual bumbling manner.

name: No Mercy
plot: A Chicago detective, seeking to avenge his partner's death, travels to New Orleans, where he unexpectedly becomes involved in a cat and mouse game of survival.

name: Great Balls of Fire!
plot: The life and career of wildly controversial rock 'n' roll star Jerry Lee Lewis.

name: Keeping the Faith
plot: Two friends, a priest and a rabbi, fall in love with the same woman they knew in their youth, but the religious position of both men denies them romance.

name: Caged Heat
plot: In a women's prison, a group of inmates band together to combat the repressive and abusive policies of the crippled female warden and the corrupt prison doctor.

name: Knockin' on Heaven's Door
