plot: Two New York City cops go after amateur crooks who are trying to rip off the Mafia and start a gang war.

name: The Baby of Mâcon
plot: Plagued with infertility, the inhabitants of Mâcon are naturally involved in the spectacle that is a masque about the miracle child born to a virgin mother.

name: Five Corners
plot: A psychotic young man returns to his old neighborhood after release from prison. He seeks out the woman he previously tried to rape and the man who protected her, with twisted ideas of love for her and hate for him.

name: Little Fauss and Big Halsy
plot: The friendship between two Arizona dirt bike racers is tested when they both lust for an attractive runaway young woman who joins them on the racing circuit.

name: Showtime
plot: A spoof of buddy cop movies where two very different cops are forced to team up on a new reality based television cop show, while tracking down the manufacturer and distributor of an illegally made semi-automatic firearm.

name: Tales of Ordinary Madness
plot: Poet/lecturer Charles Serking awakens from his alcoholic haze long enough to take a bus back to L.A. and plunge into an orgy of drink and sexual depravity.

name: Johnson Family Vacation
plot: Buckle up for the wildest road trip of the year. A comedy adventure about a misfit family trying to survive outrageous obstacles (including one another) on a cross-country trek to their annual family reunion.

name: Curtains
plot: Six young actresses auditioning for a movie role at a remote mansion are targeted by a mysterious masked murderer.

name: Enchanted April
plot: Four English women, after World War I, who are unhappy with their lives, and their time away on vacation in a beautiful Italian villa.

name: As Tears Go By
plot: Mid-level gangster Wah falls in love with his beautiful cousin, but must also continue to protect his volatile partner-in-crime and friend, Fly.

name: Permanent Midnight
plot: A comedy writer struggles to overcome his addiction to heroin while putting his professional and personal life in danger.

name: Ladies in Lavender
plot: Two sisters befriend a mysterious foreigner who washes up on the beach of their 1930s Cornish seaside village.

name: I, You, He, She
plot: 'Je' is a girl voluntarily lock up in a room. 'Tu' is the script. 'Il' is a lorry driver. 'Elle' is the girlfriend.

name: Spetters
plot: Several Dutch teenagers realize the cruel difference between dreams and reality.

name: Thunderheart
plot: A young mixed-blood FBI agent is assigned to work with a cynical veteran investigator on a murder on a poverty-stricken Sioux reservation.

name: Lisa and the Devil
plot: A tourist spends the night in a derelict Spanish villa seemingly held in the supernatural grip of an eccentric butler, who resembles a depiction of the Devil she had seen on an old fresco.

name: Zero Day
plot: Two troubled adolescents chronicle the events that ultimately lead up to a terrifying assault on their school.

name: Return to Paradise
plot: Two friends must choose whether to help a third friend who was arrested in Malaysia for drug possession.

name: Mother's Day
plot: Two brothers kidnap and brutalize three women for the pleasure of their demented mother.

name: A Home of Our Own
plot: An overwhelmed but persevering mother relocates her many children to a safe but extremely humble home that will hopefully eventually provide them with a better life

name: Kal Ho Naa Ho
plot: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.

name: Sound of the Sea
plot: A new literature teacher, Ulises, comes to a small town near the sea and falls in love with a young woman, Martina. This woman is loved by a rich businessman named Alberto but chooses Ulises. Soon after their marriage and the birth of their son, Ulises vanishes while fishing at sea. In the meanwhile Martina marries Alberto, but all is not what it seems...

name: Prehysteria!
plot: A young boy and his family embark on a series of adventures when the boy finds some mysterious eggs which hatch to reveal a brood of baby dinosaurs.

name: Veer-Zaara
plot: "Veer-Zaara" is a saga of love, separation, courage, and sacrifice. A love story that is an inspiration and will remain a legend forever.

name: The Believers
plot: Cal Jamison, a police psychologist, is forced to deal with a series of ritualistic murders and a malevolent cult.

name: The Pit
plot: A solitary and strange preteen boy wreaks revenge on his harassers when he makes a disturbing discovery in the depth of a forest.

name: Snapdragon
plot: Two men have already been killed during intercourse by a prostitute. The young Sergeant Peckham is transferred from vice to homicide squad for the investigation.

name: Citizen Toxie: The Toxic Avenger IV
plot: The Toxic Avenger must defend his friends from his own evil alternate universe doppelgänger, The Noxious Offender.

name: Strike!
plot: In the 1960s, a group of friends at an all girls school learn that their school is going to be combined with a nearby all boys school. They concoct a plan to save their school while dealing with everyday problems along the way.

name: The Cat from Outer Space
plot: Three scientists help an Alien feline, stranded on Earth, to repair its damaged spacecraft in order to return home but their efforts are hampered by inept army officials and foreign spies.

name: Rugrats Go Wild
plot: The Rugrats get tangled in an exotic adventure, where they're helped by the Thornberrys, a family that travels the world making nature documentaries.

name: The Van
plot: Set in the fictional Dublin suburb of Barrytown, Bimbo is a baker who loses his job after being made redundant. Bimbo then acquires the help of his best friend, Larry, to set up a successful burger van.

name: Mickey Blue Eyes
plot: An English auctioneer proposes to the daughter of a Mafia kingpin, only to realize that certain "favors" would be asked of him.

name: Palmetto
plot: A recently released ex-con gets involved in a fake kidnapping scheme that turns very real.

name: The Visitor
plot: The soul of a young girl with telekinetic powers and her mother become the prize in a battle between good ETs and evil ETs.

name: Electra Glide in Blue
plot: Ambitious but diminutive motorcycle cop John Wintergreen patrols the Arizona highways, yearning for promotion to Homicide Detective, while investigating a murder tied to hippies.

name: Foxfire
plot: Legs Sadovsky gets four other high school girls to think for themselves and react to a teacher's sexual harassment, which gets them suspended. They bond, and rebel, at an abandoned house.

name: Shipwrecked
plot: A young Norwegian boy in 1850s England goes to work as a cabin boy and discovers some of his shipmates are actually pirates.

name: Urban Legends: Final Cut
plot: A film school is the center of a fresh spate of killings based on urban legends.

name: The January Man
plot: Two years after being forced out of NYPD, quirky Nick is rehired by the mayor to catch a serial killer after the 11th murder of a woman.

name: Gor
plot: American professor Tarl Cabot is transported via a magical ring to planet Gor, where he must help an oppressed country overthrow its evil king and his barbarian henchmen.

name: The King and I
plot: Traveling to the exotic kingdom of Siam, English schoolteacher Anna Leonowens soon discovers that her most difficult challenge is the stubborn, imperious King himself.

name: Meatballs 4
plot: Ricky is the hottest water-ski instructor around and he has just been rehired by his former employer/camp to whip up attendance. But the camp is in serious financial trouble and the owner of a rival, more popular, camp wants to buy them out. Therefore they will have to engage in a mean, winner-takes-all competition that will settle the row once and for all.

name: Red Corner
plot: An American attorney on business in China is wrongfully arrested and put on trial for murder, with a female defense lawyer from the country the only key to proving his innocence.

name: Unfaithfully Yours
plot: A composer who suspects his wife of cheating plots to kill her and frame her lover.

name: Le Dîner de Cons
plot: A few friends have a weekly fools' dinner, where each brings a fool along. Pierre finds a champion fool for next dinner. Surprise.

name: Brief Crossing
plot: A young French man and an older English woman spend one night together on a ship.

name: Kinjite: Forbidden Subjects
plot: A brutal Los Angeles police Lt. is determined to bust up an organization that forces underage girls into prostitution.

name: Fort Apache the Bronx
plot: In New York City, South Bronx's main police precinct is nicknamed Fort Apache by its employees who feel like troopers surrounded by hostiles in a wild west isolated outpost.

name: Fatal Games
plot: A mad javelin thrower kills teenagers in the school. All promising athletes are executed in the most brutal way. Especially naked girls in dressing-rooms or saunas.

name: Asylum
plot: In order to secure a job at a mental institution, a young psychiatrist must interview four patients inside the asylum.

name: Caddyshack II
plot: When a crass new-money tycoon's membership application is turned down at a snooty country club, he retaliates by buying the club and turning it into a tacky amusement park.

name: Kiss Me Goodbye
plot: The ghost of a dead husband haunts his wife as she moves back to their house in NYC. She's about to marry an egyptologist there.

name: City Hall
plot: The accidental shooting of a boy in New York leads to an investigation by the Deputy Mayor, and unexpectedly far-reaching consequences.

name: Mom and Dad Save the World
plot: An alien Overlord plans to blow up the Earth but first, he snatches and proposes to marry an Earthman's wife.

name: Hard Rain
plot: The partner and nephew of an armored-truck driver tries to prevent three million dollars from being taken by a gang during a catastrophic flooding caused by a severe storm.

name: Children of the Corn III: Urban Harvest
plot: Two brothers connected to the murderous children's cult of Gatlin, Nebraska are taken to Chicago by an adoptive couple.

name: Silent Movie
plot: A film director and his strange friends struggle to produce the first major silent feature film in forty years.

name: One on One
plot: A small-town basketball star goes to college and tries to impress his tutor, teammates, and coach.

name: The Wicked Lady
plot: Caroline is to be wed to Sir Ralph and invites her sister Barbara to be her bridesmaid. Barbara seduces Ralph, however, and she becomes the new Lady, but despite her new wealthy situation, she gets bored and turns to highway robbery for thrills. While on the road she meets a famous highwayman, and they continue as a team, but some people begin suspecting her identity, and she risks death if she continues her nefarious activities.

name: H.O.T.S.
plot: College exploitation film focusing on the wild escapades of the women of H.O.T.S. Sorority. The antics include but are certainly not limited to a wet t-shirt contest, a sky-diving episode, plenty of fraternity boys and even a house-keeping robot. Can the girls of H.O.T.S. overcome the scrutiny of their unliberated student counterparts and the University Administration as they unknowingly become the focus of bumbling crooks?

name: Club Paradise
plot: A retired Chicago firefighter partners with a reggae singer to turn a seedy Caribbean nightclub into a resort for affluent tourists.

name: Dr. Giggles
plot: A madman who believes he's a doctor comes to the town where his crazy father was killed, and soon begins murdering people and becoming infatuated with a teenage girl who has a heart condition.

name: C.R.A.Z.Y.
plot: A young French Canadian, one of five boys in a conservative family in the 1960s and 1970s, struggles to reconcile his emerging identity with his father's values.

name: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
plot: In the year 2032, Batô, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.

name: The Ballad of Cable Hogue
plot: A hobo accidentally stumbles onto a water spring, and creates a profitable way station in the middle of the desert.

name: High Road to China
plot: During WW1, an alcoholic American biplane pilot is hired by the spoiled daughter of an industrialist to find her father who disappeared in Asia.

name: 15 Minutes
plot: A homicide detective and a fire marshal must stop a pair of murderers who commit videotaped crimes to become media darlings.

name: Happily Ever After
plot: Snow White and her new friends must rescue the Prince when he is captured by the Wicked Queen's vengeful brother.

name: Murder-Rock: Dancing Death
plot: The owner of a prestigious New York ballet school teams up with a male model to solve a series of bizarre murders of a few of the students.

name: Flirting
plot: Two freethinking teenagers - a boy and a girl - confront with authoritarian teachers in their boarding schools. The other students treat this differently.

name: Shottas
plot: Wayne and Biggs grow up together on the tough and dangerous streets of Kingston, Jamaica. Eventually moving to Miami, they begin a ruthless climb to the top of a criminal enterprise as they aggressively take control of the Jamaican mob.

name: The Magnificent Seven Ride!
plot: Forced by personal circumstances, Marshal Chris Adams recruits a writer and five prisoners to help him eliminate a gang of Mexican bandits.

name: The Beast in Heat
plot: A beautiful, nefarious senior female SS officer/doctor creates a genetic, mutant human hybrid; the beast is a, squat, mongoloid hyper-sexually-driven fiend which she uses to torture and molest female prisoners while get fellow Nazis watch.

name: Tex
plot: After their mother dies and their father leaves them, teenage brothers Tex and Mason McCormick struggle to make it on their own.

name: Prince Valiant
plot: In a time now lost in the mists of memory, the great King Arthur rules in the legendary citadel that is Camelot. His Knights of the Round Table perform acts of derring-do and spend their spare time jousting, much to the delight of the local citizens and especially to Princess Ilene, a guest at Camelot. Watching her from afar is a young, inexperienced squire called Valiant, and when the young Welsh princess is sent home to marry Prince Arn, Valiant contrives to accompany her masquerading as Sir Gawain. Meanwhile, the evil sorceress Morgan le Fey, sister to King Arthur, has convinced the tyrannical Sligon, ruler of the Viking kingdom of Thule, that he should steal Arthur's sword, the powerful and magical Excalibur, knowing that its loss could bring about Arthur's downfall. So into the fray comes Sligon's unstable and psychotic brother Thagnar, who manages to steal the sword. Pandemonium reigns. But Valiant is having problems of his own - kidnappers attempt to steal away the Princess, and after various skirmishes, including one with a mysterious character who lives in a cave and purloins treasure, women and other things of value, Valiant manages to return the Princess to her homeland - although he also manages to have a duel with the Princess' jealous fiancé, Prince Arn. All things converge as Valiant is finally informed of his heritage by the stranger from the cave... Boltar of Thule. He informs the lad that he is Prince Valiant, rightful heir to the kingdom of Thule, and with his help, Valiant returns to the land of his birth to rightfully claim what is his.

name: The Runner
plot: After enrolling in a school, an impoverished boy finds conflict with his classmates and decides to compete to earn their respect.

name: First Strike
plot: This fourth installment of Chan's Police Story film franchise has our hero trying to locate a missing nuclear warhead.

name: La Cérémonie
plot: A newly hired maid for a rich countryside family befriends a post-office clerk who encourages her to rebel against her employers.

name: Baba Yaga
plot: A photographer finds herself falling under the spell of a witch.

name: The Exterminator
plot: A man's best friend is killed on the streets of New York City. The man (Robert Ginty) then transforms into a violent killer, turning New York City into a great war zone, and Christopher George is the only one to stop him.

name: So Fine
plot: While trying to get his father out of a financial jam, a man comes up with an idea that turns into an unexpected overnight financial fashion success: bottomless pants.

name: Muppets from Space
plot: Gonzo is contacted by his alien family through his breakfast cereal. But when the men in black kidnap him, it's up to Kermit and the gang to rescue Gonzo and help him reunite with his long-lost family.

name: Twisted
plot: Jessica, whose father killed her mother and committed suicide, is a police officer. While investigating a murder, she finds herself in the center of her own investigation, when her former lovers start being murdered.

name: Love Letter
plot: When exchanging letters two women discover new things about a man they knew.

name: Up Pompeii
plot: Roman slave Lurcio inadvertently becomes the possessor of a scroll naming the proposed assassins of the Emperor Nero. Administering to the participants of his master's orgy guests seems small compared to the trouble the scroll brings, but all are in for a nasty shock when Mount Vesuvius decides to erupt.

name: Under the Rainbow
plot: A visiting dignitary, a CIA agent, a Nazi spy, Japanese tourists, an assassin and a group of "midget" actors from The Wizard of Oz (1939) all check into an elite Los Angeles hotel called Under the Rainbow.

name: Anna Karenina
plot: Anna (Marceau) is a wife and mother who has an affair with the handsome Count Vronsky (Bean). Based on the novel by Tolstoy.

name: Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack
plot: A reporter, notorious for working on pseudo-documentaries, must uncover the legend of the three guardian monsters who must rise to defend Japan from the vengeful spirits within Godzilla.

name: Shiloh
plot: A small-town Southern boy named Marty Preston must rescue a young beagle from his abusive owner, Judd Travers.

name: Wicked Stepmother
plot: A mother-and-daughter pair of witches wreaks havoc on a suburban family.

name: Volunteers
plot: 1962, after Yale graduation, womanizing Lawrence flees a gambling debt that his rich dad won't pay. He takes his roomie's place as Peace Corps Volunteer in Thai Golden Triangle with 2 other PCVs. Will he survive 2 years?

name: The Spirit of the Beehive
plot: In 1940, after watching and being traumatized by the movie Frankenstein (1931), a sensitive seven year-old girl living in a small Spanish village drifts into her own fantasy world.

name: More American Graffiti
plot: Told in four different New Year's Eves in the mid 1960s, John, Terry, Debbie, Steve and Laurie deal with adulthood, the Vietnam war, peace rallies, and relationships.

name: Tom and Jerry: The Movie
plot: Cat and mouse duo Tom and Jerry reluctantly work together to save a young girl from her evil aunt.

name: Even Cowgirls Get the Blues
plot: Sissy Hankshaw (Uma Thurman) is born with enormous thumbs that help her hitchhiking through the U.S. from a young age. She becomes a model in advertising, and her New York agent, "the Countess" (Sir John Hurt), sends her to his ranch in California to shoot a commercial, set against the background of mating whooping cranes. There, she befriends Bonanza Jellybean (Rain Phoenix), one of the cowgirls at the beauty ranch. The cowgirls take command of the ranch from the Countess and drug the cranes with peyote. The Police besiege the ranch.

name: Wish You Were Here
plot: In a staid English seaside town after the Second World War, young Lynda grows up with her widowed father and younger sister. She eventually becomes pregnant by an acquaintance of her father.

name: Streetwise
plot: Gritty documentary that looks at the lives of teenagers living on the streets of Seattle.

name: Welcome Home, Roxy Carmichael
plot: A small town prepares for the homecoming of superstar Roxy Carmichael, as does a young outsider, who believes Roxy is her mother.

name: Betrayed
plot: An FBI agent posing as a combine driver becomes romantically involved with a Midwest farmer who lives a double life as a white supremacist.

name: Sex Is Comedy
plot: A director struggles to film a difficult, intimate sex scene between two actors who happen to hate each other.

name: Semi-Tough
plot: A three-way friendship between two free-spirited professional football players and the owner's daughter becomes compromised when two of them become romantically involved.

name: Godzilla 1985
plot: Thirty years after the original monster's rampage, a new Godzilla emerges and attacks Japan.

name: The Legend of Hell House
plot: A physicist, his wife and two mediums are hired to investigate the Belasco House, where 27 guests had inexplicably died in 1927, along with most of a team of paranormal investigators that was sent in the early 1950s.

name: A Summer's Tale
plot: A shy maths graduate takes a holiday in Dinard before starting his first job. He hopes his sort-of girlfriend will join him, but soon strikes up a friendship with another girl working in town. She in turn introduces him to a further young lady who fancies him. Thus the quiet young lad finds he is having to do some tricky juggling in territory new to him.

name: From Beijing with Love
plot: A Chinese spy who's been out of service for ten years whilst making a living as a butcher is sent to Hong Kong to locate a stolen Tyrannosaurus rex skull.

name: Black Belt Jones
plot: A Mafia buy out of Papa Byrd's karate school downtown ends in his death. Byrd's daughter, Sydney, refuses to sell, and wants revenge. Byrd's students call the Black Belt Jones for help. Jones reluctantly teams with Sydney in many battles.

name: Shortcut to Happiness
plot: A down-and-out writer sells his soul to the Devil in exchange for fame and fortune.

name: Diggstown
plot: Gabriel's released from prison. His con man friend makes a foolish bet with Diggstown's owner on who'd win the boxing matches - their man against ten Diggstown men.

name: Gerry
plot: A friendship between two young men is tested when they go for a hike in a desert and forget to bring any water or food with them.

name: A Dry White Season
plot: A white middle class South African suburbanite with no interest in politics agrees to help his black gardener find his jailed son. His investigation opens his eyes to the horrors committed by the secret police and turns him into a target.

name: Pretty Persuasion
plot: A 15-year-old girl incites chaos among her friends and a media frenzy when she accuses her drama teacher of sexual harassment.

name: Blood Hook
plot: During a local fishing contest, people are being violently dragged into the lake and killed by a giant fish hook.

name: Nightmare Beach
plot: After the execution of a motorcycle gang leader convicted of murder, a helmeted biker goes on a killing spree during spring break in Florida.

name: Rosewood
plot: A dramatization of a 1923 horrific racist lynch mob attack on an African-American community.

name: Working Girls
plot: A day in the life of several prostitutes in an upscale Manhattan whore house. The film is a stark portrayal of the women prostitutes, the male customers and the motivations of both. Watch as the madam manipulates her "girls". Watch as she answers the phone by saying "Hello John, what's new and different?" Watch as the "johns" try to manipulate the "girls". Part nudie exploitation, part sociological thesis.

name: Patrick
plot: A comatose hospital patient harasses and kills through his powers of telekinesis to claim his private nurse as his own.

name: Rover Dangerfield
plot: A Vegas show dog gets ditched in the sticks and ends up working on a farm.

name: My Life
plot: A terminally ill man prepares for his death.

name: Belle Epoque
plot: A 1931 Spanish military deserter finds himself on a lonely farm until the farmer's four daughters pay a visit and he falls for all of them.

name: High School High
plot: Richard Clark has just left the well-known Wellington Academy to teach at Marion Barry High School. Now, he will try to inspire the D-average students into making good grades and try to woo a fellow teacher.

name: Being Cyrus
plot: "Being Cyrus" is a dark, comedic venture by the debutante director Homi Adajania that spins around the Sethnas - a Parsi family.

name: The Grim Reaper
plot: A group of friends and a hitchhiker become stranded on a tourist island where they are stalked by a disfigured cannibalistic killer who is prowling the island after killing its residents.

name: Deathstalker and the Warriors from Hell
plot: The third thrilling saga of Deathstalker pits him against the evil wizard and ruler of the Southland, Troxartes, and his band of undead warriors.

name: The Jazz Singer
plot: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of being a popular singer.

name: Heaven's Prisoners
plot: A hardened New Orleans cop, Dave Robicheaux, finally tosses in the badge and settles into life on the bayou with his wife. But a bizarre plane crash draws him back into the fray when his family is viciously threatened.

name: Women in Cellblock 9
plot: Somewhere in the jungles of South America mercenaries stop a truck which has allegedly loaded fruit. The cargo turns out to be six young women. Apprehended and handed over to the custody of the local women's prison.

name: Losing Isaiah
plot: The biological and adoptive mothers of a young boy are involved in a bitter, controversial custody battle.

name: My Life Without Me
plot: A young woman conceals the fact of her terminal cancer to live her life with a passion she never had before.

name: North Shore
plot: After learning how to surf by using the local wave tanks, Arizona resident Rick uses his winnings from a recent contest to fly to Hawaii and try to make a living for himself as a professional wave rider.

name: Dad
plot: While his mom recovers in hospital from a heart attack, John puts his busy life on hold to fly home and help his elderly dad around the house. John's son later joins them and they all truly bond for the first and, tragically, final time.

name: Nuts
plot: A high-class call girl accused of murder fights for the right to stand trial rather than be declared mentally incompetent.

name: The Mangler
plot: A laundry-folding machine has been possessed by a demon, causing it to develop homicidal tendencies.

name: The Boys in the Band
plot: Tempers fray and true selves are revealed when a heterosexual accidentally intrudes on a homosexual party.

name: The Beast Within
plot: A young woman gets raped by a mysterious man-creature, and years later her son begins a horrific transformation into a similar beast.

name: Immortal
plot: In the distant future, Earth is occupied by ancient gods and genetically altered humans. When a god is sentenced to death he seeks a new human host and a woman to bear his child.

name: Down to You
plot: College students Al and Imogen meet and fall in love, but fear of commitment causes them to go their separate ways.

name: Chisum
plot: Cattle baron John Chisum joins forces with Billy the Kid and Pat Garrett to fight the Lincoln County land war.

name: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
plot: A man studies kung fu at the Shaolin Temple to fight back against the oppressive Manchu government.

name: Moscow on the Hudson
plot: A Russian saxophonist visiting New York with a circus troupe suddenly decides to defect from the USSR during a shopping trip to a department store, but he finds adjusting to American life more difficult than he imagined.

name: Gas Food Lodging
plot: A waitress lives with her two teen daughters in a trailer park in New Mexico. They all want a boyfriend.

name: The Island
plot: A journalist takes his son with him to investigate pirate activity off the coast of Florida. But he gets stranded on a mysterious island--where he might not be alone.

name: Another Day in Paradise
plot: In the hope of a big score, two junkie couples team up to commit various drug robberies which go disastrously wrong, leading to dissent, violence, and murder.

name: Turkey Shoot
plot: In a dystopian future where deviants are held in "re-education" camps, a freedom fighter and an innocent prisoner try to survive their decadent oppressors' game of kill-or-be-killed.

name: Carry on Abroad
plot: A group of tourists arrive at a half-finished hotel in Spain where the oddly identical staff and bad weather threaten the building's stability.

name: Moving Violations
plot: The goofy students of a remedial drivers education class find themselves butting heads with their abusive police instructors.

name: White Dog
plot: A trainer attempts to retrain a vicious dog that's been raised to attack black people.

name: The Doctor
plot: When a self-centered doctor is diagnosed with cancer, he becomes better able to empathize with his patients and appreciate a life outside his career.

name: Hamlet
plot: Modern-day New York City adaptation of Shakespeare's immortal story about Hamlet's plight to avenge his father's murder.

name: Steel
plot: A scientist for the military turns himself into a cartoon-like superhero when a version of one of his own weapons is being used against enemies.

name: Mohabbatein
plot: A film about the battle between love and fear, between two stubborn men and their opposing beliefs and the outcome of the love stories of 3 couples.

name: The Adventures of Taura: Prison Ship Star Slammer
plot: Two women who have been unjustly confined to a prison planet plot their escape, all the while having to put up with lesbian guards, crazed wardens and mutant rodents.

name: The Go-Between
plot: A tale of torrid and forbidden love between a couple in the English countryside.

name: Main Hoon Na
plot: An army major goes undercover as a college student. His mission is both professional and personal: to protect his general's daughter from a radical militant, and to find his estranged half-brother.

name: Blow Dry
plot: In 2000, a small town hosts The British Hairdressing Championship, where a former 2-time winner, his son, his run-away wife and his runaway wife's lady lover reside (not all on speaking terms).

name: Psycho Beach Party
plot: Chicklet is a sixteen-year old tomboy who's desperate to be part of the in-crowd of Malibu beach surfers. She's the typical American girl - except for one little problem: her personality is split into more slices than a pepperoni pizza.

name: Before the Rain
plot: Three interconnected stories of love under the threat of civil war in Macedonia and London.

name: Dead Man on Campus
plot: Two college roommates go out and party, resulting in bad grades. They learn of the clause that says, "If your roommate dies, you get an A," and decide to find someone who is on the verge, so to speak, to move in with them.

name: The Divorce
plot: French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her sister and French brother-in-law and niece in Paris.

name: Once Around
plot: Renata Bella feels like a failure at life and career. But when Renata attends a seminar on selling real estate, she finally finds True Love. Sam Sharpe, while a top-notch, successful salesman, is much older than Renata. She is swept away by his excessively flamboyant style and irrepressible nature. The very traits she finds romantic, however, lead to repeated conflict with her family, especially her beloved father Joe, leaving Renata trapped in the middle.

name: Claudine
plot: In the 1970s Harlem, garbage collector Roop feels intimidated by the idea of dating Claudine who is a single mother of six on welfare.

name: Flesh Gordon Meets the Cosmic Cheerleaders
plot: Flesh Gordon is kidnapped by a group of space cheerleaders hoping to use him to save their planet.

name: Cutter's Way
plot: Richard spots a man dumping a body, and decides to expose the man he thinks is the culprit with his friend Alex Cutter.

name: The Big Bounce
plot: A small-time con artist and a Hawaiian real estate developer's mischevious, enterprising mistress team up for a potential $200,000 score.

name: Haunted Honeymoon
plot: Two radio voice actors are getting married. Larry has fits of fear. A shrink needs 36 hours to scare him to death and cure him - during a family reunion at a scary family castle.

name: Satan's Little Helper
plot: A naive young boy unknowingly becomes the pawn of a serial killer.

name: Kill Me Again
plot: A young detective becomes involved with a beautiful woman on the run from the mob and her psychopath boyfriend.

name: The Ladies Man
plot: The Saturday Night Live (1975) character gets a big screen treatment.

name: Restoration
plot: The exiled royal doctor to King Charles II devotes himself to helping Londoners suffering from the plague, and in the process falls in love with an equally poor woman.

name: Werckmeister Harmonies
plot: A naive young man witnesses an escalation of violence in his small hometown following the arrival of a mysterious circus attraction.

name: Superman II: The Richard Donner Cut
plot: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

name: A Return to Salem's Lot
plot: A man and his son vacation to the quiet vampire populated town of Salem's Lot.

name: Emanuelle in Bangkok
plot: On assignment in Bangkok to interview the King of Thailand, photojournalist Emanuelle becomes entangled in political intrigue and sexual encounters with old and new lovers.

name: Eye of the Beholder
plot: A private eye shadows a female serial killer of men all over the U.S. without her knowing as he, strangely enough, occasionally acts as her guardian angel.

name: Head Over Heels
plot: A young woman is attracted to a man despite her thinking she's seen him kill someone.

name: Once Upon a Crime...
plot: Phoebe and a fellow American in Rome find a dog with a $5000 reward. They take a train to the owner in Monte Carlo. She turns up murdered. They run and become suspects just as 3 other Americans on the train.

name: F.I.S.T.
plot: A rebellious Cleveland warehouse worker rises through the ranks of a trucking industry union to become union president but his organized crime links cause his eventual downfall.

name: The Enigma of Kaspar Hauser
plot: A young man named Kaspar Hauser suddenly appears in Nuremberg in 1828, barely able to talk or walk, and bearing a strange note.

name: Godzilla vs. SpaceGodzilla
plot: Godzilla is threatened by two new forces: Mogera - another UN built machine; and Space Godzilla - a beast spawned from Godzilla's particles in space.

name: Two Can Play That Game
plot: An arrogant career woman plays a series of heartless mind-games with her boyfriend to "put him in line," only to discover that he has a few tricks up his own sleeve.

name: Millennium Mambo
plot: The ethereally beautiful Vicky recalls her romances with Hao Hao and Jack in the neon-lit clubs of Taipei.

name: Grizzly
plot: An eighteen-foot-tall grizzly bear terrorizes a state park, leaving it up to a Park Ranger to save the day.

name: The Nude Bomb
plot: Maxwell Smart is recalled to duty to help fight a villian who threatens to detonate a weapon that destroys clothing.

name: The Ship Sails On
plot: In 1914, a luxury ship leaves Italy in order to scatter the ashes of a famous opera singer. A lovable bumbling journalist chronicles the voyage and meets the singer's many eccentric friends and admirers.

name: Enemy Gold
plot: While on a mission to stop a drug operation, three Federal agents accidentally discover gold from the Civil War. With the aid of a corrupt agent, a ruthless criminal kingpin will hunt them down, one by one.

name: The White Buffalo
plot: At the closing of 1874 a haunted, dying Wild Bill Hickok teams up with a grieving Crazy Horse to hunt a murderous albino buffalo.

name: Trojan War
plot: Brad is about to hook up with the girl of his dreams, but runs into a problem, no condom. So Brad sets out into the night to find one, running into many obstacles along the way, while not knowing his best friend, Leah is in love with him.

name: The Anniversary Party
plot: Love is complex and relationships deteriorate.

name: Cannibal! The Musical
plot: The sole survivor of an ill-fated mining expedition tells how his taste for gold was replaced by that of human flesh.

name: Terminator II
plot: In a polluted future Venice researchers work to improve the situation. One day, unknown forces start killing them. A team of soldiers and a couple of civilians is sent to investigate. Soon, they encounter strange murderous creatures.

name: The Dish
plot: A remote Australian community, populated by quirky characters, plays a key role in the first Apollo moon landing.

name: Slipstream
plot: In the near future, where Earth has been devastated by man's pollution and giant winds rule the planet, bounty hunter Matt kidnaps a murderer out of the hands of two police officers, planning to get the bounty himself.

name: The Fog of War
plot: The story of America as seen through the eyes of the former Secretary of Defense under President John F. Kennedy and President Lyndon B. Johnson, Robert McNamara.

name: Next Door
plot: John has just been left by his girlfriend Ingrid. That day he allows himself to be seduced into a mystical and scary world, where it is impossible to separate truth from the lies

name: Luther the Geek
plot: A psychotic killer convicted of multiple murders is released on parole after spending twenty years in prison. His psychosis immediately takes over and he goes on a killing spree.

name: Doctor Detroit
plot: A pimp on the run trusts his sex workers to a meek professor of literature, who accepts the challenge.

name: Stardust Memories
plot: While attending a retrospective of his work, a filmmaker recalls his life and his loves: the inspirations for his films.

name: Bed of Roses
plot: Romantic drama about a young career girl who is swept off her feet by a shy florist who fell in love with her after one glimpse through a shadowy window.

name: The Seven-Ups
plot: A tough detective who is part of an elite New York City unit is trying to find out who killed his partner, but uncovers a plot to kidnap mobsters for money.

name: Speed Zone
plot: Despite the police's preemptive strike, the illegal coast-to-coast car race is still on with new drivers. It's a race where fair play, red lights, stop signs, police roadblocks and traffic rules in general have no validity.

name: In a Glass Cage
plot: A former Nazi child-killer is confined in an iron lung inside an old mansion after a suicide attempt. His wife hires him a full-time carer, a mysterious young man who is driven slowly mad by the old man's disturbing past.

name: The Daytrippers
plot: When she discovers a love letter written to her husband by an unknown paramour, the distraught Eliza turns to her tight-knit Long Island family for advice.

name: Mrs Palfrey at the Claremont
plot: All but abandoned by her family in a London retirement hotel, an elderly woman strikes up a curious friendship with a young writer.

name: Fist of Legend
plot: In 1937, a Chinese martial artist returns to Shanghai to find his teacher dead and his school harassed by the Japanese.

name: Talk Radio
plot: A rude, contemptuous talk show host becomes overwhelmed by the hatred that surrounds his program just before it goes national.

name: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
plot: During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.

name: Phantasm II
plot: Mike, now released from a psychiatric hospital, meets with Reggie, and discover his dreams (the events of the original film) are real, and they both journey to find and stop the evil Tall Man from his grim work.

name: Sleep with Me
plot: Sarah, Joseph and Frank are BFFs. Joseph and Sarah get married but the evening before she tells Frank with a kiss that it could've been him. Frank continues to have a thing for Sarah.

name: Head in the Clouds
plot: From the roaring 1920s to the ruinous Spanish Civil War and Adolf Hitler's rise into power, the lives of an Irish schoolteacher, a provocative heiress and her Spanish muse are intricately interlaced, sharing the same destiny and passion.

name: Primal Rage
plot: A scientist at a Florida University accidentally creates a "rage virus" while conducting experiments to restore dead brain tissue in baboons. The virus soon spreads.

name: The Pest
plot: A Miami con man agrees to be the human target for a Neo-Nazi manhunter in order to collect $50,000 if he survives.

name: A Moment of Innocence
plot: A semi-autobiographical account of Makmahlbaf's experience as a teenager when, as a 17-year-old, he stabbed a policeman at a protest rally. Two decades later, he tracks down the policeman he injured in an attempt to make amends.

name: Godzilla vs. Biollante
plot: Desolate by the loss of his daughter, a geneticist creates a monstrous new mutation.

name: Zorro: The Gay Blade
plot: Zorro, the legendary swordsman, has passed on his weapon and his sense of duty to his noble son, Diego, a dashing swashbuckler like his father. But after an injury sidelines Diego, he is forced to hand the mask over to his twin, Ramon.

name: Three Fugitives
plot: A reformed bank robber is taken hostage by a desperate man during a bank hold up, but is forced to go on the run with his captor when they're both mistakenly thought to be in cahoots.

name: Miami Blues
plot: An ex-con's first act of freedom is moving to Miami where he restarts his old criminal ways with even more potency.

name: Mrs Dalloway
plot: In 1923 London, socialite Clarissa Dalloway's (Vanessa Redgrave's) well-planned party is overshadowed by the return of an old suitor she had known thirty-three years earlier.

name: Chato's Land
plot: In 1870s New Mexico, a half-breed kills a bigoted sheriff in self-defense but the posse that eventually hunts him finds itself in dangerous territory.

name: 'Gator Bait
plot: Desiree lives deep in the swamp and supports herself and her siblings by poaching. Ben and deputy Billy hope to get a little sexual comfort from the "Cajun swamp rat" when they catch Desiree trapping 'gators, and give chase. Desiree outsmarts them but Billy accidentally shoots Ben and tells his sheriff dad that Desiree did it. Ben's dad and sons join them in the search party and quickly get out of control. Soon the hunters become the hunted as Desiree exacts her revenge for their violence against her family.

name: The General
plot: The real-life story of Dublin folk hero and criminal Martin Cahill, who pulled off two daring robberies in Ireland with his team, but attracted unwanted attention from the police, the I.R.A., the U.V.F., and members of his own team.

name: The Pit and the Pendulum
plot: Horror film set in 1492 Toledo, Spain, depicting the cruel deeds of a monk named Torquemada, Grand Inquisitor of the Spanish Inquisition.

name: The Dead
plot: Gabriel Conroy and wife Gretta attend an early January dinner with friends at the home of his spinster aunts, an evening which results in an epiphany for both of them.

name: City by the Sea
plot: Vincent Lamarca, whose father was executed for a 1950s kidnapping of a child, grew up to become a police officer, only to see his own son become a murder suspect.

name: Innocent Lies
plot: A gripping story of sex, betrayal, and murder. In 1938, British detective Alan Cross (Adrian Dunbar) travels to a small French coastal town to investigate the mysterious death of a close friend. Soon he becomes entangled in the strange lives of his prime suspects, the Graves, an aristocratic English family hiding many dark secrets. In his search for clues, Cross cleverly uncovers an illicit relationship, local Nazi-sympathizers, and ultimately, the true identity of his friend's killer.

name: Demonlover
plot: A French corporation goes head-to-head with an American web media company for the rights to a 3-D manga pornography studio, resulting in a power struggle that culminates in violence and espionage.

name: Black Sunday
plot: When a Black September terrorist group begins a plot to carry out a massive terrorist attack in the United States, an Israeli commando works with the FBI to identify the target and conspirators, and prevent the plan from succeeding.

name: Planet of Dinosaurs
plot: A space-ship gets lost and is forced to make an emergency landing on an unknown planet. The planet looks much like Earth, only with no trace of civilization. Soon the crew discovers that there are dinosaurs on the planet, and blood-thirsty buggers at that. The crew hopes to be found and rescued, but they have to struggle to survive until then.

name: The Vault of Horror
plot: An anthology of five horror stories shared by five men trapped in the basement of an office building.

name: Gimme Shelter
plot: When three hundred thousand members of the Love Generation collided with a few dozen Hells Angels at San Francisco's Altamont Speedway, the bloody slash that transformed a decade's dreams into disillusionment was immortalized on this film.

name: Barney's Great Adventure
plot: A talking purple dinosaur leads a group of children on a hunt for a large missing egg.

name: Say It Isn't So
plot: Jo and Gilly date. They find out they're brother and sister. Jo moves away. Gilly finds out that he's not Jo's brother and that Jo's getting married. Can he stop the wedding in time?

name: The Mean Season
plot: When a teenager is shot at the beach, a journalist from The Miami Journal is sent to cover the story. He's called by the murderer and told there'll be four more.

name: The Plague Dogs
plot: Two dogs escape from a laboratory and are hunted as possible carriers of the bubonic plague.

name: Naked Souls
plot: An artist tries to rescue her scientist boyfriend, who has switched bodies with an evil, elderly genius.

name: Hi, Mom!
plot: A Vietnam vet moves into an apartment and peers through other people's windows across the street, meets one of the women, and discovers Black theater.

name: Never Cry Wolf
plot: A government researcher, sent to research the "menace" of wolves in the north, learns about the true beneficial and positive nature of the species.

name: Fire Birds
plot: Elite Apache helicopter pilots are tasked with destroying powerful armed drug cartels operating in South America.

name: A Lizard in a Woman's Skin
plot: The potentially unhinged daughter of a British politician is accused of killing her hedonistic neighbor after she witnesses the murder in a dream.

name: Lawn Dogs
plot: When Devon, a 10-year-old girl, forges a friendship with Trent, a 21-year-old outsider who mows the neighborhood lawns, things suddenly get very complicated and private.

name: Under Fire
plot: Three journalists in a romantic triangle are involved in political intrigue during the last days of the corrupt Somozoa regime in Nicaragua before it falls to a popular revolution in 1979.

name: Croupier
plot: An aspiring writer is hired as a croupier at a casino, where he realizes that his life as a croupier would make a great novel.

name: The Other
plot: A series of gruesome accidents plague a small American farming community in the summer of 1935, encircling two identical twin brothers and their family.

name: Her Alibi
plot: Phil has writer's block after 30 detective novels. In court for inspiration, he sees a cute Romanian murder suspect. He provides her alibi. She stays with him. Will he live to write another novel?

name: Purple People Eater
plot: A kid plays the old novelty song "Purple People Eater" and the creature actually appears. The two then proceed to help an elderly couple who are being evicted by their greedy landlord.

name: D.C. Cab
plot: The misadventures of a group of unfortunate but streetwise cabbies working for a Washington, D.C., decrepit taxicab company.

name: Love Liza
plot: Following the unexplained suicide of his wife Liza, a web designer turns to gasoline fumes and remote-control airplanes while avoiding an inevitable conflict with his mother-in-law.

name: Lovers of the Arctic Circle
plot: In Lapland's cold Arctic Circle, under the eternal midnight sun, unfavourable circumstances reunite two kindred spirits. And governed by circular motifs woven by faith and love, they must answer a pivotal question. Can they deny destiny?

name: Sophie Scholl: The Final Days
plot: A dramatization of the final days of Sophie Scholl, one of the most famous members of the German World War II anti-Nazi resistance movement, The White Rose.

name: Immediate Family
plot: An upscale couple unable to conceive arrange a brokered adoption with a pregnant woman who doesn't hold up her end of the deal to give up the baby.

name: Investigation of a Citizen Above Suspicion
plot: A chief of detectives, homicide section, kills his mistress and deliberately leaves clues to prove his own responsibility for the crime.

name: Hail Mary
plot: A college student gets pregnant without having intercourse, affecting people close and unrelated to her in different ways.

name: A Cop
plot: After a shaky first heist, a group of thieves plan an even more elaborate and risky second heist.

name: Nothing in Common
plot: A successful advertising executive finds his freewheeling life crashing to a halt when his parents end their longtime marriage.

name: Bandit Queen
plot: The story of the bandit queen Phoolan Devi who was sent to prison in 1983 and got free in 1994.

name: The Match Factory Girl
plot: A woman's terribly dull life is upended by a one-night stand pregnancy, causing her to seek retribution.

name: The Juror
plot: A juror in a Mafia trial is forced to convince the other jurors to vote not guilty by an obsessive mob enforcer.

name: Toolbox Murders
plot: A historic Hollywood hotel houses a supernatural evil. It's been subdued for decades, but when renovations start, a series of murders take place.

name: Faraway, So Close!
plot: A group of angels in the German capital look longingly upon the life of humans.

name: True Stories
plot: A small but growing Texas town, filled with strange and musical characters, celebrates its sesquicentennial and converge on a local parade and talent show.

name: Little Man Tate
plot: A single mother raises a child prodigy on her own, struggling to give him every opportunity he needs to express his gift.

name: Don't Go in the House
plot: A disturbed young man who was burned as a child by his sadistic mother stalks women with a flamethrower.

name: Highway
plot: After Jack gets caught with a Vegas mobster's wife in bed, he's gotta hit the road. Jack's best friend Pilot accompanies him, and the pair sets out on an adventure akin to Kerouac's "On the Road".

name: Haunted
plot: A skeptical professor visits a remote British estate to debunk allegations of psychic phenomena, but soon finds himself haunted by a ghost from his own past.

name: The Warrior and the Sorceress
plot: A fearsome swordsman, Kain, crosses the barren wastelands and comes upon a town where two arch enemies fight incessantly for control of the town's only well.

name: The Concorde... Airport '79
plot: A supersonic airborne disaster. In order to survive a flight headed for the Moscow Olympics, passengers of the Concorde must endure aerial acrobatics to dodge missiles and survive a device that decompresses the plane.

name: Where the Red Fern Grows
plot: Where the Red Fern Grows is the heartwarming and adventurous tale for all ages about a young boy and his quest for his own red-bone hound hunting dogs.

name: The Newton Boys
plot: The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, owing to their good planning and minimal violence.

name: Luther
plot: During the early sixteenth century, idealistic German monk Martin Luther, disgusted by the materialism in the Catholic Church, begins the dialogue that will lead to the Protestant Reformation.

name: Two Evil Eyes
plot: A duo of Edgar Allan Poe adaptations about a greedy wife's attempt to embezzle her dying husband's fortune, and a sleazy reporter's adoption of a strange black cat.

name: Ulee's Gold
plot: A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight his son's previous dastardly cohorts.

name: Ilsa, the Wicked Warden
plot: After the mysterious disappearance of her sister, a desperate young woman infiltrates brutal warden Ilsa's mental health facility for sexually deviant women. Will she escape the hellhole and live to tell the tale?

name: DuckTales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp
plot: Scrooge McDuck takes Huey, Dewey, and Louie to Egypt to find a pyramid and magic lamp.

name: Kiss of Death
plot: A reformed convict goes undercover with the help of an angry detective to ensnare a psychotic mobster.

name: Sweet Sweetback's Baadasssss Song
plot: After saving a Black Panther from some racist cops, a black male prostitute goes on the run from "the man" with the help of the ghetto community and some disillusioned Hells Angels.

name: Human Nature
plot: A woman is in love with a man in love with another woman, and all three have designs on a young man raised as an ape.

name: Saint Jack
plot: Jack Flowers, an American hustler in early-1970s Singapore, dreams of building a fortune by running a brothel and returning to the States to live a life of luxury.

name: Ted Bundy
plot: The story of serial killer Ted Bundy.

name: Support Your Local Gunfighter
plot: A con artist arrives in a mining town controlled by two competing companies. Both companies think he's a famous gunfighter and try to hire him to drive the other out of town.

name: The Englishman Who Went Up a Hill But Came Down a Mountain
plot: When an English cartographer must tell a Welsh village that their mountain is only a hill, the offended community sets out to change that.

name: Better Luck Tomorrow
plot: A group of over-achieving East Asian American high school seniors enjoy a power trip when they dip into extracurricular criminal activities.

name: Downtown
plot: An eager rookie cop gets transferred to a tough downtown Philadelphia precinct after stopping a powerful man for traffic violations. When his old cop buddy is murdered, he wants in on catching the killer.

name: Tomboy
plot: A strong-willed female stock car driver challenges her chauvinistic crush to a race to win his respect- and get him into bed.

name: Emperor of the North
plot: In 1933, during the Depression, Shack the brutal conductor of the number 19 train has a personal vendetta against the best train hopping hobo tramp in the Northwest, A No. 1.

name: Trauma
plot: A paranoid writer is unable to get started on his second novel. He hires a secretary and then his troubles really begin.

name: Hunk
plot: A computer nerd makes a deal with the Devil and gets a new beefcake body.

name: Murphy's Law
plot: An action-packed thriller starring Charles Bronson as Jack Murphy, a cop who is running to stay alive long enough to even the score with his wife's killer.

name: Excess Baggage
plot: A bratty teenager fakes her own kidnapping, but gets mistakenly kidnapped for real instead.

name: Iron Monkey
plot: A martial artist/doctor steals from the corrupt authorities as a masked thief to give to the poor while another martial artist/doctor is forced to hunt him down. But a major threat unites them as a powerful and traitorous shaolin monk takes over the authorities.

name: Bird
plot: The troubled life and career of jazz musician Charlie "Bird" Parker.

name: The Emigrants
plot: Småland, Sweden, mid-19th century. A farming family struggle with their rocky, unyielding land, and decide to embark on the arduous journey to new hope in America.

name: Hanging Up
plot: A trio of sisters bond over their ambivalence toward the approaching death of their curmudgeonly father, to whom none of them was particularly close.

name: Stewie Griffin: The Untold Story
plot: The maniacal baby of the Griffin family, Stewie, meets his future self. In doing this he discovers that his future image is not what he has anticipated because of a near death experience.

name: Stroszek
plot: In Berlin, an alcoholic man, recently released from prison, joins his elderly friend and a prostitute in a determined dream to leave Germany and seek a better life in Wisconsin.

name: The Ref
plot: A cat burglar is forced to take a bickering, dysfunctional family hostage on Christmas Eve.

name: Hollywood Boulevard
plot: A young woman arrives in Hollywood to try her luck as an actress. An incompetent agent hooks her up with a production company which specializes in low budget B-movie fair, plagued by strange deadly accidents.

name: Fatal Instinct
plot: A cop who moonlights as a lawyer cheats on his wife, not knowing that she's cheating on him and plans to kill him for the insurance.

name: Up Close & Personal
plot: An ambitious young woman, determined to build a career in television journalism, gets good advice from her first boss, and they fall in love.

name: Bless the Child
plot: Cody, a little girl abandoned by her mother and raised by her aunt, a nurse, is kidnapped. The girl's guardian, aided by an F.B.I. agent, learn that Cody has supernatural abilities, and the abductees are a Satanic cult willing to do anything to gain them.

name: The Wind Will Carry Us
plot: Irreverent city engineer Behzad comes to a rural village in Iran to keep vigil for a dying relative. In the meanwhile the film follows his efforts to fit in with the local community and how he changes his own attitudes as a result.

name: Bang the Drum Slowly
plot: The story of the friendship between a worldly-wise star pitcher and a half-wit catcher as they cope with the catcher's terminal illness through a baseball season.

name: The Boogey Man
plot: Through the reflection in the mirror, a girl witnesses her mother's boyfriend's murder.

name: Laserblast
plot: A teenager stumbles upon an alien weapon, which transforms him into a grotesque killer.

name: Morvern Callar
plot: After her beloved boyfriend's suicide, a mourning supermarket worker and her best friend hit the road in Scotland, but find that grief is something that you can't run away from forever.

name: Owning Mahowny
plot: A bank manager with: (a) a gambling problem and (b) access to a multimillion dollar account gets into a messy situation. Based on the story of the largest one-man bank fraud in Canadian history.

name: Lost in America
plot: A husband and wife in their 30s decide to quit their jobs, live as free spirits and cruise America in a Winnebago.

name: Graduation Day
plot: A masked killer begins murdering students on the school track team after a track runner dies upon completion of a 30 second 200-meter race.

name: Microwave Massacre
plot: Fed up of his wife's bad cooking, Donald kills her and turns to cannibalism to satisfy his appetite.

name: Virgin Witch
plot: A pair of miniskirted birds who travel to a remote castle in order to land a contract in the modeling agency of the mysterious lesbian Sybil Waite (In HD).

name: Scarlet Diva
plot: A young Italian actress embarks on a self-destructive spree of sex, drugs and other excess while doing some soul searching to find the path for redemption.

name: Butterflies Are Free
plot: A blind man moves into his own apartment against the wishes of his overprotective mother and befriends the freethinking young woman next door.

name: Cheerleader Camp
plot: A group of cheerleaders become the targets of an unknown killer at a remote summer camp.

name: Love, Honor and Obey
plot: A north London postman gets involved with a gang of criminals.

name: Slumber Party Massacre III
plot: Jackie Cassidy and her friends are stalked by a serial killer while having a slumber party.

name: A Prayer for the Dying
plot: Martin, an I.R.A. hitman, is seen by a Catholic priest while carrying out a hit. He grows a bond with the priest and his niece. But his past and his former employers put all their lives in danger.

name: The Return of Swamp Thing
plot: In this tongue-in-cheek sequel, the benevolent bog creature falls for the vegetarian, plant-loving daughter of the evil scientist who created him.

name: The Corruptor
plot: With the aid from a New York City policeman, a top immigrant cop tries to stop drug-trafficking and corruption by immigrant Chinese Triads, but things get complicated when the Triads try to bribe the policeman.

name: Survival Island
plot: A group of teens trapped on an island, and are haunted by a demon hidden inside a pinata.

name: Lady in White
plot: An author tells the story of how, as a young boy growing up in a 1960s small town, he was haunted after witnessing the murder of a little girl.

name: The First Power
plot: A dedicated L.A. police detective and a female psychic must stop a demonic serial killer who was given the powers of resurrection, teleportation and possession.

name: The Star Chamber
plot: Frustrated with a legal system gone haywire, a secret society of judges hires hitmen to snuff out criminals who escape courtroom justice - but one young judge questions the ethics of their vigilante system.

name: An Enemy of the People
plot: A scientist stands against an entire town when he discovers their medicinal spa is polluted.

name: 3 Ninjas: High Noon at Mega Mountain
plot: The three unstoppable Ninja brothers fight to save their hero (Hulk Hogan) and Mega Mountain Amusement Park from the vicious kid-hating Medusa (Loni Anderson).

name: A Low Down Dirty Shame
plot: An ex-cop, now a private detective, takes on the search for the millions stolen by a drug lord.

name: Female Vampire
plot: A beautiful female vampire lures men to their doom.

name: The Presidio
plot: A San Francisco civilian police detective is forced to work on a series of murders with his former enemy commanding officer while dating his daughter.

name: Enter the Ninja
plot: After passing a ninja master test in Japan, Cole visits a war buddy in the Philippines. He helps him fight men, who want his buddy's plantation.

name: Bride of Re-Animator
plot: Doctors Herbert West and Dan Cain discover the secret to creating human life and proceed to create a perfect woman from dead tissue.

name: The Hills Have Eyes Part II
plot: A group of bikers, heading to a race, become stranded in the desert and find themselves fighting off a family of inbred cannibals who live off the land.

name: The Pom Pom Girls
plot: A group of carefree high school seniors are having the time of their lives, filled with sex, romance, and teen high jinks.

name: Undercover Angel
plot: A writer with no focus in his work, becomes the unwilling babysitter of a precocious little girl who turns his life around.

name: Law of Desire
plot: A gay filmmaker becomes involved with an obsessive fan while still pining for his absent true love. Meanwhile, he shares a close but complex relationship with his trans sister, an actress.

name: The Last Metro
plot: In occupied Paris, an actress married to a Jewish theater owner must keep him hidden from the Germans while doing both of their jobs.

name: Family Business
plot: An ex professor offers Adam $1,000,000 to "get" some plasma from a high tech company's lab. Adam asks his criminal grandpa for help. Can they convince Adam's now honest dad to join?

name: Anand
plot: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

name: Ghoulies II
plot: The Ghoulies wreak havoc at an amusement park, disposing of those who mistake them for mere fairground attractions.

name: Street Smart
plot: A New York journalist lies when his fake story about a pimp describes a real pimp up for murder.

name: It's Pat: The Movie
plot: The comedic misadventures of a person of indeterminate gender.

name: From Justin to Kelly
plot: A waitress from Texas and a college student from Pennsylvania meet during spring break in Fort Lauderdale, Florida and come together through their shared love of singing.

name: DEFCON-4
plot: Two men and a woman circle the globe in a satellite armed with a nuclear device. The third world war breaks out, and a few months later the satellite crashes. They survive the crash but one man gets killed by survivors and the other man gets caught. The woman stays by the remains of the the satellite but is soon caught by evil punks who have taken power.

name: Dragon Ball: Curse of the Blood Rubies
plot: Goku and his friends must stop King Gurumes from destroying the city for blood rubies and gathering the seven Dragon Balls.

name: Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah
plot: Time travelers use Godzilla in their scheme to destroy Japan to prevent the country's future economic reign.

name: Doom Asylum
plot: A horribly disfigured lawyer, wrongfully pronounced dead after a terrible car accident, is taken to an asylum for dissection, only to come back alive, kill everyone, and make the asylum his killing grounds.

name: Legacy of Rage
plot: Brandon Ma is an average Joe but his best friend, Michael, is a sinister drug dealer with a crush on Brandon's girlfriend, May. When Michael murders a dirty cop and frames his friend, sending him to jail, Brandon returns for vengeance.

name: Lisztomania
plot: Composer and pianist Franz Liszt (Roger Daltrey) attempts to overcome his hedonistic life-style while repeatedly being drawn back into it by the many women in his life and fellow composer Richard Wagner (Paul Nicholas).

name: Love Streams
plot: Two closely bound, emotionally wounded souls reunite after years apart.

name: Joyeux Noel
plot: In December 1914, an unofficial Christmas truce on the Western Front allows soldiers from opposing sides of the First World War to gain insight into each other's way of life.

name: The Trip to Bountiful
plot: In 1940s Texas, an elderly woman is determined to visit her childhood home one last time.

name: Camille Claudel
plot: Camille Claude impresses already-famous sculptor Auguste Rodin. He hires her as an assistant, but soon Camille begins to sculpt for herself and she also becomes his mistress. But after a while, she would like to get out of his shadow.

name: Best of the Best II
plot: The Colosseum is the fighting arena owned by the champion Bracus. Now after the death of their friend, Tommy Lee and Alex Grady want revenge.

name: Hopscotch
plot: Grounded with a desk job by incompetent superiors, a clever CIA agent retires and writes a tell all memoir that will embarrass his bosses, prompting him to go on the run and elude them.

name: The Seduction
plot: A popular anchorwoman, Jaime Douglas, is stalked by a photographer who's obsessed with her and wants to win her affections at any cost.

name: Meatballs Part II
plot: Second in the series of Meatball movies. A group of kids attempt to save a summer camp that's a financial failure.

name: I Am David
plot: A twelve-year-old boy escapes from a Bulgarian Communist concentration camp and sets out on a journey to reach Denmark.

name: Hiding Out
plot: A stockbroker on the run from the mob decides to hide out from them by enrolling as a high-school student.

name: Emmanuelle 3
plot: Emmanuelle and her architect husband continue their amoral lifestyle in the Seychelles. But when a casual dalliance between her and a film director starts to turn serious her husband shows very traditional signs of jealousy

name: Plunkett & Macleane
plot: Two robbers are persecuted by the law, whose servants are not much better and even worse.

name: At Play in the Fields of the Lord
plot: Martin and Hazel Quarrier are small-town fundamentalist missionaries sent to the jungles of South America to convert the Indians. Their remote mission was previously run by the Catholics, before the natives murdered them all. They are sent by the pompous Leslie Huben, who runs the missionary effort in the area but who seems more concerned about competing with his Catholic 'rivals' than in the Indians themselves. Hazel is terrified of the Indians while Martin is fascinated. Soon American pilot Lewis Moon joins the Indian tribe but is attracted by Leslie's young wife, Andy. Can the interaction of these characters and cultures, and the advancing bulldozers of civilization, avoid disaster?

name: Manhattan Murder Mystery
plot: A middle-aged couple suspects foul play when their neighbor's wife suddenly drops dead.

name: Leave It to Beaver
plot: Theodore "Beaver" Cleaver, age 8, has misadventures and learns life lessons in this entertaining, hilarious tale of a small-town Ohio family and the daily trials of life.

name: Hard Hunted
plot: An international arms dealer will stop at nothing to retrieve a stolen Chinese nuclear relay hidden in a jade Buddha figurine. It's up to a group of undercover federal agents stationed in Hawaii to stop it falling into the wrong hands.

name: An Eye for an Eye
plot: A SFPD undercover narcotics cop aims to avenge his partner's death and destroy a drug-smuggling ring operated by the Chinese Triads.

name: Police Academy 6: City Under Siege
plot: Those bumbling cadets take to the streets when three inept goons successfully orchestrate a metropolitan crime wave.

name: Cop
plot: An obsessive, insubordinate homicide cop is convinced a serial killer is loose in the Hollywood area and disobeys orders in order to catch him.

name: Trinity Is Still My Name
plot: Bambino tries to teach his brother Trinity how to become an outlaw, but the two wind up saving a pioneer family and breaking up an arms ring instead.

name: Winter Kills
plot: The younger brother of an assassinated US President is led down a rabbit hole of conspiracies and dead ends after learning of a man claiming to be the real shooter.

name: Shakedown
plot: A legal aid attorney and renegade cop team up to stop a corrupt cop.

name: Beyond the Sea
plot: A swooning study of "Mack the Knife" singer Bobby Darin and specifically his relationship with wife Sandra Dee.

name: A Heart in Winter
plot: Stéphane is an emotionally distant but professionally dedicated violin restorer whose cold heart is tested when his employer's new girlfriend, a beautiful violinist, falls for him.

name: Other People's Money
plot: A corporate raider buys up shares in an undervalued company and falls in love with the founder's son's lawyer/step daughter. Let the battle begin.

name: Cadillac Man
plot: Joey gets 2 days to sell 12 cars to keep his job and keep his girlfriends happy. It gets worse. He's juggling 3 buyers when a guy with a machine gun crashes into the car dealership and takes everybody hostage.

name: Lemon Popsicle
plot: Three friends live their lives in 1950s Israel, each looking for someone to love.

name: The Watermelon Woman
plot: A young black lesbian filmmaker probes into the life of The Watermelon Woman, a 1930s black actress who played 'mammy' archetypes.

name: I Want You
plot: A young boy and his sister are drawn into one man's obsessive pursuit of his former lover.

name: Female Perversions
plot: An ambitious female attorney wallows in excess and meaningless sex with both male and female partners, while dealing with her personal life problems including helping her kleptomaniac sister.

name: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
plot: The owner of an historic South Side Chicago barbershop is pressured to sell out to a land developer, but must face the impact this would have on his close-knit community.

name: The Truth About Charlie
plot: A woman returns from holiday to find her husband has been murdered, and several groups of people are pressuring her to unravel the mystery of his true identity and activities during his final days.

name: A Man Called Horse
plot: In 1825, an English aristocrat is captured by Native Americans. He lives with them and begins to understand their way of life. Eventually, he is accepted as part of the tribe and aspires to become their leader.

name: Can't Stop the Music
plot: A pseudo autobiography of disco's The Village People.

name: Brown Sugar
plot: Friends since childhood, a magazine editor and a hip-hop record executive stumble into romantic territory.

name: Band of the Hand
plot: Five juvenile lost causes are sent to the Everglades where a war veteran tries to reform them using survival tactics. Their new skills and resolve are tested when a Miami drug lord targets them for trying to clean up their neighborhood.

name: Gray's Anatomy
plot: After doctors inform him that an eye affliction will require risky surgery, monologist Spalding Gray recounts his various pursuits for alternative medicine to avoid the doctor's scalpel.

name: The Nine Lives of Fritz the Cat
plot: Fritz the Cat may have lost one of his lives in the comics, but in his new movie, he has eight more lives left to go! While his wife screams at him, Fritz lights up a joint and reminiscences about what could have been.

name: Follow That Bird
plot: Big Bird is sent to live far from Sesame Street by a pesky social worker named Miss Finch. Unhappy, he runs away from there, prompting the rest of the Sesame Street gang to go on a cross-country journey to find him.

name: Wasabi
plot: In Japan for the funeral of his long-lost love, a tough French detective learns that he also has a teenage daughter and that her life is in danger from the Yakuza.

name: Midsommer
plot: Christian's sister commits suicide. Why? After his 4 friends graduate secondary school, they head off to a Swedish cabin for midsummer as previous years. Strange things happen. Is it his sister's spirit?

name: Target
plot: When American Donna Lloyd is kidnapped during a trip to Europe, her son Chris and her husband Walter start searching for her.

name: Student Bodies
plot: A serial killer with his signature heavy breathing proceeds to systematically kill the students and teachers of Lamab high school.

name: The Nude Vampire
plot: A young man falls in love with a beautiful woman being chased by sinister masked figures at night. He tries to track her down, and learns she's being held captive by his father and colleagues who believe she's a vampire.

name: Cromwell
plot: Puritan statesman Oliver Cromwell leads England in a civil war against the absolutist and Catholic-sympathetic King Charles I.

name: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
plot: A space alien is threatening to bring destruction on Earth, and the Power Rangers are enhanced with turbo powers in order to prevent her plan.

name: Dead of Winter
plot: A fledgling actress is lured to a remote mansion for a screen-test, soon discovering she is actually a prisoner in the middle of a blackmail plot.

name: Mobsters
plot: From start to finish, this is a story of friendship between four street-wise mates who don't mind using violence to achieve the lives that they want. They trust no one but each other, which is vital to their success as mobsters.

name: Wise Blood
plot: Fresh out of the army, Hazel Motes attempts to open the first Church Without Christ in the small town of Taulkinham.

name: Darkness
plot: A teenage girl moves into a remote country house with her family, only to discover that their gloomy new home has a horrifying past that threatens to destroy the family.

name: The Song Remains the Same
plot: The line forms here for the world's greatest and possibly most influential band--Led Zeppelin. This mesmerizing movie built around Zep's famed 1973 concerts at New York's Madison Square Garden is convincing proof why.

name: Ashes of Time
plot: A broken-hearted hit man moves to the desert where he finds skilled swordsmen to carry out his contract killings.

name: The Shape of Things
plot: A quiet, unassuming man begins to change in a major way as a result of meeting a new, art-student girlfriend, and his friends are unsettled by the transformation.

name: Kickboxer 2: The Road Back
plot: David's brother, Kurt, defeats Po in Kickboxer (1989). A year after Po kills Kurt, David, who has a kickboxing gym in LA, is manipulated into a match against Po.

name: Fun with Dick and Jane
plot: When a successful, middle-class couple finds themselves unemployed and in debt, they turn to armed robbery in desperation.

name: Munchie
plot: In this in-name-only sequel to Munchies (1987), a new kid in town, Gage Dobson, can't find his place in the new environment despite having such a cool name. The kids at school bully him, the girl he likes and his mom is about to marry a scoundrel. Everything changes for Gage Dobson when he stumbles into Munchie, a friendly gremlin-like creature that dresses like a lounge singer, sounds like a stand-up comedian and has magic powers.

name: An Ideal Husband
plot: London 1895: Cabinet minister, Sir Chiltern, and bachelor, Lord Goring, are victims of scheming women.

name: Young Doctors in Love
plot: In a zany parody of hospital soap operas, a new batch of doctors begins their internship at City Hospital.

name: Giallo in Venice
plot: In Venice a detective is on the trail of a killer who commits a double murder (a married couple) then more grisly killings occur. Sex, drugs, gore and perversions are ingredients of this sadistic and sleazy giallo.

name: Chocolat
plot: A French woman returns to her childhood home in Cameroon - formerly a colonial outpost - where she's flooded by memories, particularly of Protée, her servant.

name: Outside Providence
plot: After one too many run ins with the law, a punk teenager from a working class background is sent to prep school by his frustrated dad, and learns a thing or two.

name: Julien Donkey-Boy
plot: A portrait of the effects of schizophrenia on family life is the central focus.

name: Play It Again, Sam
plot: A neurotic film critic obsessed with the movie Casablanca (1942) attempts to get over his wife leaving him by dating again with the help of a married couple and his illusory idol, Humphrey Bogart.

name: Twelfth Night
plot: Shakespeare's comedy of gender confusion, in which a girl disguises herself as a man to be near the count she adores, only to be pursued by the woman he loves.

name: The Big Town
plot: A dice roller falls in love with a talented dancer who happens to be the wife to a gangster.

name: Hello Mary Lou: Prom Night II
plot: Thirty years after her accidental death at her 1957 senior prom, the tortured spirit of prom queen Mary Lou Maloney returns to seek revenge.

name: Extreme Measures
plot: A young doctor confronts a famous colleague when he learns about the true methods of his work.

name: Appleseed
plot: In a utopian society created at the end of the third world war, a female warrior who has been plucked from the badlands begins to see cracks in this new facade. And what does this community have planned for the rest of humankind?

name: The Phantom Tollbooth
plot: Milo is a boy who is bored with life. One day he comes home to find a toll booth in his room. Having nothing better to do, he gets in his toy car and drives through - only to emerge in a world full of adventure.

name: 1990: The Bronx Warriors
plot: In a post-apocalyptic New York City, a policeman infiltrates the Bronx, which has become a battleground for several murderous street gangs.

name: The Pallbearer
plot: A young man's life is thrown into a loop when he is asked to be a pallbearer for the funeral of a classmate he doesn't remember, and his old high school crush temporarily returns to town.

name: Ghost in the Machine
