plot: An electric surge causes a serial killer's soul to end up in a computer system.

name: Taxi 3
plot: Out to stop a new gang disguised as Santa Claus, Emilien and Daniel must also handle major changes in their personal relationships.

name: Jason's Lyric
plot: Two brothers, survivors of family tragedy, take different life paths: one falls for a high-spirited waitress and dreams of success, the other follows a life of petty crime. Their lives reconnect in shattering fashion.

name: Mortal Thoughts
plot: Two detectives interrogate a hairdresser on two homicides she may or may not have been involved in.

name: Onegin
plot: Russia, 1820s: Onegin inherits his uncle's country estate and moves there from St. Petersburg. He befriends his neighbor, Lensky, and meets Tatyana through him. She falls in love with Onegin but he just wants friendship.

name: Multiple Maniacs
plot: Watch as the life of a leader of a menacing group of deviants, explodes in a spectacle of debauchery. Accidentally filmed from beginning to end, on purpose.

name: Trading Mom
plot: Three children have had it with their mother, and magically make her disappear. They then head out to the "Mommy Market" for a replacement mother.

name: Surf Nazis Must Die
plot: When the son of a gun-wielding woman is murdered by neo-Nazi surf punks in the post-apocalyptic future, his Mama hunts them down for some bloodthirsty revenge.

name: Raw Force
plot: A group of martial-arts students is heading to an island that supposedly is home to the ghosts of martial artists who have lost their honor. A Hitler lookalike and his gang are running a female-slavery operation on the island as well. When the two groups meet, all sorts of crazy things happen, involving cannibal monks, piranhas, zombies, and more.

name: Camp
plot: After a series of Broadway flops, songwriter Bert Hanley (Dixon) goes to work at a musical camp for young performers. Inspired by the kids, he finds an opportunity to regain success by staging an altogether new production.

name: Nice Dreams
plot: Disguised as ice cream vendors, Cheech and Chong make--and subsequently lose--millions of dollars selling a batch of marijuana with an unusual side effect.

name: Hollywood Chainsaw Hookers
plot: A detective embarks on a mission to track down a woman in L.A.'s seedy nightclubs, only to come face-to-face with a blood-thirsty cult of lethally beautiful prostitutes. Is he the next victim of Hollywood's demented Chainsaw Hookers?

name: 8 Heads in a Duffel Bag
plot: A mob bagman finds that his luggage, containing the proof of his gang's latest hit, has been switched.

name: They're Coming to Get You!
plot: A woman recovering from a car accident in which she lost her unborn child finds herself pursued by a coven of devil worshipers.

name: Feeling Minnesota
plot: An ex-convict and his bumbling crook brother fight for the same woman.

name: Vampire Circus
plot: As the plague sweeps the countryside, a quarantined village is visited by a mysterious traveling circus. Soon, young children begin to disappear, and the locals suspect the circus troupe might be hiding a horrifying secret.

name: Havana
plot: In 1950s Cuba, a professional gambler falls for a woman heavily involved in the revolution movement.

name: The Efficiency Expert
plot: An expert on productivity shows wacky workers in 1966 Australia how to run their moccasin factory like clockwork, despite laying off more than half the workforce.

name: Light of Day
plot: A pair of siblings must choose whether to pursue their dream of touring with their rock band or support their family and stay in Cleveland, Ohio.

name: Freeway II: Confessions of a Trickbaby
plot: A teenage prostitute escapes from a juvenile prison with a 16-year-old serial killer and both go on a destructive road trip to Mexico in this twist on the "Hansel and Gretel" fairy tale.

name: There's Nothing Out There
plot: When a horror film buff tries to warn his friends spending spring break in a house in the woods of impending danger, they scoff at him, that is, until a huge mutant frog starts to pick them up one by one.

name: Soul Survivors
plot: A college student is caught between the world of the living and the dead.

name: The Offence
plot: A burnt-out British police detective finally snaps whilst interrogating a suspected child molester.

name: Fever Pitch
plot: A sports fan's romantic courtship clashes with his obsession with his favorite football team.

name: Anything Else
plot: Jerry Falk learns a lesson the hard way when he falls in love with the beautiful but flighty Amanda.

name: Lassie
plot: When a family of 4 moves from Baltimore to a farm in rural Virginia, they adopt an abandoned collie. The dog becomes the son's companion and protector, helping him adapt to rural life.

name: Space Mutiny
plot: A pilot is the only hope to stop the mutiny of a spacecraft by its security crew, who plot to sell the crew of the ship into slavery.

name: Brain Dead
plot: In a showdown of man versus machine, Martin plunges into a chaotic nightmare trying to save his mind from the megalomaniacal corporation.

name: Motorama
plot: A ten year-old boy runs away from his abusive parents, steals a Mustang, and a pursues a promotional card game sold at gas stations.

name: Ice Cream Man
plot: Poor Gregory. After being released from the Wishing Well Sanatorium, all he wants to do is make the children happy. So Gregory reopens the old ice cream factory, and all the unappreciative brats are reprocessed into the flavor of the day.

name: The Slipper and the Rose: The Story of Cinderella
plot: A musical retelling of the classic tale of Cinderella. In the tiny kingdom of Euphrania, the King and his court are anxious to get Prince Edward wed. But Edward wants to marry for love.

name: Blood Sucking Freaks
plot: In the Theatre of the Macabre in New York Sardu and his assistants present a show involving the torture and mutilation of young women. The audience assumes it is just an act but the torture is real, as are the deaths.

name: Legionnaire
plot: Alain is a boxer in 1925 Marseille, France. When he doesn't take the dive paid to take by a mob boss, he has to split. He joins the Foreign Legion and is sent to Morocco. He makes 3 friends and they watch each other's backs.

name: Metropolitan
plot: A group of young upper-class Manhattanites are blithely passing through the gala debutante season, when an unusual outsider joins them and stirs them up.

name: Bloodline
plot: When her father is murdered, a pharmaceutical heiress becomes the next target of an unknown killer amid the international jet set.

name: Countess Dracula
plot: In 17th-century Hungary, elderly widow Countess Elisabeth Nádasdy maintains her misleading youthful appearance by bathing in the blood of virgins regularly supplied to her by faithful servant Captain Dobi.

name: The Last Days
plot: In late 1944, even as they faced imminent defeat, the Nazis expended enormous resources to kill or deport over 425,000 Jews during the "cleansing" of Hungary. This Oscar-winning documentary, executive produced by Steven Spielberg, focuses on the plight of five Hungarian Jews who survived imprisonment in Auschwitz.

name: My Lucky Stars
plot: Muscles, cop from Hong Kong, is in Japan chasing a bad HK cop. His cop partner gets taken by the ninja gang. Muscles gets his 5 old no-good friends from the orphanage to help find the bad cop. Lots of comedy and kung-fu fighting follows.

name: Under Suspicion
plot: Disgraced detective Tony fakes evidence in divorce cases, implicates wife in Stasio affair. Stasio and wife shot dead in hotel. Tony's ex-partner Frank investigates, suspects inheritance-seeking mistress Angeline and inconsistent Tony.

name: Avenging Angel
plot: Molly, former prostitute, has managed to leave her street life with help from Lt. Andrews. She studies law and leads a normal life. When Andrews is killed by a brutal gang, she returns to the streets as Angel to find his killers.

name: Candyman: Farewell to the Flesh
plot: The Candyman arrives in New Orleans and sets his sights on a young woman whose family was ruined by the immortal killer years before.

name: D.O.A.
plot: A college professor's day: his top student allegedly commits suicide, his wife presents him with divorce papers and he overnights in a freshman girl's dorm. The next day: more murders around him. Will he find the killer in time?

name: The Street Fighter
plot: After failing to reach a deal with her enemies, a mercenary karateka protects the daughter of a recently-deceased oil tycoon from the evil conglomerate gunning for her inheritance.

name: Roma
plot: A fluid, unconnected and sometimes chaotic procession of scenes detailing the various people and events of life in Italy's capital, most of it based on director Federico Fellini's life.

name: The Preacher's Wife
plot: An angel comes to Earth to help a preacher save his church and his family.

name: Royal Deceit
plot: An old Norse legend of revenge, power and human spirit, that subsequently inspired William Shakespeare on his tragedy - Hamlet.

name: Ripley Under Ground
plot: Professional swindler hides the death of a famous artist in order to earn money by selling pictures on his own behalf.

name: The Killer Nun
plot: Legendary Swedish sex bomb Anita Ekberg stars as Sister Gertrude, a cruel nun who discovers depraved pleasure in a frenzy of drug addiction, sexual degradation and sadistic murder.

name: Avanti!
plot: A successful businessman goes to Italy to arrange for the return of his tycoon father's body--and discovers that Dad died with his long-time mistress.

name: The Four Musketeers: Milady's Revenge
plot: The Four Musketeers defend the queen and her dressmaker from Cardinal Richelieu and Milady de Winter.

name: One True Thing
plot: A career woman reassesses her parents' lives after she is forced to care for her cancer-stricken mother.

name: Agnes of God
plot: When a naive novice nun is discovered with a dead newborn in her convent quarters, a court-appointed psychiatrist investigates her case.

name: The Last Movie
plot: After a film production wraps in Peru, an American wrangler decides to stay behind to witness the ways that filmmaking affects the locals.

name: Jack's Back
plot: A serial killer in Los Angeles celebrates Jack the Ripper's 100th birthday by committing similar murders and only one has a chance of stopping him.

name: Ludwig
plot: The reign of the tormented Ludwig, king of Bavaria, from 1864 to 1886.

name: Sex and Zen
plot: A man marries a beautiful wife, but decides to go out and experience as many sexual conquests as possible, with unusual and often hilarious results. Meanwhile, his wife is forced to enter a brothel and work as a prostitute.

name: Hangmen
plot: Rob Greene has information about an undercover terror team inside the CIA led by Joe Connelly. To stay alive with the knowledge, he is advised to stay undercover by his supervisor Andrews. Connelly's men try to kill Greene, but he can escape and warns his son Danny that he also may be in danger and that he should look for Dog Thompson, an old military friend of Greene's. Together with Thompson and Bone Conn, another ex-soldier, Danny tries to escape Connelly's henchmen. Meanwhile, Connelly figures that Danny's friend Lisa would make a good target in order to get Danny and also his father.

name: Twin Sitters
plot: A business executive is releasing dangerous toxins and the Barbarian Brothers set out to stop his evil work.

name: Dolemite
plot: After he is released from jail, a pimp takes on the criminals and corrupt police officers who framed him in the first place.

name: I.Q.
plot: A mechanic romances the mathematician niece of physicist Albert Einstein, with help from him and his friends.

name: Robinson Crusoe
plot: 1703: Robinson Crusoe has to leave Scotland for a year, but after months sailing, a storm wrecks his ship. He ends up as only survivor on a desolate island.

name: Venom
plot: Terrorists in the process of kidnapping a child get trapped in a house with an extremely deadly snake.

name: Lovers and Other Strangers
plot: Mike and Susan's wedding is overshadowed by family drama, including Mike's brother's divorce, Susan's father's affair, her sister's marital troubles, and Mike's friend pursuing the maid of honor.

name: Chasing Papi
plot: A successful executive in the cosmetic industry has three sexy girlfriends in three different states. When they decide to visit him in L.A., he's in big trouble.

name: Police Story 2
plot: The Hong Kong supercop must stop a group of blackmailing bombers, while the villains of Police Story (1985) are out for revenge.

name: Three... Extremes
plot: An Asian cross-cultural trilogy of horror films from accomplished indie directors.

name: Kull the Conqueror
plot: A barbarian warrior becomes a king when he defeats a king in armed combat and the king's heir conspire to overthrow him and reclaim the throne by resurrecting an evil sorceress.

name: Wide Sargasso Sea
plot: A young female landowner in 1840s Jamaica marries a just-arrived Englishman to avoid losing her property. All seems to be perfect, love arises, and happiness is on the way, but she is hiding an old secret regarding her childhood and her mother. Slowly, this secret begins to erode this perfect relationship and, perhaps, her mother's story will begin again...with her.

name: Femalien
plot: A race of extraterrestrials has evolved to exist only as beams of light. Having no physical experience in their collective memory, they send Kara to Earth to experience as many sensations as possible.

name: The Element of Crime
plot: A cop in a dystopian Europe investigates a serial killings suspect using controversial methods written by his now disgraced former mentor.

name: Big Wednesday
plot: The lives of some California surfers from the early 1960s to the 1970s.

name: Blood Harvest
plot: Jill, visiting home from college, arrives to find her parents missing, and their home vandalized. Soon, matters take a turn for the worse, when she finds herself stalked, and her friends disappearing one by one.

name: Pinocchio's Revenge
plot: A suburban defense lawyer mistakenly gives her troubled daughter, Zoe, a wooden puppet belonging to a deceased serial killer. The toy fills the void of friendship in Zoe's life, but Zoe begins to act increasingly strange and violent.

name: Dumplings
plot: Aunt Mei's famous homemade dumplings provide amazing age-defying qualities popular with middle-aged women. But her latest customer - a fading actress - is determined to find out what the secret ingredient is.

name: 3 Ninjas: Knuckle Up
plot: Rocky, Colt and Tum Tum are back in an all new adventure everyone will fall for.

name: Devil Hunter
plot: a young woman modelling in South America is kidnapped for ransom in the jungle when a Vietnam veteran is going to rescue her only to find out that the jungle is filled with cannibals

name: An Innocent Man
plot: A man is framed by two corrupt cops for drugs. After he gets out of prison, he comes after them.

name: Demon Wind
plot: With the need to investigate the mysterious death of his grandparents, Cory and his friends assemble back to the old farm where it all began, sixty years earlier.

name: Brewster McCloud
plot: An introverted loner living in the bowels of the Astrodome plots to develop - with the aid of a mysterious guardian angel - a pair of wings that will help him fly.

name: Fluke
plot: After a man dies in a car crash, he is reincarnated as a dog and attempts to reconnect with his family.

name: So Close
plot: A conflict of interest between two high-kicking assassin sisters is complicated as they're pursued by the criminals who hired them and an equally high-kicking female cop.

name: Rugrats in Paris
plot: While on a family vacation in Paris, the Rugrats attempt to help Chuckie find a new mom while stopping his dad from marrying a conniving businesswoman who hates kids.

name: Without a Clue
plot: A drunken Sherlock Holmes is really just a cover for the real detective, Dr. Watson.

name: Nekromantik 2
plot: A female nurse desperately tries to hide her feelings of necrophilia from her new boyfriend, but still has pieces of the corpse of the first movie's hero in her possession.

name: Ginger Snaps Back: The Beginning
plot: Set in 19th Century Canada, Brigette and her sister Ginger take refuge in a Traders' Fort which later becomes under siege by some savage werewolves.

name: The Last Supper
plot: A group of idealistic, but frustrated, liberals succumb to the temptation of murdering rightwing pundits for their political beliefs.

name: Revolution
plot: A trapper and his young son get pulled into the American revolution early as unwilling participants and remain involved through to the end.

name: Out of Bounds
plot: Daryl's parents ship him off to the big city to live with his brother, hoping he will have a better life there. After a baggage mix-up at the airport, Daryl finds himself in possession of a drug cache, which a drug dealer wants back.

name: The In-Laws
plot: Right before his daughter's wedding, a mild-mannered foot doctor discovers that his future son-in-law's father is a free-wheeling international spy.

name: Tough Guys
plot: Two elderly gangsters are released from prison only to find they have trouble fitting in as old men who still take no guff from anyone.

name: Time of the Gypsies
plot: In this luminous tale set in the area around Sarajevo and in Italy, Perhan, an engaging young Romany (gypsy) with telekinetic powers, is seduced by the quick-cash world of petty crime, which threatens to destroy him and those he loves.

name: Brimstone & Treacle
plot: A strange young man has a sinister effect on the family of a middle-aged writer.

name: The Devil
plot: During the Prussian army's invasion to Poland in 1793, a young Polish nobleman, Jakub is saved from the imprisonment by a stranger who wants in return to obtain a list of his fellow conspirators. Following his mysterious savior across the country, Jakub sees the overall chaos and moral corruption including his father's death and the betrayal of his friend who stole his fiancee. Being apparently demented by what he has seen, he commits a number of seemingly motiveless and gory killings.

name: The Eight Immortals Restaurant: The Untold Story
plot: Macau cops begin to suspect a man running a pork buns restaurant of murder, after tracing the origin of a case full of chopped up human remains that washed ashore, which leads them to him.

name: The Woods
plot: Set in 1965 New England, a troubled girl encounters mysterious happenings in the woods surrounding an isolated girls school that she was sent to by her disinterested parents.

name: A Moment to Remember
plot: A young couple's enduring love is tested when 27-year-old Su-jin is diagnosed with a rare form of Alzheimer's disease.

name: Moontrap
plot: NASA finds remains of an ancient humanoid race on the Moon that left behind deadly robots.

name: Gloomy Sunday
plot: Follows three men who are in love with a beautiful waitress during World War II: an intellectual restaurant owner, a mysterious musician, and an erratic businessman.

name: Supercross
plot: Faced with the suspicious death of their father, two brothers must motivate one another to get back on their bikes and take the Las Vegas Motocross Championships by storm.

name: Shadows in the Sun
plot: An aspiring young writer (Jackson) tracks a literary titan (Keitel) suffering from writers block to his refuge in rural Italy and learns about life and love from the irascible genius and his daughters.

name: Kikujiro
plot: A young, naive boy sets out alone on the road to find his wayward mother. Soon he finds an unlikely protector in a crotchety man and the two have a series of unexpected adventures along the way.

name: The Hit
plot: Ten years after ratting on his old mobster friends in exchange for personal immunity, two hit men drive a hardened criminal to Paris for his execution. However, while on the way, whatever can go wrong, does go wrong.

name: Nathalie...
plot: A rich woman hires an elite prostitute in order to verify her husband's faithfulness. Before long the experiment gets out of control.

name: Love in the Afternoon
plot: Though he has an adoring wife, a bourgeois man is still tempted to pursue other women.

name: Tarzoon: Shame of the Jungle
plot: Shame, the ape man of the jungle, sets off to rescue his woman, June, when a gang of giant penises kidnaps her.

name: Absolute Beginners
plot: In London in 1958, a young photographer seeks media stardom to keep the love of a beautiful, aspiring fashion designer.

name: Return of the Killer Tomatoes!
plot: Crazy old Professor Gangreen has developed a way to make tomatoes look human for a second invasion.

name: The Distinguished Gentleman
plot: A conman discovers during a "job" that US Congress is where the money is. "Name recognition" gets him elected. Will he develop a conscience?

name: A Fish Tale
plot: Three children accidentally get turned into fish after drinking a potion made by an eccentric scientist. When the kids end up in the sea, they must find the antidote within 48 hours or remain as fish forever.

name: Corky Romano
plot: The loser son of a Mafia honcho must go undercover for the FBI.

name: Pink Cadillac
plot: Skip tracer Tommy looks for bail-jumper Lou Ann. Her crime is marrying Roy, who left counterfeit money in their mobile home and got her arrested. She leaves Roy in his pink Cadillac full of money. His psycho friends want their money back.

name: CrissCross
plot: A 12-year-old boy comes of age in 1969 Key West against the backdrop of the Apollo moon landing, when he begins to sell cocaine so his mother can stop stripping.

name: Beyond the Clouds
plot: Four stories about short or long relationships between men and women in Italy and France.

name: The Tall Guy
plot: A nasty comedian's assistant has allergy induced sneezes, giving problems at work, et cetera. He accepts weekly injections after seeing the cute nurse. After a dozen injections, he finally asks her out.

name: Texasville
plot: The summer of 1984: 32 years after Duane Jackson captained the high school football team and Jacy Farrow was homecoming queen, the small town of Anarene, Texas prepares for its centennial celebration. Oil prices are down, banks are failing, and Duane's $12 million in debt. His wife Karla drinks too much, his children are always in trouble, and he tom-cats around with the wives of friends. Jacy's back in town, after a mildly successful acting career, life in Italy, and the death of her son. People assume Duane and Jacy will resume their high school romance. And Sonny is "tired in his mind," causing worries for his safety. Can these friends find equilibrium in middle age?

name: The Dungeonmaster
plot: A demonic wizard challenges a modern-day computer programmer to a battle of technology vs. sorcery, with the programmer's girlfriend as the prize.

name: Quicksilver
plot: Jack was doing great trading shares until he wasn't. He gets a job on a bike at Quicksilver speed delivery. There he befriends Hector and the cute Terri. Jack gets an enemy in the criminal Gypsy.

name: The Gingerdead Man
plot: An evil yet adorable Gingerbread man comes to life with the soul of a convicted killer - this real life cookie monster wreaks havoc on the girl who sent the killer to the electric chair.

name: The Loss of Sexual Innocence
plot: Nic's life in glimpses at ages 5, 12, 16 and later film director and husband/dad.

name: The Perfect Weapon
plot: An expert in "kenpo" karate avenges his Koreatown friend, slain by a mobster in Los Angeles.

name: The Ballad of Narayama
plot: In a poor 19th century rural Japanese village, everyone who reaches the age of 70 has to climb a nearby mountain to die. An elderly woman is reaching close to her cut-off age during her last days with her family.

name: Desperate Living
plot: A neurotic society woman murders her husband with her maid's help; on the lam, they escape to Mortville, a homeless community ruled by a fascist queen.

name: Scotland, Pa.
plot: In a modernized retelling of "MacBeth" set in 1970s suburban Pennsylvania, Joe McBeth, an unambitious hamburger stand employee, is driven to success by his scheming wife.

name: Maid in Sweden
plot: Innocent teenager, Inga, goes to visit her sister in Stockholm, and finds her living with her secret boyfriend, Casten. Away from her controlling mother, she slowly embraces change, and succumbs to a boy's charms.

name: Faust
plot: A man sells his soul to the devil to gain superpowers and avenge his girlfriend's brutal murder. When he realizes that the price is the soul of his new love interest, he turns on the devil.

name: Parents
plot: A young boy living in 1950s suburbia suspects that his parents are cannibalistic murderers.

name: Body Count
plot: A group of teens are stalked and killed by a Shaman at a cursed camping site.

name: Ninja in the Dragon's Den
plot: Two rival warriors, a Japanese and a Chinese, are forced to work together after their master has been killed by a mighty enemy.

name: The Draughtsman's Contract
plot: A young artist is commissioned by the wife of a wealthy landowner to make a series of drawings of the estate while her husband is away.

name: Possession
plot: A pair of literary sleuths unearth the amorous secret of two Victorian poets only to find themselves falling under a passionate spell.

name: Avalon
plot: A Polish-Jewish family comes to the U.S. at the beginning of the twentieth century. There, the family and their children try to make themselves a better future in the so-called promised land.

name: She Hate Me
plot: Fired from his job for exposing corrupt business practices, a former biotech executive turns to impregnating wealthy lesbians for profit.

name: The Choirboys
plot: A group of Los Angeles cops decide to take off some of the pressures of their jobs by engaging in various forms of after hours debauchery.

name: Taste the Blood of Dracula
plot: After killing his disciple, three English gentlemen unwittingly resurrect Count Dracula, who seeks to avenge his servant by making the trio die by the hands of their own children.

name: A Short Film About Killing
plot: A soon-to-be lawyer crosses his path with a taxi driver and a young sinister man.

name: The Satanic Rites of Dracula
plot: In 1974, Professor Lorrimer Van Helsing investigates a satanic cult on behalf of Scotland Yard, only to discover a plot by Count Dracula to wipe out humanity with a bubonic plague.

name: True Confessions
plot: A worldly ambitious monsignor clashes with his older brother, a cynical Los Angeles homicide detective who is investigating the brutal murder of a young prostitute.

name: The Sailor Who Fell from Grace with the Sea
plot: After his father dies, a disturbed young boy plots to take revenge on the new man in his mother's life.

name: Black Belly of the Tarantula
plot: A series of victims are paralyzed while having their bellies ripped open, much in the same way tarantulas are killed by the black wasp. The victims all seem to have a connection with a spa.

name: Mary Reilly
plot: A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Henry Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Edward Hyde.

name: Music of the Heart
plot: After Roberta Guaspari separates from her husband, she receives encouragement from her mother to take up a job of a music teacher at the Central Park East School in East Harlem.

name: The Electric Horseman
plot: A rodeo star past his prime steals his company's horse and rides into the desert, accompanied by a feisty reporter.

name: Where the Day Takes You
plot: King is a young man, but he's already a veteran of life on the streets of Los Angeles. The leader of a group of runaways, King acts as a mentor to troubled kids such as gay hustler Little J and junkie Greg.

name: Before and After
plot: Two parents deal with the effects when their son is accused of murdering his girlfriend.

name: Father Hood
plot: Adventures of a deadbeat dad who kidnaps his kids from the bus. Based on the true life stories and experiences of Michael J. Hardy.

name: Aspen Extreme
plot: An autoworker and his buddy exit Detroit, move to Colorado, and become popular ski instructors.

name: American Ninja 2: The Confrontation
plot: On a remote Caribbean island, Army Ranger Joe Armstrong investigates the disappearance of several marines, which leads him to The Lion, a super-criminal who has kidnapped a local scientist and mass-produced an army of mutant Ninja warriors.

name: Instinct
plot: When noted anthropologist Dr. Ethan Powell, who left society to live in the jungle, is imprisoned for murder, it's up to young psychiatrist Theo Caulder to get through to him.

name: North Sea Hijack
plot: When terrorists take over two oil rigs, and threaten to blow them up if their demands are not met, an eccentric anti-terrorism expert volunteers his unique commando unit to stop them.

name: Crazy People
plot: A bitter ad executive who has reached his breaking point lands in a mental institution, where his career actually begins to thrive with help from his fellow patients.

name: Without a Trace
plot: Estranged New Yorker (Kate Nelligan) turns to the police after her son disappears.

name: You Are Not Alone
plot: Two precocious boys explore their sexuality at boarding school.

name: Solo
plot: A robot soldier named Solo escapes after learning he will be deprogrammed and helps a village who are under attack by rebels.

name: The Mack
plot: Goldie returns from five years at the state pen and winds up King of the pimping game. Trouble comes in the form of two corrupt white cops and a crime lord who wants him to return to the small time.

name: Body Melt
plot: Residents of peaceful Pebbles Court, Homesville, are being used unknowingly as test experiments for a new 'Body Drug' that causes rapid body decomposition (melting skin etc.) and painful death.

name: At First Sight
plot: A blind man has an operation to regain his sight at the urging of his girlfriend and must deal with the changes to his life.

name: Recess: School's Out
plot: T.J. and the gang must save summer vacation from disappearing forever.

name: Waking the Dead
plot: A congressional candidate questions his sanity after seeing the love of his life, presumed dead, suddenly emerge.

name: As It Is in Heaven
plot: A famous international conductor returns to his small childhood town in Sweden for early retirement. He's asked to help with the church choir. He affects the lives of all in the choir.

name: At the Earth's Core
plot: A Victorian era scientist and his assistant take a test run in their Iron Mole drilling machine and end up in a strange underground labyrinth ruled by a species of giant telepathic bird and full of prehistoric monsters and cavemen.

name: Escape to Athena
plot: A World War II adventure involving a group of Allied P.O.W.s, Nazis, black market priceless art treasures, Greek resistance, a Greek monastery, and a secret German rocket base.

name: The Blood of Heroes
plot: In a future where most of mankind and technology is wiped out, six people travel from place to place playing a brutal form of football with a dog skull. They hope one day to play in the league in a city.

name: The Wild Thornberrys
plot: After losing a cheetah cub to ruthless poachers, Eliza must redeem her folly and go on a quest to save him.

name: The Gestapo's Last Orgy
plot: A Jewish woman who survived the horrors of a concentration camp revisits the ruins of the camp, along with a former SS officer, and recollects the humiliation, the torture, and the constant abuse she went through.

name: The Cars That Ate Paris
plot: The small town of Paris, Australia deliberately causes car accidents, then sells/salvages all valuables from the wrecks as a means of economy.

name: Buffalo Soldiers
plot: A criminal subculture operates among U.S. soldiers stationed in West Germany just before the fall of the Berlin wall.

name: Fascination
plot: A runaway criminal breaks into an eerie chateau, taking its two frightened chambermaids hostage. As night falls, a group of mysterious aristocratic women arrive and the criminal begins to realize the women are hiding a sinister secret.

name: Sword of the Valiant
plot: The Green Knight challenges King Arthur's knights. But only young Gawain accepts and decapitates him. The knight takes his head and now gives Gawain one year to learn about virtues, knighthood and then face the challenge himself.

name: A Dog's Will
plot: Follows the lives of 2 poor Brazilians and their schemes to get money and the consequences of their actions.

name: Interiors
plot: Three sisters find their lives spinning out of control in the wake of their parents' sudden, unexpected divorce.

name: The Matador
plot: A globetrotting hitman and a crestfallen businessman meet in a hotel bar in Mexico City in an encounter that draws them together in a way neither expected.

name: Let Sleeping Corpses Lie
plot: A cop chases two hippies suspected of a series of Manson family-like murders; unbeknownst to him, the real culprits are the living dead, brought to life with a hunger for human flesh by ultrasonic radiation being used for pest control.

name: Indian
plot: A veteran freedom fighter enraged with the rising crime and corruption in the society murders all the wrong doers one by one using an ancient martial arts technique.

name: Crossing Delancey
plot: A Manhattan single meets a man through her Jewish grandmother's matchmaker.

name: The Silver Brumby
plot: A mother tells her daughter a fable about the prince of the brumbies, brumby being a term for the feral horses of Australia, who must find its place among its kind, while one man makes it his mission to capture it and tame it.

name: Little Black Book
plot: A woman snoops through her boyfriend's palm pilot and reveals his former girlfriends, which causes her to question why they're still listed in his little black book.

name: The Sex Monster
plot: Marty Barnes gets more than he wishes for when he asks his wife to join him in a menage-a-trois. She loves it and he has created a Sex Monster.

name: White Coats
plot: Follows the misadventures of a group of young interns at a hospital/medical school - dealing with the pressures of school and love.

name: Telefon
plot: A Russian officer is sent to the U.S. to try and stop sleeper agents who will mindlessly attack government entities when they hear certain coded words.

name: Intacto
plot: In a world where luck can be taken from a lucky person by a luckier person's touch, a small group of lucky people compete to be the luckiest and for the other contestants' luck.

name: De-Lovely
plot: Inspecting a magical biographical stage musical, composer Cole Porter reviews his life and career with his wife, Linda.

name: The Upside of Anger
plot: When her husband unexpectedly disappears, a sharp-witted suburban wife and her daughters juggle their mom's romantic dilemmas and family dynamics.

name: Dr. T & the Women
plot: A wealthy gynecologist's ideal life is thrown into turmoil when the women closest to him begin to affect his life in unexpecting ways.

name: The Man Who Cried
plot: A young refugee traveling from Russia to America in search of her lost father falls for a gypsy horseman.

name: Insignificance
plot: Four 1950s icons meet in the same hotel room and two of them discover more in common between them than they ever anticipated.

name: Flesh and Bone
plot: Decades later, a son of a killer falls in love with a girl, whose family's horrifying murder he saw in childhood.

name: After Midnight
plot: A college class, Psychology of Fear, has a new teacher who believes that you have to feel fear to understand it. A group of students convene at the teacher's house, where scary stories are told.

name: Who'll Stop the Rain
plot: A Vietnam veteran gets conned into helping an old Marine friend smuggle drugs into the country but ends up having to go on the run with his friend's wife when the deal goes sour.

name: Curse of the Pink Panther
plot: Ensuing after the events of Clouseau's disappearance, his bosses at the Surete put a computer into service to elect a new shrewd detective, Sleigh, who turns up just as inept as Clouseau.

name: Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever
plot: Tasked with destroying each other, an FBI agent and a rogue DIA agent soon discover that a much bigger enemy is at work.

name: Biggles: Adventures in Time
plot: Daring British WWI fighter pilot James "Biggles" Bigglesworth and 1980s low-level business executive Jim Ferguson discover that they can time travel to each other's eras. They try to stop the Germans from changing the outcome of WWI.

name: The Island on Bird Street
plot: During World War II a Jewish boy is left on his own for months in a ruined house in the Warsaw Ghetto, where he must learn all the tricks of survival under constantly life-threatening conditions.

name: That Was Then... This Is Now
plot: Two juvenile delinquents find themselves growing apart, for one is growing up, and the other is staying young and reckless.

name: Prefontaine
plot: Based on the life of Olympic hopeful Steve Prefontaine, a long distance runner who lived in Oregon and died young.

name: The Fifth Seal
plot: In Budapest in 1944, a watchmaker, a book seller and a carpenter are drinking in a bar with the owner, when they are joined by a stranger. The watchmaker asks a hypothetical question that will change their lives.

name: Daisy Miller
plot: In this comedy of manners, Frederick Winterbourne tries to figure out the bright and bubbly Daisy Miller, only to be helped and hindered by false judgments from their fellow friends.

name: Jubilee
plot: Queen Elizabeth I travels 400 years into the future to witness the appalling revelation of a dystopian London overrun by corruption and a vicious gang of punk guerrilla girls led by the new Monarch of Punk.

name: The Man with One Red Shoe
plot: A man picked randomly out of a crowd is made the target of CIA survelliance and pursuit.

name: The Dead Pit
plot: The arrival of an amnesiac patient in a psychiatric hospital somehow frees a mad doctor, who was shot and entombed with his fiendish experiments in an abandoned wing of the asylum 20 years before.

name: Dead End Drive-In
plot: In the future, a health nut and his tag-along girlfriend become trapped in a drive-in theater that has become a concentration camp for outcast youths.

name: The Chamber
plot: A young man fresh out of law school tries to win a reprieve for his racist grandfather who is on death row.

name: Bliss
plot: A newly married happy couple visits a sex therapist to determine why the wife can't achieve an orgasm with her husband. This causes a horrific suppressed memory to emerge and she becomes more and more distant.

name: Love Stinks
plot: Seth Winnick has it all: a successful career in television, good friends, and a passionate relationship with beautiful Chelsea. However, when he fails to make a timely marriage proposal, Chelsea tries to make his life hell.

name: Boyfriends and Girlfriends
plot: In Paris outskirts Blanche, a young clerk, befriends Lea, a girl livelier than she is. Lea is going steady with Fabien who is a friend to Alexandre who is going steady with Adrienne but is however loved by Blanche. Somehow a way has to be found to get out of this emotional chaos!

name: Long Weekend
plot: When a suburban couple go camping for the weekend at a remote beach, they discover that nature isn't in an accommodating mood.

name: The Old Gun
plot: During World War II, a peaceful French surgeon decides to ruthlessly exterminate an SS squad because of the atrocities they'd just committed in his countryside home and childhood village.

name: Hustle
plot: At the instigation of a grieving father, a Los Angeles cop investigates the suspicious circumstances of a girl's apparent suicide.

name: Trail of the Pink Panther
plot: Journalist Marie Jouvet attempts to uncover the mysterious disappearance of Chief Inspector Jacques Clouseau.

name: The Morning After
plot: A washed up, alcoholic actress who is prone to blackouts wakes up next to a murdered man. Did she kill him and, if not, is she in danger?

name: Spiral
plot: The inhabitants of a small Japanese town become increasingly obsessed with and tormented by spirals.

name: Buster
plot: Based on the story of Ronald Christopher "Buster" Edwards (Phil Collins), one of the thieves involved in "The Great Train Robbery" of 1963.

name: We're No Angels
plot: Two escaped cons only prayer to escape is to pass themselves off as priests and pass by the police blockade at the border into the safety of Canada.

name: Topsy-Turvy
plot: Set in the 1880s, the story of how, during a creative dry spell, the partnership of the legendary musical/theatrical writers Gilbert and Sullivan almost dissolves, before they turn it all around and write the Mikado.

name: Terminal Velocity
plot: A maverick skydiver and a former KGB agent team up to stop the Russian mafia from stealing gold.

name: White Water Summer
plot: The story of a shy boy who gets convinced by his parents to spend a few summer days in the mountains. So, he joins a group, and the vacation begins. Unfortunately, things turn out to be a little tough for our small friend.

name: Peter's Friends
plot: Six former college friends, with two new friends, gather for a New Year's Eve weekend reunion at a large English countryside manor after ten years to reminisce about the good times now long gone.

name: Homegrown
plot: Three marijuana farmhands see their boss killed, ending their peaceful existence in NW California. They decide to harvest, process and sell the crop themselves. Crime bosses, corrupt cops, killer pilot, greed etc. ensue.

name: Forget Paris
plot: Mickey, an NBA referee, meets Ellen, an American airline official, in Paris. It develops into a relationship of ups and downs.

name: The Phantom of Liberty
plot: A series of surreal sequences that critique morality and society in a stream of consciousness style.

name: The Main Event
plot: A bankrupt entrepreneur attempts to recoup some of her losses by getting a washed-out boxer she picked up as a tax loss back into the ring - an idea her protégé isn't fond of.

name: Men Don't Leave
plot: Jessica Lange plays Beth in this warm-hearted, funny fable about staying together when all else is falling apart.

name: Watchers
plot: A boy takes in a stray dog, later discovering that it is an ultra-intelligent runaway being stalked by a dangerous creature from the same genetic research lab.

name: Empire
plot: A successful South Bronx drug dealer turns his back on his roots and gives money to a Wall Street broker to invest for him.

name: 976-EVIL
plot: People who dial 976-EVIL receive supernatural powers and turn into satanic killers. When Spike dialed 976-EVIL, he knew it was an expensive toll call, but he didn't know that he'd have to pay for it with his soul.

name: The Amazing Mr. Blunden
plot: Two children befriend ghosts in a haunted mansion. To help the ghosts, they make a potion allowing time travel to the past. After becoming housekeepers, they return to the mansion's past and aid the dead children.

name: The Twelve Chairs
plot: In 1920s Soviet Russia, a fallen aristocrat, a priest and a con artist search for a treasure of jewels hidden inside one of twelve dining chairs, lost during the revolution.

name: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
plot: Alice (Fiona Fullerton) falls down a rabbit hole and into a magical dream world populated by surreal characters and bewildering adventures. It's a journey of self-discovery for Alice as she searches for a way out of Wonderland and encounters many bizarre creatures such as the White Rabbit (Michael Crawford), the March Hare (Peter Sellers), the Queen of Hearts (Dame Flora Robson), and the Dormouse (Dudley Moore). Musical highlights include the inspiring song "The Me I Never Knew".

name: Blood and Wine
plot: A man who has failed as a father and husband commits a heist to make money for his fledging business, but things become complicated when his wife interferes.

name: Husbands and Wives
plot: When their best friends announce that they're separating, a professor and his wife discover the faults in their own marriage.

name: Black Moon
plot: To escape a gender war, a girl flees to a remote farmhouse and becomes part of an extensive family's unusual, perhaps even supernatural, lifestyle.

name: Extremities
plot: A woman takes revenge on the man who invades her home and tries to rape her.

name: Hawk the Slayer
plot: With the aid of his companions, a man seeks to defeat his evil brother who has taken a nun hostage.

name: Godzilla Against MechaGodzilla
plot: A new Godzilla causes the JSDF to construct a cyborg countermeasure from the original monster's remains. The beast's restless soul is discovered to inhabit the machine as the pilot must learn to find value in her own life.

name: Daniel the Wizard
plot: Evil assassins want to kill Daniel Kublbock, the third runner up for the German Idols.

name: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
plot: One year after their first adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and they set out to discover its secrets.

name: Urotsukidoji: Legend of the Overfiend
plot: The relative coexistence of the human world, demon world and beast world is soon to be disrupted by The Overfiend, an immensely powerful demon who'll be reborn after 3000 years to remake the world to his own liking.

name: The Lords of Discipline
plot: In 1960s America, a black cadet is allowed acceptance into a seemingly prestigious military academy, unleashing a barrage of corruption within the system that another cadet is willing to expose.

name: Side Out
plot: A law student comes to California for the summer and ends up playing professional volleyball.

name: K2
plot: A U.S. climbing team, funded by millionaire Clairborne is determined to conquer K2.

name: Prayer of the Rollerboys
plot: In a dystopian near future America, a young man infiltrates a powerful drug dealing rollerblading youth gang that runs his town in order to end their reign for good.

name: The Story of Adele H
plot: The story of Adèle Hugo's unrequited love for a lieutenant.

name: Q&A
plot: Dirty cop, Mike Brennan thinks he got away with murder. But during a routine Q&A, the righteous assistant DA finds a clue that sets them both on a collision course.

name: Herbie Goes Bananas
plot: The adorable little VW helps its owners break up a counterfeiting ring in Mexico.

name: Uptown Saturday Night
plot: At Madame Zenobia's illegal nightclub, when Steve Jackson and Wardell Franklin get robbed of their wallets containing a winning lottery ticket, they set out to recover it.

name: Distant
plot: After his wife leaves him, a photographer has an existential crisis and tries to cope with his cousin's visit.

name: Irreconcilable Differences
plot: Alternating between the past and the present, a precocious little girl sues her selfish, career-driven parents for emancipation, surprising them both.

name: Dobermann
plot: Dobermann is the world's most ruthless bank robber and with his gang rob bank after bank, now in Paris. What can the police do but to let the mad, morally bankrupt police commissioner loose on him?

name: Avalanche Express
plot: Soviet KGB General Marenkov defects to the Americans and together with his CIA handler Harry Wargrave they plan an operation meant to reveal the KGB agents in Europe.

name: Maqbool
plot: The intrigue of the Shakespearean tragedy 'Macbeth' is transposed to the Mumbai underworld.

name: The Private Life of Sherlock Holmes
plot: When a bored Holmes eagerly takes the case of Gabrielle Valladon after an attempt on her life, the search for her missing husband leads to Loch Ness and the legendary monster.

name: Avenging Angelo
plot: A woman who has just discovered she is the daughter of a murdered Mafia chieftain seeks revenge, with the aide of her father's faithful bodyguard.

name: The Medusa Touch
plot: A telekinetic novelist causes disasters simply by thinking about them.

name: Swades
plot: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

name: Wise Guys
plot: Harry Valentini and Moe Dickstein are both errand boys for the Mob. When they lose two hundred fifty thousand dollars, they are set up to kill each other. But they run off to Atlantic City, and comedy follows.

name: A Far Off Place
plot: When a gang of African poachers raid her family's farm, young Nonni, visiting American teenager Harry Winslow and a local bushman guide must escape into the Kalahari desert and reach the nearest town.

name: Turtles Can Fly
plot: Near the Iraqi-Turkish border on the eve of an American invasion, refugee children like 13-year-old Kak (Ebrahim), gauge and await their fate.

name: Mr. Baseball
plot: Jack Elliot, once a great baseball player, is forced to play in Japan where his brash, egotistical ways cause friction with his new teammates and friends.

name: Dead Man's Curve
plot: Two college students kill their roommate and make it look like a suicide.

name: The Hunting Party
plot: A ruthless rancher and his gang use extremely long range rifles to kill the men who kidnapped his infidel wife.

name: The Last Broadcast
plot: A film crew ventures into the forest in search of the mythical 'Jersey Devil'.

name: Trapped in Paradise
plot: Residents of a friendly Pennsylvania town foil three brothers' plan to rob a bank on Christmas Eve.

name: Barcelona
plot: An American working in Barcelona, having sworn off beautiful women, is forced to be host to his playboy cousin in this witty comedy of good intentions and mixed signals.

name: Nightbeast
plot: A creature from outer space crash lands in a small town and starts killing people.

name: Deranged
plot: A deranged rural farmer becomes a grave robber and murderer after the death of his possessive mother, whose corpse he keeps, among others, as his companion in a decaying farmhouse.

name: Making Love
plot: A successful young L.A. doctor and his equally successful television-producer wife find their happily-ever-after life torn assunder when he suddenly confronts his long-repressed attraction for other men. Zach and Claire live a comfortable life secure in their love for one another when Bart, a swinging L.A. novelist, walks into Zach's office and awakens unfamiliar feelings in him. In a move which leaves him wracked with guilt, Zach cancels dinner with his wife in order to go out with Bart. He is inexplicably drawn to this man who seems intent on keeping him at arms distance. Why can't Bart allow their relationship to grow? he wonders. Exasperated, he asks Bart, "Do you snore? Does anybody ever get a chance to find out?" As Zach's absences become more and more frequent, Claire's concern manifests itself in the suspicion that he is having an affair with another woman. Jilted by Bart and feeling alone for the first time in his married life, Zach resolves to tell Claire the truth about himself. Predictably, Claire is shocked that she could have known so little about the man she has loved for so many years and accuses him of deceiving her from the very start.

name: The Hand
plot: A comic book artist loses his hand, which in turn takes on a murderous life of its own.

name: Unforgettable
plot: A Seattle medical examiner uses an experimental memory transference drug to unravel the mystery surrounding his Wife's brutal murder.

name: Crimewave
plot: A pair of whacked-out cartoon-like exterminator/hitmen kill the owner of a burglar-alarm company, and stalk the partner who hired them, his wife, and a nerd framed for the murder, who tells the story in flashback from the electric chair.

name: School Spirit
plot: A college student gets into a car crash and becomes a special kind of ghost who can make himself invisible or corporeal at will. He takes advantage of his powers to pursue his fellow female students, during the infamous 'Hog Day'.

name: Golden Balls
plot: A construction worker uses his charm and bravado in an attempt to attain enough finances to build his dream project.

name: One Last Dance
plot: In the wake of tragedy, a renowned NY dance company is on the brink of collapse. After leaving the dance world for good, Travis, Chrissa and Max have one last chance to re-connect with the passion and prove that miracles really can happen.

name: Intersection
plot: While driving on a remote highway, a man is torn between choosing to reunite with his estranged wife or taking up with his lover.

name: Absurd
plot: A priest-doctor chasing a man with supernatural regenerative abilities, who has recently escaped from a medical lab, reaches a small town where the mutant goes on a killing spree.

name: Pulp
plot: A seedy writer of sleazy pulp novels is recruited by a quirky, reclusive ex-actor to help him write his biography at his house in Malta.

name: All the Real Girls
plot: Small-town love story of a young man with a reputation for womanizing and his best friend's sister.

name: The French Sex Murders
plot: A man is accused of killing his favorite prostitute in a French brothel. He's tried and sentenced to death. He tries to escape but dies during pursuit. Soon, people connected to the case are killed one by one.

name: Guns
plot: After a failed assassination attempt on her partner, DEA agent Donna Hamilton discovers that the crime lord responsible for her father's death is coming after her and her associates.

name: Son of the Pink Panther
plot: Charles Dreyfus encounters Jacques Gambrelli, who reminds him painfully of Inspector Clouseau, the man who drove him insane. With good reason: Gambrelli is Clouseau's son.

name: Mad Dog and Glory
plot: When shy, soft-spoken Chicago detective Wayne "Mad Dog" Dobie inadvertently saves the life of local gangster Frank Milo, he's the reluctant recipient of an unusual one week "thank you" gift - a beautiful bartender named Glory.

name: Godzilla vs. Hedorah
plot: An ever-evolving alien life form from the Dark Gaseous Nebula arrives to consume rampant pollution. Spewing mists of sulfuric acid and corrosive sludge, neither humanity or Godzilla may be able to defeat this toxic menace.

name: Town & Country
plot: Two loving middle aged couples get caught in a series of marital misadventures over reasons of fidelity.

name: Torch Song Trilogy
plot: Arnold is a gay man working as drag queen in 1971 NYC. He meets a handsome bisexual man.

name: They Call Me Mister Tibbs!
plot: In San Francisco, a high-priced call girl is murdered and the case is assigned to Police Lieutenant Virgil Tibbs.

name: Brothers
plot: Two brothers must negotiate changing roles and shifting family dynamics when one is sent to war in Afghanistan.

name: A Stranger Among Us
plot: Emily, a tough NYPD cop, is sent to an orthodox Jewish community to investigate a missing person plus $720,000 in missing diamonds. To solve what becomes a murder case, she has to join the community.

name: Bronco Billy
plot: An idealistic, modern-day cowboy struggles to keep his Wild West show afloat in the face of hard luck and waning interest.

name: Piglet's Big Movie
plot: When Piglet comes up missing his Hundred Acre Wood friends use Piglet's own Book of Memories to find him, discovering along the way just how big a role he's played in their lives.

name: Eureka
plot: In 1925, a lone and obsessed Arctic prospector Jack McCann finally strikes gold. Twenty years later, he begins spiraling out of control when his only daughter becomes engaged to a man he strongly dislikes.

name: A Simple Wish
plot: A bumbling fairy godfather tries to grant a girl's wish that her cabby father lands a Broadway role.

name: Time of the Wolf
plot: When Anna and her family arrive at their holiday home, they find it occupied by strangers. This confrontation is just the beginning of a painful learning process.

name: Bob Roberts
plot: A conservative folk singer turns his hand to politics, running for the US Senate. He is not above dirty tricks and smear campaigns to gain an advantage over his opponent.

name: Pieces of April
plot: A wayward daughter invites her dying mother and the rest of her estranged family to her apartment for Thanksgiving dinner.

name: Made in Heaven
plot: After being dumped by his girlfriend, a boy runs away to California. But he ends up in heaven because he dies after trying to help a family from drowning in a river. In heaven he'll meet a beautiful girl, who has never reincarnated before.

name: Hey Good Lookin'
plot: An outrageous, affectionate look at coming of age in Eisenhower-era Brooklyn.

name: Where the Buffalo Roam
plot: Semi-biographical film based on the experiences of gonzo journalist Hunter S. Thompson.

name: Hanover Street
plot: Margaret is a nurse in England during WW2, and married to a secret agent. Things get complicated when she falls for David, an American pilot.

name: Deathwatch
plot: In the middle of World War I, nine British soldiers caught behind enemy lines seek refuge in a complex network of German trenches. What they soon discover is that they aren't alone - and it isn't a German soldier that's hunting them down.

name: The Long Weekend
plot: A comedy about two brothers, uptight Ed and playboy Cooper. Ed has a weekend to save his career, but Cooper has other plans for the weekend; to help his stressed out brother get lucky with the ladies.

name: The Cat's Meow
plot: Semi-true story of the Hollywood murder that occurred at a star-studded gathering aboard William Randolph Hearst's yacht in 1924.

name: The Nightcomers
plot: Prequel to Henry James' "The Turn of the Screw", focusing on groundskeeper Peter Quint's slow corruption of the virtuous governess Miss Jessel and the children she looks after.

name: CB4
plot: A guy makes a documentary of the rap band CB4 by following them. CB4 got popular by stealing Gusto's name, background and image. He wants them dead.

name: Head of the Family
plot: The "head" of the family is literally that - a giant head on a tiny body, who psychically controls the rest of his even more unusual family.

name: Four Flies on Grey Velvet
plot: A musician is stalked by an unknown homicidal maniac, who blackmails him for the accidental killing of another stalker.

name: Junior Bonner
plot: Ace Bonner returns to Arizona several years after he abandoned his family, Junior Bonner is a wild young man. Against the typical rodeo championship, family drama erupts.

name: Sounder
plot: The oldest son of a loving and strong family of black sharecroppers comes of age in the Depression-era South after his father is imprisoned for stealing food.

name: Frankenstein Unbound
plot: The ultimate weapon which was meant to be safe for the mankind produces global side effects including time slides and disappearances.The scientist behind the project and his car are zapped from the year 2031 to 1817's Switzerland.

name: Two of a Kind
plot: When God decides to destroy Earth, four angels aim to redeem mankind through a young man and woman with their own troubles.

name: Woman on Top
plot: After being cheated on by an insecure man, Brazilian chef Isabella Oliveira moves to San Francisco and finds success as the host of a cooking show.

name: The Protector
plot: Two New York City cops, Billy Wong and Danny Garoni, head to Hong Kong after the daughter of a rich businessman is kidnapped by the drug lord, Mr. Ko.

name: Chattahoochee
plot: In 1955 Florida, a Korean vet has a breakdown and is incarcerated in a "maximum security" mental health prison, where patients are abused.

name: The Butcher Boy
plot: The antisocial son of an alcoholic father and a bipolar mother grows up in 1960s Ireland.

name: The Order
plot: A young priest is sent to Rome to investigate the troubling death of the head of his order.

name: Young Einstein
plot: Albert Einstein turns the science community upside down with his discoveries including a formula to put bubbles back in beer and rock n' roll.

name: King of the Hill
plot: A young boy struggles on his own in a run-down hotel after his parents and younger brother are separated from him in 1930s Depression-era Midwest.

name: Just Before Dawn
plot: Five young people venture into the backwoods of Oregon to claim a property, and find themselves being stalked by a hulking, machete-wielding psychopath.

name: Mr. Destiny
plot: Unhappy Larry Burrows sees what his life could have been like if he had made that winning home run as a teenager.

name: Landscape in the Mist
plot: Two children journey the long road to Germany to find the man they believe to be their father.

name: Out to Sea
plot: A failed gambler, intent on meeting a rich widow, tricks his widowed brother-in-law into boarding a cruise ship as dance hosts.

name: Scorpio
plot: During the Cold War, the CIA orders free-lance operative Scorpio to assassinate his former CIA mentor Cross and a deadly cat-and-mouse game ensues.

name: The Legacy
plot: An American couple in England stumble upon a rambling mansion where a number of powerful individuals have been summoned by its patriarch regarding the home's legacy.

name: The Legend of Boggy Creek
plot: A documentary-style drama about the "Fouke Monster", a Bigfoot-type creature that has been sighted in and around Fouke, Arkansas since the 1950s.

name: Undertow
plot: Pig farmer and widower John Munn is raising his two sons in an isolated farmhouse, until his troubled brother arrives and changes their lives forever.

name: The Hiding Place
plot: During WWII, a Dutch family caught hiding Jews is sent to a concentration camp where their Christian faith helps them endure the hardships.

name: Flodder
plot: A rather a-social family, gets a chance to live in an upper-class neighborhood. As they are not accepted by the snobs living there, they get in all sorts of trouble.

name: Coming Soon
plot: The trials and tribulations of wealthy young Manhattanites and their sexual coming of age, a romantic comedy set at an Upper East Side preparatory school.

name: Poison for the Fairies
plot: A 10 year old girl convinces a lonely classmate that she is a witch, forcing the child to become her assistant. Though their games are initially rather naive, they gradually take a nasty and violent turn.

name: City of Joy
plot: An American doctor, a British nurse, and an illiterate Indian farmer unite to transform a Calcutta ghetto in this uplifting, inspirational movie starring Patrick Swayze and Pauline Collins.

name: Agatha
plot: December 1926, Agatha Christie's husband asks for a divorce. She leaves her car and goes missing 11 days. She books into a hotel as Mrs. Neele. Fiction: A US reporter looks for her and investigates.

name: Godsend
plot: A couple agree to have their deceased son cloned, under the supervision of an enigmatic doctor, but bizarre things start to happen several years after his rebirth.

name: Going All the Way
plot: After returning home from the Korean War, two young men search for love and fulfillment in middle America.

name: Domestic Disturbance
plot: When Danny witnesses his stepfather Rick murder a man, Danny's father Frank has to protect his son from the greatest danger.

name: Virus
plot: After a virus devastates the global human population, survivors in Antarctica desperately try to find a cure and save the human race.

name: The Long Walk Home
plot: Two women, black and white, in 1955 Montgomery Alabama, must decide what they are going to do in response to the famous bus boycott led by Martin Luther King.

name: Dust Devil
plot: A woman on the run from her abusive husband encounters a mysterious hitch-hiker.

name: A Shock to the System
plot: When electrocuted by the fuse box at home, Graham gets ideas concerning his nagging wife and the guy, who got Graham's promotion at the office.

name: Fright
plot: An English baby sitter is terrorized by her friend's ex-husband, escaped from an asylum.

name: The Brothers McMullen
plot: Three Irish Catholic brothers from Long Island struggle to deal with love, marriage, and infidelity.

name: The Valachi Papers
plot: Gangster Joe Valachi is a marked man in the same joint where mob boss Don Vito Genovese is imprisoned and he's forced to co-operate with the DA in exchange for protection.

name: The Butcher
plot: An unlikely friendship between a dour, working class butcher and a repressed schoolteacher coincides with a grisly series of Ripper-type murders in a provincial French town.

name: That Darn Cat
plot: A maid is kidnapped and scratches a message onto D.C. the cat's collar and when his owner Patti discovers this, she plays amateur detective with the help of D.C. to try to find the culprits.

name: Hell
plot: Paul and Nelly have everything to be happy: a dream wedding and a hotel. Until Paul starts to doubt Nelly.

name: The Monster
plot: After a series of bizarre actions, Loris is mistaken for a serial killer. Jessica, a policewoman in undercover, will try to induce him to commit a murder.

name: Paradise Road
plot: A group of women who are imprisoned on the island of Sumatra by the Japanese during World War II use music to relieve their misery.

name: Monte Walsh
plot: An aging cowboy realizes that the West he knew and loved will soon be no more--and that there will be no room for him, either.

name: Rats: Night of Terror
plot: In a post-apocalyptic earth, where most of humanity lives underground, a group of surface people stumble upon an abandoned lab that was trying to bring life back to the earth's surface, but the place is run over by vicious rats.

name: Billy Bathgate
plot: In the year 1935, a teen named Billy Bathgate finds first love while becoming the protégé of fledgling gangster Dutch Schultz.

name: Cadence
plot: Charlie Sheen plays a rebellious inmate in an Army stockade.

name: The Whales of August
plot: Two aged sisters reflect on life and the past during a late summer day in Maine.

name: El Norte
plot: After their family is killed in a government massacre, siblings Enrique and Rosa flee Guatemala and embark on a perilous journey to "El Norte": the United States.

name: Leap of Faith
plot: Fake faith healer Jonas Nightingale is stranded in a small town where he finds he can't fool all of the people all of the time.

name: The Nest
plot: Horrifying shocker as a biological experiment goes haywire when meat-eating mutant roaches invade an island community, terrorizing a peaceful New England fishing village and hideously butchering its citizens.

name: Satan's Slave
plot: A woman traveling with her parents to her uncle's house crash near his house. Her parents die but she survives. She stays with her uncle, but it becomes clear that he and his son are planning something sinister for her.

name: Herbie Rides Again
plot: The living Volkswagen Beetle helps an old lady protect her home from a corrupt developer.

name: The Driller Killer
plot: An artist slowly goes insane while struggling to pay his bills, work on his paintings, and care for his two female roommates, which leads him taking to the streets of New York after dark and randomly killing derelicts with a power drill.

name: Plump Fiction
plot: Follows the plot of Pulp Fiction (1994). Scenes from other movies are also parodied.

name: The Candy Snatchers
plot: A nonverbal autistic boy stumbles upon a teenage heiress who has been kidnapped by a trio of young psychopaths, who are intent on extorting diamonds from her stepfather.

name: Without Limits
plot: The life of renowned runner Steve Prefontaine and his relationship with legendary coach Bill Bowerman.

name: Do or Die
plot: Hunted down by six teams of assassins hired by a Japanese crime lord, Federal agents Donna and Nicole struggle to survive, with help from their agency friends.

name: The Boys in Company C
plot: In 1967, five young men undergo boot camp training before being shipped out to Vietnam. Once they get there, the experience proves worse than they could have imagined.

name: For Richer or Poorer
plot: An unhappily married Manhattan socialite couple flee from the I.R.S. and end up in Amish country where they pretend to be visiting relatives.

name: The Bishop's Bedroom
plot: Mario, a rich and eccentric war hero befriends Marco, a loner with a sailboat and takes him home to meet his estranged wife Cleofe and sexually repressed sister in law Matilde.

name: Full Frontal
plot: A day in the life of a group of men and women in Hollywood, in the hours leading up to a friend's birthday party.

name: Tarzan and the Lost City
plot: Tarzan returns to his homeland of Africa to save his home from destruction.

name: Conquest
plot: A young man, armed with a magical bow and arrows, embarks on a mystical journey through a mystical land to rid it of all evil and joins forces with an outlaw to take down an evil witch bent on claiming the magic bow for evil.

name: Stewardess School
plot: The zany "stewdents" at a wacky flight attendants' school have all sorts of wild and crazy high-flying adventures in this '80s comedy.

name: Albino Alligator
plot: While escaping from a foiled robbery attempt, three thieves find themselves surrounded by police at a New Orleans bar--only they're not the people the police are searching for.

name: Taking Off
plot: While searching for their runaway teenage daughter, the parents rediscover the pleasures of life as they get acquainted with a self-help group for parents of vanished children.

name: The Beekeeper
plot: A bee keeper, Spiros, travels from the north to the south of Greece with his bees to meet the spring.

name: Mausoleum
plot: A 10 year-old girl, mourning the death of her mother, becomes possessed by a demon who has been preying on her female ancestors for centuries. Years later, the demon starts to take over, both mentally and physically.

name: Dr. Jekyll and Ms. Hyde
plot: A scientist creating perfumes inherits his great grandfather Dr. Jekyll's formula and decides to use modern technology to improve it. He ends up as an ambitious, ruthless woman. She tries to prevent returning into the spineless man.

name: Bloodbath at the House of Death
plot: Six scientists investigate a strange phenomenon at the creepy Headstone Manor, the site of a mysterious massacre years earlier that took the lives of 18 guests in one night.

name: Bad Blood
plot: As a deadly virus which infects people who have loveless sex sweeps Paris, a lonely pariah attempts to steal a potent antidote, only to fall for the mistress of his partner-in-crime. Is the infectious young love the cure to the bad blood?

name: The Music of Chance
plot: A thrill seeker agrees to help a shady professional gambler win a high stakes poker game. However, they lose and become captives of two eccentric rich men who decide to forcibly keep them on their remote gated ranch as indentured servants.

name: Scream and Scream Again
plot: A serial killer who drains his victims' blood is on the loose in London. The police follow him to a house owned by an eccentric scientist.

name: Friday Foster
plot: At Los Angeles airport, magazine photographer Friday Foster witnesses an assassination attempt against billionaire Blake Tarr and is drawn into a murky political conspiracy.

name: Jack & Sarah
plot: A young American woman becomes a nanny in the home of a recent British widower.

name: The Kindred
plot: A geneticist takes his assistants to his old family home to locate the deadly product of his late mother's revolutionary research into rapid human evolution--his monstrous, tentacled baby brother--before a mad scientist gets to him first.

name: The Octagon
plot: A martial artist must defeat a plan by ninjas to create a worldwide training camp for terrorists.

name: Carnosaur
plot: A genetically manipulated and very hungry dinosaur escapes from a bioengineering company and wreaks havoc on the local desert town. A security guard and a girl environmentalist try to stop both it and the company's doomsday bioweapon.

name: Savannah Smiles
plot: Savannah is the only child of a wealthy politician, Richard Driscoll, who is more concerned with his image and career than with his family.

name: Burnt by the Sun
plot: In the USSR in 1936, shadows of Stalin's repressions fall on a famous, revolutionary hero. The accusations of him being a foreign spy are nonsense, and everyone knows that. However, a slow process of his downfall has already started.

name: Rancho Deluxe
plot: Two drifters, of widely varying backgrounds, rustle cattle and try to avoid being caught in contemporary Montana.

name: Panic
plot: Alex, a hit man, tries to get out of the family business, but his father won't let him do so. While seeking the help of a therapist, he meets a sexually charged 23-year-old woman with whom he falls in love.

name: Nightmare City
plot: An airplane exposed to radiation lands, and blood drinking zombies emerge armed with knives, guns and teeth! They go on a rampage slicing, dicing, and biting their way across the Italian countryside.

name: Guest House Paradiso
plot: Richie and Eddie, a perverted loser and his alcoholic partner-in-crime, run the worst hotel in Britain: the Guest House Paradiso.

name: The Myth
plot: Archeologist Jack keeps having reoccurring dreams of a past life, where he is the great general Meng Yi, who is sworn to protect a princess named Ok-Soo. Jack decides to go investigate everything with his friend William.

name: Christopher Columbus: The Discovery
plot: Genoese navigator overcomes intrigue in the court of King Ferdinand and Queen Isabella of Spain and gains financing for his expedition to the East Indies.

name: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
plot: An insurance investigator and an efficiency expert who hate each other are both hypnotized by a crooked hypnotist with a jade scorpion into stealing jewels.

name: Hitch-Hike
plot: A bickering couple driving cross-country pick up a murderous hitchhiker who threatens to kill them unless they take him to a sanctuary. In return he agrees to split some bank loot he has on him.

name: Live Wire
plot: After A US senator is killed, A Bomb Disposal Expert is brought in to investigate the deadly explosive and must uncover the terrorists plan.

name: The Boogens
plot: Otherworldly creatures are released from the bootleg tunnels underneath a small-town mining community, and begin chomping on the locals.

name: Night Watch
plot: Elizabeth Taylor plays a woman who is a witness to murder...but whose?

name: Impostor
plot: In the future, an alien race uses androids as bombs to attack Earth. A government weapons specialist is accused of being one such android and sets out to prove his innocence.

name: Buck Rogers in the 25th Century
plot: A 20th century astronaut emerges out of 500 years of suspended animation into a future time where Earth is threatened by alien invaders.

name: Snake in the Eagle's Shadow
plot: An orphan who has been raised at a kung fu school, where he is treated as little more than a dogsbody and practice target for the students, has a life-changing experience after helping an old peripatetic beggar.

name: The Swamp
plot: The life of two women and their families in a small provincial town of Salta, Argentina.

name: Spasms
plot: A gigantic serpent is captured on a remote island and shipped to an American college for experimentation. A British millionaire and an American scientist must pursue the beast when it escapes and starts to kill innocent people.

name: The Prey
plot: Three couples go on a camping trip in the woods of southern California during the summer, where a deformed man is stalking their camp.

name: The Man Who Loved Women
plot: Bertrand Morane's burial is attended by all the women the forty-year-old engineer loved. We then flash back to Bertrand's life and love affairs, told by himself while writing an autobiographical novel. A film about romantic relationships, the need to charm, and the literary creation.

name: Meatballs III: Summer Job
plot: The ghost of a dead porn star comes to Earth to help a nerd with his sex life.

name: Rumpelstiltskin
plot: The wish of a young widow to see her police officer husband, killed on the line of duty, frees a demonic creature who wants to claim the soul of her baby.

name: Farinelli
plot: The story of castrato opera singer Carlo Broschi, who enthralled 18th-century European audiences under his stage name Farinelli.

name: Ghosts of Mississippi
plot: A Mississippi district attorney and the widow of Medgar Evers struggle to finally bring a white racist to justice for the 1963 murder of the civil rights leader.

name: The Other Side of the Mountain
plot: Young ski champion Jill Kinmont is left paralyzed after a tragic skiing accident. Her best friend suffers the same fate after contracting polio. Jill must slowly put her life back together again with the help of those close to her.

name: Deadly Prey
plot: A group of sadistic mercenaries kidnap people off the streets and set them loose on the grounds of their secret camp, so the "students" at the camp can learn how to track down and kill their prey.

name: Twilight's Last Gleaming
plot: An imprisoned rogue USAF general with a secret personal agenda, escapes the brig and takes over an ICBM silo, threatening to start WW3.

name: Taking Care of Business
plot: An uptight advertising exec has his entire life in a Filofax organizer that mistakenly ends up in the hands of a friendly convict who poses as him.

name: March of the Penguins
plot: In the Antarctic, every March since the beginning of time, the quest begins to find the perfect mate and start a family.

name: One Good Cop
plot: An NYPD Detective (Michael Keaton) and his struggle for justice, while taking care of his late partner's three little girls after he is killed in the line of duty.

name: Bats
plot: Genetically mutated bats escape and it's up to a bat expert and the local sheriff to stop them.

name: High Heels
plot: A singer returns after 15 years abroad to perform in Madrid and finds her 27 y.o. daughter married to one of her mom's ex-lovers.

name: Valdez Is Coming
plot: A Mexican-American sheriff (Burt Lancaster) must resort to violence against a powerful rancher (Frank Tanner, played by Jon Cypher) in order to get just compensation for the pregnant Indian widow of a wrongly killed black man.

name: China Moon
plot: Detective Kyle Bodine falls for Rachel Munro who is trapped in a violent marriage. After shooting her husband, Kyle reluctantly agrees to help hide the body, but Kyle's partner is showing an unusual flair for finding clues.

name: Silent Fall
plot: An autistic boy witnesses his parents' double murder. A controversial therapist seeks to probe the child's mind in order to solve the case.

name: Far from Home
plot: A teenage girl and her father driving cross-country become stranded when their car runs out of gas in a remote Nevada desert town and they're forced to stay in a dilapidated trailer park where a serial killer lurks.

name: The Bermuda Triangle
plot: The passengers and crew of a ship on a scuba diving trip in the Caribbean stray into the famed Bermuda Triangle, and mysterious and deadly things start happening.

name: Beyond the Door
plot: Juliet Mills plays a young pregnant woman in San Francisco who is going to have the devil's baby during her strange possession. Richard Johnson shows up to help her... but what does he really want?

name: The Green Ray
plot: It's July, and Delphine has nowhere to go for the summer. She feels very bored and "empty", but this won't last; one day she accidently meets someone who seems to be totally made for her...

name: Down to Earth
plot: After dying before his time, an aspiring black comic gets a second shot at life - by being placed in the body of a wealthy white businessman.
